## <a name="gx_button_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1528">gx_button_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1528">gx_button_background_draw</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1529">Rysuj tło przycisku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1529">Draw button background</span></span>

###<a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1530">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1530">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_button_background_draw(GX_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1531">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1531">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1532">Ta usługa rysuje tło przycisku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1532">This service draws the button background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1533">Ta funkcja jest zwykle wywoływana wewnętrznie przez funkcję gx_button_draw, ale jest dostępna dla aplikacji, aby pomóc w tworzeniu niestandardowych funkcji rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1533">This function is normally called internally by the gx_button_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1534">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1534">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1535">**przycisk** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki przycisku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1535">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1536">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1536">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1537">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1537">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1538">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1538">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1539">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1539">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1540">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1540">Example</span></span>

```C
VOID custom_button_draw(GX_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Draw button background. */
    gx_button_background_draw(button);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)button);
}
```

## <a name="gx_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1555">gx_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1555">gx_button_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1556">Przycisk Utwórz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1556">Create button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1557">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1557">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_button_create(
    GX_BUTTON *button, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT button_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1558">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1558">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1559">Ta usługa tworzy określony przycisk i kojarzy przycisk z podanym widżetem nadrzędnym.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1559">This service creates a button as specified and associates the button with the supplied parent widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1560">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1560">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1561">**przycisk** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki przycisku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1561">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1562">**Nazwa** Logiczna nazwa przycisku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1562">**name** Logical name of button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1563">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do elementu nadrzędnego widget przycisku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1563">**parent** Pointer to parent widget of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1564">**styl** Styl przycisku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1564">**style** Button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1565">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich elementów widget, a także style charakterystyczne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1565">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1566">**button_id** Zdefiniowany przez aplikację identyfikator przycisku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1566">**button_id** Application-defined ID of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1567">**rozmiar** Rozmiar przycisku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1567">**size** Size of the button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1568">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1568">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1569">Tworzenie przycisku pomyślnego **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1569">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful button creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1570">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1570">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1571">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1571">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1572">Element widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) został już utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1572">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1573">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontrolki widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1573">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1574">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1574">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1575">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1575">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1576">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1576">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BUTTON my_top_button;

/* Create a stop button. */
status = gx_button_create(&my_stop_button, "my stop button",
                            &my_parent_window,
                            GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE,
                            MY_STOP_BUTTON_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the stop button was successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_button_deselect"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1591">gx_button_deselect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1591">gx_button_deselect</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1592">Przycisk Anuluj wybór</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1592">Deselect button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1593">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1593">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_button_deselect(
    GX_BUTTON *button, 
    GX_BOOL gen_event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1594">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1594">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1595">Ta usługa dewybiera określony przycisk i generuje zdarzenie sygnału w zależności od stylów przycisków.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1595">This service deselects the specified button and generate a signal event depending on button styles.</span></span>


| <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1596">Styl przycisku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1596">Button Style</span></span>              | <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1597">Wysłać</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1597">Signal</span></span>                     |
|---------------------------|----------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1598">Brak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1598">None</span></span>                      | <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1599">GX_EVENT_CLICKED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1599">GX_EVENT_CLICKED</span></span>         |
| <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1600">GX_STYLE_BUTTON_RADIO</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1600">GX_STYLE_BUTTON_RADIO</span></span>  | <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1601">GX_EVENT_RADIO_DESELECT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1601">GX_EVENT_RADIO_DESELECT</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1602">GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1602">GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1603">GX_EVENT_TOGGLE_OFF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1603">GX_EVENT_TOGGLE_OFF</span></span>     |



### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1604">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1604">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1605">**przycisk** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki przycisku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1605">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1606">**gen_event** Jeśli GX_TRUE, przycisk spowoduje wygenerowanie zdarzenia GX_EVENT_CLICKED, GX_EVENT_DESELECT lub GX_EVENT_TOGGLE_OFFSET w zależności od stylu przycisku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1606">**gen_event** If GX_TRUE, the button will generate a GX_EVENT_CLICKED, GX_EVENT_DESELECT, or GX_EVENT_TOGGLE_OFFSET event depending on the button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1607">Jeśli GX_FALSE, przycisk nie będzie generował żadnego zdarzenia wyższego poziomu nawet wtedy, gdy będzie to normalne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1607">If GX_FALSE, the button will not generate any higher level event even if it would normally do so.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1608">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1608">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1610">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1610">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1611">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1611">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1612">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1612">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

## <a name="gx_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1630">gx_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1630">gx_button_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1631">Przycisk rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1631">Draw button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1632">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1632">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_button_draw(GX_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1633">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1633">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1634">Ta usługa Rysuje określony przycisk.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1634">This service draws the specified button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1635">Ta funkcja jest zwykle wywoływana wewnętrznie przez mechanizm odświeżania kanwy GUIX, ale jest dostępna dla aplikacji, aby pomóc w zaimplementowaniu niestandardowych funkcji rysowania dla widżetów przycisków niestandardowych.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1635">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom button widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1636">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1636">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1637">**przycisk** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki przycisku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1637">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1638">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1638">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1639">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1639">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1640">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1640">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1641">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1641">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1642">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1642">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom button draw function. */
VOID custom_button_draw(GX_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Call default button draw. */
    gx_button_draw(button);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}

```

## <a name="gx_button_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1657">gx_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1657">gx_button_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1658">Zdarzenie przycisku procesu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1658">Process button event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1659">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1659">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_button_event_process(
    GX_BUTTON *button, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1660">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1660">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1661">Ta usługa przetwarza zdarzenie dla określonego przycisku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1661">This service processes an event for the specified button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1662">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1662">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1663">**przycisk** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki przycisku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1663">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1664">**event_ptr** Wskaźnik do zdarzenia do przetworzenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1664">**event_ptr** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1665">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1665">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1666">Proces zdarzenia pomyślnego przycisku **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1666">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful button event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1667">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1667">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1668">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1668">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1669">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1669">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1670">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1670">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1671">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1671">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic button event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_button_event_process(GX_BUTTON *button,
                                 GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default button
            event processing */
        status = gx_button_event_process(button, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_alpha_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1723">gx_canvas_alpha_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1723">gx_canvas_alpha_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1724">Ustaw wartość alfa-Blend dla kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1724">Set alpha-blend value for canvas</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1725">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1725">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_alpha_set(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_UBYTE alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1726">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1726">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1727">Ta usługa ustawia wartość alfa-Blend dla określonej kanwy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1727">This service sets the alpha-blend value for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1728">Wartości alfa kanwy mogą mieć wartość z zakresu od 0 (transparent) do 255 (w pełni nieprzezroczysty).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1728">Canvas alpha values can range from 0 (transparent) to 255 (fully opaque).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1729">Mieszanie kanw nakładki wymaga obsługi sprzętowej warstwy grafiki lub obsługi oprogramowania w ramach tworzenia kanwy złożonej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1729">Blending overlay canvases requires either hardware graphics layer support, or software support via the creation of a composite canvas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1730">Obsługa sprzętu dla mieszania kanwy jest włączana przez wywoływanie interfejsu API gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind () przed ustawieniem wartości alfa kanwy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1730">Hardware support for canvas blending is enabled by invoking the gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API prior to setting the canvas alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1731">Gdy Kanwa jest powiązana z sprzętową warstwą grafiki, wywołanie interfejsu API gx_canvas_alpha_set () bezpośrednio wywołuje sprzętową warstwę grafiki mieszanie usług.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1731">When a canvas is bound to a hardware graphics layer, calling the gx_canvas_alpha_set() API directly invokes the hardware graphics layer blending services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1732">Aby korzystać z obsługi oprogramowania na potrzeby mieszania kanwy, aplikacja musi utworzyć kanwę ze stylem GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE, w którym wszystkie inne zarządzane kanwy są złożone przed ostatecznym wyświetleniem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1732">To utilize software support for canvas blending, the application must create a canvas with GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE style, into which all other managed canvases are composited prior to final display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1733">Obsługa oprogramowania dla mieszania kanwy jest dostępna tylko w przypadku uruchamiania z sterownikiem wyświetlania o wartości 16-BPP lub wyższej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1733">Software support for canvas blending is only provided when running with a display driver of 16-bpp or higher color depth.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1734">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1734">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1735">**Kanwa** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1735">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1736">**Alpha** Alfa-Blend — wartość z zakresu od 0 (transparent) do 255 (nieprzezroczysty).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1736">**alpha** Alpha-blend value, range from 0 (transparent) to 255 (opaque).</span></span>

### <a name="return--values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1737">Wartości zwracane</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1737">Return  Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1738">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne przejście alfa-Blend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1738">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful alpha-blend value set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1739">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1739">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1740">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1740">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1741">**GX_INVALID_ERROR** (0X20) Nieprawidłowa Kanwa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1741">**GX_INVALID_ERROR** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1742">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1742">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1743">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1743">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1744">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1744">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the alpha-blend value of “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_alpha_set(&my_canvas, GX_ALPHA_VALUE_OPAQUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the alpha-blend value was successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_arc_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1754">gx_canvas_arc_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1754">gx_canvas_arc_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1755">Rysuj łuk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1755">Draw arc</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1756">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1756">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_arc_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter, 
    UINT r,
    INT start_angle, 
    INT end_angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1757">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1757">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1758">Ta usługa rysuje łuk okręgu na kanwie przy użyciu bieżącego pędzla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1758">This service draws a circle arc on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1759">Łuk okręgu jest obcinany do nieprawidłowego regionu kanwy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1759">The circle arc is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1760">Ta usługa wymaga zdefiniowania GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1760">This service requires GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1761">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1761">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1762">**xcenter** x — pozycja środka łuku okręgu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1762">**xcenter** x-position of center of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1763">**YCenter** — pozycja y środka łuku okręgu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1763">**ycenter** y-position of center of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1764">promień łuku okręgu w języku **r**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1764">**r** Radius of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1765">**start_angle** Kąt początkowy łuku okręgu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1765">**start_angle** Starting angle of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1766">**end_angle** Kąt końcowy łuku okręgu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1766">**end_angle** Ending angle of the circle arc</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1767">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1767">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1768">Pomyślne narysowanie łuku **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1768">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful arc draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1769">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1769">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1770">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) Nieprawidłowa wartość</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1770">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1771">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) brak otwartego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1771">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1772">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1772">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1773">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1773">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1774">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1774">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw a circle arc from 0 degree to 90 degree in clockwise. */
status = gx_canvas_arc_draw(100, 100, 50, 0, 90);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the arc has been drawn on “my_canvas”. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_block_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1787">gx_canvas_block_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1787">gx_canvas_block_move</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1788">Przenieś blok pikseli kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1788">Move block of canvas pixels</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1789">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1789">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_block_move(GX_RECTANGLE *block,
    GX_VALUE x_shift, GX_VALUE y_shift, GX_RECTANGLE *dirty);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1790">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1790">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1791">Ta usługa przenosi blok danych pikseli kanwy w określonym kierunku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1791">This service moves a block of canvas pixel data in the direction specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1792">Ta usługa jest używana wewnętrznie przez GUIX do wykonywania szybkiego przewijania, ale może być również używana przez oprogramowanie aplikacji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1792">This service is used internally by GUIX to accomplish fast scrolling, but may also be used by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1793">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1793">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1794">**Blokuj** Współrzędne obszaru do przeniesienia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1794">**block** Coordinates of area to move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1795">**x_shift** Liczba pikseli do przesunięcia na osi x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1795">**x_shift** Number of pixels to shift on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1796">**y_shift** Liczba pikseli do przesunięcia na osi y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1796">**y_shift** Number of pixels to shift on the y-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1797">**zanieczyszczony** Jeśli blok został pomyślnie przeniesiony, ta funkcja zwraca część prostokąta źródłowego, która jest wciąż zanieczyszczona obiektowi wywołującemu w tym parametrze.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1797">**dirty** If the block move is successful, this function returns the portion of the source rectangle that is still dirty to the caller in this parameter.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1798">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1798">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1799">Pomyślne przeniesienie bloku **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1799">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful block move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1800">Nie można przenieść bloku **GX_FAILURE** (0x10)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1800">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Failed block move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1801">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1801">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1802">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1802">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1803">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1803">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1804">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1804">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1805">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1805">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE invalid;
GX_RECTANGLE move;

/* define 100 x 100 pixel rectangle */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&move, 0, 0, 99, 99);

/* Move this rectangle 10 pixels to the right”. */
status = gx_canvas_block_move(&move, 10, 0, &invalid);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, then ‘invalid’ marks the area that needs to be redrawn after the block move. */

```

## <a name="gx_canvas_circle_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1818">gx_canvas_circle_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1818">gx_canvas_circle_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1819">Rysuj okrąg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1819">Draw circle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1820">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1820">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_circle_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter, 
    UINT r);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1821">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1821">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1822">Ta usługa rysuje okrąg na kanwie przy użyciu bieżącego pędzla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1822">This service draws a circle on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1823">Okrąg jest obcinany do nieprawidłowego regionu kanwy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1823">The circle is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1824">Ta usługa wymaga zdefiniowania GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1824">This service requires GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1825">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1825">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1826">**xcenter** x-coord środka okręgu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1826">**xcenter** x-coord of center of the circle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1827">**YCenter** y-coord środka Cirlce</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1827">**ycenter** y-coord of center of the cirlce</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1828">promień okręgu **r**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1828">**r** Radius of the circle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1829">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1829">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1830">Odświeżenie okręgu **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1830">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful circle draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1831">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1831">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1832">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) Nieprawidłowa promień okręgu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1832">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid circle radius</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1833">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) brak otwartego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1833">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1834">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1834">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1835">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1835">Threads</span></span>

```C

/* Draw a circle of radius 10 centered at (100, 100). */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the circle has been drawn on “my_canvas”. */

```

## <a name="gx_canvas_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1849">gx_canvas_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1849">gx_canvas_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1850">Utwórz kanwę</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1850">Create canvas</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1851">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1851">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_create(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    UINT type, 
    UINT width, 
    UINT height,
    GX_COLOR *memory_area, 
    ULONG memory_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1852">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1852">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1853">Ta usługa tworzy kanwę o określonych właściwościach i skojarzonej pamięci.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1853">This service creates the canvas with the specified properties and associated memory.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1854">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1854">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1855">**Kanwa** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1855">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1856">**Nazwa** Nazwa logiczna kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1856">**name** Logical name for the canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1857">**Wyświetl** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonego ekranu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1857">**display** Pointer to previously created display</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1858">**Typ** Typ typów kanwy canvasThe:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1858">**type** Type of canvasThe canvas types include:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1859">**GX_CANVAS_SIMPLE:** Kanwa pamięci, która jest używana do rysowania poza ekranem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1859">**GX_CANVAS_SIMPLE:** A memory canvas which is used to off-screen drawing.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1860">**GX_CANVAS_MANAGED:** Kanwa, która jest automatycznie opróżniana do aktywnego wyświetlania, w ramach procesu konstruowania złożonego lub jako część operacji przełączania buforu dla architektury jednej kanwy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1860">**GX_CANVAS_MANAGED:** A canvas which automatically flushed to the active display, either as part of the composite building process or as part of the buffer toggle operation for single-canvas architectures.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1861">**GX_CANVAS_VISIBLE:** Ta flaga może służyć do włączania i wyłączania kanwy bez utraty zawartości rysunku kanwy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1861">**GX_CANVAS_VISIBLE:** This flag can be used to turn on and off a canvas, without losing the canvas drawing contents.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1862">**GX_CANVAS_MODIFIED:** Zarezerwowane do użytku w przyszłości.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1862">**GX_CANVAS_MODIFIED:** Reserved for future use.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1863">**GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE:** Ta flaga jest używana przez aplikację podczas konfigurowania systemu wielokanwowego, który będzie złożonym wieloma zarządzanymi kanwami na kanwę kompozytową, a kompozyt jest kierowany do buforu ramki sprzętowej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1863">**GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE:** This flag is used by the application when configuring a multiple-canvas system which will composite multiple managed canvases into the composite canvas, and the composite is the driven to the hardware frame buffer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1864">**Szerokość** Szerokość w pikselach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1864">**width** Width in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1865">**wysokość** Wysokość w pikselach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1865">**height** Height in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1866">**memory_area** Obszar pamięci dla kanwy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1866">**memory_area** Memory area for canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1867">Ta wartość może</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1867">This value can</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1868">**GX_NULL** w momencie tworzenia kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1868">**GX_NULL** at the time of canvas creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1869">**i** później zainicjowany przy użyciu gx_canvas_memory_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1869">**and** later initialized using gx_canvas_memory_define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1870">**memory_size** Rozmiar obszaru pamięci w bajtach lub 0, jeśli po utworzeniu kanwy zostanie zdefiniowana pamięć kanwy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1870">**memory_size** Size of memory area in bytes, or 0 if the canvas memory will be defined after the canvas is created.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1871">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1871">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1872">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — tworzenie kanwy zakończonej powodzeniem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1872">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful canvas create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1873">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1873">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1874">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1874">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1875">Element widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) został już utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1875">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1876">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS_SIZE** (0X1C) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontrolki kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1876">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS_SIZE** (0x1C) Invalid canvas control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1877">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0X1b) Nieprawidłowy typ kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1877">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Invalid canvas type</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1878">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1878">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1879">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1879">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1880">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1880">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define global canvas memory area. */
GX_COLOR my_canvas_memory[272*480];

…

/* Create “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_create(&my_canvas, "my canvas", &my_display,
                    (GX_CANVAS_MANAGED | GX_CANVAS_VISIBLE),
                    272, 480,
                    my_canvas_memory,
                    sizeof(default_canvas_memory));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the 272 x 480 canvas was successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1885">gx_canvas_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1885">gx_canvas_delete</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1886">Usuń kanwę</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1886">Delete canvas</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1887">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1887">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_delete(GX_CANVAS *canvas);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1888">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1888">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1889">Ta usługa usuwa kanwę.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1889">This service deletes the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1890">Kanwa zostanie usunięta z wewnętrznej połączonej listy kanwy utrzymywanej przez GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1890">The canvas is removed from the internal linked list of canvas maintained by GUIX.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1891">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1891">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1892">**Kanwa** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1892">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1893">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1893">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1894">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — tworzenie kanwy zakończonej powodzeniem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1894">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful canvas create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1895">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1895">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1896">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1896">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1897">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0X20) Nieprawidłowa Kanwa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1897">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1898">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1898">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1899">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1899">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS my_canvas was deleted. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_drawing_complete"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1908">gx_canvas_drawing_complete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1908">gx_canvas_drawing_complete</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1909">Ukończ rysowanie kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1909">Complete canvas drawing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1910">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1910">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_drawing_complete(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_BOOL flush);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1911">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1911">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1912">Ta usługa umożliwia GUIX na zakończenie rysowania aplikacji na określonej kanwie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1912">This service lets GUIX know the application’s drawing on the specified canvas is complete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1913">Aplikacja może korzystać z tej usługi, aby wymusić natychmiastowe rysowanie na kanwie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1913">The application can use this service to force immediate drawing to a canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1914">Spowoduje to opróżnienie kanwy do widocznego buforu ramek i/lub wyzwolenie operacji przełączania bugger, w zależności od architektury pamięci systemowej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1914">This flushes the canvas to the visible frame buffer and/or triggers a bugger toggle operation, depending on system memory architecture.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1915">Ta usługa powinna być wywoływana tylko przez aplikację w celu zamknięcia sekwencji rysowania rozpoczętej z gx_canvas_drawing_initiate ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1915">This service should only be called by the application to close a drawing sequence begun with gx_canvas_drawing_initiate().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1916">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1916">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1917">**Kanwa** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1917">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1918">**opróżnianie** Jeśli **_GX_TRUE_**, zmiany kanwy są opróżniane do wyświetlenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1918">**flush** If **_GX_TRUE_**, canvas changes are flushed to the display</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1919">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1919">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1920">Zakończono pomyślne rysowanie **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1920">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful drawing completion</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1921">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1921">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1922">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1922">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1923">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1923">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1924">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1924">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1925">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1925">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Complete drawing on “my_canvas” and flush to display. */
status = gx_canvas_drawing_complete(&my_canvas, GX_TRUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing was successfully completed. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_drawing_initiate"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1932">gx_canvas_drawing_initiate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1932">gx_canvas_drawing_initiate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1933">Inicjuj rysowanie kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1933">Initiate canvas drawing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1934">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1934">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_drawing_initiate(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas,
    GX_WIDGET *who, 
    GX_RECTANGLE *dirty_area);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1935">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1935">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1936">Ta usługa inicjuje rysowanie na określonej kanwie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1936">This service initiates drawing on the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1937">Ta usługa jest wywoływana wewnętrznie w ramach operacji odroczonego rysowania wykonywanej automatycznie przez GUIX, gdy Kanwa wymaga aktualizacji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1937">This service is called internally as part of the deferred drawing operation performed automatically by GUIX when a canvas needs to be update.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1938">Jednak aplikacja może pominąć algorytm rysowania odroczonego GUIX i wykonać natychmiastowe i bezpośrednie rysowanie na kanwie, wywołując gx_canvas_drawing_inititate, a następnie wywołując odpowiednie funkcje rysowania, a następnie wywołując gx_canvas_drawing_complete ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1938">However, the application is allowed bypass the GUIX deferred drawing algorithm and perform immediate and direct drawing on a canvas by first calling gx_canvas_drawing_inititate, then calling the desired drawing functions, then calling gx_canvas_drawing_complete().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1939">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1939">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1940">**Kanwa** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1940">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1941">**kto** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki widget obiektu wywołującego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1941">**who** Pointer to widget control block of the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1942">Ten parametr służy do inicjowania przycinania rysowania i wyświetlania parametrów dla kolejnych operacji rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1942">This parameter is used to initialize the drawing clipping and view parameters for subsequent drawing operations.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1943">**dirty_area** Obszar do narysowania w obrębie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1943">**dirty_area** Area to draw within.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1944">Ten parametr jest przesyłany przez obiekt wywołujący, aby wskazać obszar, do którego obiekt wywołujący chce, aby wszystkie operacje rysowania zostały obcięte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1944">This parameter is passed by the caller to indicate the area to which the caller wants all drawing operations clipped.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1945">Zwykle jest to obszar, który został wcześniej oznaczony jako zanieczyszczony, ale obiekt wywołujący jest bezpłatny, aby rozwijać lub zwijać obszar przycinania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1945">This is usually the area previously marked as dirty, but the caller is free to expand or contract the clipping area.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1946">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1946">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1947">Pomyślne rozpoczęcie rysowania **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1947">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful drawing initiation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1948">**GX_DRAW_NESTING_EXCEEDED** (0X05) przekracza maksymalną liczbę zagnieżdżenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1948">**GX_DRAW_NESTING_EXCEEDED** (0x05) Exceed maximum nesting count</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1949">**GX_NO_VIEW** (0X03) brak okienka ekranu dla obiektu wywołującego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1949">**GX_NO_VIEW** (0x03) No viewports for the caller</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1950">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1950">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1951">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1951">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1952">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0X20) Nieprawidłowa Kanwa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1952">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1953">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1953">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1954">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1954">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1955">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1955">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Initiate drawing on “my_canvas”, my_widget.gx_widget_size
specify the area the application wants GUIX to redraw. */
status = gx_canvas_drawing_initiate(&my_canvas, &my_widget,
    &my_widget.gx_widget_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing was successfully initiated. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1960">gx_canvas_offset_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1960">gx_canvas_offset_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1961">gx_canvas_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1961">gx_canvas_shift</span></span>


## <a name="gx_canvas_ellipse_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1962">gx_canvas_ellipse_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1962">gx_canvas_ellipse_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1963">Rysuj elipsę</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1963">Draw ellipse</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1964">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1964">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_ellipse_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter, 
    INT a, 
    dINT b);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1965">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1965">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1966">Ta usługa Rysuje elipsę na kanwie przy użyciu bieżącego pędzla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1966">This service draws an ellipse on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1967">Elipsa jest obcinana do nieprawidłowego regionu kanwy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1967">The ellipse is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1968">Ta usługa wymaga zdefiniowania GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1968">This service requires GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1969">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1969">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1970">**xcenter** x-coord środka elipsy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1970">**xcenter** x-coord of center of the ellipse</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1971">**YCenter** y-coord środka wielokropka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1971">**ycenter** y-coord of center of the ellipse</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1972">**długość głównej** osi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1972">**a** Length of the semi-major axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1973">**b** Długość osi podrzędnej średnika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1973">**b** Length of the semi-minor axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1974">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1974">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1975">Odświeżenie okręgu **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1975">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful circle draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1976">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1976">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1977">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) Nieprawidłowa wartość</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1977">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1978">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) brak otwartego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1978">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1979">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1979">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1980">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1980">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1981">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1981">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw an ellipse of semi-major radius 100, semi-minor radius 50
    and centered at (200, 200). */
status = gx_canvas_ellipse_draw(200, 200, 100, 50);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the ellipse has been drawn on
    “my_canvas”. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1994">gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1994">gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1995">Powiązywanie kanwy ze sprzętową warstwą grafiki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1995">Bind canvas to hardware graphics layer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1996">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1996">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    INT layer);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-1997">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1997">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-1998">Ta usługa wiąże kanwę rysowania GUIX z sprzętową warstwą grafiki.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1998">This service binds a GUIX drawing canvas to a hardware graphics layer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-1999">Ta usługa jest wymagana tylko w przypadku urządzeń sprzętowych obsługujących wiele sprzętowych warstw graficznych.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-1999">This service is only required for hardware devices supporting multiple hardware graphics layers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2000">Powiązanie kanwy ze sprzętową warstwą grafiki powoduje, że interfejsy API gx_canvas_show (), gx_canvas_hide (), gx_canvas_alpha_set () i gx_canvas_offset_set () są implementowane bezpośrednio przez sprzętowe usługi sterownika ekranu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2000">Binding a canvas to a hardware graphics layer results in the gx_canvas_show(), gx_canvas_hide(), gx_canvas_alpha_set(), and gx_canvas_offset_set() APIs being implemented directly by hardware display driver services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2001">Jeśli sterownik ekranu sprzętowego nie obsługuje wielu warstw graficznych, ta usługa nie zwróci wartości GX_INVALID_DISPLAY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2001">If the hardware display driver does not support multiple graphics layers, this service will fail returning GX_INVALID_DISPLAY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2002">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2002">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2003">**Kanwa** kanwy do wdrożenia na sprzęcie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2003">**canvas** canvas to be implement in hardware</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2004">warstwa grafiki sprzętowej **warstwy**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2004">**layer** hardware graphics layer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2005">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2005">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2006">Pomyślne powiązanie **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2006">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful binding</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2007">Nie zdefiniowano usługi warstwy wyświetlania **GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2007">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Display layer service is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2008">Nieprawidłowe wskaźniki **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2008">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17) Invalid pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2009">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2009">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_hide"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2018">gx_canvas_hide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2018">gx_canvas_hide</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2019">Ukrywanie kanwy, co sprawia, że jest niewidoczna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2019">Hide a canvas, making it invisible</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2020">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2020">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_hide(GX_CANVAS *canvas);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2021">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2021">Description</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2024">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2024">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2026">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2026">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2028">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0X20) Nieprawidłowa Kanwa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2028">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2029">Nieprawidłowe wskaźniki **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2029">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17) Invalid pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2030">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2030">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_line_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2043">gx_canvas_line_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2043">gx_canvas_line_draw</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_line_draw(
    GX_VALUE x_start, 
    GX_VALUE y_start,
    GX_VALUE x_end, 
    GX_VALUE y_end);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2046">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2046">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2047">Ta usługa rysuje linię na kanwie przy użyciu bieżącego pędzla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2047">This service draws a line on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2048">Linia jest przycinana do nieprawidłowego regionu kanwy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2048">The line is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2049">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2049">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2050">**x_start** Początkowe położenie linii x wiersza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2050">**x_start** Starting x-position of the line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2051">**y_end** Początkowe położenie osi y w wierszu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2051">**y_end** Starting y-position of the line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2052">**x_start** Końcowa pozycja x wiersza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2052">**x_start** Ending x-position of the line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2053">**y_end** Końcowa pozycja y linii.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2053">**y_end** Ending y-position of the line</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2054">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2054">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2055">Pomyślne rysowanie wiersza **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2055">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful line draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2056">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2056">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2057">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2057">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2058">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) brak otwartego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2058">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2059">**GX_INVALID_WIDTH** (0X1E) Nieprawidłowa szerokość pędzla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2059">**GX_INVALID_WIDTH** (0x1E) Invalid brush width</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2060">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2060">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_memory_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2075">gx_canvas_memory_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2075">gx_canvas_memory_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2076">Definiowanie pamięci kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2076">Define canvas memory</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2077">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2077">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_memory_define(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_COLOR *memory,
    ULONG memsize);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2078">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2078">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2079">Ta usługa może być używana do przypisywania adresu pamięci kanwy po utworzeniu kanwy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2079">This service can be used to assign the canvas memory address after the canvas has been created.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2080">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2080">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2081">**Kanwa** Wskaźnik do wcześniej utworzonej kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2081">**canvas** Pointer to previously created canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2082">**pamięć** Adres pamięci kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2082">**memory** Canvas memory address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2083">**memsize** Rozmiar bloku pamięci kanwy w bajtach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2083">**memsize** Size of the canvas memory block in bytes</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2084">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2084">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2085">Pomyślne przypisanie **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2085">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful assignment</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2086">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0X20) nieprawidłowy blok sterujący</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2086">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2087">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2087">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2088">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2088">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2089">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2089">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2090">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2090">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Assign canvas memory block. */
status = gx_canvas_memory_define(canvas,
    (GX_COLOR *) DRAM_MEMORY,
    (640 * 480 * 2));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the canvas memory pointer has be
reassigned. */

```

## <a name="gx_canvas_mouse_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2094">gx_canvas_mouse_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2094">gx_canvas_mouse_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2095">Definiowanie obrazu kursora myszy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2095">Define the mouse cursor image</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2096">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2096">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_mouse_define(GX_CANVAS *canvas,
    GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2097">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2097">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2098">Ta usługa definiuje informacje o myszy dla określonej kanwy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2098">This service defines mouse information for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2099">Ta usługa wymaga zdefiniowania GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2099">This service requires GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2100">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2100">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2101">**Kanwa** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2101">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2102">**informacje** Wskaźnik na informacje dotyczące kursora myszy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2102">**info** Pointer to mouse cursor information.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2103">**Dodatek I** zawiera definicję do GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO struktury.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2103">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2104">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2104">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2105">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — pomyślny zestaw informacji myszy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2105">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful mouse info set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2106">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2106">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2107">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2107">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2108">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2108">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2109">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2109">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2110">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2110">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set mouse cursor info. */
GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO mouse_cursor;
mouse_cursor.gx_mouse_cursor_image_id = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_MOUSE;
mouse_cursor.gx_mouse_cursor_hotspot_x = 0;
mouse_cursor.gx_mouse_cursor_hotspot_y = 0;

status = gx_canvas_mouse_define(&my_canvas, &mouse_cursor);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the mouse info of “my_canvas” has been
set successfully. */

```

## <a name="gx_canvas_mouse_hide"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2114">gx_canvas_mouse_hide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2114">gx_canvas_mouse_hide</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2115">Wyłączanie kursora myszy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2115">Turn off the mouse cursor</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2116">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2116">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_mouse_hide(GX_CANVAS *canvas);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2117">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2117">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2118">Ta usługa sprawia, że kursor myszy jest ukryty na określonej kanwie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2118">This service makes the mouse cursor hidden from the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2119">Ta usługa wymaga zdefiniowania GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2119">This service requires GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2120">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2120">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2121">**Kanwa** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2121">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2122">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2122">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2123">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pomyślnego kursora myszy Ukryj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2123">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful mouse cursor hide</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2124">**GX_FAILURE** (0X10) niepowodzenie ukrywania kursora myszy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2124">**GX_FAILURE** (0X10) Failed mouse cursor hide</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2125">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2125">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2126">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2126">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2129">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2129">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Hide the mouse cursor. */
status = gx_canvas_mouse_hide(&my_canvas);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the mouse cursor of “my_canvas” has been
hidden successfully. */

```
