## <a name="gx_canvas_mouse_show"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2133">gx_canvas_mouse_show</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2133">gx_canvas_mouse_show</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2137">Ta usługa sprawia, że kursor myszy jest widoczny dla określonej kanwy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2137">This service makes the mouse cursor visible for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2138">Ta usługa wymaga zdefiniowania GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2138">This service requires GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2139">Interfejs API gx_canvas_mouse_define powinien zostać wywołany w celu zdefiniowania obrazu kursora myszy przed zażądaniem tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2139">The gx_canvas_mouse_define API should be invoked to define the mouse cursor image before this service is requested.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2140">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2140">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2143">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — pomyślny zestaw informacji myszy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2143">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful mouse info set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2144">**GX_FAILURE** (0X10) nie powiodło się wyświetlenie kursora myszy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2144">**GX_FAILURE** (0X10) Failed mouse cursor show</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2145">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2145">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2146">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2146">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_offset_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2153">gx_canvas_offset_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2153">gx_canvas_offset_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2154">Przypisanie kanwy x, przesunięcie ekranu y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2154">Assign canvas x,y display offset</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2155">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2155">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_offset_set(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas,
    GX_VALUE x, 
    GX_VALUE y);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2156">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2156">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2157">Ta usługa przypisuje przesunięcie wyświetlania x, y dla określonej kanwy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2157">This service assigns an x,y display offset for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2158">Steruje położeniem, w którym Kanwa jest złożona w buforze ramki widocznej, i jest często używana, gdy Kanwa jest mniejsza od ekranu fizycznego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2158">This controls the position at which the canvas is composited into the visible frame buffer, and is often used when the canvas is smaller than the physical display.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2159">Jeśli Kanwa została powiązana z sprzętową warstwą grafiki przy użyciu interfejsu API gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind (), usługa gx_canvas_offset_set jest implementowana bezpośrednio przy użyciu obsługi sprzętowej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2159">If the canvas has been bound to a hardware graphics layer using the gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API, the gx_canvas_offset_set service is implemented directly using hardware support.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2160">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2160">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2161">**Kanwa** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2161">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2162">Współrzędna **x** x przesunięcia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2162">**x** X coordinate of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2163">Współrzędna **y** y przesunięcia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2163">**y** Y coordinate of offset</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2164">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2164">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2165">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — pomyślne przypisanie przesunięcia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2165">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful assignment of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2166">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2166">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2167">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2167">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2168">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0X20) Nieprawidłowa Kanwa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2168">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2169">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2169">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2170">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2170">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2171">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2171">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set display offset for “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_offset_set(&my_canvas, 20, 30);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing is now offset from
position 20,30. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_pie_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2181">gx_canvas_pie_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2181">gx_canvas_pie_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2182">Rysuj wykres kołowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2182">Draw pie</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2183">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2183">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pie_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter,
    UINT r, 
    INT start_angle, 
    INT end_angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2184">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2184">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2185">Ta usługa rysuje wykres kołowy do kanwy przy użyciu bieżącego pędzla kontekstu rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2185">This service draws a pie into the canvas using the current drawing context brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2186">Wykres kołowy jest przycinany do nieprawidłowego regionu kanwy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2186">The pie is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2187">Ta usługa wymaga zdefiniowania GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT opcji konfiguracji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2187">This service requires the configuration option GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2188">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2188">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2189">**xcenter** x — pozycja środka kołowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2189">**xcenter** x-position of center of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2190">**YCenter** osi y na środek koła</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2190">**ycenter** y-position of center of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2191">**r** promień koła</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2191">**r** Radius of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2192">**start_angle** Kąt początkowy koła</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2192">**start_angle** Starting angle of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2193">**end_angle** Kąt końcowy koła</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2193">**end_angle** Ending angle of the pie</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2194">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2194">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2195">Pomyślne narysowanie łuku **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2195">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful arc draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2196">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2196">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2197">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) Nieprawidłowa wartość</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2197">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2198">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) brak otwartego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2198">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2199">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2199">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2200">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2200">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2201">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2201">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw a pie from 0 degree to 90 degree in clockwise. */
status = gx_canvas_pie_draw(100, 100, 50, 0, 90);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pie has been drawn to canvas. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixel_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2214">gx_canvas_pixel_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2214">gx_canvas_pixel_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2215">Rysuj piksel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2215">Draw pixel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2216">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2216">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixel_draw(GX_POINT position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2217">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2217">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2218">Ta usługa rysuje piksel na kanwie przy użyciu koloru linii bieżącego pędzla kontekstu rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2218">This service draws a pixel on the canvas using the line color of the current drawing context brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2219">Jeśli opcja konfiguracji GX_BRUSH_ALPHA_SUPPORT jest zdefiniowana, mieszaj piksel w inny sposób, rysując piksel jako całkowicie nieprzezroczysty.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2219">If configuration option GX_BRUSH_ALPHA_SUPPORT is defined, blend the pixel with the otherwise, draw the pixel as fully opaque.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2220">**punkt** x, pozycja y pikseli do rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2220">**point** x,y position of pixel to draw</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2221">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2221">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2222">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne rysowanie Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2222">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2223">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2223">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2224">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) brak otwartego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2224">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2225">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2225">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2226">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2226">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2227">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2227">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_POINT point; /* the x,y position you want to draw to */
GX_RECTANGLE drawto; /* the rectangle bounding your drawing */
GX_CANVAS *mycanvas; /* the canvas you want to draw to */

/* calculate 1x1 pixel drawing area: */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&drawto,
    point.gx_point_x, point.gx_point_y,
    point.gx_point_x, point.gx_point_y);

/* get my canvas: */
gx_widget_canvas_get(win, &mycanvas);

/* open my canvas for drawing: */
gx_canvas_drawing_initiate(mycanvas, win, &drawto);

/* setup my brush colors. Use any color ID in your resources: */
gx_context_line_color_set(GX_COLOR_ID_WINDOW_BORDER);

/* draw a pixel: */
status = gx_canvas_pixel_draw(point);

/* close the canvas: */
gx_canvas_drawing_complete(mycanvas, GX_TRUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pixel was successfully drawn to mycanvas. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2232">gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2232">gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2233">Pixelmap Blend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2233">Blend pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2234">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2234">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend(
    GX_VALUE x_position,
    GX_VALUE y_position, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap, 
    GX_UBYTE alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2235">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2235">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2236">Ta usługa miesza Pixelmap z tłem kanwy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2236">This service blends a pixelmap with the canvas background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2237">Współczynnik mieszania jest określany przez obiekt wywołujący.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2237">The blending ratio is specified by the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2238">Wartość alfa może być z zakresu od 0 (w pełni przezroczyste) do 255 (w pełni nieprzezroczysty).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2238">The alpha value can range from 0 (fully transparent) to 255 (fully opaque).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2239">Pixelmap może również zawierać wewnętrzny kanał alfa, który jest połączony z przychodzącą wartością mieszania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2239">The pixelmap may also include an internal alpha channel, which is combined with the incoming blending value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2240">Ta usługa jest obsługiwana tylko przez sterowniki ekranu działające o głębi kolorów 16-BPP i wyższych.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2240">This service is only supported by display drivers running at 16-bpp color depth and higher.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2241">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2241">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2242">**x_start** Początkowe położenie osi x Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2242">**x_start** Starting x-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2243">**y_end** Początkowe położenie osi y Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2243">**y_end** Starting y-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2244">**Pixelmap** Wskaźnik do Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2244">**pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2245">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2245">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2246">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne rysowanie Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2246">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2247">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2247">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2248">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2248">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2249">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0X28) nie jest obsługiwana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2249">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2250">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) brak otwartego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2250">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2251">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2251">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2252">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2252">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2253">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2253">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw pixelmap on active canvas */

GX_PIXELMAP *map;
gx_system_pixelmap_get(ID_MY_PIXELMAP, &map);

status = gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend(10, 20, map, 128);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap has been blended onto the current canvas. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixelmap_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2281">gx_canvas_pixelmap_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2281">gx_canvas_pixelmap_get</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2299">gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2299">gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2300">Rysuj obrócony Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2300">Draw rotated pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2301">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2301">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate(
    GX_VALUE x_position, 
    GX_VALUE y_position,
    GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap, 
    INT angle,
    INT rot_cx, 
    INT rot_cy);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2302">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2302">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2303">Ta usługa obraca Pixelmap w określonym kącie i renderuje Pixelmap do kanwy bezpośrednio w miarę wykonywania obrotu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2303">This service rotates a pixelmap at the specified angle and renders the pixelmap to the canvas directly as the rotation is performed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2304">Ta usługa różni się od gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate, ponieważ dane wyjściowe obrotu są bezpośrednio renderowane do pamięci kanwy, a obrócony Pixelmap nie jest zwracany do obiektu wywołującego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2304">This service differs from gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate in that the output of the rotation is directly rendered to the canvas memory, and the rotated pixelmap is not returned to the caller.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2305">Zaletą tej usługi w porównaniu gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate jest to, że nie jest wymagana dodatkowa pamięć do przechowywania obróconego Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2305">The advantage of this service over gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate is that no additional memory is required to hold the rotated pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2306">Wadą jest to, że kod obrotu musi być wykonywany za każdym razem, gdy Pixelmap jest rysowany.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2306">The disadvantage is that the rotation code must be executed each time the pixelmap is drawn.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2307">Podczas renderowania obróconego Pixelmap są wymuszane walidacji wycinków i okienka ekranu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2307">Clipping and viewport validation are enforced during rendering of the rotated pixelmap.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2308">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2308">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2309">**x_position** Początkowe położenie osi x Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2309">**x_position** Starting x-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2310">**y_position** Początkowe położenie osi y Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2310">**y_position** Starting y-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2311">**Pixelmap** Wskaźnik do Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2311">**pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2312">**kąt** Kąt obrotu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2312">**angle** Angle to rotate</span></span>

```C
    -1, -1);

```

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixelmap_tile"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2330">gx_canvas_pixelmap_tile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2330">gx_canvas_pixelmap_tile</span></span>

```C

    GX_RECTANGLE *fill,
    GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2337">**Pixelmap** Wskaźnik do Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2337">**pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2338">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2338">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2340">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2340">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2341">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2341">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2342">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) brak otwartego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2342">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2343">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar wypełnienia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2343">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid fill size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2344">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2344">Allowed From</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2364">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) brak otwartego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2364">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

```C
{
    { 208, 63 },
    { 274, 63 },
    { 274, 163 },
    { 208, 163 }
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2407">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2407">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2408">Rysuj tekst obrócony o punkt środkowy (przestarzałe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2408">Draw text rotated about a center point (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2409">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2409">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw(
    const GX_CHAR *text,
    GX_VALUE xCenter, 
    GX_VALUE yCenter, 
    INT angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2410">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2410">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2411">Ten interfejs API jest przestarzały na korzyść lub gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2411">This API has been deprecated in favor or gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext().</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2412">Mimo że w dalszym ciągu obsługiwane nowe aplikacje nie powinny używać tego interfejsu API i powinny używać gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2412">While still supported, new applications should not use this API and should instead use gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2413">Ta usługa służy do rysowania tekstu na kanwie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2413">This service draws text to the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2414">Tekst jest rysowany jako obrócony o żądanym punkcie centrum.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2414">The text is drawn rotated about the requested center point.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2415">Bieżąca czcionka kontekstu rysowania i kolor linii kontekstu rysowania służy do renderowania tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2415">The current drawing context font and drawing context line color is used to render the text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2416">Ta usługa używa gx_utility_string_to_alphamap funkcji do renderowania ciągu tekstowego do tymczasowego 8bpp Pixelmap zawierającego tylko wartość alfa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2416">This service uses the function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap to render the text string to a temporary 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2417">Następnie usługa obraca alphamap przy użyciu funkcji gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2417">The service then rotates the alphamap using the function gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2418">Gdy końcowa alphamap jest renderowana na kanwie, ta usługa zwolni tymczasowy alphamap i skojarzoną pamięć.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2418">After the final alphamap is rendered to the canvas, this service frees the temporary alphamap and associated memory.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2419">Ponieważ tymczasowy alphamap jest wymagany do renderowania obróconego tekstu, aplikacja musi skonfigurować gx_system_memory_allocator za pomocą interfejsu API wywoływania gx_system_memory_allocator_set () przed próbą narysowania obróconego tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2419">Since a temporary alphamap is required to render rotated text, the application must configure the gx_system_memory_allocator by the calling gx_system_memory_allocator_set() API before attempting to draw rotated text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2420">Ta usługa powinna być używana tylko do renderowania obróconego tekstu "jednorazowo".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2420">This service should only be used to render rotated text “one time”.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2421">Jeśli ten sam ciąg tekstowy zostanie narysowany wiele razy w różnych lokalizacjach lub w różnych kątach rotacji, bardziej wydajne jest użycie funkcji narzędzia gx_utility_string_to_alphamap (), aby utworzyć tekst alphamap raz, a następnie użyć gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate wiele razy, aby wielokrotnie obrócić powstające alphamap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2421">If the same text string will be drawn multiple times at different locations or different rotation angles, it is more efficient to use the utility function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap() to create the text alphamap once, then use gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate multiple times to rotate the resulting alphamap repeatedly.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2422">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2422">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2423">**tekst** Ciąg tekstowy do narysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2423">**text** Text string to be drawn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2424">**xCenter** Wyśrodkuj położeniu wokół tego, który tekst zostanie obrócony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2424">**xCenter** Center positon around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2425">**yCenter** Wyśrodkuj położenie, wokół którego zostanie obrócony tekst.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2425">**yCenter** Center position around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2426">**kąt** Żądany kąt obrotu tekstu (w stopniach).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2426">**angle** The desired text rotation angle, in degrees.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2429">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2429">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2430">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2430">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2432">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0X34) Nieprawidłowa długość ciągu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2432">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2433">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2433">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2434">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2434">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2435">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2435">Example</span></span>

```C
void my_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{

    GX_VALUE xpos = 100;
    GX_VALUE ypos = 100;
    INT dynamic_count = 1234567;
    GX_CHAR dynamic_text[10];

    /* Call default window draw routine. */
    gx_window_draw(window);

    /* Set font. */
    gx_context_font_set(GX_FONT_ID_SMALL_BOLD);

    /* Convert int value to string. */
    gx_utility_ltoa(dynamic_count, dynamic_text, 20);

    /* Draw rotate text. */
    gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw(dynamic_text, xpos, ypos, 45);
}
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2443">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2443">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2444">Rysuj tekst obrócony o punkt środkowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2444">Draw text rotated about a center point</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2445">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2445">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext(
    GX_CONST GX_STRING *text,
    GX_VALUE xCenter, 
    GX_VALUE yCenter, 
    INT angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2446">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2446">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2447">Ta usługa służy do rysowania tekstu na kanwie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2447">This service draws text to the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2448">Tekst jest rysowany jako obrócony o żądanym punkcie centrum.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2448">The text is drawn rotated about the requested center point.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2449">Bieżąca czcionka kontekstu rysowania i kolor linii kontekstu rysowania służy do renderowania tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2449">The current drawing context font and drawing context line color is used to render the text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2450">Ta usługa używa gx_utility_string_to_alphamap funkcji do renderowania ciągu tekstowego do tymczasowego 8bpp Pixelmap zawierającego tylko wartość alfa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2450">This service uses the function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap to render the text string to a temporary 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2451">Następnie usługa obraca alphamap przy użyciu funkcji gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2451">The service then rotates the alphamap using the function gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2452">Gdy końcowa alphamap jest renderowana na kanwie, ta usługa zwolni tymczasowy alphamap i skojarzoną pamięć.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2452">After the final alphamap is rendered to the canvas, this service frees the temporary alphamap and associated memory.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2453">Ponieważ tymczasowy alphamap jest wymagany do renderowania obróconego tekstu, aplikacja musi skonfigurować gx_system_memory_allocator przez wywołujący interfejs API ***gx_system_memory_allocator_set*** przed próbą narysowania obróconego tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2453">Since a temporary alphamap is required to render rotated text, the application must configure the gx_system_memory_allocator by the calling ***gx_system_memory_allocator_set*** API before attempting to draw rotated text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2454">Ta usługa powinna być używana tylko do renderowania obróconego tekstu "jednorazowo".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2454">This service should only be used to render rotated text “one time”.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2455">Jeśli ten sam ciąg tekstowy zostanie narysowany wiele razy w różnych lokalizacjach lub w różnych kątach rotacji, bardziej wydajne jest użycie funkcji narzędzia gx_utility_string_to_alphamap (), aby utworzyć tekst alphamap raz, a następnie użyć gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate wiele razy, aby wielokrotnie obrócić powstające alphamap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2455">If the same text string will be drawn multiple times at different locations or different rotation angles, it is more efficient to use the utility function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap() to create the text alphamap once, then use gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate multiple times to rotate the resulting alphamap repeatedly.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2456">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2456">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2457">**tekst** Ciąg tekstowy do narysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2457">**text** Text string to be drawn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2458">**xCenter** Wyśrodkuj położeniu wokół tego, który tekst zostanie obrócony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2458">**xCenter** Center positon around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2459">**yCenter** Wyśrodkuj położenie, wokół którego zostanie obrócony tekst.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2459">**yCenter** Center position around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2460">**kąt** Żądany kąt obrotu tekstu (w stopniach).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2460">**angle** The desired text rotation angle, in degrees.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2461">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2461">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2462">Renderowanie tekstu w **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2462">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text rendering</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2463">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2463">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2464">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2464">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2465">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) Nieprawidłowy kontekst rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2465">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Invalid draw context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2466">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0X30) za mało dostępnej pamięci lub gx_system_memory_allocator nie została przypisana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2466">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Insufficient memory available or gx_system_memory_allocator has not been assigned.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2467">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0X34) Nieprawidłowa długość ciągu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2467">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2468">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2468">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2469">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2469">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2470">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2470">Example</span></span>

```C
void my_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{

    GX_VALUE xpos = 100;
    GX_VALUE ypos = 100;
    INT dynamic_count = 1234567;
    GX_CHAR dynamic_text[10];
    GX_STRING string;

    /* Call default window draw routine. */
    gx_window_draw(window);

    /* Set font. */
    gx_context_font_set(GX_FONT_ID_SMALL_BOLD);

    /* Convert int value to string. */
    gx_utility_ltoa(dynamic_count, dynamic_text, 20);

    string.gx_string_ptr = dynamic_text;
    string.gx_string_length = strlen(dynamic_text);

    /* Draw rotate text. */
    gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext(&string, xpos, ypos, 45);
}
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_shift"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2478">gx_canvas_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2478">gx_canvas_shift</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2479">Przenieś kanwę o x, y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2479">Shift canvas by x,y</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2480">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2480">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_shift(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_VALUE x, GX_VALUE y);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2481">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2481">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2482">Ta usługa przenosi przesunięcie określonego obszaru roboczego o określoną liczbę.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2482">This service shifts the specified canvas offset by the specified amount.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2483">Ma to wpływ na położenie, w którym Kanwa jest renderowana w buforze ramki widocznej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2483">This affects the position at which the canvas is rendered within the visible frame buffer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2484">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2484">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2485">**Kanwa** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2485">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2486">**x** pikseli do przesunięcia na osi x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2486">**x** Pixels to shift on the X axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2487">**y** pikseli do przesunięcia na osi y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2487">**y** Pixels to shift on the Y axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2488">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2488">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2489">Pomyślna zmiana kanwy **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2489">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful canvas shift</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2490">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2490">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2491">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2491">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2492">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0X20) Nieprawidłowa Kanwa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2492">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2493">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2493">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2494">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2494">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2495">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2495">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Shift canvas “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_shift(&my_canvas, 10, 15);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas has been shifted by 10 pixels
    on the X axis and 15 on the Y axis. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_show"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2502">gx_canvas_show</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2502">gx_canvas_show</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2503">Wyświetlanie kanwy jako widocznej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2503">Make a canvas visible</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2504">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2504">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_show(GX_CANVAS *canvas);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2505">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2505">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2506">Ta usługa sprawia, że Kanwa jest widoczna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2506">This service makes a canvas visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2507">Jeśli Kanwa została wcześniej powiązana z sprzętową warstwą grafiki przy użyciu interfejsu API gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind (), usługa gx_canvas_show () jest implementowana bezpośrednio przy użyciu obsługi sprzętowej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2507">If the canvas has been previously bound to a hardware graphics layer using the gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API, the gx_canvas_show() service is implemented directly using hardware support.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2508">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2508">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2509">**Kanwa** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2509">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2510">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2510">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2511">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — pomyślne przypisanie przesunięcia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2511">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful assignment of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2512">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2512">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2513">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2513">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2514">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0X20) Nieprawidłowa Kanwa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2514">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2515">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2515">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2516">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2516">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2517">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2517">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Make this canvas visible. */
status = gx_canvas_show(&my_canvas);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing is now visible */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2526">gx_canvas_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2526">gx_canvas_text_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2527">Rysuj tekst (przestarzałe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2527">Draw text (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2528">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2528">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_text_draw(
    GX_VALUE x_start, 
    GX_VALUE y_start,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *string, 
    INT length);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2529">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2529">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2530">Ta usługa rysuje tekst na kanwie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2530">This service draws text on the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2531">Ten interfejs API, chociaż nadal jest obsługiwany, jest przestarzały, a nowe aplikacje powinny zamiast tego używać gx_canvas_text_draw_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2531">This API, while still supported, is deprecated and new applications should instead use gx_canvas_text_draw_ext().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2532">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2532">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2533">**x_start** Uruchamianie współrzędnych x dla tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2533">**x_start** Starting x-coordinate for text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2534">**y_start** Początkowa Współrzędna y dla tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2534">**y_start** Starting y-coordinate for text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2535">**ciąg** Wskaźnik do ciągu do rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2535">**string** Pointer to string to draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2536">**Długość** Jeśli długość >= 0, ogranicza liczbę znaków rysowanych do długości.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2536">**length** If length >= 0, limits the number of characters drawn to length.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2537">Jeśli długość < 0, cały ciąg do momentu narysowania wartości NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2537">If length < 0, the entire string until NULL terminator is drawn.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2538">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2538">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2539">Pomyślne rysowanie tekstu **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2539">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2540">Niepowodzenie rysowania tekstu **GX_FAILURE** (0x1E)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2540">**GX_FAILURE** (0x1E) Failed text draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2541">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2541">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2542">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2542">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2543">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) brak otwartego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2543">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2544">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0X34) Nieprawidłowa długość ciągu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2544">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2545">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2545">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2546">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2546">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2547">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2547">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw text “example” on current canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_text_draw(10, 20, “example”, 7);

/* Draw all of a string of unknown length on the current canvas */
status = gx_canvas_text_draw(10, 40, string_ptr, -1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text “example” has been drawn. */
```

## <a name="gx_checkbox_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2592">gx_checkbox_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2592">gx_checkbox_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2593">Utwórz pole wyboru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2593">Create checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2594">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2594">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_checkbox_create(
    GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT checkbox_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2595">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2595">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2596">Ta usługa tworzy widżet CheckBox z określonymi właściwościami.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2596">This service creates a checkbox widget with the specified properties.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2597">GX_CHECKBOX pochodzi od GX_TEXT_BUTTON, a wszystkie usługi gx_text_button mogą być używane z GX_CHECKBOX widżetów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2597">GX_CHECKBOX is derived from GX_TEXT_BUTTON, and all gx_text_button services may be used with GX_CHECKBOX widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2598">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2598">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2599">**pole wyboru** Wskaźnik do pola wyboru bloku sterowania nazwa logiczna nazwa widżetu pola wyboru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2599">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block name Logical name of checkbox widget</span></span>

## <a name="gx_checkbox_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2619">gx_checkbox_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2619">gx_checkbox_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2620">Pole wyboru rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2620">Draw checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2621">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2621">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_checkbox_draw(GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2622">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2622">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2623">Ta usługa służy do rysowania określonego pola wyboru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2623">This service draws the specified checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2624">Ta funkcja jest zwykle wywoływana wewnętrznie przez mechanizm odświeżania kanwy GUIX, ale jest uwidaczniana dla aplikacji, aby pomóc w zaimplementowaniu niestandardowych funkcji rysowania niestandardowych widżetów pól wyboru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2624">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom checkbox widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2625">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2625">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2626">**pole wyboru** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki CheckBox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2626">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2627">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2627">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2628">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2628">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2629">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2629">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2630">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2630">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2631">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2631">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom checkbox draw function. */
VOID custom_checkbox_draw(GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox)
{
    /* Call default checkbox draw. */
    gx_checkbox_draw(checkbox);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_checkbox_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2636">gx_checkbox_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2636">gx_checkbox_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2637">Zdarzenie pola wyboru procesu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2637">Process checkbox event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2638">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2638">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_checkbox_event_process(
    GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox, 
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2639">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2639">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2640">Ta usługa przetwarza zdarzenie dla określonego pola wyboru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2640">This service processes an event for the specified checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2641">Ta usługa powinna być wywoływana jako domyślna procedura obsługi zdarzeń przez wszelkie niestandardowe funkcje przetwarzania zdarzeń CheckBox.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2641">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom checkbox event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2642">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2642">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2643">**pole wyboru** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki CheckBox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2643">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2644">**event_ptr** Wskaźnik do zdarzenia do przetworzenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2644">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2645">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2645">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2646">Proces zdarzenia CheckBox pomyślnego **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2646">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2647">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2647">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2648">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2648">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2649">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2649">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2650">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2650">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2651">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2651">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2652">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2652">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic checkbox event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_checkbox_event_process(GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default checkbox
            event processing */
        status = gx_checkbox_event_process(checkbox, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2657">gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2657">gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set</span></span>

```C
    GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID unchecked_id, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID checked_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID unchecked_disabled_id, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID checked_disabled_id);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2665">**unchecked_id** Pixelmap używany dla stanu niesprawdzonego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2665">**unchecked_id** Pixelmap used for unchecked state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2666">**checked_id** Pixelmap używany dla stanu zaznaczenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2666">**checked_id** Pixelmap used for checked state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2667">**unchecked_disabled_id** Pixelmap używany dla pola wyboru wyłączone i niezaznaczone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2667">**unchecked_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for a disabled and unchecked checkbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2668">**checked_disabled_id** Pixelmap używany dla wyłączonego i zaznaczonego pola wyboru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2668">**checked_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for a disabled and checked checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2669">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2669">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2670">Pole wyboru **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) powiodło się</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2670">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox select</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2671">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2671">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2672">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2672">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2673">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2673">Allowed From</span></span>

```C

status = gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set(&my_checkbox,
    PIXELMAP_UNCHECKED_ID,
    PIXELMAP_CHECKED_ID, PIXELMAP_UNCHECKED_DISABLED_ID,
    PIXELMAP_CHECKED_SIABLED_ID));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmaps are assigned to the checkbox “my_checkbox” */
```

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2700">Pobierz kąt bieżący</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2700">Get current angle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2701">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2701">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_angle_get(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge, 
    INT *angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2702">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2702">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2703">Ta usługa Pobiera bieżący kąt wskazówki dla widgetu miernika okrągłego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2703">This service retrieves the current needle angle of circular gauge widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2704">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2704">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2705">**miernik** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki miernika okrągłego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2705">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2706">**kąt** Bieżący kąt wskazówki do pobrania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2706">**angle** Current needle angle to be retrieved</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2707">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2707">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2708">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne odchylenia kątowe miernika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2708">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful circular gauge angle get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2709">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2709">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2710">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2710">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2712">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2712">Example</span></span>

```C
INT current_angle;

/* Retrieve the current needle angle of “my_gauge”. */
status = gx_circular_gauge_angle_get(&my_gauge, &current_angle);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the current needle angle of “my_gauge” has been retrieved. */
```

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_angle_set(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    INT angle);
```

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2732">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2732">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_animation_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2742">gx_circular_gauge_animation_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2742">gx_circular_gauge_animation_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2743">Ustaw parametry animacji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2743">Set animation parameters</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2744">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2744">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_animation_set(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    INT steps, 
    INT delay);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2745">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2745">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2746">Ta usługa ustawia kroki animacji i czas opóźnienia dla widżetu mierniki cyklicznej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2746">This service sets animation steps and delay time for a circular gauge widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2747">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2747">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2748">**miernik** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki miernika okrągłego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2748">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2749">**kroki** Łączna liczba kroków dla jednej rotacji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2749">**steps** Total steps for one rotation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2750">**opóźnienie** Czas opóźnienia dla każdego kroku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2750">**delay** Delay time for every step</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2751">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2751">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2752">Pole wyboru **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) powiodło się</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2752">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox select</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2753">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2753">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2754">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2754">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2755">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) Nieprawidłowa wartość</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2755">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2756">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2756">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2757">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2757">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2758">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2758">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set animation steps and delay time of circular gauge “my_gauge”
    to 30 and 1, the needle of “my_gauge” will rotate from
    current angle to target angle by 30 steps with 1 tick delay between every step. */
status = gx_circular_gauge_animation_set(&my_gauge, 30, 1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the steps and delay time of “my_gauge” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2766">gx_circular_gauge_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2766">gx_circular_gauge_background_draw</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2768">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2768">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_circular_gauge_background_draw(GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2769">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2769">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2770">Ta usługa rysuje tło określonego miernika cyklicznego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2770">This service draws background of the specified circular gauge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2771">Ta usługa jest zwykle wywoływana wewnętrznie przez funkcję gx_circular_gauge_draw, ale jest dostępna dla aplikacji, aby pomóc w tworzeniu niestandardowych funkcji rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2771">This service is normally called internally by the gx_circular_gauge_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2772">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2772">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2774">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2774">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2775">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2775">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2776">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2776">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2778">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2778">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw circular gauge background. */
gx_circular_gauge_background_draw(&my_circular_gauge);
```

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2786">gx_circular_gauge_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2786">gx_circular_gauge_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2787">Utwórz miernik cykliczny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2787">Create circular gauge</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2788">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2788">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_create(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE_INFO *info,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID background_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT circular_gauge_id,
    GX_VALUE xpos,
    GX_VALUE ypos);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2789">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2789">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2790">Ta usługa tworzy widżet miernika okrągły z określonymi właściwościami.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2790">This service creates a circular gauge widget with the specified properties.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2791">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2791">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2792">**miernik** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki miernika okrągłego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2792">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2793">**Nazwa** Logiczna nazwa widżetu miernika cyklicznego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2793">**name** Logical name of circular gauge widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2794">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do widżetu nadrzędnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2794">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2795">**informacje** Wskaźnik na strukturę informacji miernika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2795">**info** Pointer to the gauge information structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2796">**Dodatek I** zawiera definicję do GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE_INFO struktury</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2796">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE_INFO structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2797">**background_id** Identyfikator zasobu w tle miernika cyklicznego Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2797">**background_id** Resource ID of circular gauge background pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2798">**styl** Styl miernika okrągłego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2798">**style** Style of circular gauge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2799">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich elementów widget, a także style charakterystyczne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2799">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2800">**circular_gauge_id** Zdefiniowany przez aplikację identyfikator miernika cyklicznego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2800">**circular_gauge_id** Application-defined ID of circular gauge</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2811">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2811">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE gauge_info;

gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_animation_steps = 30;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_animation_delay = 1;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_xpos = 140;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_ypos = 140;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_neelde_xcor = 20;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_neelde_ycor = 88;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Create “my_gauge”. */
status = gx_circular_gauge_create(&my_gauge, “my_gauge”,
            &my_parent,
            &gauge_info, MY_PIXELMAP_RESOURCE_ID, GX_NULL,
            MY_ICON_ID, 5, 30);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the circular gauge “my_gauge” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2819">gx_circular_gauge_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2819">gx_circular_gauge_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2820">Rysuj miernik cykliczny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2820">Draw circular gauge</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2821">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2821">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_circular_gauge_draw(GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2822">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2822">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2823">Ta usługa Rysuje określony okrągły miernik.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2823">This service draws the specified circular gauge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2824">Ta funkcja jest zwykle wywoływana wewnętrznie przez mechanizm odświeżania kanwy GUIX, ale jest dostępna dla aplikacji, aby pomóc w zaimplementowaniu niestandardowych funkcji rysowania dla widżetów niestandardowego miernika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2824">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom gauge widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2825">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2825">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2826">**miernik** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki miernika okrągłego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2826">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2827">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2827">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2828">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2828">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2829">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2829">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2830">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2830">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2831">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2831">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom circular gauge draw function. */
VOID custom_gauge_draw(GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge)
{
    /* Call default circular gauge draw. */
    gx_circular_gauge_draw(gauge);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}
```
