## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2839">gx_circular_gauge_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2839">gx_circular_gauge_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2840">Zdarzenie cyklicznego miernika procesu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2840">Process circular gauge event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2841">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2841">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_event_process(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2842">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2842">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2843">Ta usługa przetwarza zdarzenie dla określonego miernika cyklicznego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2843">This service processes an event for the specified circular gauge.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2844">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2844">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2845">**miernik** Wskaźnik do bloku sterowania miernikiem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2845">**gauge** Pointer to gauge control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2846">**event_ptr** Wskaźnik do zdarzenia do przetworzenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2846">**event_ptr** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2847">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2847">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2848">Proces zdarzenia pomyślnego miernika **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2848">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful gauge event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2849">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2849">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2850">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2850">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2851">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2851">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2852">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2852">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2853">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2853">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic circular gauge event processing as part of custom event processing function. */
UINT custom_gauge_event_process(GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default circular gauge
             event processing */
        status = gx_circular_gauge_event_process(gauge, event);
        break;
}
return status;
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2891">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2891">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2892">Ta usługa definiuje pędzel bieżącego kontekstu rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2892">This service defines the brush of the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2893">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2893">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2894">**line_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu koloru linii.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2894">**line_color_id** Resource ID of line color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2895">**Dodatek B** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane identyfikatory zasobów koloru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2895">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2896">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodać identyfikatory zasobów koloru niestandardowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2896">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2897">**fill_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu koloru wypełnienia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2897">**fill_color_id** Resource ID of fill color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2898">**Dodatek B** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane identyfikatory zasobów koloru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2898">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2899">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodać identyfikatory zasobów koloru niestandardowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2899">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2900">**styl** Styl pędzla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2900">**style** Style of brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2901">**Dodatek D** zawiera opis obsługiwanych stylów pędzla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2901">**Appendix D** describes the supported brush styles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2902">Style pędzla można łączyć w jedną zmienną przy użyciu funkcji bitowej lub operacji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2902">Brush styles can be combined into one variable using bitwise OR operation.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2904">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — Definiowanie pędzla kontekstu pomyślnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2904">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2905">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0X33) Nieprawidłowy identyfikator zasobu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2905">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2906">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) nie zdefiniowano aktywnego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2906">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2907">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0X33) Nieprawidłowy identyfikator zasobu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2907">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2908">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) nie ma aktywnego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2908">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

```C
    GX_STYLE_BORDER_NONE);
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2926">gx_context_brush_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2926">gx_context_brush_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2927">Pobierz pędzel bieżącego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2927">Get brush of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2928">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2928">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_get(GX_BRUSH **return_brush);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2929">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2929">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2930">Ta usługa zwraca wskaźnik do aktywnego pędzla w bieżącym kontekście rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2930">This service returns a pointer to the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2931">Jeśli nie ma aktywnego kontekstu rysowania, usługa zakończy się niepowodzeniem i zwróci wskaźnik o wartości NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2931">If there is no active drawing context, the service fails and returns a NULL pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2932">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2932">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2933">**return_brush** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla pędzla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2933">**return_brush** Pointer to destination for brush.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2934">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2934">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2935">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie pobrał pędzel kontekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2935">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved context brush</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2936">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) nie ma aktywnego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2936">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2937">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2937">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2938">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2938">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2939">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2939">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2940">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2940">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BRUSH *my_brush;

/* Get the brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_brush_get(&my_brush);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush of the current context has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_pattern_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2955">gx_context_brush_pattern_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2955">gx_context_brush_pattern_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2956">Ustaw Wzorzec pędzla bieżącego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2956">Set brush pattern of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2957">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2957">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_pattern_set(ULONG pattern);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2958">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2958">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2959">Ta usługa ustawia Wzorzec pędzla bieżącego kontekstu rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2959">This service sets the brush pattern of the current drawing context.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2960">Wzorzec pędzla jest używany do rysowania pionowych linii kreskowanych w poziomie i kreskowanych.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2960">The brush pattern is used for drawing dashed horizontal and dashed vertical lines.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2961">Gdy gx_canvas_line_draw () jest wywoływana, a linia jest pozioma lub pionowa, a pole brush.gx_brush_line_pattern ma wartość różną od zera, zostanie narysowana linia wzorku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2961">When the gx_canvas_line_draw() is called, and the line is horizontal or vertical, and the brush.gx_brush_line_pattern field is non-zero, a pattern line is drawn.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2962">Maska wzorca pędzla jest obecnie obsługiwana tylko dla linii poziomej i pionowej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2962">The brush pattern mask is currently only supported for horizontal and vertical lines.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2963">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2963">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2964">**wzorzec** Wzorzec, który ma być używany dla pędzla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2964">**pattern** Pattern to be used for the brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2965">Jest to prosty szesnastkowy wzorzec włączania/wyłączania, który będzie używany do rysowania linii wzorców.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2965">This is a simple hexidecimal on/off pattern to be used for pattern line drawing.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2966">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2966">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2967">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) zestaw pędzli kontekstu pomyślnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2967">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2968">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) Nieprawidłowy kontekst rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2968">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Invalid drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2969">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2969">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2970">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2970">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2971">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2971">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the brush pattern for the current contex. */
status = gx_context_brush_pattern_set(0x80808080);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush pattern of the current context
has been set to the specified pattern. */
```

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_set(GX_BRUSH *brush);
```

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2989">Ta usługa ustawia pędzel bieżącego kontekstu rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2989">This service sets the brush of the current drawing context.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-2995">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2995">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2996">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2996">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-2997">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2997">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-2998">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-2998">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BRSUH my_brush;
GX_FONT *font;
GX_COLOR fill_color;
GX_COLOR line_color;

/* Retrieve the font that associated with the specified font ID. */
gx_context_font_get(MY_FONT_ID, &font);

/* Retrieve the color that associated with the specified color ID. */
gx_context_color_get(MY_FILL_COLOR_ID, &fill_color);
gx_context_color_get(MY_LINE_COLOR, &line_color);

my_brush.gx_brush_pixelmap = MY_PIXELMAP_ID;
my_brush.gx_brush_font = font;
my_brush.gx_brush_line_pattern = 0x80808080;
my_brush.gx_brush_pattern_mask = 0x80000000;
my_brush.gx_brush_fill_color = fill_color;
my_brush.gx_brush_line_color = line_color;
my_brush.gx_brush_style = GX_BRSUH_SOLID_FILL | GX_BRUSH_ALIAS |
                          GX_BRUSH_PIXELMAP_FILL | GX_BRUSH_ROUND
my_brush.gx_brush_width = 2;
my_brush.gx_brush_alpha = 255;

/* Set the brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_brush_set(my_brush);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush of the current context has been set. */
```


## <a name="gx_context_color_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3068">gx_context_color_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3068">gx_context_color_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3080">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0X33) Nieprawidłowy identyfikator zasobu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3080">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3082">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3082">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3100">gx_context_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3100">gx_context_fill_color_set</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3102">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3102">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_fill_color_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3103">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3103">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3104">Ta usługa ustawia kolor wypełnienia aktywnego pędzla w bieżącym kontekście rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3104">This service sets the fill color of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3105">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3105">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3106">**fill_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu koloru wypełnienia bieżącego kontekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3106">**fill_color_id** Resource ID of fill color of current context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3107">**Dodatek B** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane identyfikatory zasobów koloru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3107">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3108">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodać identyfikatory zasobów koloru niestandardowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3108">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3109">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3109">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3111">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0X33) Nieprawidłowy identyfikator zasobu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3111">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3112">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) nie ma aktywnego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3112">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

```C
/* Set the fill color of the current context to black. */
status = gx_context_fill_color_set(MY_BLACK_COLOR_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the fill color of the current context has been set to black. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_font_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3130">gx_context_font_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3130">gx_context_font_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3131">Pobierz czcionkę skojarzoną z IDENTYFIKATORem czcionki w bieżącym kontekście rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3131">Get font associated with font ID in current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3132">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3132">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_font_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id,
    GX_FONT **return_font);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3133">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3133">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3134">Ta usługa Pobiera wskaźnik czcionki skojarzony ze wskazanym IDENTYFIKATORem czcionki.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3134">This service retrieves the font pointer associated with the indicated font ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3135">Ta usługa powinna być wywoływana tylko z poziomu aktywnej operacji rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3135">This service should only be called from within an active drawing operation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3136">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3136">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3137">**font_id** Zażądano identyfikatora zasobu czcionki.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3137">**font_id** Resource ID of font requested.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3138">**return_font** Adres zmiennej do przechowania zwrócony wskaźnik czcionki.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3138">**return_font** Address of variable to hold returned font pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3139">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3139">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3140">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie pobrała czcionkę</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3140">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3141">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0X33) Nieprawidłowy identyfikator zasobu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3141">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3142">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) nie ma aktywnego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3142">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3143">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3143">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3144">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3144">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3145">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3145">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3146">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3146">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_FONT *my_font;

/* Get the font pointer. */
status = gx_context_font_get(MY_MIDSIZE_FONT, &my_font);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the font that indicated with MY_MIDSIZE_FONT has been successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_pixelmap_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3219">gx_context_pixelmap_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3219">gx_context_pixelmap_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3220">Pobierz Pixelmap skojarzone z IDENTYFIKATORem Pixelmap w bieżącym kontekście rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3220">Get pixelmap associated with pixelmap ID in current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3221">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3221">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_pixelmap_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID pixelmap_id,
    GX_PIXELMAP **return_map);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3222">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3222">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3223">Ta usługa Pobiera wskaźnik Pixelmap powiązany ze wskazanym IDENTYFIKATORem Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3223">This service retrieves the pixelmap pointer associated with the indicated pixelmap ID.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3224">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3224">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3225">**pixelmap_id** Zażądano identyfikatora zasobu Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3225">**pixelmap_id** Resource ID of pixelmap requested.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3226">**return_map** Adres zmiennej do przechowania zwrócony adres Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3226">**return_map** Address of variable to hold returned pixelmap address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3227">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3227">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3228">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie pobrał Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3228">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3229">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0X33) Nieprawidłowy identyfikator zasobu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3229">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3230">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) nie ma aktywnego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3230">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3231">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3231">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pixelmap pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3232">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3232">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3233">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3233">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3234">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3234">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXELMAP *map;

/* Get the pixelmap pointer. */
status = gx_context_pixelmap_get(MY_PIXELMAP_ID, &map);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pixelmap was successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3249">gx_context_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3249">gx_context_pixelmap_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3250">Ustaw Pixelmap bieżącego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3250">Set pixelmap of current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3251">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3251">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_pixelmap_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID pixelmap_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3252">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3252">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3253">Ta usługa przypisuje Pixelmap aktywnego pędzla w bieżącym kontekście rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3253">This service assigns the pixelmap of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3254">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3254">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3255">**pixelmap_id** Identyfikator zasobu Pixelmap do użycia dla bieżącego kontekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3255">**pixelmap_id** Pixelmap resource ID to use for current context</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3256">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3256">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3257">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne kontekst Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3257">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context pixelmap set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3258">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0X33) Nieprawidłowy identyfikator zasobu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3258">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3259">**GX_INVLAID_CONTEXT** (0X06) Nieprawidłowy kontekst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3259">**GX_INVLAID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Invalid context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3260">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3260">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3261">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3261">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3262">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3262">Example</span></span>

```C

status = gx_context_pixelmap_set(MY_PIXELMAP_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap of the current context has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_raw_brush_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3277">gx_context_raw_brush_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3277">gx_context_raw_brush_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3278">Zdefiniuj nieprzetworzony pędzel bieżącego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3278">Define raw brush of current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3279">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3279">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_raw_brush_define(
    GX_COLOR line_color,
    GX_COLOR fill_color, 
    UINT style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3280">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3280">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3281">Ta usługa definiuje surowy pędzel bieżącego kontekstu ekranu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3281">This service defines the raw brush of the current screen context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3282">Surowe definicje są używane, gdy 32-bitowe wartości kolorów ARGB są przesyłane do pędzla, a nie identyfikatorów kolorów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3282">Raw definitions are used when 32-bit ARGB color values are to be passed into the brush rather than color IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3283">Surowe definicje kolorów są przydatne, gdy żądany kolor nie występuje w bieżącej tabeli kolorów systemu lub gdy wartość koloru RGB jest obliczana w czasie wykonywania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3283">Raw color definitions are useful when the desired color is not present in the current system color table or when the RGB color value is computed at runtime.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3284">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3284">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3285">**line_color** Kolor linii w 32-bitowym formacie koloru pierwotnego ARGB.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3285">**line_color** Color of line in 32-bit raw ARGB color format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3286">**Dodatek A** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane kolory.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3286">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3287">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodać kolory niestandardowe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3287">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3288">**fill_color** Kolor wypełnienia w 32-bitowym formacie koloru pierwotnego ARGB.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3288">**fill_color** Color of fill in 32-bit raw ARGB color format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3289">**Dodatek A** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane kolory.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3289">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3290">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodać kolory niestandardowe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3290">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3291">**styl** Styl pędzla.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3291">**style** Style of brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3292">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich elementów widget, a także style charakterystyczne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3292">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3293">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3293">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3294">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — Definiowanie nieprawidłowego pędzla pierwotnego kontekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3294">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw brush define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3295">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) nie ma aktywnego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3295">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3296">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3296">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3297">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3297">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3298">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3298">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define the raw brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_raw_brush_define(GX_COLOR_BLACK,
    GX_COLOR_BLACK, GX_STYLE_BORDER_NONE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the raw brush of the current context has been defined. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_raw_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3313">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3313">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3314">Ustaw nieprzetworzony kolor wypełnienia bieżącego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3314">Set raw fill color of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3315">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3315">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_raw_fill_color_set(GX_COLOR line_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3316">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3316">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3317">Ta usługa ustawia pierwotny kolor wypełnienia bieżącego kontekstu ekranu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3317">This service sets the raw fill color of the current screen context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3318">Parametr line_color jest 32 bitową wartością koloru w formacie ARGB, a nie wartością identyfikatora koloru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3318">The line_color parameter is a 32-bit ARGB format raw color value, rather than a color ID value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3319">Surowe definicje kolorów są przydatne, gdy żądany kolor nie występuje w bieżącej tabeli kolorów systemu lub gdy wartość koloru RGB jest obliczana w czasie wykonywania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3319">Raw color definitions are useful when the desired color is not present in the current system color table or when the RGB color value is computed at runtime.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3320">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3320">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3321">**line_color** Kolor linii.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3321">**line_color** Color of line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3322">**Dodatek A** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane kolory.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3322">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3323">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodać kolory niestandardowe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3323">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3324">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3324">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3325">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ustawiony kolor pierwotnego wypełnienia kontekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3325">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw fill color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3326">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) nie ma aktywnego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3326">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3327">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3327">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3328">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3328">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3329">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3329">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the raw fill color of the current context. */
status = gx_context_raw_fill_color_set(GX_COLOR_BLACK);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the raw fill color of the current context has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_raw_line_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3344">gx_context_raw_line_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3344">gx_context_raw_line_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3345">Ustaw kolor nieprzetworzonej linii bieżącego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3345">Set raw line color of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3346">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3346">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_raw_line_color_set(GX_COLOR line_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3347">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3347">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3348">Ta usługa ustawia kolor linii aktywnego pędzla w bieżącym kontekście rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3348">This service sets the line color of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3349">Parametr line_color jest 32 bitową wartością koloru w formacie ARGB, a nie wartością identyfikatora koloru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3349">The line_color parameter is a 32-bit ARGB format raw color value, rather than a color ID value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3350">Surowe definicje kolorów są przydatne, gdy żądany kolor nie występuje w bieżącej tabeli kolorów systemu lub gdy wartość koloru RGB jest obliczana w czasie wykonywania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3350">Raw color definitions are useful when the desired color is not present in the current system color table or when the RGB color value is computed at runtime.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3351">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3351">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3352">**line_color** Kolor wartości linii.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3352">**line_color** Color of line value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3353">**Dodatek A** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane kolory.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3353">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3354">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodać kolory niestandardowe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3354">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3355">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3355">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3356">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ustawiony kolor niesformatowanego wiersza kontekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3356">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3357">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) nie ma aktywnego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3357">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3358">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3358">Allowed From</span></span>

```C

status = gx_context_raw_line_color_set(GX_COLOR_BLACK);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the raw line color of the current context has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_string_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3374">gx_context_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3374">gx_context_string_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3375">Pobierz ciąg skojarzony z IDENTYFIKATORem ciągu (przestarzałe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3375">Retrieve string associated with String ID (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3376">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3376">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_string_get(GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR **return_string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3377">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3377">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3378">Ten przestarzały interfejs API zwraca ciąg skojarzony z danym IDENTYFIKATORem ciągu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3378">This deprecated API returns the string associated with the given string ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3379">Nowe aplikacje powinny używać gx_context_string_get_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3379">New applications should use gx_context_string_get_ext().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3380">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3380">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3381">**string_id** Identyfikator ciągu wygenerowany przez aplikację GUIX Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3381">**string_id** String ID generated by the GUIX Studio application.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3382">**return_string** Adres zmiennej do zwrócenia wskaźnika ciągu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3382">**return_string** Address of variable to return string pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3383">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3383">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3384">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ustawiony kolor niesformatowanego wiersza kontekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3384">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3385">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3385">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3386">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3386">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3387">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) nie ma aktywnego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3387">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3388">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3388">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3389">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3389">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3390">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3390">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR *text;

status = gx_context_string_get(GX_ID_ERROR, &text);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string pointer has been returned. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3391">Zobacz też</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3391">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3392">gx_context_string_get_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3392">gx_context_string_get_ext</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_string_get_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3393">gx_context_string_get_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3393">gx_context_string_get_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3394">Pobierz ciąg skojarzony z danym IDENTYFIKATORem ciągu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3394">Retrieve string associated with given string ID.</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3395">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3395">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_string_get_ext(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id, 
    GX_STRING *return_string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3396">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3396">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3397">Ta usługa zwraca ciąg skojarzony z danym IDENTYFIKATORem ciągu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3397">This service returns the string associated with a given string ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3398">Ta usługa może być wywoływana tylko w przypadku aktywnego kontekstu rysowania, tj. z funkcji rysowania widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3398">This service can only be invoked when there is an active drawing context, i.e. from within the drawing function of a widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3399">Ta usługa identyfikuje aktywną kanwę i wyświetla i pobiera ciąg z zlokalizowanego wystąpienia ekranu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3399">This service identifies the active canvas and display and retrieves the string from the located display instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3400">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3400">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3401">**string_id** Identyfikator ciągu używany do identyfikowania ciągu, zgodnie z wygenerowanym przez GUIX Studio w pliku nagłówkowym zasobu aplikacji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3401">**string_id** String ID used to identify the string, as generated by GUIX Studio in the application resource header file.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3402">**return_string** Adres zmiennej GX_STRING, w której zostanie zwrócony wskaźnik ciągu i długość ciągu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3402">**return_string** Address of GX_STRING variable in which the string pointer and string length will be returned.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3403">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3403">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3404">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ustawiony kolor niesformatowanego wiersza kontekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3404">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3405">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3405">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3406">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3406">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3407">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) nie ma aktywnego kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3407">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3408">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3408">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
string.gx_string_length values have been returned. */
```

## <a name="gx_display_active_language_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3425">gx_display_active_language_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3425">gx_display_active_language_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3426">Przypisywanie aktywnego języka wyświetlania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3426">Assign the display active language</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3427">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3427">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_active_language_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    GX_UBYTE language);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3428">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3428">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3429">Ta usługa przypisuje aktualnie aktywny język dla wskazanego ekranu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3429">This service assigns the currently active language for the indicated display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3430">Indeks języka odpowiada językom zdefiniowanym w tabeli języka wyświetlania i nie jest identyfikatorem języka ANSI.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3430">The language index corresponds to the languages defined in the display language table, and is not an ANSI language identifier.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3431">Różne ekrany w systemie wielu wyświetlaczy mogą uruchamiać różne języki aktywne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3431">Different displays in a multi display system can each run different active languages.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3432">Tabelę języka wyświetlania należy przypisać przed użyciem tego interfejsu API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3432">The display language table should be assigned before this API is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3433">Gdy ekran zostanie zainicjowany przy użyciu gx_studio_display_configure, tabela języka zostanie automatycznie zainstalowana, a aplikacja zostanie przekazana w indeksie aktywnego języka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3433">When a display is initialized using gx_studio_display_configure, the language table is automatically installed and the application passes in the active language index.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3434">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3434">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3435">**Wyświetl** Wskaźnik wyświetlania bloku sterowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3435">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3436">**Język** Indeks aktywnego języka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3436">**language** Active language index</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3437">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3437">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3438">Pomyślne przypisanie języka **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3438">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful language assign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3439">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik wyświetlania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3439">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid display pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3440">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) Nieprawidłowy indeks języka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3440">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid language index</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3441">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3441">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3442">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3442">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3443">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3443">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Change value of color MY_COLOR_ID. */
status = gx_display_active_language_set(&my_display,
    LANGUAGE_ENGLISH);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the active language has been assigned. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3444">Zobacz też</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3444">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3445">gx_display_language_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3445">gx_display_language_table_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3446">gx_studio_display_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3446">gx_studio_display_configure</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3447">gx_display_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3447">gx_display_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3448">Przypisz ponownie jedną wartość koloru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3448">Re-assign one color value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3449">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3449">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_color_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID color_id, 
    GX_COLOR new_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3450">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3450">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3451">Ta usługa ponownie przypisuje wartość koloru skojarzoną z określonym IDENTYFIKATORem koloru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3451">This service re-assigns the color value associated with the specified color ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3452">Można go użyć do zmodyfikowania tabeli kolorów wyświetlanej bez podawania zupełnie nowej tabeli kolorów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3452">This can be used to modify the color table of a display without providing an entirely new color table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3453">Podana wartość koloru musi być w formacie natywnym obsługiwanym przez ekran.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3453">The color value provided must be in the native format supported by the display.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3454">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3454">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3455">**Wyświetl** Wskaźnik wyświetlania bloku sterowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3455">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3456">**color_id** Identyfikator koloru do ponownego przypisania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3456">**color_id** Color ID to reassign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3457">**new_color** Wartość koloru do przypisania do tego gniazda color_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3457">**new_color** Color value to assign to this color_id slot</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3458">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3458">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3459">Pomyślne ponowne przypisanie koloru **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3459">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color reassign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3460">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0X33) Nieprawidłowy identyfikator koloru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3460">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid color ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3461">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3461">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3462">Nieprawidłowe wyświetlanie **GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3462">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Invalid display</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3463">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3463">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3464">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3464">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3465">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3465">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Change value of color MY_COLOR_ID. */
status = gx_display_color_set(&my_display, MY_COLOR_ID, 0x5454);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the color has been reassigned. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3466">Zobacz też</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3466">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3467">gx_display_color_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3467">gx_display_color_table_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_color_table_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3468">gx_display_color_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3468">gx_display_color_table_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3469">Przypisz tabelę kolorów wyświetlania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3469">Assign display color table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3470">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3470">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_color_table_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_COLOR *color_table, 
    INT color_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3471">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3471">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3472">Ta usługa ponownie przypisuje tabelę kolorów, która będzie używana przez ekran.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3472">This service re-assigns the color table to be used by the display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3473">Ta usługa jest zwykle wywoływana przez wygenerowaną funkcję konfiguracji wyświetlania GUIX Studio, ale może być również wywoływana przez oprogramowanie aplikacji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3473">This service is normally invoked by the GUIX Studio generated display configuration function, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3474">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3474">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3475">**Wyświetl** Wskaźnik wyświetlania bloku sterowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3475">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3476">**Color_Table** Tablica wartości kolorów w formacie natywnym.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3476">**color_table** Array of color values in display native format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3477">**color_count** Wskazuje liczbę wpisów w tabeli kolorów</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3477">**color_count** Indicates number of entries in color table</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3478">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3478">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3479">Zestaw tabeli kolorów pomyślnych **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3479">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color table set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3480">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3480">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3481">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3481">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3482">Nieprawidłowe wyświetlanie **GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3482">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Invalid display</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3483">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3483">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3484">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3484">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3485">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3485">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_COLOR default_table[32] = { … };

/* Change the color table */
status = gx_display_color_table_set(&my_display, default_table, 32);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the color table has been reassigned. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3486">Zobacz też</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3486">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3487">gx_display_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3487">gx_display_color_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3488">gx_display_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3488">gx_display_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3489">Utwórz ekran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3489">Create display</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3490">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3490">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_create(
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    GX_CONST CHAR *name,
    UINT (*display_driver_setup)(GX_DISPLAY *),
    GX_VALUE width, 
    GX_VALUE height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3491">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3491">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3492">Ta usługa tworzy ekran i wywołuje funkcję instalacji sterownika wyświetlania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3492">This service creates a display and calls the display driver setup function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3493">GUIX pobiera ten ekran i dodaje go do wewnętrznej listy wyświetlanych elementów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3493">GUIX takes this display and adds it to its internal list of displays.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3494">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3494">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3495">**Wyświetl** Wskaźnik wyświetlania bloku sterowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3495">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3496">**Nazwa** Nazwa wyświetlania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3496">**name** Name of the display</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3497">**display_driver_setup** Wskaźnik wyświetlania funkcji instalacji sterownika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3497">**display_driver_setup** Pointer to display driver setup function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3498">**optional_driver_info** Wskaźnik do opcjonalnych informacji o sterowniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3498">**optional_driver_info** Pointer to optional driver information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3499">**color_format** Format koloru, zgodnie z definicją w **dodatku C**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3499">**color_format** Color format, as defined in **Appendix C**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3500">**Szerokość** Liczba pikseli na osi x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3500">**width** Number of pixels on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3501">**wysokość** Liczba pikseli na osi y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3501">**height** Number of pixels on the y-axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3502">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3502">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3503">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne wyświetlenie ekranu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3503">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful display create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3504">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR** (0XFE) nie można skonfigurować wyświetlania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3504">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR** (0xFE) Fail to setup display</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3505">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3505">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3506">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3506">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3507">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X23) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontrolki wyświetlania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3507">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x23) Invalid display control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3508">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3508">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3509">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3509">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3510">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3510">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DISPLAY my_display;

UINT my_driver_setup_callback(GX_DISPLAY *display)
{
    …
}

/* Create screen “my_display”. */
status = gx_display_create(&my_display, “my display”,
    my_driver_setup_callback, 320, 480);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the screen “my_display” has been created. */
```

```C

    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    VOID (*display_driver_cleanup)(GX_DISPLAY *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3516">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3516">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3517">Ta usługa zamyka ekran i czyści przydzieloną zasoby.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3517">This service shuts down a display, and cleans up allocated resources.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3521">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3521">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3523">**GX_FAILURE** (0X10) utworzona lista wyświetlania ma wartość null</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3523">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Created display list is NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3524">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3524">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3525">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3525">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3526">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3526">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3528">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3528">Example</span></span>

```C
VOID driver_cleanup_callback(GX_DISPLAY *display)
{
    …
}

/* Delete a display “my_display”. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the screen “my_display” has been destroyed. */
```

## <a name="gx_display_font_table_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3538">gx_display_font_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3538">gx_display_font_table_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3539">Przypisywanie tabeli czcionek wyświetlanych</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3539">Assign display font table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3540">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3540">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_font_table_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_FONT **font_table, 
    INT table_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3541">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3541">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3542">Ta usługa ponownie przypisuje tabelę czcionek, która będzie używana przez ekran.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3542">This service re-assigns the font table to be used by the display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3543">Ta usługa jest zwykle wywoływana przez wygenerowaną funkcję konfiguracji wyświetlania GUIX Studio, ale może być również wywoływana przez oprogramowanie aplikacji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3543">This service is normally invoked by the GUIX Studio generated display configuration function, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3544">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3544">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3545">**Wyświetl** Wskaźnik wyświetlania bloku sterowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3545">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3546">**font_table** Tablica wskaźników GX_FONT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3546">**font_table** Array of GX_FONT pointers.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3547">**table_size** Liczba czcionek w tabeli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3547">**table_size** Number of fonts in table</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3548">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3548">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3549">Zestaw tabeli czcionek pomyślnych **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3549">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful font table set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3550">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3550">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3551">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3551">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3552">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3552">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3553">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3553">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3554">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3554">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_FONT *font_table[32] = { … };

/* Assign font table */
status = gx_display_font_table_set(&my_display, font_table, 32);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the font table has been reassigned. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3555">Zobacz też</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3555">See Also</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_language_table_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3559">gx_display_language_table_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3559">gx_display_language_table_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3560">Pobierz tabelę języka wyświetlania (przestarzałe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3560">Retrieve display language table (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3561">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3561">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_language_table_get(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_CHAR **table, 
    GX_UBYTE *language_count,
    UINT *string_table_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3562">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3562">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3563">Ta usługa pobiera tabelę języka z wskazanego ekranu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3563">This service retrieves the language table from the indicated display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3564">Ta usługa może być używana przez aplikację do modyfikowania tabeli języka wyświetlania w czasie wykonywania przy użyciu dynamicznie zdefiniowanych ciągów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3564">This service can be used by an application to modify the display language table, at runtime, using dynamically defined strings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3565">Ten interfejs API jest przestarzały i jest obsługiwany tylko w przypadku aplikacji korzystających z tabeli języka starego stylu (tj. plik zasobów wygenerowany przez program Studio jest generowany dla wersji biblioteki wcześniejszej niż wersja 5,6).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3565">This API is deprecated and supported only for applications using the old style language table (i.e. the Studio generated resource file is generated for library version prior to version 5.6).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3566">Nowe aplikacje powinny używać gx_display_language_table_get_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3566">New applications should use gx_display_language_table_get_ext().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3567">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3567">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3568">**Wyświetl** Wskaźnik wyświetlania bloku sterowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3568">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3569">**tabela** Adres do otrzymania wskaźnika tabeli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3569">**table** Address to receive table pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3570">**language_count** Adres do otrzymania liczby języków</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3570">**language_count** Address to receive language count</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3571">**string_table_size** Adres odbierający rozmiar tabeli ciągów</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3571">**string_table_size** Address to receive string table size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3572">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3572">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3573">Zestaw tabeli czcionek pomyślnych **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3573">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful font table set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3574">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3574">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3575">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3575">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3576">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3576">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3577">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3577">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3578">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3578">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR **language_table;
GX_UBYTE language_count;
UINT string_count;

/* Retrieve language table */
status = gx_display_language_table_get(&my_display,
        &language_table, &language_count, &string_count);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the language table has been retrieved.
```

## <a name="gx_display_language_table_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3606">gx_display_language_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3606">gx_display_language_table_set</span></span>
