### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3608">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3608">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_language_table_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_CHAR **table, 
    GX_UBYTE number_of_languages, 
    UINT number_of_strings);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3609">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3609">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3610">Ta usługa jest przestarzała, a nowe aplikacje powinny używać gx_display_language_table_set_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3610">This service is deprecated and new applications should use gx_display_language_table_set_ext().</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3611">Ta usługa jest obsługiwana tylko w przypadku zgodności z plikami zasobów wygenerowanymi przez program Studio, które są przeznaczone dla wersji biblioteki wcześniejszych niż wersja 5,6.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3611">This service is supported only for compatibility with Studio generated resources files targeting library versions prior to version 5.6.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3612">Ta usługa przypisuje tabelę języka, która będzie używana przez ekran.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3612">This service assigns the language table to be used by the display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3613">Ta usługa jest zwykle wywoływana przez funkcję wygenerowaną przez program GUIX Studio gx_studio_display_configure, ale może być również wywoływana przez oprogramowanie aplikacji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3613">This service is normally invoked by the GUIX Studio generated function gx_studio_display_configure, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3614">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3614">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3615">**Wyświetl** Wskaźnik wyświetlania bloku sterowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3615">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3616">**tabela** Tabela języka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3616">**table** Language table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3617">**number_of_languages** Liczba kolumn w podanej tabeli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3617">**number_of_languages** Number of columns in the provided table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3618">**number_of_strings** Liczba ciągów w każdej kolumnie tabeli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3618">**number_of_strings** Number of strings in each table column</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3619">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3619">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3620">Zestaw tabeli czcionek pomyślnych **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3620">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful font table set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3621">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3621">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3622">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3622">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3623">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3623">Allowed From</span></span>

```C

/* Assign language table */

5, 232);

```

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3678">Ta usługa Pobiera ciąg z aktywnej tabeli ciągów dla wskazanego wyświetlenia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3678">This service retrieves a string from the active string table for the indicated display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3679">Aktywny język służy do wybierania ciągu z tabeli języka przypisanej do ekranu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3679">The active language is used to select the string from the language table assigned to the display.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3707">**który** String.gx_string_ptr i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3707">**which** string.gx_string_ptr and</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_theme_install"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3767">gx_display_theme_install</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3767">gx_display_theme_install</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3768">Zainstaluj motywy na określonym ekranie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3768">Install themes to the specified display</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3769">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3769">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_theme_install(
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    GX_THEME *theme_table);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3770">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3770">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3771">Ta usługa zainstaluje motywy na określonym ekranie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3771">This service install themes to the specified display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3772">Ta usługa jest zwykle wywoływana przez wygenerowaną przez program Studio funkcję konfiguracji wyświetlania, ale może być również wywoływana przez oprogramowanie aplikacji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3772">This service is normally invoked by the Studio generated display configuration function, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3773">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3773">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3774">**Wyświetl** Wskaźnik wyświetlania bloku sterowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3774">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3775">**theme_table** Tabela motywów do zainstalowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3775">**theme_table** Theme table to be installed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3776">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3776">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3777">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie zainstalował tabelę motywów</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3777">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully installed theme table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3778">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3778">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3779">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik tabeli motywu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3779">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid theme table pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3780">Nieprawidłowe wyświetlanie **GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3780">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Invalid display</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3781">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3781">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3782">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3782">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3783">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3783">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_THEME theme_1;

&theme_table[1] = {
    &theme_1,
    …
}

/* Define resource tables. */
GX_COLOR color_table[32] = {…};
GX_FONT *font_table[32] = {…};
GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap_table[32] = { … };

/* Define scroll appearance. */
GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE scroll_appearance;

memset(&scroll_appearance, 0, sizeof(GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE));

scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_width = 20;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_width = 18;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_color =
    GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_color =
    GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_button_color =
    GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_min = 20;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_max = 20;
scroll appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_style =
    GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN;

theme_1.theme_color_table = color_table;
theme_1.theme_font_table = font_table;
theme_1.theme_pixlemap_table = pixelmap_table;
theme_1.theme_palette = GX_NULL;
theme_1.theme_vertical_scrollbar_appearance = scroll_appearance;
theme_1.theme_horizontal_scrollbar_appearance = scroll_appearance;
theme_1.theme_vertical_scroll_style = GX_SCROLLBAR_RELATIVE_THUMB;
theme_1.theme_horizontal_scroll_style =
    GX_SCROLLBAR_RELATIVE_THUMB;
theme_1.theme_color_table_size = 32;
theme_1.theme_font_table_size = 32;
theme_1.theme_pixelmap_table_size = 32;
theme_1.theme_palette_size = 0;

/* Install theme table. */
status = gx_display_theme_install(&my_display, theme_table);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the theme table has been installed. */
```

## <a name="gx_drop_list_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3807">gx_drop_list_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3807">gx_drop_list_create</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3809">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3809">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_drop_list_create(
    GX_DROP_LIST *drop_list, 
    GX_CONST
    GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3810">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3810">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3811">Ta usługa tworzy listę rozwijaną.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3811">This service creates a drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3812">Lista rozwijana jest kombinacją widżetu listy rozwijanej i wyświetlaną pionową listą, która jest wyświetlana po otwarciu listy rozwijanej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3812">A drop list is a combination of the drop list widget, and a popup vertical list that is displayed when the drop-list is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3813">Lista rozwijana w pionie jest tworzona automatycznie po utworzeniu widżetu list i wyświetlania lub ukrywania, gdy widżet listy rozwijanej jest otwarty lub zamknięty odpowiednio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3813">The popup vertical list is created automatically when the drop-list widget is created, and displayed or hidden when the drop-list widget is opened or closed, respectively.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3814">Widżet listy rozwijanej obsługuje dwa skojarzone pixelmaps.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3814">The drop list widget supports two associated pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3815">Pierwszy, opisany jako "tapeta listy" w widoku właściwości Studio, to opcjonalna tapeta Pixelmap, która jest wyświetlana jako tło listy pionowej, która jest wyświetlana po otwarciu widżetu listy rozwijanej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3815">The first, described as “List Wallpaper” in the Studio properties view, is the optional wallpaper pixelmap that is displayed as the background of the vertical list that is displayed when the drop-list widget is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3816">Druga Pixelmap, opisana jako "obraz tła" w widoku właściwości Studio, jest opcjonalnym obrazem wyświetlanym jako tło samego listy rozwijanej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3816">The second pixelmap, described as the “Background Image” in the Studio properties view, is an optional image displayed as the background of the drop-list itself.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3817">Widżet listy rozwijanej może mieć element widget podrzędny, który jest używany do otwierania i zamykania listy rozwijanej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3817">A drop-list widget can have (but is not required to have) a child widget that is used to open and close the drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3818">Jest to zwyczajowa ikona lub widżet przycisku, ale nawet niestandardowy widżet może być używany jako przełącznik otwierania/zamykania dla nadrzędnej listy rozwijanej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3818">This is customarily an icon or button widget, but even a custom widget could be used as the open/close toggle for the parent drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3819">Ustawienie klucza, które powoduje, że ten widżet podrzędny działa na liście rozwijanej, jest to, że ten widżet podrzędny musi mieć wstępnie zdefiniowany identyfikator widżetu ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3819">The key setting which makes this child widget operate the drop list is that this child widget must have the pre-defined widget id ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3820">Aby zdefiniować widżet podrzędny, który zostanie otwarty i zamknie listę rozwijaną, firstadd i podrzędny element widget na listę rozwijaną, i umieść ten element podrzędny na liście rozwijanej zgodnie z potrzebami:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3820">To define a child widget which will open and close the drop-list, firstadd and child widget to the drop list, and position this child within the drop list as desired:</span></span>

![Zrzut ekranu przedstawiający listę rozwijaną.](./media/guix/image6.jpg)

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3822">Następnie za pomocą widoku właściwości programu Studio Przypisz ten element widget do wartości identyfikatora ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON, czyli wewnętrznie zdefiniowanej przez siebie wartości identyfikatora rozpoznawanej przez nadrzędną listę rozwijaną:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3822">Then use the Studio properties view to assign this child widget the ID value ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON, which is an internally defined ID value recognized by the parent drop list:</span></span>

![Zrzut ekranu przedstawiający widok Właściwości programu Studio.](./media/guix/image7.jpg)

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3824">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3824">Parameters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3825">**drop_list** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki listy rozwijanej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3825">**drop_list** Pointer to the drop list control block</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3827">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do widżetu nadrzędnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3827">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3828">**total_rows** Łączna liczba wierszy na liście rozwijanej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3828">**total_rows** Total number of rows in the drop list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3829">**open_height** Wysokość listy pionowej wyświetlana po otwarciu listy rozwijanej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3829">**open_height** The height of the vertical list displayed when the drop list is opened.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3830">**wywołanie zwrotne** Funkcja wywoływana przez listę pionową, gdy lista jest przewijana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3830">**callback** Function called by the vertical list when the list is scrolled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3831">Aby uzyskać więcej informacji, zapoznaj się z dokumentacją GX_VERTICAL_LIST.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3831">Refer to the documentation of GX_VERTICAL_LIST for more information.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3832">**styl** Styl obramowania listy rozwijanej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3832">**style** The drop-down list border style.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3833">**drop_list_id** Zdefiniowany przez aplikację Identyfikator listy rozwijanej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3833">**drop_list_id** Application-defined ID of the drop list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3834">**rozmiar** Wymiary listy rozwijanej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3834">**size** Dimensions of the drop list</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3835">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3835">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3836">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie Porzuć listę rozwijaną</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3836">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful drop list create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3837">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3837">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3838">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3838">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3839">Element widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) został już utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3839">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

```C
GX_DROP_LIST my_drop_list;
VOID list_row_create(GX_VERTICAL_LIST *list,
```

## <a name="gx_drop_list_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3849">gx_drop_list_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3849">gx_drop_list_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3850">Zdarzenie usuwania listy rozwijanej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3850">Process drop list event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3851">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3851">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_drop_list_event_process(
    GX_DROP_LIST *list, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3852">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3852">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3853">Ta usługa przetwarza zdarzenie dla listy rozwijanej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3853">This service processes an event for the drop list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3854">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3854">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3855">**drop_list** Upuść listę rozwijaną kontrolkę widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3855">**drop_list** Drop list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3856">**zdarzenie** Wskaźnik do zdarzenia do przetworzenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3856">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3857">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3857">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3858">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie przetworzył zdarzenie usuwania listy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3858">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed drop list event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3859">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3859">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3860">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3860">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3861">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3861">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3862">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3862">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3863">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3863">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic drop list event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_drop_list_event_process(GX_DROP_LIST *drop_list,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default drop list
            event processing */
        status = gx_drop_list_event_process(drop_list, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_drop_list_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3890">gx_drop_list_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3890">gx_drop_list_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3891">Przypisywanie obrazu tła do listy rozwijanej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3891">Assign a background image to the drop list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3892">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3892">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_drop_list_pixelmap_set(
    GX_DROP_LIST *drop_list,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3893">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3893">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3894">Przypisz obraz tła do listy rozwijanej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3894">Assign a background image to the drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3895">Ta Pixelmap jest używana jako tło dla widżetu listy rozwijanej, a nie dla wyskakującej listy pionowej, która jest wyświetlana, gdy lista jest otwarta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3895">This pixelmap is used as the background for the drop list widget itself, and not for the popup vertical list that is displayed when the list is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3896">Aby przypisać Pixelmap do okienka podręcznego listy rozwijanej, należy najpierw wywołać gx_drop_list_popup_get, aby pobrać wskaźnik do listy podręcznej, a następnie użyć gx_window_wallpaper_set () do przypisania Pixelmap do tej listy podręcznej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3896">To assign a pixelmap to the drop-list popup, you would need to first call gx_drop_list_popup_get to retrieve a pointer to the popup list, and then use gx_window_wallpaper_set() to assign a pixelmap to this popup list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3897">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3897">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3898">**drop_list** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki listy rozwijanej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3898">**drop_list** Pointer to the drop list control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3899">Identyfikator zasobu **identyfikatora** do pixlemap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3899">**id** Resource ID to the pixlemap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3900">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3900">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3901">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie Porzuć listę Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3901">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful drop list pixelmap set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3902">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3902">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3903">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3903">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3904">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0X33) Nieprawidłowy identyfikator pixlemap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3904">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid pixlemap ID</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3905">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3905">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3906">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3906">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3907">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3907">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DROP_LIST mylist;

/* create the drop list here */

/* Assign a pixelmap id, which will turn on the list button */
status = gx_drop_list_pixelmap_set(&mylist,
    GX_PIXELMAP_ID_DROP_LIST_BACKGROND);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pixelmap was successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_drop_list_popup_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3914">gx_drop_list_popup_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3914">gx_drop_list_popup_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3915">Pobierz wskaźnik do listy okienka podręcznego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3915">Retrieve pointer to popup vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3916">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3916">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_drop_list_popup_get(
    GX_DROP_LIST *drop_list,
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST **return_list);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3917">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3917">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3918">Widżet listy rozwijanej składa się z widżetu listy rozwijanej i wyświetlaną pionową listę, która jest wyświetlana po otwarciu widżetu listy rozwijanej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3918">A drop-list widget is composed of the drop-list widget itself, and a popup vertical list that is shown when the drop-list widget is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3919">Ta usługa Pobiera wskaźnik do składnika listy pionowej listy rozwijanej, umożliwiając aplikacji wywoływanie usług interfejsu API bezpośrednio na tej liście pionowej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3919">This service retrieves a pointer to the vertical list component of the drop list, allowing the application to invoke API services directly on this vertical list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3920">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3920">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3921">**drop_list** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki listy rozwijanej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3921">**drop_list** Pointer to the drop list control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3922">**return_list** Wskaźnik do listy pionowej przechowywanej na liście rozwijanej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3922">**return_list** Pointer to the vertical list stored in the drop list</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3923">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3923">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3924">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie pobrał podręczny list pionowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3924">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved popup vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3925">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3925">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3926">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3926">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3927">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3927">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3928">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3928">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DROP_LIST drop_list;
GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list;

/* Retrieve the popup list of “drop_list”. */
status = gx_drop_list_popup_get(&drop_list, &vertical_list)

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the popup list was successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_children_position"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3934">gx_horizontal_list_children_position</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3934">gx_horizontal_list_children_position</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3935">Umieść elementy podrzędne dla listy poziomej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3935">Position children for the horizontal list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3936">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3936">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_children_position(GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *horizontal_list);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3937">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3937">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3938">Ta funkcja umieszcza elementy podrzędne dla listy poziomej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3938">This function positions the children for the horizontal list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3939">Ta funkcja jest wywoływana automatycznie, gdy lista odbiera zdarzenie GX_EVENT_SHOW, ale powinna być wywoływana bezpośrednio, jeśli lista zostanie zmodyfikowana po jej udostępnieniu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3939">This function is called automatically when the list receives the GX_EVENT_SHOW event, but should be called directly if the list is modified after it has been made visible.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3940">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3940">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3941">**horizontal_list** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki listy poziomej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3941">**horizontal_list** Pointer to the horizontal list control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3942">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3942">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3943">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie pozycjonować elementy podrzędne dla listy poziomej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3943">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful positioned the children for the horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3944">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3944">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3945">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3945">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3946">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3946">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3947">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3947">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3948">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3948">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Position children in the horizontal list */
status = gx_horizontal_list_children_position (&horizontal_list);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the children in the horizontal list are positioned. */
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3957">gx_horizontal_list_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3957">gx_horizontal_list_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3958">Utwórz listę poziomą</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3958">Create horizontal list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3959">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3959">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_create(
    GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *horizontal_list,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_columns,
    VOID (*callback)(GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *, 
    GX_WIDGET *, INT),
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT horizontal_list_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3960">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3960">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3961">Ta usługa tworzy listę poziomą.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3961">This service creates a horizontal list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3962">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3962">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3963">**horizontal_list** Blok kontrolny widżetu listy poziomej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3963">**horizontal_list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3964">**Nazwa** Nazwa listy poziomej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3964">**name** Name of horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3965">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do elementu nadrzędnego widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3965">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3966">**total_columns** Łączna liczba comumns na liście poziomej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3966">**total_columns** Total number of comumns in horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3967">**wywołanie zwrotne** Jest to wskaźnik do funkcji wywołania zwrotnego dostarczonej przez aplikację.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3967">**callback** This is a pointer to a callback function provided by the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3968">Funkcja wywołania zwrotnego jest wywoływana, gdy pozioma lista jest przewijana, aby utworzyć nowo widoczne elementy listy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3968">The callback function is invoked when the horizontal list is scrolled, to create the newly visible list items.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3969">W ten sposób pozioma lista może wyświetlać dowolny typ widżetu zdefiniowany przez użytkownika jako elementy listy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3969">In this way the horizontal list can display any user-defined widget type as the list items.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3970">**styl** Styl widżetu ScrollBar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3970">**style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3971">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich elementów widget, a także style charakterystyczne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3971">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3972">**horizontal_list_id** Zdefiniowany przez aplikację Identyfikator listy poziomej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3972">**horizontal_list_id** Application-defined ID of horizontal list</span></span>

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3992">gx_horizontal_list_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3992">gx_horizontal_list_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3993">Zdarzenie przetworzenia listy poziomej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3993">Process horizontal list event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3994">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3994">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_event_process(
    GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *list,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3995">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3995">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-3996">Ta usługa przetwarza zdarzenie dla listy poziomej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3996">This service processes an event for the horizontal list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-3997">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3997">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3998">**Lista** Blok kontrolny widżetu listy poziomej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3998">**list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-3999">**zdarzenie** Wskaźnik do zdarzenia do przetworzenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-3999">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4000">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4000">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4001">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie przetworzył zdarzenie listy poziomej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4001">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed horizontal list event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4002">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4002">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4003">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4003">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4004">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4004">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4005">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4005">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4006">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4006">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic horizontal list event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_list_event_process(
    GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *list,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default horizontal
        list event processing */
        status =
        gx_horizontal_list_event_process(list, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4039">gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4039">gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get</span></span>

```C
    GX_horizobntal_LIST *horizontal_list,
    INT *return_index);
```

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4043">Ta usługa zwraca indeks pozycji listy poziomej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4043">This service returns the selected list entry index of the horizontal list.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4049">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4049">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

```C
    &current_index_entry);
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4087">gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4087">gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4088">Pobierz wybrany wpis z listy poziomej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4088">Get selected entry from horizontal list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4089">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4089">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get(
    GX_horizobntal_LIST *horizontal_list,
    GX_WIDGET **return_list_entry);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4090">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4090">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4091">Ta usługa zwraca zaznaczony wpis listy poziomej listy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4091">This service returns the selected list entry of the horizontal list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4092">Należy zauważyć, że jeśli lista pozioma zawiera więcej wierszy niż elementy podrzędne widget, a wybrany wpis został przewinięty z widoku, ten interfejs API zwróci GX_NULL, ponieważ elementy widget podrzędne są ponownie używane, ponieważ zawartość listy jest przewijana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4092">Note that if the horizontal list has more rows than child widgets, and the selected entry has been scrolled from view, this API will return GX_NULL because the child widgets are re-used as the list content is scrolled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4093">Funkcja gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get będzie niezawodnie zwracać indeks wybranego elementu, nawet jeśli ten element został przewinięty z widoku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4093">The gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get function will reliably return the index of the selected item, even if that item has been scrolled from view.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4094">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4094">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4095">**horizontal_list** Blok kontrolny widżetu listy poziomej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4095">**horizontal_list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4096">**return_list_entry** Miejsce docelowe dla widżetu wpisu listy zwrotnej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4096">**return_list_entry** Destination for return list entry widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4097">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4097">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4098">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie uzyskano wpis listy poziomej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4098">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful obtained the horizontal list entry</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4099">**GX_FAILURE** (0X10) wybrany widżet został przewinięty z widoku na liście zawierającej więcej wierszy niż elementy podrzędne klienta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4099">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Selected widget has been scrolled from view in a list with more rows than client children.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4100">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4100">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4101">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4101">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4102">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4102">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4103">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4103">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4104">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4104">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the list entry at the current index of horizontal list “my_list”. */
status = gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get(&my_list, &current_list_entry);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “current_list_entry” contains a pointer to the currently selected widget. */

    
```

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4121">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4121">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4123">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X10) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4123">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x10) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4124">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4124">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4125">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) Nieprawidłowa wartość liczby</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4125">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid count value</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4126">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4126">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4127">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4127">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
status = gx_horizontal_list_total_columns_set(&my_list, 20);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the total colums of “my_list” was successfully set to 20. */
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4137">gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4137">gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4138">Utwórz poziomy pasek przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4138">Create horizontal scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4139">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4139">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create(
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WINDOW *parent,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *appearance ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4140">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4140">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4141">Ta usługa tworzy poziomy pasek przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4141">This service creates a horizontal scrollbar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4142">Identyfikator dla poziomego paska przewijania jest wstępnie zdefiniowany (ponieważ okno musi wiedzieć, jak przechwytywać zdarzenia z niego), a rozmiar jest automatyczny (ponieważ musi wypełnić szerokość klienta okna nadrzędnego).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4142">The ID for a horizontal scrollbar is pre-defined (because a window has to know how to catch events from it), and the size is automatic (because it has to fill the parent window’s client width).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4143">Jeśli zdecyduje się zezwolić na paski przewijania obszaru klienta, należy dodać kolejną funkcję Create z parametrami ID i size.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4143">If we decide to allow client area scrollbars, we will need to add another create function with the id and size parameters.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4144">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4144">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4145">**pasek przewijania** Blok kontrolny widżetu ScrollBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4145">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4146">**Nazwa** Nazwa paska przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4146">**name** Name of scrollbar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4147">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do elementu nadrzędnego widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4147">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4148">**wygląd** Struktura wyglądu definiuje wygląd paska przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4148">**appearance** The appearance structure defines the appearance of the scroll bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4149">Jeśli ta wartość jest GX_NULL, ScrollBar będzie używać domyślnego wyglądu ScrollBar zdefiniowanego przez gx_system_scroll_appearance_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4149">If this value is GX_NULL, the scrollbar will use the default scrollbar appearance defined by gx_system_scroll_appearance_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4150">Zapoznaj się z **załącznikiem I** , aby zapoznać się z definicją struktury GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4150">Refer to **Appendix I** for the definition of the GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4151">**Styl** Styl widżetu ScrollBar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4151">**Style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4152">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich elementów widget, a także style charakterystyczne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4152">**Appendix D** contains pre- defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4153">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4153">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4154">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) powodzenie w poziomie — Tworzenie paska przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4154">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful horizontal scrollbar create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4155">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4155">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4156">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4156">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4157">Element widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) został już utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4157">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4158">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontrolki widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4158">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4159">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4159">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4160">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4160">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4161">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4161">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create horizontal scrollbar “my_scrollbar”. */
status = gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create(&my_scrollbar,
    “my_horizontal_scrollbar”, &my_parent, GX_NULL,
    GX_STYLE_SCROLLBAR_END_BUTTONS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the horizontal scrollbar “my_scrollbar” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_icon_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4168">gx_icon_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4168">gx_icon_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4169">Przycisk tworzenia ikony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4169">Create icon button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4170">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4170">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_button_create(
    GX_ICON_BUTTON *button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID icon_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT icon_button_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4171">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4171">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4172">Ta usługa tworzy określony widżet przycisku ikony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4172">This service creates the specified icon button widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4173">GX_ICON_BUTTON pochodzi od GX_BUTTON i obsługuje wszystkie gx_button usługi interfejsu API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4173">GX_ICON_BUTTON is derived from GX_BUTTON and supports all gx_button API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4174">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4174">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4175">**przycisk** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki przycisku ikony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4175">**button** Pointer to icon button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4176">**Nazwa** Nazwa logiczna widżetu przycisku ikony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4176">**name** Logical name of icon button widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4177">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do widżetu nadrzędnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4177">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4178">**icon_id** Identyfikator zasobu ikony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4178">**icon_id** Resource ID of icon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4179">**styl** Styl ikony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4179">**style** Style of icon.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4180">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich elementów widget, a także style charakterystyczne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4180">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4181">**icon_button_id** Zdefiniowany przez aplikację przycisk ikony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4181">**icon_button_id** Application-defined ID of icon button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4182">**rozmiar** Wymiary przycisku ikony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4182">**size** Dimensions of icon button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4183">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4183">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4184">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — przycisk ikony został pomyślnie utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4184">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created icon button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4185">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4185">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4186">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4186">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4187">Element widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) został już utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4187">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4188">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontrolki widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4188">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4189">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4189">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4190">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4190">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4191">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4191">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_icon_button”. */
status = gx_icon_button_create(&my_icon_button, “my_icon_button”,
    &my_parent,
    MY_ICON_RESOURCE_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_ICON_BUTTON_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the icon button “my_icon_button” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_icon_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4208">gx_icon_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4208">gx_icon_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4209">Rysowanie przycisku ikony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4209">Draw an icon button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4210">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4210">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_icon_button_draw(GX_ICON_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4211">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4211">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4212">Ta usługa rysuje przycisk ikony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4212">This service draws the icon button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4213">Ta funkcja jest zwykle wywoływana wewnętrznie przez GUIX w ramach operacji odświeżania kanwy, ale jest również dostępna dla aplikacji, która może chcieć udostępnić niestandardową funkcję rysowania i wywoływać domyślny rysunek przycisku ikony jako niestandardowa baza rysunku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4213">This function is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default icon button drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4214">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4214">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4215">**przycisk** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki przycisku ikony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4215">**button** Pointer to icon button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4216">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4216">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4217">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4217">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4218">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4218">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4219">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4219">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4220">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4220">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom icon draw function. */
void MyIconButtonDraw(GX_ICON_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Do the normal drawing first */
    gx_icon_button_draw(button);

    /* Add custom drawing here */
}
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4239">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4239">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set(
    GX_ICON_BUTTON *button,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID icon_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4240">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4240">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4241">Ta usługa przypisuje nowy Pixelmap do widżetu przycisku ikony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4241">This service assigns a new pixelmap to the icon button widget.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4248">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4248">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4249">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4249">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
    GX_PIXELMAP_ID_ICON);
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4270">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4270">Prototype</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4271">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4271">Description</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4275">**ikona** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki widżetu ikona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4275">**icon** Pointer to icon widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4276">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4276">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4277">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4277">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4278">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4278">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4279">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4279">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4280">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4280">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom icon draw function. */
void MyIconButtonDraw(GX_ICON *icon)
{
    /* Call icon background draw. */
    gx_icon_background_draw(icon);

    /* Add custom drawing here */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw(icon);
}
```

## <a name="gx_icon_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4286">gx_icon_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4286">gx_icon_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4287">Ikona tworzenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4287">Create icon</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4288">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4288">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_create(
    GX_ICON *icon, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID pixelmap_id, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT icon_id, 
    GX_VALUE x, 
    GX_VALUE y);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4289">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4289">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4290">Ta usługa tworzy określony widżet ikony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4290">This service creates the specified icon widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4291">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4291">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4292">**ikona** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki ikona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4292">**icon** Pointer to icon control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4293">**Nazwa** Nazwa logiczna widżetu ikony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4293">**name** Logical name of icon widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4294">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do widżetu nadrzędnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4294">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4295">**pixelmap_id** Identyfikator zasobu Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4295">**pixelmap_id** Resource ID of pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4296">**styl** Styl ikony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4296">**style** Style of icon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4297">**icon_id** Zdefiniowany przez aplikację identyfikator ikony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4297">**icon_id** Application-defined ID of icon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4298">**x** początkowa pozycja współrzędnej x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4298">**x** Starting x-coordinate position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4299">**y** , początkowa pozycja współrzędnej y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4299">**y** Starting y-coordinate position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4300">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4300">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4301">Pomyślne Tworzenie ikony **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4301">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful icon create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4302">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4302">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4303">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4303">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4304">Element widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) został już utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4304">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4305">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontrolki widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4305">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4306">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4306">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4307">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4307">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4308">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4308">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_icon”. */
status = gx_icon_create(&my_icon, “my_icon”, &my_parent,
    MY_PIXELMAP_RESOURCE_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_ICON_ID,
    5, 30);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the icon “my_icon” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_icon_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4313">gx_icon_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4313">gx_icon_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4314">Ikona rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4314">Draw icon</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4315">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4315">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_icon_draw(GX_ICON *icon);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4316">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4316">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4317">Ta usługa Rysuje określony widżet ikon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4317">This service draws the specified icon widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4318">Ta usługa jest zwykle wywoływana wewnętrznie przez GUIX w ramach operacji odświeżania kanwy, ale jest również dostępna dla aplikacji, która może chcieć udostępnić funkcję rysowania niestandardowego i wywoływać domyślny rysunek ikony jako niestandardowa baza rysunku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4318">This service is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default icon drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4319">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4319">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4320">**ikona** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki widżetu ikona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4320">**icon** Pointer to icon widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4321">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4321">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4322">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4322">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4323">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4323">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4324">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4324">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4325">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4325">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom icon drawing function. */

VOID my_icon_draw(GX_MENU *menu)
{
    /* Call default icon draw. */
    gx_icon_draw(menu);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_icon_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4330">gx_icon_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4330">gx_icon_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4331">Przetwarzanie zdarzenia widżetu ikony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4331">Icon widget event processing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4332">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4332">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_event_process(
    GX_ICON *icon, 
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4333">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4333">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4334">Ta usługa obsługuje zdarzenia wysyłane do widżetu GX_ICON.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4334">This service handles events sent to a GX_ICON widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4335">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4335">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4336">**ikona** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki widżetu ikona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4336">**icon** Pointer to icon widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4337">**event_ptr** Wskaźnik do GX_EVENT struktury</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4337">**event_ptr** Pointer to GX_EVENT structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4338">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4338">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4339">Zdarzenie ikony przetworzonej **GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) zostało zakończone pomyślnie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4339">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful processed icon event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4340">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4340">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4341">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4341">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4342">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4342">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4343">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4343">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4344">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4344">Example</span></span>

```C
switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
{
case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
    /* Do default handling. */
    status = gx_icon_event_process(icon, event_ptr);

    /* add your own handling here */
    break;
}
```

```C

    GX_ICON *icon, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_id);
```

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4353">Ta usługa ustawia Pixelmap dla określonego widżetu ikony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4353">This service sets the pixelmap for the specified icon widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4354">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4354">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4355">**ikona** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki widżetu ikona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4355">**icon** Pointer to icon widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4356">**normal_id** Identyfikator zasobu stanu normalnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4356">**normal_id** Normal state Resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4357">**selected_id** Identyfikator zasobu wybranego stanu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4357">**selected_id** Selected state Resource ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4359">Ikona pomyślnego Pixelmap (0x00) **GX_SUCCESS**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4359">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful icon pixelmap set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4360">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4360">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4361">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4361">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4362">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4362">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4363">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4363">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4364">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4364">Example</span></span>

```C

    MY_NOT_SELECTED_RESOURCE_ID,
    MY_SELECTED_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the icon “my_icon” has a pixelmap set. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4387">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4387">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4388">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4388">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_IMAGE_READER my_image_reader;

“color format” could be set to:
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_32ARGB
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_24RGB
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_565RGB
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_8BIT_PALETTE

/* Create image reader “my_image_reader”. */
status = gx_image_reader_create(&my_image_reader, decoder_data,
    decoder_data_size,
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_32ARGB,
    GX_IMAGE_READER_MODE_COMPRESS)

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_image_reader” has been successfully created. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4401">**palsize** Rozmiar palety</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4401">**palsize** The size of the palette</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4404">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4404">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4405">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar palety</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4405">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid palette size</span></span>

## <a name="gx_image_reader_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4412">gx_image_reader_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4412">gx_image_reader_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4413">Rozpocznij proces dekompresowania i konwersji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4413">Start the decompress and conversion process</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4414">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4414">Prototype</span></span>
