```C
    GX_IMAGE_READER *image_reader, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *outmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4415">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4415">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4416">Ta usługa dekoduje obraz nieprzetworzony do określonego formatu koloru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4416">This service decodes a raw image to a specified color format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4417">Obsługiwane są obecnie tylko typy obrazów RAW JPEG i PNG.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4417">Currently only jpeg and png raw image types are supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4418">Wymaga to zdefiniowania GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4418">This requires GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4419">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4419">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4420">**image_reader** Blok sterowania czytnika obrazu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4420">**image_reader** Image reader control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4421">**Pixelmap** Pixelmap wyjściowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4421">**pixelmap** Output pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4422">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4422">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4423">Pomyślne odkodowanie obrazu **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4423">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful image decoding</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4424">Program przydzielania pamięci **GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) nie został zdefiniowany lub alokacja pamięci nie powiodła się</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4424">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4425">Typ obrazu wejściowego **GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) lub format koloru wyjściowego nie jest obsługiwany</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4425">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Input image type or output color format is not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4426">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4426">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4427">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4427">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4428">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4428">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4429">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4429">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4430">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4430">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_IMAGE_READER my_image_reader;
GX_PIXELMAP output_map;

/* Create my_image_reader here. */

/* Decoding a raw image according to the settings of “my_image_reader”. */
status = gx_image_reader_start(&my_image_reader, output_map)

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS “output_map” have been loaded with the requested pixelmap. */
```

## <a name="gx_line_chart_axis_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4434">gx_line_chart_axis_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4434">gx_line_chart_axis_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4435">Rysowanie wykresu liniowego x, oś y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4435">Draw line chart x,y axis</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4436">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4436">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_line_chart_axis_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4437">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4437">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4438">Ta usługa rysuje oś x, y wykresu liniowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4438">This service draws the x,y axis of a line chart.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4439">Kolory osi i parametry szerokości linii są pobierane z struktury informacji wykresu liniowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4439">The axis colors and line width parameters are retrieved from the line chart information structure.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4440">Ta usługa jest zwykle wywoływana wewnętrznie przez funkcję gx_line_chart_draw, ale jest dostępna dla aplikacji, aby pomóc w tworzeniu niestandardowych funkcji rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4440">This service is normally called internally by the gx_line_chart_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4441">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4441">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4442">**Wykres** Blok sterowania wykresem liniowym.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4442">**chart** Line chart control block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4443">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4443">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4444">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4444">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4445">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4445">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4446">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4446">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4447">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4447">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom chart drawing function. */

VOID my_chart_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart)
{
    /* Call default window draw. */
    gx_window_draw((GX_WINDOW *)chart);

    /* Draw the line chart axis. */
    gx_line_chart_axis_draw(&chart->gx_line_chart_info);

    /* Draw the data line */
    gx_line_chart_data_draw(&chart->gx_line_chart_info);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4461">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4461">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4462">**Wykres** Wskaźnik do bloku sterowania GX_LINE_CHART.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4462">**chart** Pointer to the GX_LINE_CHART control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4463">**Nazwa** Opcjonalna nazwa wykresu liniowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4463">**name** Optional line chart name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4464">**element nadrzędny** Element widget elementu nadrzędnego lub GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4464">**parent** Parent widget, or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4465">**informacje** Struktura definiująca parametry rysowania wykresu liniowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4465">**info** Structure defining line chart drawing parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4466">**Dodatek I** zawiera definicję do GX_LINE_CHART_INFO struktury.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4466">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_LINE_CHART_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4467">**styl** Flagi stylu widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4467">**style** Widget style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4468">**chart_id** Wartość identyfikatora logicznego wykresu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4468">**chart_id** Chart logical ID value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4470">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4470">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4472">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4472">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4473">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4473">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4474">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontrolki widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4474">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4475">Element widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) został już utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4475">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4476">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4476">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4477">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4477">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4478">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4478">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create a line chart */
GX_LINE_CHART chart;
GX_RECTANGLE chart_size;
GX_LINE_CHART_INFO gx_chart_info;
GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root_window;

chart_size = root_window->gx_widget_size;

/* Initialize params for the GUIX base chart. */
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_min_val = DATA_MIN_VAL;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_max_val = DATA_MAX_VAL;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_max_data_count = MAX_DATA_COUNT;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_active_data_count = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_axis_line_width = AXIS_LINE_WIDTH;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_data_line_width = DATA_LINE_WIDTH;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_data = chart_data;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_line_color = GX_COLOR_ID_DATA_LINE;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_axis_color = GX_COLOR_ID_AXIS_LINE;

/* Leave room for labels on bottom and right. */
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_left_margin = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_top_margin = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_right_margin = 80;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_bottom_margin = 32;

status = gx_line_chart_create(&chart, “Line Chart”, root_window,
    &gx_chart_info, GX_STYLE_NONE, &chart_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the “chart” has been successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_line_chart_data_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4485">gx_line_chart_data_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4485">gx_line_chart_data_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4486">Rysowanie linii danych wykresu liniowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4486">Draw line chart data line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4487">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4487">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_line_chart_data_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4488">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4488">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4489">Ta usługa rysuje wiersz danych wykresu liniowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4489">This service draws the line chart data line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4490">Kolory linii i parametry szerokości linii są pobierane z struktury informacji wykresu liniowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4490">The line colors and line width parameters are retrieved from the line chart information structure.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4491">Ta usługa jest zwykle wywoływana wewnętrznie przez funkcję gx_line_chart_draw, ale jest dostępna dla aplikacji, aby pomóc w tworzeniu niestandardowych funkcji rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4491">This service is normally called internally by the gx_line_chart_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4492">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4492">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4493">**Wykres** Blok sterowania wykresem liniowym</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4493">**chart** Line chart control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4494">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4494">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4495">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4495">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4496">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4496">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4497">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4497">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4498">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4498">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom chart drawing function. */

VOID my_chart_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart)
{
    /* Call default window draw. */
    gx_window_draw((GX_WINDOW *)chart);

    /* Draw the line chart axis. */
    gx_line_chart_axis_draw(chart);

    /* Draw the data line. */
    gx_line_chart_data_draw(chart);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4534">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4534">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4546">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4546">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4547">Ta usługa oblicza wartość skalowania ustalonego służącą do wykreślania wartości danych na osi Y wykresu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4547">This service calculates the fixed-point scaling value used to plot data values on the chart Y axis.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4548">Parametry chart_info i prostokąt ograniczający wykres są używane do obliczania wartości skalowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4548">The chart_info parameters and chart bounding rectangle are used to calculate this scaling value.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4554">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4554">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

```C
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_id, 
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT menu_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4566">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4566">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4567">Ta usługa tworzy menu jako wybrane i kojarzy menu z dostarczonym widżetem nadrzędnym.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4567">This service creates a menu as specified and associates the menu with the supplied parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4568">Akceptuje wszystkie typy widżetów jako element menu podrzędnego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4568">It accepts all types of widget as child menu item.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4569">Aby wstawić widżet jako element menu podrzędnego, wywołaj **gx_menu_insert**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4569">To insert a widget as a child menu item, call **gx_menu_insert**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4570">GX_MENU pochodzi od GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT i obsługuje wszystkie gx_pixelmap_prompt usługi interfejsu API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4570">GX_MENU is derived from GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT and supports all gx_pixelmap_prompt API services.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4573">**Nazwa** Nazwa menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4573">**name** Name of the menu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4574">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do elementu nadrzędnego widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4574">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4575">**text_id** Identyfikator zasobu tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4575">**text_id** Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4576">**fill_id** Identyfikator zasobu wypełnienia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4576">**fill_id** Resource ID of fill</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4577">**styl** Styl elementu widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4577">**style** Style of the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4578">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich elementów widget, a także style charakterystyczne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4578">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_menu_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4601">gx_menu_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4601">gx_menu_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4602">Menu Rysuj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4602">Draw menu</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4603">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4603">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_menu_draw(GX_MENU *menu);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4604">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4604">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4605">Ta usługa służy do rysowania określonego menu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4605">This service draws the specified menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4606">Ta funkcja jest zwykle wywoływana wewnętrznie przez mechanizm odświeżania kanwy GUIX, ale jest uwidaczniana dla aplikacji, aby pomóc w zaimplementowaniu niestandardowych funkcji rysowania niestandardowych widżetów menu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4606">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom menu widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4607">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4607">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4608">**menu** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4608">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4609">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4609">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4610">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4610">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4611">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4611">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4612">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4612">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4613">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4613">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom menu drawing function. */

VOID my_menu_draw(GX_MENU *menu)
{
    /* Call default menu draw. */
    gx_menu_draw(menu);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_menu_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4625">gx_menu_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4625">gx_menu_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4626">Zdarzenie menu procesu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4626">Process menu event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4627">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4627">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_menu_event_process(GX_MENU *menu, GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4628">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4628">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4629">Ta usługa przetwarza zdarzenie dla określonego menu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4629">This service processes an event for the specified menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4630">Ta usługa powinna być wywoływana jako domyślna procedura obsługi zdarzeń za pomocą wszelkich funkcji niestandardowego przetwarzania zdarzeń menu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4630">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom menu event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4631">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4631">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4632">**menu** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4632">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4633">**event_ptr** Wskaźnik do zdarzenia do przetworzenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4633">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4634">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4634">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4635">Proces zdarzenia menu zakończono pomyślnie **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4635">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful menu event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4636">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4636">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4637">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4637">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4638">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4638">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4639">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4639">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4640">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4640">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4641">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4641">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic menu event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_menu_event_process(GX_MENU *menu, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */

        /* Call default event process if this is a system event such as GX_EVENT_SHOW. */
        status = gx_menu_event_process(menu, event);
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default menu
           event processing */
        status = gx_menu_event_process(menu, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}

```

## <a name="gx_menu_insert"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4649">gx_menu_insert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4649">gx_menu_insert</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4650">Wstaw nowy element</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4650">Insert a new item</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4651">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4651">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_menu_insert(
    GX_MENU *menu, 
    GX_WIDGET *insert);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4652">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4652">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4653">Ta usługa wstawia nowy element do menu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4653">This service inserts a new item to the menu.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4654">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4654">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4655">**menu** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4655">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4656">element **widget** Wskaźnik do widżetu do wstawienia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4656">**widget** Pointer to the widget to insert</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4657">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4657">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4658">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie wstawiono nowy element do menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4658">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully inserted new item into menu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4659">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4659">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4660">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4660">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4661">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4661">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4662">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4662">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4663">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4663">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Insert new item “my_widget” to the menu “my_menu”. */
status = gx_menu_insert(&my_menu, &my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the new item “my_widget” has been inserted to the menu “my_menu”. */
```

## <a name="gx_menu_remove"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4675">gx_menu_remove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4675">gx_menu_remove</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4676">Usuń element</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4676">Remove an item</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4677">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4677">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_menu_remvoe(
    GX_MENU *menu, 
    GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4678">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4678">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4679">Ta usługa usuwa element z menu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4679">This service removes an item from the menu.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4680">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4680">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4681">**menu** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4681">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4682">element **widget** Wskaźnik do elementu widget do usunięcia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4682">**widget** Pointer to widget to remove</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4683">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4683">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4684">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie usunął element menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4684">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully removed menu item</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4685">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4685">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4686">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4686">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4687">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4687">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4688">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4688">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4689">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4689">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove item “my_widget” from menu “my_menu” */
status = gx_menu_remove(&my_menu, &my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the item “my_widget” has been removed from menu “my_menu”. */
```

## <a name="gx_menu_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4701">gx_menu_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4701">gx_menu_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4702">Rysuj tekst menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4702">Draw menu text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4703">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4703">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_menu_text_draw(GX_MENU *menu);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4704">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4704">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4705">Ta usługa rysuje tekst menu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4705">This service draws the text of a menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4706">Ta funkcja jest zwykle wywoływana wewnętrznie przez mechanizm odświeżania kanwy GUIX, ale jest uwidaczniana dla aplikacji, aby pomóc w zaimplementowaniu niestandardowych funkcji rysowania niestandardowych widżetów menu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4706">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom menu widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4707">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4707">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4708">**menu** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4708">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4709">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4709">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4710">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4710">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4711">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4711">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4712">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4712">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4713">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4713">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom menu drawing function. */

VOID my_menu_draw(GX_MENU *menu)
{
    /* Call default menu background draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_prompt_background_draw(
                            (GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *)menu);

    /* Draw menu text. */
    gx_menu_text_draw(menu);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_menu_text_offset_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4725">gx_menu_text_offset_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4725">gx_menu_text_offset_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4726">Ustaw przesunięcie rysowania tekstu menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4726">Set menu text draw offset</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4727">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4727">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_menu_text_offset_set(
    GX_MENU *menu, 
    GX_VALUE x_offset,
    GX_VALUE y_offset);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4728">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4728">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4729">Ta usługa ustawia przesunięcie x, y dla tekstu menu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4729">This service sets x, y display offset for menu text.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4730">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4730">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4731">**menu** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4731">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4732">**x_offset** Współrzędna X przesunięcia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4732">**x_offset** X coordinate of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4733">**y_offset** Współrzędna Y przesunięcia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4733">**y_offset** Y coordinate of offset</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4734">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4734">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4735">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne Ustawianie przesunięcia tekstu menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4735">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful set menu text draw offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4736">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4736">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4737">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4737">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4738">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4738">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4739">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4739">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4740">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4740">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text draw offset of menu “my_menu” to (20, 10). */
status = gx_menu_text_offset_set(&my_menu, 20, 10);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text draw offset of menu “my_menu” has been set to (20, 10). */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4752">gx_multi_line_text_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4752">gx_multi_line_text_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4753">Przycisk tworzenia tekstu wielowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4753">Create multi line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4754">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4754">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_button_create(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT text_button_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4755">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4755">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4756">Ta usługa tworzy widżet przycisku tekstu wielowierszowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4756">This service creates a multi-line text button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4757">Przycisk tekstu wielowierszowego wyświetla tekst przycisku nad wierszami 1-n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4757">A multi-line text button displays the button text over 1-n lines.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4758">Maksymalna liczba wierszy jest definiowana przez stałą GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON_MAX_LINES, która domyślnie przyjmuje wartość 4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4758">The maximum number of lines is defined by the constant GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON_MAX_LINES, which defaults to 4.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4759">Podziały wierszy są ustawiane za pomocą powrotu karetki i/lub powrotu karetki + par wysuwu wiersza w ciągu tekstowym przypisanym do przycisku tekstu wielowierszowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4759">The line breaks are set by carriage return and/or carriage return + line feed pairs within the text string assigned to the multi-line text button.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4760">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON pochodzi od GX_TEXT_BUTTON i obsługuje wszystkie gx_text_button usługi interfejsu API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4760">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON is derived from GX_TEXT_BUTTON and supports all gx_text_button API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4761">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4761">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4762">**text_button** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki przycisku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4762">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4763">**Nazwa** Nazwa logiczna przycisku tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4763">**name** Logical name of text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4764">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do elementu nadrzędnego widget przycisku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4764">**parent** Pointer to parent widget of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4765">**text_id** Identyfikator zasobu tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4765">**text_id** Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4766">**styl** Styl przycisku tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4766">**style** Text button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4767">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich elementów widget, a także style charakterystyczne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4767">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4768">**text_button_id** Zdefiniowany przez aplikację identyfikator przycisku tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4768">**text_button_id** Application-defined ID of the text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4769">**rozmiar** Rozmiar przycisku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4769">**size** Size of the button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4770">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4770">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4771">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne utworzenie wielowierszowego przycisku tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4771">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi line text button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4772">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4772">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4773">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4773">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4774">Element widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) został już utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4774">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

```C
/* Create multi-line text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_button_create(&my_text_button, "my text button",

    &size);

```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4786">gx_multi_line_text_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4786">gx_multi_line_text_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4787">Przycisk rysowania wielowierszowego tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4787">Draw multi-line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4788">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4788">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4789">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4789">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4790">Ta usługa rysuje przycisk tekstu wielowierszowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4790">This service draws the multi-line text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4791">Ta funkcja jest zwykle wywoływana wewnętrznie przez GUIX w ramach operacji odświeżania kanwy, ale jest również narażona na aplikację, która może chcieć udostępnić niestandardową funkcję rysowania i wywoływać domyślny rysunek wielowierszowego rysunku przycisku tekstu jako niestandardowa baza rysunku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4791">This function is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default multi-line text button drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4792">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4792">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4793">**przycisk** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki przycisku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4793">**button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4794">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4794">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4795">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4795">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4796">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4796">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4797">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4797">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4798">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4798">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw the text button “my_text_button”. */
void MyButtonDraw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Do the normal drawing first */
    gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(&my_text_button);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4806">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4806">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4807">Domyślna obsługa zdarzeń dla wielowierszowego przycisku tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4807">Default event handling for multi-line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4808">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4808">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4809">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4809">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4810">Ta usługa jest domyślną funkcją obsługi zdarzeń dla widżetu przycisk tekstu wielowierszowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4810">This service is the default event handling function for the multi line text button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4811">Ta funkcja jest dostępna dla aplikacji, które chcą zapewnić obsługę zdarzeń niestandardowych widżetu przycisk tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4811">This function is made accessible to applications that want to provide custom event handling for a text button widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4812">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4812">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4813">**przycisk** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki przycisku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4813">**button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4814">**event_ptr** Zdarzenie do przetworzenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4814">**event_ptr** Event to be processed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4815">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4815">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4816">Zdarzenie **GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) zostało pomyślnie obsłużone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4816">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully handled event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4817">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4817">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4818">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4818">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4819">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4819">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4820">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4820">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4821">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4821">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT MyEventHandler(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(button, event_ptr);
        /* add custom actions here */
        break;
    default:
        gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(button, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4829">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4829">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4830">Funkcja obsługi rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4830">Drawing support function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4831">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4831">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4832">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4832">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4833">Ta funkcja obsługi służy do rysowania części tekstowej wielowierszowego przycisku tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4833">This support function draws the text portion of a multi-line text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4834">Ta funkcja jest wywoływana wewnętrznie przez gx_multi_line_text_button_draw () i jest udostępniana jako osobny interfejs API jako wygoda dla aplikacji, które definiują niestandardową funkcję rysowania wielowierszowego tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4834">This function is called internally by gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(), and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom multi-line text button drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4835">Aplikacje, które chcą dostosować Rysowanie w tle przycisków, mogą zapewnić swoją niestandardową funkcję rysowania i wywoływać usługę multi_line_text_button_text_draw jako część niestandardowego rysunku, aby narysować tekst przycisku w tle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4835">Applications that want to customize the button background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the multi_line_text_button_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the button text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4836">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4836">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4837">**text_button** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki przycisku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4837">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4838">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4838">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4839">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4839">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4840">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4840">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4841">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4841">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4842">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4842">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function */
VOID my_button_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* insert code here to draw button background */

    /* call support function to do text drawing */
    gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw();

    /* draw child widgets */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) button);
}
```

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4851">Ustaw identyfikator zasobu tekstowego na przycisk tekst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4851">Set text resource ID to the text button</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    RESOURCE_ID string_id)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4853">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4853">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4854">Ta usługa Ustawia określony identyfikator zasobu ciągu na przycisk tekst.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4854">This service sets the specified string resource ID to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4855">Ciąg może zawierać znaki nowego wiersza, które działają do wyświetlania tekstu w wielu wierszach w obszarze przycisku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4855">The string may contain newline characters which act to display the text on multiple lines within the button area.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4856">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4856">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4857">**text_button** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki przycisku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4857">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4858">**string_id** Identyfikator zasobu ciągu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4858">**string_id** Resource ID of the string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4859">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4859">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4860">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił identyfikator zasobu ciągu na przycisk tekstowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4860">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the string resource ID to the text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4861">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4861">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4862">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4862">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4863">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4863">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4864">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4864">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4865">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4865">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the string ID ”MY_STRING_ID” to the text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set(
    &my_text_button, MY_STRING_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string ID MY_STRING_ID was set to “my_text_button”. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4873">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4873">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4874">Przypisywanie tekstu do przycisku tekstu (przestarzałe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4874">Assign text to the text button (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4875">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4875">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_mult_line_text_button_text_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4876">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4876">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4877">Ta usługa jest przestarzała na rzecz gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4877">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4878">Ta usługa przypisuje określony ciąg do przycisku tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4878">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4879">Jeśli element widget text_button został utworzony przy użyciu GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY stylu, widżet tworzy prywatną kopię ciągu tekstowego, a w związku z tym interfejs API gx_system_memmory_allocate_set musi zostać wywołany raz przed zażądaniem tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4879">If the text_button widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned, and therefore the gx_system_memmory_allocate_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4880">Jeśli GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY nie jest aktywny, widżet nie tworzy prywatnej kopii ciągu przychodzącego, w związku z czym ciąg musi być statycznie lub globalnie przydzielony, tj. nie może to być automatyczna lub Tymczasowa zmienna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4880">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4881">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4881">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4882">**text_button** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki przycisku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4882">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4883">wskaźnik **tekstowy** na ciąg zakończony ZNAKiem null</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4883">**text** pointer to the NULL-terminated string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4884">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4884">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4885">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił tekst na przycisk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4885">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4886">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4886">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4887">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4887">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4888">Nie zdefiniowano alokatora pamięci **GX_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4888">**GX_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4889">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0X34) Nieprawidłowa długość ciągu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4889">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4890">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4890">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4891">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4891">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4892">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4892">Example</span></span>

```C
static GX_CHAR text[] = “myrstring”;

/* Set text to the text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set(&my_text_button, text);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text of “my_text_button” was set. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4904">Ta usługa przypisuje określony ciąg do przycisku tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4904">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4905">Jeśli element widget text_button został utworzony przy użyciu GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY stylu, widżet tworzy prywatną kopię ciągu tekstowego, a w związku z tym interfejs API gx_system_memmory_allocate_set musi zostać wywołany raz przed zażądaniem tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4905">If the text_button widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned, and therefore the gx_system_memmory_allocate_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4906">Jeśli GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY nie jest aktywny, widżet nie tworzy prywatnej kopii ciągu przychodzącego, w związku z czym ciąg musi być statycznie lub globalnie przydzielony, tj. nie może to być automatyczna lub Tymczasowa zmienna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4906">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4909">wskaźnik **ciągu** do GX_STRING zmiennej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4909">**string** pointer to GX_STRING variable</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4915">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0X34) Nieprawidłowa długość ciągu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4915">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_backspace"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4924">gx_multi_line_text_input_backspace</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4924">gx_multi_line_text_input_backspace</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4925">Usuń znak przed pozycją kursora tekstu wielowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4925">Delete a character before multi line text input cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4926">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4926">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_backspace(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4927">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4927">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4928">Ta usługa usuwa znak przed pozycją kursora wielowierszowego wprowadzania tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4928">This service deletes the character before multi line text input cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4929">Ta usługa jest wywoływana wewnętrznie po odebraniu zdarzenia klawisza Backspace w dół, ale może być również wywoływana przez aplikację.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4929">This service is called internally when a backspace key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4930">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4930">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4931">**text_input** Blok kontrolny widżetu tekstu wielowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4931">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4932">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4932">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4933">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie pomyślne wprowadzanie tekstu w wiele wierszy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4933">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text input backspace</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4934">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4934">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4935">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4935">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4936">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4936">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4937">**GX_FAILURE** (0X10) Nieprawidłowa czcionka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4937">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4938">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4938">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4939">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4939">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4940">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4940">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Delete a character before the cursor of “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_backspace(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the character before the cursor has been deleted. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_clear"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4972">gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_clear</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4972">gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_clear</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4973">Usuwa wszystkie znaki z buforu wejściowego tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4973">Deletes all characters from the text input buffer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4974">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4974">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_clear(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4975">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4975">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4976">Ta usługa usuwa wszystkie znaki z bufora wejściowego tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4976">This service deletes all characters from the text input buffer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4977">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4977">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4978">**text_input** Blok kontrolny widżetu tekstu wielowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4978">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4979">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4979">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4980">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne czyszczenie bufora danych wejściowych z wielowierszowym tekstem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4980">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text input buffer clear</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4981">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4981">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-4982">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4982">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4983">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4983">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-4984">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4984">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-4985">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-4985">Example</span></span>

```C
/* clear input buffer of “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_clear(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input widget has emptied its input buffer. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5017">gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5017">gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5018">Pobiera informacje o buforze widżetu wprowadzania tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5018">Retrieves buffer information of text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5019">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5019">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    GX_CHAR **buffer_address,
    UINT *content_size, 
    UINT *buffer_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5020">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5020">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5021">Ta usługa pobiera informacje buforowe widżetu wprowadzanie tekstu wielowierszowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5021">This service retrieves buffer information of a multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5022">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5022">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5023">**text_input** Blok kontrolny widżetu tekstu wielowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5023">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5024">**buffer_address** Adres buforu wejściowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5024">**buffer_address** The address of the input buffer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5025">**content_size** Liczba bajtów danych wejściowych</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5025">**content_size** The byte count of the input data</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5026">**buffer_size** Rozmiar buforu wejściowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5026">**buffer_size** The size of the input buffer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5027">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5027">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5028">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne pobieranie tekstu wielowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5028">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5029">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5029">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5030">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5030">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5031">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5031">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5032">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5032">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5033">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5033">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR *buffer_address;
UINT context_size;
UINT buffer_size;

/* Retrieves buffer information of “my_text_input” widget. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get(&my_text_input,
    &buffer_address, &string_size,
    &buffer_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of buffer_address, string_size and buffer_size has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5065">gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5065">gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5066">Wstaw ciąg znaków w bieżącej pozycji kursora tekstu wielowierszowego (przestarzałe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5066">Insert a character string at current multi line text input cursor position (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5067">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5067">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_UBYTE *insert_str,
    UINT insert_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5068">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5068">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5069">Ten interfejs API jest przestarzały i zastąpiony przez gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5069">This API is deprecated and replaced by gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5070">Ta usługa wstawia ciąg znaków do buforu ciągów wejściowych tekstu wielowierszowego w bieżącym położeniu kursora.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5070">This service inserts a character string into the multi line text input string buffer at the current cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5071">Ta usługa jest wywoływana wewnętrznie po odebraniu określonego zdarzenia związanego z kluczem, ale może być również wywoływana przez aplikację.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5071">This service is called internally when specific key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5072">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5072">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5073">**text_input** Blok kontrolny widżetu tekstu wielowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5073">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5074">**insert_str** Ciąg znaków formatu UTF-8, który ma zostać wstawiony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5074">**insert_str** UTF-8 format character string to be inserted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5075">**insert_size** Liczba bajtów do wstawienia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5075">**insert_size** Byte count to be inserted</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5076">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5076">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5077">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie wstawiono ciąg znaków</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5077">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully inserted the character string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5078">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5078">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5079">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5079">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5080">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5080">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5081">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar ciągu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5081">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid string size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5082">**GX_FAILURE** (0X10) Nieprawidłowa czcionka lub brak rozmiaru buforu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5082">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font or out of buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5083">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5083">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5084">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5084">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5085">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5085">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Insert characters at current cursor position. */
GX_CHAR insert_text[10] = “insert”;
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert(&my_text_input,
    insert_text,
    GX_STRLEN(insert_text));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the multi line text input widget has successfully insert the string. */
```
