## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5139">gx_multi_line_text_input_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5139">gx_multi_line_text_input_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5140">Utwórz wielowierszowe wprowadzanie tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5140">Create multi-line text input</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5141">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5141">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_create(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WINDOW *parent,
    GX_CHAR *input_buffer, UINT buffer_size,
    ULONG style, USHORT text_input_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5142">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5142">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5143">Ta usługa tworzy widżet tekstu wielowierszowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5143">This service creates a multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5144">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT pochodzi od GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW i obsługuje wszystkie gx_multi_line_text_view usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5144">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT is derived from GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW and supports all gx_multi_line_text_view services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5145">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5145">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5146">**text_input** Blok kontrolny widżetu tekstu wielowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5146">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5147">**Nazwa** Nazwa widżetu wprowadzania tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5147">**name** Name of text input widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5148">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do elementu nadrzędnego widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5148">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5149">**input_buffer** Wskaźnik do buforu wejściowego tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5149">**input_buffer** Pointer to text input buffer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5150">**buffer_size** Rozmiar buforu wejściowego tekstu w bajtach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5150">**buffer_size** Size of text input buffer in bytes</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5151">**styl** Styl widżetu wprowadzania tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5151">**style** Style of text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5152">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich elementów widget, a także style charakterystyczne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5152">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5164">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5164">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT my_text_input;
GX_CHAR my_buffer[100];
GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Define widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 10, 10, 100, 200);

/* Create multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_create(&my_text_input,
    “my_text_input”, &my_parent,
    my_buffer, 100, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
    MY_TEXT_INPUT_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text input “my_text_input” has been created. */
```

```C
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_POINT cursor_pos);
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5243">gx_multi_line_text_input_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5243">gx_multi_line_text_input_delete</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5244">Usuń znak z położenia kursora wielowierszowego wprowadzania tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5244">Delete the character at the multi line text input cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5245">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5245">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_delete(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5246">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5246">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5247">Ta usługa usuwa znak po pozycji kursora tekstu wielowierszowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5247">This service deletes the character after the multi line text input cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5248">Ta usługa jest wywoływana wewnętrznie po odebraniu zdarzenia usuwania klucza, ale może być również wywoływana przez aplikację.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5248">This service is called internally when a delete key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5386">gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5386">gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5387">Domyślna obsługa zdarzeń w przypadku wprowadzania tekstu wielowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5387">Default event handling for multi-line text input</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5388">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5388">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5389">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5389">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5390">Ta usługa jest domyślną funkcją obsługi zdarzeń dla widżetu wprowadzanie tekstu wielowierszowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5390">This service is the default event handling function for the multi line text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5391">Ta funkcja jest dostępna dla aplikacji, które chcą zapewnić obsługę zdarzeń niestandardowych dla widżetu wprowadzanie tekstu wielowierszowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5391">This function is made accessible to applications that want to provide custom event handling for a multi line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5392">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5392">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5393">**przycisk** Wskaźnik do bloku kontroli wprowadzania tekstu wielowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5393">**button** Pointer to multi line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5394">**event_ptr** Zdarzenie do przetworzenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5394">**event_ptr** Event to be processed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5395">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5395">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5396">Zdarzenie **GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) zostało pomyślnie obsłużone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5396">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully handled event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5397">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5397">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5398">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5398">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5399">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5399">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5400">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5400">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5401">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5401">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5402">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5402">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT MyEventHandler(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* pass all other events to the generic multi line text
            input event processing */
        gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process(input, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5434">gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5434">gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5435">Ustaw kolor tła tekstu wielowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5435">Set multi line text input background color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5436">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5436">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_fill_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5437">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5437">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5438">Ta usługa przypisuje kolory wypełnienia dla widżetu wprowadzanie tekstu wielowierszowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5438">This service assigns fill colors for the multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5439">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5439">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5440">**text_input** Blok kontrolny widżetu tekstu wielowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5440">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5441">**normal_fill_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu normalnego koloru wypełnienia, który był używany w normalnym stanie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5441">**normal_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the normal fill color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5442">**selected_fill_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu wybranego koloru wypełnienia, który był używany, gdy element widget uzyska fokus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5442">**selected_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the selected fill color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5443">**disabled_fill_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu wyłączonego koloru wypełnienia, który był używany, gdy GX_STYLE_ENABLED nie jest aktywny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5443">**disabled_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the disabled fill color that used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5444">**readonly_fill_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu koloru wypełnienia tylko do odczytu, który jest używany, gdy oba GX_STYLE_ENABLED i GX_STYLE_INPUT_READONLY są aktywne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5444">**readonly_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the read only fill color that used when both GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_INPUT_READONLY are active.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5445">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5445">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5446">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił kolory dla wprowadzania tekstu wielowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5446">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set colors for the multi-line text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5447">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5447">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5448">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5448">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5449">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5449">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5450">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5450">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5451">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5451">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set fill colors for the multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */

status = gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set(&my_text_input,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_FILL,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_FILL,
    GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_FILL);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the fill color of “my_text_input” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_home"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5483">gx_multi_line_text_input_home</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5483">gx_multi_line_text_input_home</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5484">Przesuń kursor wprowadzania tekstu do początku bieżącego wiersza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5484">Move the text input cursor to the start of the current line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5485">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5485">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_home(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5486">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5486">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5487">Ta usługa przenosi położenie kursora wprowadzania tekstu na początek bieżącego wiersza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5487">This service moves the text input cursor position to the start of the current line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5488">Ta usługa jest wywoływana wewnętrznie po odebraniu zdarzenia dotyczącego klucza głównego, ale może być również wywoływana przez aplikację.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5488">This service is called internally when a home key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5489">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5489">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5490">**text_input** Blok kontrolny widżetu tekstu wielowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5490">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5491">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5491">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5492">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie przeniesiono kursor do początku bieżącego wiersza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5492">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to start of the current line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5493">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5493">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5494">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5494">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5495">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5495">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5496">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5496">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5497">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5497">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5498">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5498">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move cursor to the start of the current line. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_home(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the cursor has been moved to the start of the current line. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5530">gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5530">gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5531">Przenieś kursor wielowierszowego tekstu wejściowego o jeden znak w lewo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5531">Move multi line text input cursor one character to the left</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5532">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5532">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5533">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5533">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5534">Ta usługa przenosi kursor wielowierszowego tekstu wejściowego o jeden znak w lewo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5534">This service moves the multi line text input cursor one character to the left.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5535">Ta usługa jest wywoływana wewnętrznie w przypadku odebrania lewego klucza zdarzenia, ale może być również wywoływana przez aplikację.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5535">This service is called internally when a left key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5536">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5536">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5537">**text_input** Blok kontrolny widżetu tekst jednowierszowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5537">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_right_arrow(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5589">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5589">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5628">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5628">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5629">Ta usługa dodaje style do widżetu wprowadzanie tekstu wielowierszowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5629">This service adds styles to a multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5630">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5630">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5632">**styl** Style do dodania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5632">**style** Styles to add.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5633">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich elementów widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5633">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5634">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5634">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5635">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne dodanie stylu wprowadzania tekstu wielowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5635">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text input style add</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5636">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5636">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5637">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5637">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5638">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5638">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5639">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5639">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
    ULONG style);
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5766">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5766">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5767">Ustaw kolor tekstu wielowierszowego wprowadzania tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5767">Set multi line text input text color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5768">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5768">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_text_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5769">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5769">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5770">Ta usługa przypisuje kolory tekstu dla widżetu wprowadzanie tekstu wielowierszowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5770">This service assigns text colors for the multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5771">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5771">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5772">**text_input** Blok kontrolny widżetu tekstu wielowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5772">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5773">**normal_fill_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu standardowego koloru tekstu, który był używany w normalnym stanie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5773">**normal_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the normal text color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5774">**selected_text_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu wybranego koloru tekstu, który był używany, gdy element widget uzyskuje fokus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5774">**selected_text_color_id** Resource ID of the selected text color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5775">**disabled_text_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu dla wyłączonego koloru tekstu, który był używany, gdy GX_STYLE_ENABLED nie jest aktywny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5775">**disabled_text_color_id** Resource ID of the disabled text color that used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5776">**readonly_text_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu dla koloru tekstu tylko do odczytu, który jest używany, gdy oba GX_STYLE_ENABLED i GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READONLY są aktywne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5776">**readonly_text_color_id** Resource ID of the read only text color that used when both GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READONLY are active</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5777">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5777">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5778">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił kolory dla wprowadzania tekstu wielowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5778">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set colors for the multi-line text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5779">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5779">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5780">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5780">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5781">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5781">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5782">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5782">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5783">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5783">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for the multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set(&my_text_input,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the fill colors of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5815">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5815">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5816">Zaznacz tekst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5816">Select text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5817">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5817">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    UINT start_index, UINT end_index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5818">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5818">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5819">Ta usługa wybiera tekst tekstu wielowierszowego z określonym znacznikiem początkowym i indeksem znacznika końcowego oraz podświetla zaznaczony tekst z wybranymi kolorami wypełnienia i tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5819">This service selects multi line text input text with specified start mark and end mark index and highlights the selected text with the selected fill and text colors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5820">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5820">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5821">**text_input** Wskaźnik do bloku kontroli wprowadzania tekstu wielowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5821">**text_input** Pointer to multi line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5822">**start_index** Indeks pierwszego zaznaczonego znaku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5822">**start_index** Index of the first selected character</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5823">**end_index** Indeks ostatniego zaznaczonego znaku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5823">**end_index** Index of the last selected character</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5824">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5824">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5825">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne Zaznaczanie tekstu tekstu wielowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5825">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi line text input text selection</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5826">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5826">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5827">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5827">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5828">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5828">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5829">Wartość indeksu **GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) jest nieprawidłowa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5829">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Index value not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5830">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5830">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5831">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5831">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5832">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5832">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Select text between index [0, 9]. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select(&my_text_input,
    0,9);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text between 
    index [0, 9] “my_text_input” was selected. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5864">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5864">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5865">Przypisywanie tekstu do tekstu wejściowego (przestarzałe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5865">Assign text to the text input (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5866">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5866">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_mult_line_text_input_text_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5867">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5867">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5868">Ten interfejs API jest przestarzały i zastępuje go gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5868">This API is deprecated and replace by gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5869">Ta usługa przypisuje określony ciąg do wielowierszowego wejścia tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5869">This service assigns the specified string to the multi line text input.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5870">Jeśli rozmiar buforu danych wejściowych widżetu multi_line_text_input jest mniejszy niż długość ciągu, ciąg zostanie obcięty.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5870">If the multi_line_text_input widget’s input buffer size is smaller than string length, the string will be truncated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5871">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5871">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5872">**text_input** Wskaźnik do bloku kontroli wprowadzania tekstu wielowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5872">**text_input** Pointer to multi line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5873">wskaźnik **tekstowy** na ciąg zakończony ZNAKiem null</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5873">**text** pointer to the NULL-terminated string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5874">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5874">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5875">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił tekst na wprowadzanie tekstu wielowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5875">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the text to the multi line text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5876">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5876">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5877">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5877">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5878">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0X34) Nieprawidłowa długość ciągu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5878">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5879">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5879">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5880">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5880">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5881">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5881">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the string “my string” to the text button “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set(&my_text_input,
    “myrstring”);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the content of “my_text_input” bas been reset. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5934">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5934">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5935">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5935">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5936">Ta usługa przenosi kursor wielowierszowego tekstu wejściowego do poprzedniego wiersza tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5936">This service moves the multi line text input cursor to the previous line of text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5937">Ta usługa jest wywoływana wewnętrznie po odebraniu zdarzenia niskiego poziomu strzałki w dół, ale może być również wywoływana przez aplikację.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5937">This service is called internally when an up arrow key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5938">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5938">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5939">**text_input** Blok kontrolny widżetu tekst jednowierszowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5939">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5940">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5940">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5941">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie przeniesiono kursor do poprzedniego wiersza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5941">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to the previous line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5942">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5942">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5943">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5943">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5944">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5944">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5945">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5945">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5946">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5946">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5947">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5947">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move the cursor to the previous line. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the multi line text input cursor has been moved to the previous line. */

```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5979">gx_multi_line_text_view_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5979">gx_multi_line_text_view_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5980">Tworzenie wielowierszowego widoku tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5980">Create multi-line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5981">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5981">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_create(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WINDOW *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT text_view_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5982">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5982">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-5983">Ta usługa tworzy widżet GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5983">This service creates a GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5984">Ten typ widżetu pochodzi od GX_WINDOW, w związku z czym wszystkie usługi interfejsu API gx_window mogą być również używane z tym typem widgetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5984">This widget type is derived from GX_WINDOW, and therefore all gx_window API services may also be utilized with this widget type.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5985">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5985">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5986">**text_view** Blok kontrolny widżetu widok tekstu wielowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5986">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5987">**Nazwa** Nazwa widżetu widoku tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5987">**name** Name of the text view widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5988">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do elementu nadrzędnego widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5988">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5989">**text_id** Identyfikator zasobu ciągu tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5989">**text_id** Resource ID of the text string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5990">**styl** Styl widżetu widoku tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5990">**style** Style of text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5991">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich elementów widget, a także style charakterystyczne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5991">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5992">**text_view_id** Zdefiniowany przez aplikację Identyfikator widoku tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5992">**text_view_id** Application-defined ID of text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5993">**rozmiar** Wymiary widżetu widok tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5993">**size** Dimensions of text view widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-5994">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5994">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5995">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie utworzył widżet widoku tekstu wielowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5995">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created multi-line text view widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5996">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5996">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5997">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5997">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5998">Element widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) został już utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5998">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-5999">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontrolki widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-5999">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6000">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6000">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6001">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6001">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6002">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6002">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_create(&my_text_view,
    “my_text_view”, &my_parent,
    TEXT_STRING_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
    MY_TEXT_VIEW_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text view “my_text_view” has been successfully created. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6036">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6036">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_multi_line_text_view_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW * text_view);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6037">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6037">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6038">Ta usługa rysuje widżet widoku tekstu wielowierszowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6038">This service draws a multi line text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6039">Ta usługa jest zwykle wywoływana wewnętrznie podczas odświeżania kanwy, ale może być również wywoływana z niestandardowych funkcji rysowania wielowierszowego widoku tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6039">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom multi line text view drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6042">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6042">Return Values</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6045">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6045">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6046">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6046">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom multi line text view drawing function. */

VOID my_multi_line_text_view_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *view)
{

    gx_multi_line_text_view_draw(view);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6078">gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6078">gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6079">Przetwarzanie zdarzenia wielowierszowego widoku tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6079">Process multi-line text view event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6080">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6080">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6081">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6081">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6082">Ta usługa przetwarza zdarzenie dla widżetu widoku tekstu wielowierszowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6082">This service processes an event for a multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6083">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6083">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6084">**text_view** Blok kontrolny widżetu widok tekstu wielowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6084">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6085">**zdarzenie** Wskaźnik do zdarzenia do przetworzenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6085">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6086">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6086">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6087">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne przetwarzanie zdarzeń w wielowierszowym widoku tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6087">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text view event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6088">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6088">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6089">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6089">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6090">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6090">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6091">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6091">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6092">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6092">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6093">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6093">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event handler. */
UINT my_event_handler(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *view, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process(view, event_ptr);
        /* Add custom actions here. */
        break;
    default:
        gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process (view, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6171">gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6171">gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6172">Ustawianie wielowierszowego obramowania tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6172">Set multi-line text view line space</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6173">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6173">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_BYTE line_space);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6174">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6174">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6175">Ta usługa ustawia odstępy między wierszami tekstu dla widżetu widok tekstu wielowierszowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6175">This service sets the spacing between lines of text for the multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6178">**line_space** Wartość do ustawienia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6178">**line_space** Value to set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6179">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6179">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6180">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił wartość przestrzeni wierszy dla wielowierszowego widoku tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6180">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set line space value for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6181">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6181">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6182">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6182">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6183">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6183">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6184">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6184">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* Set line space of “my_text_view” to 2. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the line space of “my_text_view” has been successfully set to 2. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6216">gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6216">gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6217">Pobierz informacje o przewijaniu wielowierszowego widoku tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6217">Get multi-line text view scroll info</span></span>


### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6218">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6218">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLL_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6219">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6219">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6220">Ta usługa pobiera informacje o przewijaniu wielowierszowego widoku tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6220">This service gets the multi-line text view scroll information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6221">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6221">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6222">**text_view** Blok kontrolny widżetu widok tekstu wielowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6222">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6223">**Styl** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL lub GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6223">**Style** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL or GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6224">**Informacje** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla informacji przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6224">**Info** Pointer to destination for scroll info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6225">**Dodatek I** zawiera definicję do GX_SCROLL_INFO struktury.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6225">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SCROLL_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6226">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6226">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6227">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie pobrała informacje przewijania widoku tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6227">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved text view scroll info</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6228">Element widget **GX_FAILURE** (0x10) nie jest widoczny lub nieprawidłowy identyfikator czcionki widoku tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6228">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Widget is not visible or text view font id is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6229">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6229">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6230">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6230">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6231">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6231">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6232">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6232">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLL_INFO scroll_info;

/* Get scroll information for multi-line text view “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get(&my_text_view,
    &scroll_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “scroll_info” contains the scroll information for multi-line text view “my_text_view”. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6264">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6264">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6265">Ustaw kolor tekstu dla widoku tekstu wielowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6265">Set the text color for the multi line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6266">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6266">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCe_ID disabled_text_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6267">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6267">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6268">Ta usługa przypisuje kolor tekstu do widżetu widoku tekstu wielowierszowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6268">This service assigns text color to the multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6269">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6269">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6270">**text_view** Blok kontrolny widżetu widok tekstu wielowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6270">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6271">**normal_text_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu standardowego koloru tekstu, który był używany w normalnym stanie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6271">**normal_text_color_id** Resource ID of the normal text color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6272">**selected_text_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu wybranego koloru tekstu, który był używany, gdy element widget uzyskuje fokus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6272">**selected_text_color_id** Resource ID of the selected text color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6273">**disabled_text_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu wyłączonego koloru tekstu, który był używany GX_STYLE_ENABLED nie jest aktywny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6273">**disabled_text_color_id** Resource ID of the disabled text color that used GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6274">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6274">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6275">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił kolory dla wielowierszowego widoku tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6275">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set colors for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6276">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6276">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6277">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6277">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6278">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6278">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6279">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6279">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6280">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6280">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for the multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set(&my_text_view,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text color of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6312">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6312">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6313">Ustawianie ciągu tekstowego systemu w widoku tekstu wielowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6313">Set system text string in multi line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6314">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6314">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6315">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6315">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6316">Ta usługa ustawia identyfikator zasobu ciągu do wielowierszowego widżetu widoku tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6316">This service sets the resource ID of a string to the multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6317">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6317">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6318">**text_view** Blok kontrolny widżetu widok tekstu wielowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6318">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6319">**text_id** Identyfikator zasobu dla ciągu tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6319">**text_id** Resource ID for the text string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6320">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6320">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6321">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił identyfikator ciągu dla wielowierszowego widoku tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6321">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set string id for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6322">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6322">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6323">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6323">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6324">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0X33) Nieprawidłowy identyfikator zasobu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6324">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6325">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6325">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6326">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6326">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6327">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6327">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set string ID STRING_ID to the multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set(&my_text_view, STRING_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text id of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6359">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6359">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6360">Ustawianie ciągu zdefiniowanego przez użytkownika w widoku tekstu wielowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6360">Set user-defined string in multi line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6361">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6361">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6362">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6362">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6363">Ta usługa przypisuje ciąg tekstowy do widżetu widok tekstu wielowierszowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6363">This service assigns a text string to the multi-line text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6364">Jeśli element widget text_view został utworzony przy użyciu GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY stylu, widżet tworzy prywatną kopię ciągu tekstowego, a w związku z tym interfejs API gx_system_memory_allocate_set musi zostać wywołany raz przed zażądaniem tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6364">If the text_view widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned, and therefore the gx_system_memory_allocate_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6365">Jeśli GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY nie jest aktywny, widżet nie tworzy prywatnej kopii ciągu przychodzącego, w związku z czym przypisany ciąg musi być statycznie lub globalnie przydzielona, tj. nie może to być automatyczna lub Tymczasowa zmienna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6365">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the assigned string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6366">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6366">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6367">**text_view** Blok kontrolny widżetu widok tekstu wielowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6367">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6368">**tekst** Ciąg tekstowy zakończony zerem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6368">**text** NULL-terminated text string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6369">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6369">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6370">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił ciąg dla wielowierszowego widoku tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6370">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set string for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6371">Program przydzielania pamięci **GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) nie został zdefiniowany lub alokacja pamięci nie powiodła się</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6371">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6372">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6372">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6373">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6373">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6374">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6374">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6375">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6375">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6376">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6376">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set string “my string” to the multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set(&my_text_view, “my string”);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6408">gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6408">gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6409">Ustaw odstępy między widokiem tekstu wielowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6409">Set multi-line text view whitespace</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6410">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6410">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_UBYTE whitespace);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6411">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6411">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6412">Ta usługa ustawia odstępy między konturami widżetu i obszarem klienckim dla widżetu widok tekstu wielowierszowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6412">This service sets spacing between widget outlines and client area for a multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6413">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6413">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6414">**text_view** Blok kontrolny widżetu widok tekstu wielowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6414">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6415">**odstępy** Szerokość marginesu między widżetem text_view a wyświetlanym tekstem (w pikselach).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6415">**whitespace** Width of margin between text_view widget and the displayed text, in pixels.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6416">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6416">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6417">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił odstępy dla wielowierszowego widoku tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6417">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set whitespace for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6418">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6418">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6419">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6419">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6420">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6420">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6421">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6421">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6422">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6422">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set whitespace of “my_text_view” to 2. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set(&my_text_view, 2);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the whitespace of “my_text_view” has been successfully set to 2. */
```

## <a name="gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6454">gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6454">gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6455">Tworzenie numerycznego monitu Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6455">Create numeric pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6456">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6456">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_create(
    GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id, GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_id,
    ULONG style, USHORT pixelmap_prompt_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6457">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6457">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6458">Ta usługa tworzy liczbowy widżet monitu Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6458">This service creates a numeric pixelmap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6459">Numeric_pixelmap_prompt to tylko pixelmap_prompt, które utrzymują własny bufor i udostępniają interfejs API gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_value_set (INT), rozmiar buforu jest definiowany przez stałą GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE, która domyślnie jest 16.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6459">A numeric_pixelmap_prompt is just a pixelmap_prompt that keeps its own buffer and provides a gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_value_set(INT) API, the buffer size is defined by the constant GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE, which defaults to 16.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6460">GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT pochodzi od GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT i obsługuje wszystkie gx_pixelmap_prompt usługi interfejsu API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6460">GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT is derived from GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT and supports all gx_pixelmap_prompt API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6461">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6461">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6462">**Monituj** Numeryczny blok kontroli monitu Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6462">**prompt** Numeric pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6463">**Nazwa** Nazwa monitu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6463">**name** Name of prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6464">**element nadrzędny** Blok nadrzędnego elementu widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6464">**parent** Parent widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6465">**text_id** Identyfikator ciągu zasobu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6465">**text_id** Resource string id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6466">**fill_id** Identyfikator Pixelmap dla obszaru wypełnienia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6466">**fill_id** Pixelmap id for fill area</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6467">**styl** Styl pixelmapego monitu, **dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich elementów widget, a także style charakterystyczne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6467">**style** Style of numeric pixelmap prompt, **Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6468">**pixelmap_prompt_id** Zdefiniowany przez aplikację identyfikator monitu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6468">**pixelmap_prompt_id** Application-defined ID of prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6469">**rozmiar** Wymiary numerycznego monitu Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6469">**size** Dimensions of numeric pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6470">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6470">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6471">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie utworzył numeryczny monit pixlemap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6471">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully create numeric pixlemap prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6472">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6472">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6473">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6473">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6474">Element widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) został już utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6474">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6475">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontrolki widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6475">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6478">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6478">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_numeric_pix_prompt”. */
status = gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_create(&my_numeric_pix_prompt,
    “my_numeric_pix_prompt”, &my_parent,
    MY_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID, MY_FEEL_RESOURCE_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the numeric pixelmap prompt “my_numeric_pix_prompt” has been created. */
```
