## <a name="gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_format_function_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6482">gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_format_function_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6482">gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_format_function_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6483">Przesłoń funkcję formatu pixelmapego monitu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6483">Override format function of numeric pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6484">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6484">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_numeric_pixelmap_format_function_set(
    GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    OID (*format_func)(GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *, INT));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6485">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6485">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6486">Ta usługa zastępuje domyślną funkcję formatu widżetu pixlemap monitu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6486">This service overrides the default format function of the numeric pixlemap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6487">Funkcja formatowania domyślnego konwertuje wartość numeryczną monitu Pixelmap na ciąg i zapisuje ją w buforze prywatnym widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6487">The default format function converts the numeric pixelmap prompt value to a string and stores it in the widget’s private buffer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6488">Ta usługa umożliwia aplikacji Definiowanie własnej funkcji formatowania i przechowywanie wartości numerycznego monitu Pixelmap w buforze prywatnym widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6488">This service allows the application to define its own format function to format and store the numeric pixelmap prompt value in the widget’s private buffer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6489">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6489">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6490">**Monituj** Numeryczny blok kontroli monitu Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6490">**prompt** Numeric pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6491">**format_func** Funkcja formatowania, która ma zostać ustawiona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6491">**format_func** Format function to be set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6492">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6492">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6493">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił numeryczną funkcję formatu monitu pixlemap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6493">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set numeric pixlemap prompt format function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6494">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6494">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6495">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6495">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6496">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6496">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6497">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6497">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define my numeric pixelmap format function. */
VOID my_format_function(GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    INT value)
{
    /* If the value is “1234”, the new format will be “12.34”. */

    INT length;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value / 100,
        prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_ BUFFER_SIZE);
    Length = GX_STRLEN(prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer);
    prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer[length++] = ‘.’;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value % 100,
        prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer + length,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE - length);
}

/* Override default format function of “my_numeric_pix_prompt”. */
status = gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_format_function_set(
    &my_numeric_pix_prompt,
    my_format_function);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the format function of “my_numeric_pix_prompt” has been override. */
```

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6513">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6513">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_numeric_prompt_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6519">gx_numeric_prompt_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6519">gx_numeric_prompt_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6520">Utwórz monit liczbowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6520">Create numeric prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6521">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6521">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_numeric_prompt_create( 
    GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style, USHORT prompt_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6522">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6522">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6523">Ta usługa tworzy widżet z monitem numerycznym.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6523">This service creates a numeric prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6524">Monit numeric_ jest tylko monitem, który utrzymuje własny bufor i udostępnia interfejs API gx_numeric_ prompt_value_set (INT), rozmiar buforu jest definiowany przez stałą GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE, która domyślnie jest równa 16.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6524">A numeric_ prompt is just a prompt that keeps its own buffer and provides a gx_numeric_ prompt_value_set(INT) API, the buffer size is defined by the constant GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE, which defaults to 16.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6525">GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT pochodzi od GX_PROMPT i obsługuje wszystkie gx_prompt usługi interfejsu API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6525">GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT is derived from GX_PROMPT and supports all gx_prompt API services.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6527">**Monituj** Blok kontroli monitów numerycznych</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6527">**prompt** Numeric prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6528">**Nazwa** Nazwa monitu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6528">**name** Name of prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6529">**element nadrzędny** Blok nadrzędnego elementu widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6529">**parent** Parent widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6530">**text_id** Identyfikator ciągu zasobu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6530">**text_id** Resource string id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6531">**styl** Styl monitu liczbowego, **dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich elementów widget, a także style charakterystyczne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6531">**style** Style of numeric prompt, **Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6532">**prompt_id** Zdefiniowany przez aplikację identyfikator monitu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6532">**prompt_id** Application-defined ID of prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6533">**rozmiar** Wymiary monitu liczbowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6533">**size** Dimensions of numeric prompt</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6534">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6534">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6535">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie Utwórz monit liczbowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6535">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully creat numeric prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6536">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6536">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6537">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6537">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6538">Element widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) został już utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6538">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6539">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontrolki widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6539">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_numeric _prompt”. */
status = gx_numeric_prompt_create(&my_numeric_prompt,
```

## <a name="gx_numeric_prompt_format_function_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6546">gx_numeric_prompt_format_function_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6546">gx_numeric_prompt_format_function_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6547">Przesłoń funkcję formatu monitu liczbowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6547">Override format function of numeric prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6548">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6548">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_numeric_format_function_set(
    GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT *prompt,
    VOID (*format_func)(GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT *, INT));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6549">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6549">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6550">Ta usługa zastępuje domyślną funkcję formatu widżetu monitu liczbowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6550">This service overrides the default format function of a numeric prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6551">Funkcja formatowania domyślnego konwertuje wartość numerycznego monitu na ciąg i zapisuje ją w buforze prywatnym widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6551">The default format function converts the numeric prompt value to a string and stores it in the widget’s private buffer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6552">Ta usługa umożliwia aplikacji Definiowanie własnej funkcji formatowania i przechowywanie wartości numerycznego monitu w buforze prywatnym widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6552">This service allows the application to define its own format function to format and store the numeric prompt value in the widget’s private buffer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6553">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6553">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6554">**Monituj** Blok kontroli monitów numerycznych</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6554">**prompt** Numeric prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6555">**format_func** Funkcja formatowania, która ma zostać ustawiona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6555">**format_func** Format function to be set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6556">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6556">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6557">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił funkcję formatowania monitu liczbowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6557">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set numeric prompt format function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6558">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6558">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6559">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6559">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6560">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6560">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6561">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6561">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define my numeric format function. */
VOID my_format_function(GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT *prompt, INT value)
{
    /* If the value is “1234”, the new format will be “12.34”. */

    INT length;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value / 100, prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_ BUFFER_SIZE);
    Length = GX_STRLEN(prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer);
    prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer[length++] = ‘.’;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value % 100,
        prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer + length,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE - length);
}

/* Override the default format function of “my_numeric_prompt”. */
status = gx_numeric_prompt_format_function_set(&my_numeric_prompt,
    my_format_function);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the format function of “my_numeric_prompt” has been override. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6575">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6575">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6576">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6576">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6577">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6577">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6578">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6578">Initialization and threads</span></span>

## <a name="gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6583">gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6583">gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6584">Tworzenie numerycznego kółka przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6584">Create numeric scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6585">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6585">Prototype</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6586">UINT gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create (GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL \* koło, GX_CONST GX_CHAR \* nazwa, GX_WIDGET \* Parent, INT start_val, INT end_val, style ULONG, USHORT wheel_id, GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE \* size);</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6586">UINT gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create( GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL \*wheel, GX_CONST GX_CHAR \*name, GX_WIDGET \*parent, INT start_val, INT end_val, ULONG style, USHORT wheel_id, GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE \*size);</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6587">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6587">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6588">Ta usługa tworzy liczbowy widżet kółka przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6588">This service creates a numeric scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6589">Numeryczne kółko przewijania jest typem widżetu kółka przewijania, który jest używany do wyświetlania zakresu liczb.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6589">A numeric scroll wheel is a type of scroll wheel widget that is specifically used for displaying a range of numbers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6590">Dostępne są również inne typy widżetów z kółkiem przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6590">Other types of scroll wheel widgets are also available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6591">Zapoznaj się z interfejsem API gx_scroll_wheel_create (), aby uzyskać więcej informacji na temat hierarchii widżetu, typy widżetów i wyprowadzania elementu widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6591">Refer to the gx_scroll_wheel_create() API for more information about the scroll wheel widget hierarchy, widget types, and widget derivation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6592">GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL pochodzi od GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL i obsługuje wszystkie usługi gx_text_scroll_wheel i gx_scroll_wheel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6592">GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL is derived from GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL and supports all gx_text_scroll_wheel and gx_scroll_wheel services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6593">Wszystkie typy kółka przewijania generują zdarzenia GX_EVENT_LIST_SELECT do ich elementu nadrzędnego, gdy kółko przewijania jest przewijane.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6593">All scroll wheel types generate GX_EVENT_LIST_SELECT events to their parent when the scroll wheel is scrolled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6594">Numeryczne kółko przewijania będzie domyślnie mieć wartość ABS (end_val – start_val) + 1 wierszy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6594">A numeric scroll wheel will default to having abs(end_val – start_val) + 1 rows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6595">Innymi słowy, kółko przewijania będzie wyświetlało każdą wartość między start_val i end_val, zwiększanie lub zmniejszanie o 1 z każdym wierszem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6595">In other words, the scroll wheel will display every value between start_val and end_val, incrementing or decrementing by 1 with each row.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6596">Należy pamiętać, że start_val może być większa lub mniejsza niż end_val, w zależności od tego, w jaki sposób aplikacja chce, aby zakres był widoczny.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6596">Note that start_val can be greater or less than end_val, depending on which way the application wants the range to appear.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6597">Jeśli aplikacja chce zmienić przyrost wiersza, można to zrobić, wywołując gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set () po utworzeniu kółka przewijania numerycznego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6597">If the application wants to change the row increment, it can do this by calling gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set() after creating the numeric scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6598">Na przykład aplikacja chcąca utworzyć kółko przewijania, które wyświetla wartości lat 1980 do 2020, zwiększające się o 5, może to zrobić:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6598">For example, an application wanting to create a scroll wheel that displays the values years 1980 to 2020, incrementing by 5, might do this:</span></span>

```C
gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, GX_NULL, parent, 1980,
    2020, style, id, &size);

/* the years 1980 through 2020, inclusive, incrementing by 5 years,
yields 9 total rows */

gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set(&wheel, 9);
```

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6599">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6599">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6600">**koło** Wskaźnik do numerycznego bloku kontrolki pokrętła przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6600">**wheel** Pointer to numeric scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6601">**Nazwa** Logiczna nazwa widżetu przycisku Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6601">**name** Logical name of pixelmap button widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6602">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do widżetu nadrzędnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6602">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>

```C
status = gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create(&year_wheel,
```

## <a name="gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6635">gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6635">gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6636">Przypisz zakres wartości numerycznego kółka przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6636">Assign value range of numeric scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6637">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6637">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT
gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set(
    GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT start_val, INT end_val);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6638">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6638">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6639">Ta usługa modyfikuje zakres wartości, które są dozwolone i wyświetlane przez liczbowy widżet kółka przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6639">This service modifies the range of values allowed and displayed by a numeric scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6640">Numeryczne kółko przewijania jest typem widżetu kółka przewijania, który jest używany do wyświetlania zakresu liczb.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6640">A numeric scroll wheel is a type of scroll wheel widget that is specifically used for displaying a range of numbers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6641">Dostępne są również inne typy widżetów z kółkiem przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6641">Other types of scroll wheel widgets are also available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6642">Zapoznaj się z interfejsem API gx_scroll_wheel_create (), aby uzyskać więcej informacji na temat hierarchii widżetu, typy widżetów i wyprowadzania elementu widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6642">Refer to the gx_scroll_wheel_create() API for more information about the scroll wheel widget hierarchy, widget types, and widget derivation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6643">Wywołanie tego interfejsu API spowoduje zresetowanie wierszy sumy kółka przewijania do wartości ABS (end_val – start_val) + 1, co oznacza, że kółko przewijania zostanie zwiększone o 1 dla każdego wiersza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6643">Invoking this API resets the scroll wheel total rows to abs(end_val – start_val) + 1, meaning the scroll wheel will increment by 1 for each row.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6644">Aby to zmienić, aplikacja może wywołać gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set (), aby zmienić łączną liczbę wierszy, efektywnie zmieniając wartość przyrostu między wierszami.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6644">To change this, the application can call gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set() to change the total number of row, effectively changing the value increment between rows.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6645">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6645">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6646">**koło** Wskaźnik do numerycznego bloku kontrolki pokrętła przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6646">**wheel** Pointer to numeric scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6647">**start_val** Początkowa wartość liczbowa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6647">**start_val** Starting numeric value</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6648">**end_val** Końcowa wartość liczbowa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6648">**end_val** Ending numeric value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6649">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6649">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6650">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił numeryczny zakres kółka przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6650">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set numeric scroll wheel range</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6651">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6651">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6652">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6652">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6653">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6653">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
status = gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set(&year_wheel, 0, 200);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scroll wheel range has been modified. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6674">gx_pixelmap_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6674">gx_pixelmap_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6675">Utwórz przycisk Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6675">Create pixelmap button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6676">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6676">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_button_create(
    GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT pixelmap_button_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6677">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6677">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6678">Ta usługa tworzy widżet przycisku Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6678">This service creates a pixelmap button widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6679">GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON pochodzi od GX_BUTTON i obsługuje wszystkie gx_button usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6679">GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON is derived from GX_BUTTON and supports all gx_button services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6680">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6680">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6682">**Nazwa** Logiczna nazwa widżetu przycisku Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6682">**name** Logical name of pixelmap button widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6683">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do widżetu nadrzędnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6683">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6684">**normal_id** Identyfikator zasobu stanu normalnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6684">**normal_id** Normal state Resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6685">**selected_id** Identyfikator zasobu wybranego stanu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6685">**selected_id** Selected state Resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6686">**disabled_id** Identyfikator zasobu wyłączonego stanu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6686">**disabled_id** Disabled state Resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6687">**styl** Styl pola wyboru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6687">**style** Style of checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6688">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich elementów widget, a także style charakterystyczne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6688">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6689">**pixelmap_button_id** Zdefiniowany przez aplikację przycisk Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6689">**pixelmap_button_id** Application-defined ID of pixelmap button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6690">**rozmiar** Wymiary przycisku Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6690">**size** Dimensions of pixelmap button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6691">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6691">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6692">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie utworzył przycisk Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6692">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created pixelmap button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6693">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6693">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6694">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6694">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6695">Element widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) został już utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6695">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6696">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontrolki widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6696">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6697">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6697">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6698">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6698">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6699">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6699">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_pixelmap_button”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_button_create(&my_pixelmap_button,
    “my_pixelmap_button”, &my_parent,
    MY_NORMAL_RESOURCE_ID, MY_SELECTED_RESOURCE_ID,
    MY_DESELECTED_RESOURCE_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
    MY_PIXELMAP_BUTTON_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap button “my_pixelmap_button” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6721">gx_pixelmap_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6721">gx_pixelmap_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6722">Przycisk rysowania Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6722">Draw pixelmap button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6723">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6723">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_pixelmap_button_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6724">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6724">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6725">Ta usługa rysuje widżet przycisku Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6725">This service draws a pixelmap button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6726">Ta funkcja jest zwykle wywoływana wewnętrznie przez mechanizm odświeżania kanwy GUIX, ale jest uwidaczniana dla aplikacji, aby pomóc w zaimplementowaniu niestandardowych funkcji rysowania dla widżetów przycisku niestandardowego Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6726">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom pixelmap button widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6727">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6727">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6728">**przycisk** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki przycisku Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6728">**button** Pointer to pixelmap button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6729">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6729">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6730">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6730">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6731">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6731">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6732">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6732">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6733">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6733">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom pixelmap button drawing function. */

VOID my_pixelmap_button_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Call default pixelmap button draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_button_draw(button);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_button_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6755">gx_pixelmap_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6755">gx_pixelmap_button_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6756">Przetwarzanie zdarzenia Pixelmap Button</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6756">Pixelmap button event processing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6757">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6757">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_button_event_process(
    GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6758">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6758">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6759">Ta usługa udostępnia domyślną obsługę zdarzeń dla typu widżetu przycisk Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6759">This service provides default event handling for the pixelmap button widget type.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6760">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6760">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6761">**przycisk** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki przycisku Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6761">**button** Pointer to pixelmap button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6762">**event_ptr** Wskaźnik do GX_EVENT struktury</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6762">**event_ptr** Pointer to GX_EVENT structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6763">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6763">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6764">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — pomyślne rysowanie przycisku Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6764">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap button draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6765">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6765">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6766">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6766">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6767">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6767">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6768">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6768">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6769">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6769">Example</span></span>

```C
switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
{
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_pixelmap_button_event_process(icon, event_ptr);
    
        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
}
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6791">gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6791">gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6792">Przypisz pixelmaps do przycisku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6792">Assign pixelmaps to button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6793">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6793">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set(
    GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_id, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6794">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6794">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6795">Ta usługa ustawia pixelmaps na przycisk Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6795">This service sets pixelmaps to the pixelmap button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6796">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6796">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6797">**przycisk** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki przycisku Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6797">**button** Pointer to pixelmap button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6798">**normal_id** Identyfikator zasobu Pixelmap, który ma być używany jako stan Normalny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6798">**normal_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used as normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6799">**selected_id** Identyfikator zasobu Pixelmap, który ma być używany, gdy przycisk jest zaznaczony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6799">**selected_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used when the button is selected</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6800">**disabled_id** Identyfikator zasobu Pixelmap, który ma być używany, gdy przycisk jest wyłączony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6800">**disabled_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used when the button is disabled</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6801">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6801">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6802">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie ustawia Pixelmap na przycisk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6802">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful sets the pixelmap to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6803">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6803">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6804">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6804">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6805">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6805">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6806">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6806">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6807">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6807">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw “my_pixelmap_button”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set (&my_pixelmap_button,
    NORMAL_ID, SELECTED_ID,
    DISABLED_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap button is properly configured with the specified pixelmaps. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_prompt_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6829">gx_pixelmap_prompt_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6829">gx_pixelmap_prompt_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6830">Utwórz monit Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6830">Create pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6831">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6831">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_prompt_create(
    GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_pixelmap_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT pixelmap_prompt_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6832">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6832">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6833">Ta usługa tworzy widżet monitu Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6833">This service creates a pixelmap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6834">Monit Pixelmap różni się od standardowego GX_PROMPT w tym, że maluje tło monitu przy użyciu pixelmaps.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6834">A pixelmap prompt differs from a standard GX_PROMPT in that it paints the background of the prompt using pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6835">Funkcja Create akceptuje jeden identyfikator Pixelmap, normalny stan wypełnienia Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6835">The create function accepts one pixelmap id, the normal state fill pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6836">Do poziomu wiersza polecenia Pixelmap można przypisać maksymalnie sześć pixelmaps.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6836">Up to six pixelmaps may be assigned to the pixelmap prompt.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6837">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6837">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6838">**Monituj** Wskaźnik do bloku sterowania monitem Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6838">**prompt** Pointer to pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6839">**Nazwa** Nazwa logiczna widżetu monitu Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6839">**name** Logical name of pixelmap prompt widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6840">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do widżetu nadrzędnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6840">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6841">**text_id** Identyfikator zasobu tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6841">**text_id** Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6842">**fill_id** Identyfikator zasobu wypełnienia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6842">**fill_id** Resource ID of fill</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6843">**styl** Styl pola wyboru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6843">**style** Style of checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6844">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich elementów widget, a także style charakterystyczne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6844">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6845">**pixelmap_prompt_id** Zdefiniowany przez aplikację Identyfikator wiersza Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6845">**pixelmap_prompt_id** Application-defined ID of pixelmap prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6846">**rozmiar** Wymiary monitu Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6846">**size** Dimensions of pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6847">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6847">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6848">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — pomyślne utworzenie monitu Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6848">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap prompt create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6849">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6849">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6850">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6850">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6851">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontrolki widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6851">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6852">Element widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) został już utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6852">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6853">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6853">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6854">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6854">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6855">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6855">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_pixelmap_prompt”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_prompt_create(&my_pixelmap_prompt,
    “my_pixelmap_prompt”, &my_parent,
    MY_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID, MY_LEFT_RESOURCE_ID,
    MY_FILL_RESOURCE_ID, MY_RIGHT_RESOURCE_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_PIXELMAP_PROMPT_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap prompt “my_pixelmap_prompt” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6871">gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6871">gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6872">Rysowanie monitu Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6872">Draw pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6873">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6873">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6874">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6874">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6875">Ta usługa rysuje widżet Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6875">This service draws a pixelmap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6876">Ta funkcja jest zwykle wywoływana wewnętrznie przez mechanizm odświeżania kanwy GUIX, ale jest dostępna dla aplikacji, aby pomóc w zaimplementowaniu niestandardowych funkcji rysowania dla widżetów monitów niestandardowych Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6876">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom pixelmap prompt widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6877">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6877">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6878">**Monituj** Wskaźnik do bloku sterowania monitem Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6878">**prompt** Pointer to pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6879">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6879">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6880">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6880">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6881">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6881">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6882">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6882">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6883">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6883">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom pixelmap prompt drawing function. */

VOID my_pixelmap_button_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt)
{
    /* Call default pixelmap prompt draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw(prompt);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6899">gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6899">gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6900">Przypisz pixelmaps do monitu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6900">Assign pixelmaps to prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6901">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6901">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set(
    GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_left_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_fill_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_right_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_left_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_fill_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_right_pixelmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6902">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6902">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6903">Ta usługa przypisuje identyfikatory Pixelmap do monitu Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6903">This service assigns pixelmap ids to the pixelmap prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6904">Identyfikatory Pixelmap lewej, Fill i Right są używane do zezwalania aplikacji na użycie jednego zestawu pixelmaps do wyświetlania monitów o różne szerokości, ale o wspólnej wysokości, aby zaoszczędzić na wymaganiach dotyczących magazynu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6904">The left, fill, and right pixelmap ids are used to allow the application to use one set of pixelmaps for prompts of various widths but a common height to save on storage requirements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6905">Jeśli nie są używane lewe i prawe identyfikatory, powinny być ustawione na 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6905">If the left and right IDs are not used, they should be set to 0.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6906">Jeśli monit powinien wyglądać inaczej, gdy zyskuje fokus wprowadzania, wybrane identyfikatory Pixelmap są używane do tego celu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6906">If the prompt should draw itself differently when it gains input focus, the selected pixelmap ids are used for that purpose.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6907">Jeśli wybrane identyfikatory nie są używane lub są takie same jak normalne identyfikatory, ustaw je na 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6907">If the selected ids are not used or are the same as the normal ids, set them to 0.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6908">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6908">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6909">**Monituj** Wskaźnik do bloku sterowania monitem Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6909">**prompt** Pointer to pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6910">**normal_left_id** Identyfikator zasobu Pixelmap, który ma być używany po lewej stronie w normalnym stanie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6910">**normal_left_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used on the left side in the normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6911">**normal_fill_id** Identyfikator zasobu Pixelmap, który ma być używany jako uzupełniający wypełnianie w normalnym stanie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6911">**normal_fill_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used as a tiled fill in the normal state</span></span>

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_slider_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6945">gx_pixelmap_slider_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6945">gx_pixelmap_slider_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6946">Utwórz suwak Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6946">Create pixelmap slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6947">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6947">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_slider_create(
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info,
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO *pixelmap_info, ULONG style,
    USHORT pixelmap_slider_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6948">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6948">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6949">Ta usługa tworzy widżet suwaka Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6949">This service creates a pixelmap slider widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6950">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6950">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6951">**suwak** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki suwaka Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6951">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6952">**Nazwa** Logiczna nazwa widgetu suwaka Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6952">**name** Logical name of pixelmap slider widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6953">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do widżetu nadrzędnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6953">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6954">**informacje** Wskaźnik do struktury GX_SLIDER_INFO, która zawiera wartości definiujące minimalną wartość suwaka, wartość maksymalną, bieżącą wartość i limity wskazówki.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6954">**info** Pointer to a GX_SLIDER_INFO structure which contains values defining the slider minimum value, maximum value, current value, and needle limits.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6955">**Dodatek I** zawiera definicję dla struktury GX_SLIDER_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6955">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6956">**pixelmap_info** Wskaźnik do struktury GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO, która definiuje pixelmaps używany do rysowania tła suwaka i wskazówki.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6956">**pixelmap_info** Pointer to a GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure which defines the pixelmaps used to draw the slider background and needle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6957">**Dodatek I** zawiera definicję dla struktury GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6957">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6958">Tło suwaka może używać jednego lub dwóch pixelmaps.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6958">The slider background can use one or two pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6959">Jeśli takie tło nie zmienia się po przeniesieniu wskazówki.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6959">If one, the background does not change as the needle moves.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6960">Jeśli zdefiniowano dwa tła, tło przed wskazówką używa pierwszego pixelmapu w tle, a w tle po stronie wskazówki jest stosowane drugie Pixelmap w tle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6960">If two backgrounds are defined, the background before the needle uses the first background pixelmap, and the background after the needle uses the second background pixelmap.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6961">**styl** Styl suwaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6961">**style** Style of slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6962">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich elementów widget, a także style charakterystyczne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6962">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6963">**pixelmap_slider_id** Zdefiniowany przez aplikację suwak Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6963">**pixelmap_slider_id** Application-defined ID of pixelmap slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6964">**rozmiar** Wymiary monitu Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6964">**size** Dimensions of pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6965">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6965">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6966">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie utworzył suwak Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6966">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created pixelmap slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6967">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6967">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6968">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6968">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6969">Element widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) został już utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6969">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6970">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontrolki widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6970">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6971">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6971">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6972">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6972">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6973">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6973">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SLIDER_INFO info;
GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO pixelmap_info;

/* Initiate slider information structure. */
info.gx_slider_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_slider_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_slider_info_current_val = 50;
info.gx_slider_info_min_travel = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_max_tralvel = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_width = 5;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_height = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_inset = 5;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_hotspot_offset;

/* Initiate pixelmap slider information structure. */
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_lower_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_ORANGE;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_upper_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_EMPTY;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_needle_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Create “my_pixelmap_slider”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_slider_create(&my_pixelmap_slider,
                            “my_pixelmap_slider”, &my_parent,
                            &info, &pixelmap_info,
                            GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
                            MY_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap slider “my_pixelmap_slider” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_slider_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6993">gx_pixelmap_slider_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6993">gx_pixelmap_slider_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6994">Rysuj suwak Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6994">Draw pixelmap slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6995">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6995">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_pixelmap_slider_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *slider);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6996">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6996">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-6997">Ta usługa rysuje widżet suwaka Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6997">This service draws a pixelmap slider widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-6998">Ta funkcja jest zwykle wywoływana wewnętrznie przez mechanizm odświeżania kanwy GUIX, ale jest dostępna dla aplikacji, aby pomóc w zaimplementowaniu niestandardowych funkcji rysowania dla widżetów niestandardowego Pixelmap suwaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6998">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom pixelmap slider widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-6999">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-6999">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7000">**suwak** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki suwaka Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7000">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap slider control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7001">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7001">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7002">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7002">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7003">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7003">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7004">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7004">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7005">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7005">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom pixelmap slider drawing function. */

VOID my_pixelmap_slider_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *pixelmap_slider)
{
    /* Call default pixelmap slider draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_slider_draw(pixelmap_slider);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7026">gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7026">gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7027">Zdarzenie suwaka Pixelmap procesu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7027">Process pixelmap slider event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7028">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7028">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process(
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7029">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7029">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7030">Ta usługa przetwarza zdarzenie dla określonego widżetu suwaka Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7030">This service processes an event for the specified pixelmap slider widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7031">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7031">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7032">**suwak** Wskaźnik do Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7032">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7033">Kontrolka **suwaka** Blokuj wskaźnik zdarzenia do zdarzenia w celu przetworzenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7033">**slider** control block event Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7034">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7034">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7035">Proces zdarzenia suwaka Pixelmap (0x00) zakończyła się pomyślnie **GX_SUCCESS**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7035">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap slider event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7036">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7036">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7037">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7037">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7038">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7038">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7039">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7039">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7040">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7040">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7041">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7041">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */
UINT my_event_hanlder(GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *pixelmap_slider, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process(pixelmap_slider,
                                                    event_ptr);

        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process(pixelmap_slider,
                                                  event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_slider_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7062">gx_pixelmap_slider_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7062">gx_pixelmap_slider_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7063">Przypisz pixelmaps do suwaka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7063">Assign pixelmaps to slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7064">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7064">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_slider_pixelmap_set(
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO *pixinfo);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7065">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7065">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7066">Ta usługa ustawia pixelmaps do suwaka Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7066">This service sets pixelmaps to the pixelmap slider.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7067">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7067">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7068">**suwak** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki suwaka Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7068">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7069">**pixinfo** Wskaźnik do struktury GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO, która definiuje pixelmaps używany do rysowania tła suwaka i wskazówki.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7069">**pixinfo** Pointer to a GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure which defines the pixelmaps used to draw the slider background and needle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7070">**Dodatek I** zawiera definicję dla struktury GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7070">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7071">Tło suwaka może używać jednego lub dwóch pixelmaps.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7071">The slider background can use one or two pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7072">Jeśli takie tło nie zmienia się po przeniesieniu wskazówki.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7072">If one, the background does not change as the needle moves.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7073">Jeśli zdefiniowano dwa tła, tło przed wskazówką używa pierwszego pixelmapu w tle, a w tle po stronie wskazówki jest stosowane drugie Pixelmap w tle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7073">If two backgrounds are defined, the background before the needle uses the first background pixelmap, and the background after the needle uses the second background pixelmap.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7074">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7074">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7075">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie ustawia Pixelmap na suwak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7075">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful sets the pixelmap to the slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7076">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7076">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7077">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7077">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7078">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7078">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7079">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7079">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7080">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7080">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO pixelmap_info;

/* Initiate pixelmap slider information structure. */
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_lower_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_ORANGE;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_upper_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_EMPTY;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_needle_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Draw “my_pixelmap_button”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_slider _pixelmap_set (&my_pixelmap_slider,
                                &pixelmap_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap slider is properly configured with “pixelmap_info”. */
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7102">gx_progress_bar_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7102">gx_progress_bar_background_draw</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7104">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7104">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_progress_bar_background_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7105">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7105">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7106">Ta usługa rysuje tło określonego paska postępu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7106">This service draws the background of the specified progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7107">Ta funkcja jest wywoływana wewnętrznie jako część gx_progress_bar_draw (), ale jest dostępna dla aplikacji w celu obsługi tych przypadków, w których aplikacja definiuje niestandardową funkcję rysowania paska postępu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7107">This function is called internally as part of the gx_progress_bar_draw(), but is exposed to the application to support those cases where the application defines a custom progress bar drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7108">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7108">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7109">**pasek postępu** Wskaźnik do bloku sterowania paskiem postępu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7109">**progress bar** Pointer to progress bar control block</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7113">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7113">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7114">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7114">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_progress_bar_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
{
    /* Call default progress bar background draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_background_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Call default progress bar text draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_text_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```
