## <a name="gx_progress_bar_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7125">gx_progress_bar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7125">gx_progress_bar_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7126">Utwórz pasek postępu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7126">Create a progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7127">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7127">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_progress_bar_create(
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO *progress_bar_info,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT progress_bar_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7128">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7128">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7129">Ta usługa tworzy widżet paska postępu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7129">This service creates a progress bar widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7130">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7130">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7131">**progress_bar** Blok sterowania paskiem postępu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7131">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7132">**Nazwa** Nazwa logiczna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7132">**name** Logical name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7133">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do widżetu nadrzędnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7133">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7134">**progress_bar_info** Wskaźnik do struktury GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7134">**progress_bar_info** Pointer to a GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7135">**Dodatek I** zawiera definicję dla struktury GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7135">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7136">**styl** Styl paska postępu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7136">**style** Style of progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7137">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich elementów widget, a także style charakterystyczne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7137">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7138">**progress_bar_id** Zdefiniowany przez aplikację pasek postępu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7138">**progress_bar_id** Application-defined ID of progress bar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7139">**rozmiar** Wymiary paska postępu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7139">**size** Dimensions of progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7140">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7140">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7141">Tworzenie paska postępu o pomyślnym **zaGX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7141">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful progress bar create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7142">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7142">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7143">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7143">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7144">Element widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) został już utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7144">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7145">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontrolki widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7145">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7146">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7146">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7147">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7147">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7148">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7148">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7149">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7149">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

info.gx_progress_bar_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_current_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM_FONT;
info.gx_progress_bar_normal_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_WHITE;
info.gx_progress_bar_selected_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_BLUE;
info.gx_progress_bar_fill_pixelmap = 0;

size.gx_rectangle_left = 10;
size.gx_rectangle_top = 10;
size.gx_rectangle_right = 110;
size.gx_rectangle_bottom = 140;

/* Create a progress bar with the specified information. */
status = gx_progress_bar_create(&my_progress_bar, GX_NULL, GX_NULL,
                        &info, GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN,
                        0, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCSESS the progress bar “my_progress_bar” has been successfully created. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7161">Rysowanie paska postępu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7161">Draw a progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7162">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7162">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_progress_bar_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7163">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7163">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7164">Ta usługa rysuje widżet paska postępu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7164">This service draws a progress bar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7165">Ta funkcja jest zwykle wywoływana wewnętrznie przez mechanizm odświeżania kanwy GUIX, ale jest dostępna dla aplikacji, aby pomóc w zaimplementowaniu niestandardowych funkcji rysowania dla widżetów niestandardowego paska postępu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7165">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom progress bar widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7166">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7166">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7168">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7168">Return Values</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7171">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7171">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7172">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7172">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_progress_bar_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
{
    /* Call default progress bar draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7183">gx_progress_bar_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7183">gx_progress_bar_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7184">Postęp zdarzenia paska postępu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7184">Progress a progress bar event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7185">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7185">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_progress_bar_event_process(
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7186">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7186">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7187">Ta usługa przetwarza zdarzenie paska postępu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7187">This service processes a progress bar event.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7188">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7188">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7189">**progress_bar** Blok sterowania paskiem postępu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7189">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7190">**event_ptr** Wskaźnik do GX_EVENT struktury</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7190">**event_ptr** Pointer to GX_EVENT structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7191">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7191">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7192">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — pomyślne utworzenie monitu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7192">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7193">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7193">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7194">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7194">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7195">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0X12) nieprawidłowy widżet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7195">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7196">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7196">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7197">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7197">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7198">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7198">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process (GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_progress_bar_event_process(progress_bar,
                                                event_ptr);
        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_progress_bar_event_process(progress_bar,
                                                event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

```C
    GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id);
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_info_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7234">gx_progress_bar_info_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7234">gx_progress_bar_info_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7235">Ustaw strukturę informacji paska postępu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7235">Set progress bar information structure</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7236">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7236">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_progress_bar_info_set(
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7237">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7237">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7238">Ta usługa resetuje strukturę informacji widżetu pasek postępu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7238">This service resets the information structure of a progress bar widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7239">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7239">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7240">**progress_bar** Blok sterowania paskiem postępu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7240">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7241">**informacje** Wskaźnik do struktury GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7241">**info** Pointer to a GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7242">**Dodatek I** zawiera definicję dla struktury GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7242">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7243">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7243">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7244">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie zresetował informacje paska postępu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7244">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully reset progress bar info</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7245">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7245">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7246">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7246">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7247">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7247">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7248">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7248">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7249">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7249">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;

info.gx_progress_bar_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_current_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM_FONT;
info.gx_progress_bar_normal_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_WHITE;
info.gx_progress_bar_selected_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_BLUE;
info.gx_progress_bar_fill_pixelmap = 0;

status = gx_progress_bar_info_set(&progress_bar, &info);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the progress bar info was re-assigned. */
```

```C
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7314">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7314">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7315">Ta usługa ustawia kolor tekstu widżetu pasek postępu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7315">This service sets the text color of a progress bar widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7316">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7316">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7317">**progress_bar** Blok sterowania paskiem postępu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7317">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7318">**normal_text_color** Identyfikator zasobu standardowego koloru tekstu, który był używany w normalnym stanie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7318">**normal_text_color** Resource ID of normal text color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7319">**selected_text_color** Identyfikator zasobu wybranego koloru tekstu, który był używany podczas uzyskiwania fokusu elementu widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7319">**selected_text_color** Resource ID of selected text color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7320">**disabled_text_color** Identyfikator zasobu wyłączonego koloru tekstu, który był używany, gdy GX_STYLE_ENABLED nie jest aktywny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7320">**disabled_text_color** Resource ID of disabled text color that used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7321">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7321">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7322">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ustawiony kolor tekstu paska postępu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7322">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful progress bar text color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7323">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7323">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7324">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7324">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7325">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7325">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7326">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7326">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7327">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7327">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for the progress bar “my_progress_bar”*/
UINT status = gx_progress_bar_text_color_set(&my_progress_bar,
                        GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
                        GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
                        GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

/* if status is GX_SUCCESS, the progress bar text colors were successfully assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7338">gx_progress_bar_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7338">gx_progress_bar_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7339">Rysuj tekst paska postępu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7339">Draw progress bar text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7340">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7340">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_progress_bar_text_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7341">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7341">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7342">Ta usługa rysuje tekst określonego paska postępu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7342">This service draws the text of specified progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7343">Ta funkcja jest wywoływana wewnętrznie jako część gx_progress_bar_draw (), ale jest dostępna dla aplikacji w celu obsługi tych przypadków, w których aplikacja definiuje niestandardową funkcję rysowania paska postępu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7343">This function is called internally as part of the gx_progress_bar_draw(), but is exposed to the application to support those cases where the application defines a custom progress bar drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7344">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7344">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7345">**pasek postępu** Wskaźnik do bloku sterowania paskiem postępu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7345">**progress bar** Pointer to progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7346">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7346">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7347">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7347">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7348">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7348">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7349">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7349">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7350">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7350">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_progress_bar_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
{
    /* Call default progress bar background draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_background_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Call default progress bar text draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_text_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_value_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7361">gx_progress_bar_value_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7361">gx_progress_bar_value_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7362">Ustaw bieżącą wartość paska postępu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7362">Set current value of a progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7363">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7363">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_progress_bar_value_set(
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    INT value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7364">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7364">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7365">Ta usługa przypisuje bieżącą wartość paska postępu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7365">This service assigns the progress bar current value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7366">Widżet paska postępu automatycznie unieważnia się i ponownie narysuje po zmianie wartości paska postępu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7366">The progress bar widget will automatically invalidate and redraw itself when the progress bar value is changed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7367">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7367">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7368">**progress_bar** Blok sterowania paskiem postępu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7368">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7369">**wartość** Bieżąca wartość paska postępu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7369">**value** Progress bar current value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7370">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7370">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7371">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił wartość paska postępu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7371">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful set the value of the progress bar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7372">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7372">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7373">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7373">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7374">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7374">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7375">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7375">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7376">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7376">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status = gx_progress_bar_value_set(progress_bar, 50);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the progress bar value was successfully assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7387">gx_prompt_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7387">gx_prompt_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7388">Utwórz monit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7388">Create prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7389">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7389">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_create(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT prompt_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7390">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7390">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7391">Ta usługa tworzy widżet monitu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7391">This service creates a prompt widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7392">GX_PROMPT pochodzi od GX_WIDGET i obsługuje wszystkie gx_widget usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7392">GX_PROMPT is derived from GX_WIDGET and supports all gx_widget services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7393">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7393">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7394">**Wskaźnik** do widżetu nadrzędnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7394">**Pointer** to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7395">**text_id** Identyfikator zasobu tekstu monitu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7395">**text_id** Resource ID of prompt text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7396">**styl** Styl monitu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7396">**style** Style of prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7397">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich elementów widget, a także style charakterystyczne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7397">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7398">**prompt_id** Zdefiniowany przez aplikację identyfikator monitu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7398">**prompt_id** Application-defined ID of prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7399">**rozmiar** Wymiary monitu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7399">**size** Dimensions of prompt</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7400">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7400">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7401">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — pomyślne utworzenie monitu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7401">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7402">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7402">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7403">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7403">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7404">Element widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) został już utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7404">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7405">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontrolki widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7405">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7406">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7406">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7407">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7407">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7408">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7408">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_prompt”. */
status = gx_prompt_create(&my_prompt, “my_promPt”, &my_parent,
                    MY_PROMPT_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID,
                    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_PROPMT_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the prompt “my_prompt” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7420">gx_prompt_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7420">gx_prompt_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7421">Rysuj monit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7421">Draw prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7422">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7422">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_prompt_draw(GX_PROMPT *prompt);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7423">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7423">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7424">Ta usługa rysuje widżet monitu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7424">This service draws a prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7425">Ta usługa jest wywoływana wewnętrznie przez GUIX podczas odświeżania kanwy, ale może być również wywoływana przez niestandardowe funkcje rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7425">This service is called internally by GUIX during canvas refresh, but can also be called by custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7426">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7426">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7427">**Monituj** Wskaźnik do monitu z blokiem kontrolki widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7427">**prompt** Pointer to prompt widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7428">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7428">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7429">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7429">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7430">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7430">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7431">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7431">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7432">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7432">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom prompt drawing function. */

VOID my_prompt_draw(GX_PROMPT *prompt)
{
    /* Call default prompt draw. */
    gx_prompt_draw(prompt);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7444">gx_prompt_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7444">gx_prompt_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7445">Zdarzenie monitu procesu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7445">Process prompt event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7446">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7446">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_event_process(GX_PROMPT *prompt, GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7447">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7447">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7448">Ta usługa przetwarza zdarzenie dla określonego monitu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7448">This service processes an event for the specified prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7449">Ta usługa powinna być wywoływana jako domyślna procedura obsługi zdarzeń przez wszelkie niestandardowe funkcje przetwarzania zdarzeń monitu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7449">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom prompt event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7450">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7450">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7451">**Monituj** Wskaźnik do monitu o sterowanie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7451">**prompt** Pointer to prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7452">**event_ptr** Wskaźnik do zdarzenia do przetworzenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7452">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7453">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7453">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7454">Proces zdarzenia pomyślnego monitowania **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7454">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7455">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7455">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7456">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7456">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7457">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7457">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7458">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7458">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7459">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7459">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7460">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7460">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic prompt event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_prompt_event_process(GX_PROMPT *prompt, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default prompt event processing */
        status = gx_prompt_event_process(prompt, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7476">Ta usługa ustawia czcionkę widżetu monit.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7476">This service sets the font of a prompt widget.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7484">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7484">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>


## <a name="gx_prompt_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7499">gx_prompt_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7499">gx_prompt_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7500">Ustaw kolor tekstu monitu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7500">Set prompt text color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7501">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7501">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_text_color_set(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7502">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7502">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7503">Ta usługa ustawia kolor tekstu widżetu monit.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7503">This service sets the text color of a prompt widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7504">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7504">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7505">**Monituj** Wskaźnik do monitu z blokiem kontrolki widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7505">**prompt** Pointer to prompt widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7506">**normal_color** Identyfikator zasobu koloru dla zwykłego tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7506">**normal_color** Resource ID of color for normal text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7507">**Dodatek A** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane identyfikatory zasobów koloru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7507">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7508">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodać identyfikatory zasobów koloru niestandardowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7508">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7509">**selected_color** Identyfikator zasobu koloru dla zaznaczonego tekstu używany, gdy element widget uzyskuje fokus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7509">**selected_color** Resource ID of color for selected text, used when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7510">**Dodatek A** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane identyfikatory zasobów koloru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7510">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7511">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodać identyfikatory zasobów koloru niestandardowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7511">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7512">**disabled_color** Identyfikator zasobu koloru dla wyłączonego tekstu używany, gdy GX_STYLE_ENABLED nie jest aktywny.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7512">**disabled_color** Resource ID of color for disabled text, used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7513">**Dodatek A** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane identyfikatory zasobów koloru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7513">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7514">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodać identyfikatory zasobów koloru niestandardowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7514">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7515">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7515">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7516">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — zestaw kolorów tekstu monitu pomyślnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7516">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt text color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7517">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7517">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7518">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7518">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7519">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET_SIZE** (0X14) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7519">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET_SIZE** (0x14) Invalid widget size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7520">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7520">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
                    GX_COLOR_ID_BLACK,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_LIGHTGRAY,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7534">gx_prompt_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7534">gx_prompt_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7535">Funkcja obsługi rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7535">Drawing support function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7536">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7536">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_prompt_text_draw(GX_PROMPT *prompt);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7537">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7537">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7538">Ta funkcja obsługi służy do rysowania części tekstowej monitu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7538">This support function draws the text portion of a prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7539">Ta funkcja jest wywoływana wewnętrznie przez gx_prompt_draw () i jest udostępniana jako osobny interfejs API jako wygoda dla aplikacji, które definiują funkcję niestandardowego rysowania monitów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7539">This function is called internally by gx_prompt_draw(), and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom prompt drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7540">Aplikacje, które chcą dostosować Rysowanie w tle monitów, mogą zapewnić swoją niestandardową funkcję rysowania i wywoływać usługę gx_prompt_text_draw jako część niestandardowego rysunku, aby narysować tekst monitu w tle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7540">Applications that want to customize the prompt background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the gx_prompt_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the prompt text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7541">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7541">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7542">**Monituj** Wskaźnik do bloku sterowania monitem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7542">**prompt** Pointer to the prompt control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7543">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7543">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7544">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7544">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7545">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7545">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7546">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7546">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7547">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7547">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function */
VOID my_prompt_draw(GX_PROMPT *prompt)
{
    /* insert code here to draw prompt background */

    /* call support function to do text drawing */
    gx_prompt_text_draw();

    /* draw child widgets */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) prompt);
}
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_text_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7559">gx_prompt_text_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7559">gx_prompt_text_get</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7561">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7561">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_text_get(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt, 
    GX_CHAR **return_text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7562">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7562">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7563">Ta usługa jest przestarzała na rzecz gx_prompt_text_get_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7563">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_prompt_text_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7564">Ta usługa Pobiera tekst widżetu monit.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7564">This service gets the text of a prompt widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7565">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7565">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7566">**Monituj** Wskaźnik do monitu z blokiem kontrolki widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7566">**prompt** Pointer to prompt widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7567">**return_text** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7567">**return_text** Pointer to destination for text</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7568">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7568">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7569">Tekst monitu o pomyślne **zaGX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7569">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt text get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7570">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7570">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7571">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7571">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7572">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7572">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7573">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7573">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7574">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7574">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PROMPT my_prompt;
GX_CHAR *my_prompt_text;

/* Get the text of “my_prompt”. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pointer “my_prompt_text” points to the text displayed by “my_prompt”. */
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7639">gx_prompt_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7639">gx_prompt_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7640">Ustaw tekst monitu (przestarzałe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7640">Set prompt text (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7641">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7641">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_text_set(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt, 
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7642">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7642">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7643">Ta usługa została wycofana na korzyść gx_prompt_text_set_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7643">This service has been deprecated in favor of gx_prompt_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7644">Ta usługa ustawia tekst widżetu monit.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7644">This service sets the text of a prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7645">Jeśli widżet monit został utworzony z GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY stylu, widżet tworzy prywatną kopię ciągu tekstowego przypisanego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7645">If the prompt widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7646">Jeśli GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY nie jest aktywny, widżet nie tworzy prywatnej kopii ciągu przychodzącego, w związku z czym ciąg musi być statycznie lub globalnie przydzielony, tj. nie może to być automatyczna lub Tymczasowa zmienna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7646">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7647">GX_PROMPT pochodzi od GX_WIDGET i w związku z tym wszystkie gx_widget usługi API mogą być używane z GX_PROMPT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7647">GX_PROMPT is derived from GX_WIDGET, and therefore all gx_widget API services may be used with GX_PROMPT.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7648">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7648">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7649">**Monituj** Wskaźnik do monitu z blokiem kontrolki widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7649">**prompt** Pointer to prompt widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7650">**tekst** Wskaźnik do tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7650">**text** Pointer to text</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7651">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7651">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7652">Zestaw tekstu monitu o pomyślną **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7652">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt text set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7653">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7653">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7654">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7654">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7655">Funkcja alokacji pamięci **GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) nie jest zdefiniowana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7655">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocate function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7656">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0X34) Nieprawidłowa długość ciągu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7656">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7657">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7657">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7658">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7658">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C

status = gx_prompt_text_set(&my_prompt, “my_text”);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text for “my_prompt” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_anchor_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7702">gx_radial_progress_bar_anchor_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7702">gx_radial_progress_bar_anchor_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7703">Ustaw kąt początkowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7703">Set starting angle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7704">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7704">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_progress_bar_anchor_set(
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar, 
    GX_VALUE angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7705">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7705">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7706">Ta usługa ustawia kąt początkowy dla paska postępu promieniowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7706">This service sets the starting angle for radial progress bar.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7707">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7707">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7708">Wskaźnik paska **postępu** dla bloku sterowania paska postępu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7708">**progress** bar Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7709">**kąt** Kąt początkowy łuku okręgu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7709">**angle** Starting angle of the circular arc</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7710">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7710">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7711">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) powodzenie promienia słupkowego na pasku postępu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7711">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar anchor set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7712">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7712">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7713">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7713">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7714">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0X12) nieprawidłowy widżet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7714">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7715">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7715">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7716">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7716">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7717">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7717">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE start_angle = 90;

/* Set the start angle of “my_progress_bar” to 90 degree. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_anchor_set(&my_progress_bar, start_angle);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the anchor value of “my_progress_bar” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7728">gx_radial_progress_bar_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7728">gx_radial_progress_bar_background_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7729">Rysuj tło</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7729">Draw background</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7730">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7730">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_radial_progress_bar_background_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7731">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7731">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7732">Ta usługa rysuje tło paska postępu promieniowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7732">This service draws a radial progress bar background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7733">Ta usługa jest wewnętrznie przywoływana przez funkcję gx_radial_progress_bar_draw, ale jest udostępniona do użycia przez aplikację w takich przypadkach, w której aplikacja definiuje niestandardową funkcję rysowania paska postępu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7733">This service is internally referenced by the gx_radial_progress_bar_draw function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom radial progress bar drawing function</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7734">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7734">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7735">**pasek postępu** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki paska postępu promieniowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7735">**progress bar** Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7736">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7736">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7737">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7737">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7738">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7738">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7739">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7739">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7740">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7740">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom radial progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_radial_progress_bar_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *radial_progress)
{
    /* Call default radial progress bar background draw. */
    gx_radial_progress_bar_background_draw(radial_progress);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)radial_progress);
}
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7751">gx_radial_progress_bar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7751">gx_radial_progress_bar_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7752">Utwórz pasek postępu promieniowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7752">Create radial progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7753">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7753">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_progress_bar_create(
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO *info,
    ULONG style
    USHORT id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7754">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7754">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7755">Ta usługa tworzy Radialny pasek postępu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7755">This service creates a radial progress bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7756">Jeśli styl widżetu GX_STYLE_ENABLED zostanie zastosowany do paska postępu, pasek postępu przyjmie pen_down, pen_drag i pen_up dane wejściowe, aby zmodyfikować bieżącą wartość paska postępu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7756">If the widget style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is applied to the progress bar, the progress bar will accept pen_down, pen_drag, and pen_up input to modify the progress bar current value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7757">GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW stylu widżetu można użyć, aby włączyć rysowanie wartości paska postępu jako tekstu w obszarze paska postępu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7757">The widget style GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW can be used to enable drawing the progress bar value as text within the progress bar area.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7758">Jeśli ten styl jest używany w połączeniu z GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_PERCENT stylu, wartość paska postępu jest wyświetlana jako wartość procentowa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7758">If this style is used in combination with the style GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_PERCENT, the progress bar value is displayed as a percentage.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7759">W przeciwnym razie wartość paska postępu jest wyświetlana jako bieżąca wartość kątowa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7759">Otherwise the progress bar value is displayed as the current angular value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7760">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7760">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7761">**pasek postępu** Wskaźnik do kontrolki paska postępu promieniowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7761">**progress bar** Pointer to radial progress bar control</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7762">Wskaźnik paska **postępu** dla bloku sterowania paska postępu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7762">**progress** bar Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7763">**Nazwa** Nazwa paska postępu promieniowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7763">**name** Name of radial progress bar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7764">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do elementu nadrzędnego widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7764">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7765">**informacje** Wskaźnik do struktury GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7765">**info** Pointer to a GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7766">**Dodatek I** zawiera definicję dla struktury GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7766">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7767">**styl** Styl paska postępu promieniowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7767">**style** Style of radial progress bar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7768">**Identyfikator** zdefiniowany przez aplikację pasek postępu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7768">**id** Application-defined ID of progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7769">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7769">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7770">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie przeprowadzono pasek postępu radialnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7770">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7771">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7771">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7772">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7772">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7773">Element widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) został już utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7773">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7774">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0X12) nieprawidłowy element widget elementu nadrzędnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7774">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid parent widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7775">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7775">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7776">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7776">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7777">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7777">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RAIDAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;

info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_xcenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_ycenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_radius = 100;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_current_angle = 180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_anchor_val = -180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_normal_text_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_text_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_disabled_text_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_width = 20;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_width = 16;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_WIDGET_FILL;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL;

/* Create a radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_create(&my_progress_bar,
                    “my_progress_bar”, parent, &info,
                    GX_STYLE_ENABLED | GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT |
                    GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW,
                    ID_MY_RADIAL_PROGRESS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial progress bar “my_progress_bar” has been created. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7791">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7791">Description</span></span>

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7812">gx_radial_progress_bar_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7812">gx_radial_progress_bar_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7813">Zdarzenie paska postępu promieniowego procesu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7813">Process radial progress bar event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7814">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7814">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_progress_bar_event_process(
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7815">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7815">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7816">Ta usługa przetwarza zdarzenie paska postępu promieniowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7816">This service processes a radial progress bar event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7817">Ta funkcja jest wewnętrznie przywoływana przez funkcję gx_radial_progress_bar_create, ale jest narażona na użycie przez aplikację w takich przypadkach, w których aplikacja definiuje niestandardową funkcję przetwarzania zdarzeń dotyczących postępu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7817">This function is internally referenced by the gx_radial_progress_bar_create function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom radial progress event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7818">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7818">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7819">Wskaźnik paska **postępu** dla bloku sterowania paska postępu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7819">**progress** bar Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7820">**event_ptr** Wskaźnik do zdarzenia do przetworzenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7820">**event_ptr** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7821">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7821">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7822">Proces zdarzenia dotyczącego paska postępu, **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7822">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7823">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7823">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7824">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7824">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7825">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0X12) nieprawidłowy widżet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7825">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7826">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7826">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7827">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7827">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7828">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7828">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process (GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *radial_progress, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
        case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_radial_progress_bar_event_process(
                            radial_progress, event_ptr);
        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_radial_progress_bar_event_process(
                            radial_progress, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7875">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7875">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7876">Zestaw informacyjny paska postępu **GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) zakończony pomyślnie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7876">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar info set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7877">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7877">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7879">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0X12) nieprawidłowy widżet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7879">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7880">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7880">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7881">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7881">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7882">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7882">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RAIDAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;

info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_xcenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_ycenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_radius = 100;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_current_angle = 180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_anchor_val = -180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_normal_text_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_text_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_disabled_text_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_width = 20;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_width = 16;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_WIDGET_FILL;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL;

/* Set appearance information for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_info_set(&my_progress_bar, &info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the appearance information of “my_progress_bar” has been set. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7904">**selected_color** Identyfikator zasobu koloru tekstu, gdy element widget uzyskuje fokus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7904">**selected_color** Resource ID of text color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7905">**Dodatek A** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane identyfikatory zasobów koloru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7905">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7906">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodać identyfikatory zasobów koloru niestandardowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7906">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7907">**disabled_color** Identyfikator zasobu tekstu, gdy styl GX_STYLE_ENABLED nie jest ustawiony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7907">**disabled_color** Resource ID of text color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7908">**Dodatek A** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane identyfikatory zasobów koloru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7908">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7909">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodać identyfikatory zasobów koloru niestandardowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7909">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7911">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie ustawiony kolor słupka na pasku postępu dla tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7911">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar text color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7912">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7912">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7917">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7917">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text color for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_text_color_set(&my_progress_bar,
                            GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
                            GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
                            GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text color of “my_progress_bar” has been set. */
```
