## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7928">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7928">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7929">Rysuj tekst paska postępu promieniowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7929">Draw radial progress bar text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7930">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7930">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7931">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7931">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7932">Ta usługa rysuje tekst określonego paska postępu promieniowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7932">This service draws the text of specified radial progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7933">Ta funkcja jest wywoływana wewnętrznie jako część gx_radial_progress_bar_draw (), ale jest dostępna dla aplikacji w celu obsługi tych przypadków, w których aplikacja definiuje niestandardową funkcję rysowania paska postępu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7933">This function is called internally as part of the gx_radial_progress_bar_draw(), but is exposed to the application to support those cases where the application defines a custom progress bar drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7934">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7934">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7935">**pasek postępu** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki paska postępu promieniowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7935">**progress bar** Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7936">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7936">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7937">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7937">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7938">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7938">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7939">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7939">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7940">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7940">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw text for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw (&my_progress_bar);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text of “my_progress_bar” has been drawn. */

/* Write a custom radial progress bar drawing function. */
VOID my_radial_progress_bar_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *radial_progress)
{
    /* Add your own background draw here. */

    /* Call default radial progress bar text draw. */
    gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw(radial_progress);

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)radial_progress);
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7945">gx_radial_progress_bar_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7945">gx_radial_progress_bar_draw</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7950">gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7950">gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7951">gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7951">gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7952">Ustaw wartość paska postępu promieniowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7952">Set radial progress bar value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7953">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7953">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set(
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar, 
    GX_VALUE value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7954">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7954">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7955">Ta usługa ustawia wartość paska postępu promieniowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7955">This service sets radial progress bar value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7956">Przypisana wartość jest ograniczona do zakresu [-360, 360], definiując możliwy zakres wartości kątowych dla bieżącej lokalizacji paska postępu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7956">The assigned value is limited to the range [-360, 360], defining the possible range of angular values for the progress bar current location.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7957">Aplikacja musi skalować podaną rzeczywistą wartość, aby przypisać wartość kątową do widżetu pasek postępu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7957">The application must scale the real-world value being indicated to assign an angular value to the progress bar widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7958">Pasek postępu jest rysowany tak, aby bieżąca wartość wskazywała różnicę kątową między pozycją zakotwiczenia a punktem końcowym górnego łuku. Wartości ujemne powodują, że łuk ma być rysowany w kierunku w prawo, rozpoczynając od pozycji zakotwiczenia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7958">The progress bar is drawn such that the current value indicates the angular delta between the anchor position and the end point of the upper arc. Negative values cause the arc to be drawn in a clockwise direction starting at the anchor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7959">Dodatnia wartość bieżąca powoduje, że łuk ma być rysowany w kierunku w prawo, rozpoczynając od pozycji zakotwiczenia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7959">Positive current value causes the arc to be drawn in a counter-clockwise direction starting at the anchor position.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7960">Na przykład, aby narysować łuk zaczynający się na górze łuku (12 pozycji) i kończący się z prawej strony (trzy pozycje na końcu), przypisz wartość zakotwiczenia o 90 stopni i bieżącą wartość-90 stopni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7960">For example, to draw an arc starting at the top of the arc (12 o’clock position) and ending at the right (three o’clock position), assign an anchor value of 90 degrees and a current value of -90 degrees.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7961">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7961">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7962">Wskaźnik paska **postępu** dla bloku sterowania paska postępu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7962">**progress** bar Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7963">**wartość** Nowa wartość paska postępu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7963">**value** New progress bar value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7964">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7964">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7965">Wartość ustawienia słupkowego postępu, **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7965">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar value set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7966">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7966">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7967">Nieprawidłowe wskaźniki **GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7967">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7968">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0X12) nieprawidłowy widżet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7968">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7969">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7969">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7970">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7970">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7971">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7971">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE new_value = 180;

/* Set value for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set(&my_progress_bar,
                                        new_value);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of “my_progress_bar” has been set. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7981">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7981">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw</span></span>

## <a name="gx_radio_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7982">gx_radio_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7982">gx_radio_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7983">Utwórz przycisk radiowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7983">Create radio button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7984">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7984">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radio_button_create(
    GX_RADIO_BUTTON *button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id, ULONG style,
    USHORT radio_button_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7985">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7985">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-7986">Ta usługa tworzy widżet przycisku radiowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7986">This service creates a radio button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7987">GX_RADIO_BUTTON pochodzi od GX_TEXT_BUTTON i w związku z tym wszystkie usługi gx_text_button są również obsługiwane przez ten typ widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7987">GX_RADIO_BUTTON is derived from GX_TEXT_BUTTON, and therefore all gx_text_button services are also supported by this widget type.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-7988">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7988">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7989">**przycisk** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki przycisku radiowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7989">**button** Pointer to radio button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7990">**Nazwa** Logiczna nazwa widżetu przycisku radiowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7990">**name** Logical name of radio button widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-7991">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do widżetu nadrzędnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-7991">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>

## <a name="gx_radio_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8022">gx_radio_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8022">gx_radio_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8023">Przycisk rysowania przycisku radiowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8023">Draw radio button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8024">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8024">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_radio_button_draw(GX_RADIO_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8025">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8025">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8026">Ta usługa rysuje widżet przycisku radiowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8026">This service draws a radio button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8027">Ta usługa jest wywoływana wewnętrznie przez odświeżanie kanwy GUIX, ale może być również wywoływana przez zastąpione funkcje rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8027">This service is called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh, but can also be called by overridden drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8028">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8028">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8029">**przycisk** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki widżetu przycisk radiowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8029">**button** Pointer to radio button widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8030">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8030">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8031">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8031">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8032">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8032">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8033">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8033">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8034">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8034">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom radio button drawing function. */

VOID my_radio_button_draw(GX_RADIO_BUTTON *radio_button)
{
    /* Call default radio button draw. */
    gx_radio_button_draw(radio_button);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)radio_button);
}
```

## <a name="gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8049">gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8049">gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8050">Ustaw pixelmaps dla przycisku radiowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8050">Set pixelmaps for radio button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8051">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8051">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set(
    GX_RADIO_BUTTON *button,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID off_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID on_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID off_disabled_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID on_disabled_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8052">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8052">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8053">Ta usługa przypisuje pixelmaps do wyświetlania przez określony przycisk radiowy dla każdego stanu przycisku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8053">This service assigns the pixelmaps to be displayed by the specified radio button for each button state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8054">Identyfikatory zasobów mogą być zduplikowane.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8054">The resource IDs can be duplicated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8055">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8055">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8056">**off_id** Pixelmap używany do stanu wyłączenia przycisku radiowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8056">**off_id** Pixelmap used for radio button off state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8057">**on_id** Pixelmap używany dla przycisku radiowego w stanie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8057">**on_id** Pixelmap used for radio button on state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8058">**off_disabled_id** Pixelmap używany dla przycisku radiowego wyłączone i wyłączone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8058">**off_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for radio button disabled and off state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8059">**on_disabled_id** Pixelmap używany dla przycisku radiowego wyłączone i w stanie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8059">**on_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for radio button disabled and on state</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8060">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8060">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8061">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) przycisk radiowy pomyślnego pixelmaps zestawu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8061">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radio button pixelmaps set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8062">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8062">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8063">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8063">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8064">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0X12) nieprawidłowy widżet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8064">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8065">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8065">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8066">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8066">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8067">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8067">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set pixelmap for “my_radio_button”. */
status = gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set(&my_radio_button,
                                MY_OFF_PIXELMAP,
                                MY_ON_PIXELMAP,
                                MY_OFF_DISABLED_PIXELMAP,
                                MY_ON_DISABLED_PIXELMAP);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmaps for radio button “my_radio_button” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8082">gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8082">gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8083">Ustaw listę zakotwiczenia suwaka promieniowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8083">Set radial slider anchor list</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_VALUE *anchor_angles, 
    USHORT anchor_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8085">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8085">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8086">Ta usługa Ustawia kąty zakotwiczenia dla suwaka promieniowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8086">This service sets anchor angles for radial slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8087">Jeśli jest ustawiona lista kątów zakotwiczenia, kąt suwaka promieniowego będzie jednym ze zdefiniowanych kątów zakotwiczenia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8087">If anchor angle list is set, the radial slider angle will be one of defined anchor angles.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8088">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8088">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8090">**anchor_angles** Lista kątów do ustawienia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8090">**anchor_angles** Angle list to set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8091">**anchor_count** Liczba kątów zakotwiczenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8091">**anchor_count** Count of the anchor angles</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8092">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8092">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8093">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — Ustawianie kątów zakotwiczenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8093">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful anchor angles set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8094">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8094">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8097">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8097">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8098">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8098">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8099">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8099">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE anchor_angles[]={0, 30, 60, 90, 120, 150, 180};
USHORT anchor_count = 7;

/* Set anchor angles for radial slider. */
status = gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set(&my_radial_slider,
                                anchor_angles, anchor_count);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the anchor angles have been set for “my_radial_slider”. */

/* Set anchor angles for radial slider. */
status = gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set(&my_radial_slider,
                                GX_NULL, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the anchor angles have been removed from “my_radial_slider”. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_angle_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8110">gx_radial_slider_angle_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8110">gx_radial_slider_angle_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8111">Ustaw kąt suwaka promieniowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8111">Set radial slider angle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8112">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8112">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_angle_set(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_VALUE new_angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8113">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8113">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8114">Ta usługa ustawia nową wartość kąta dla suwaka promieniowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8114">This service sets new angle value for radial slider.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8115">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8115">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8116">**suwak** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki suwaka promieniowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8116">**slider** Pointer to radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8117">**new_angle** Nowa wartość kąta, która ma zostać ustawiona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8117">**new_angle** New angle value to be set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8118">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8118">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8119">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie ustawiony kąt suwaka promieniowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8119">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial slider angle set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8120">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8120">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8121">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8121">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8122">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0X12) nieprawidłowy widżet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8122">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8123">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8123">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8125">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8125">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set “my_radial_slider” angle to 0 degree(3 o’clock position). */
status = gx_radial_slider_angle_set(&my_radial_slider, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of “my_radial_slider” has been set to 0 degree. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_animation_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8136">gx_radial_slider_animation_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8136">gx_radial_slider_animation_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8137">Utwórz informacje o animacji suwaka promieniowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8137">Create radial slider animation info</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8138">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8138">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_animation_set(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    USHORT steps, USHORT delay, 
    USHORT animation_style,
    VOID (*animation_update_callback)(GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8139">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8139">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8140">Ta usługa ustawia kroki animacji, czas opóźnienia i style animacji dla animacji promieniowej wskazówki suwaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8140">This service sets animation steps, delay time and animation styles for radial slider needle animation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8141">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8141">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8142">**suwak** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki suwaka promieniowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8142">**slider** Pointer to radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8143">**kroki** Łączna liczba kroków dla jednej animacji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8143">**steps** Total steps for one animation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8144">**opóźnienie** Czas opóźnienia dla każdego kroku animacji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8144">**delay** Delay time for each animation step</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8145">**animation_style** Typ funkcji krzywych napięcia, obejmuje:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8145">**animation_style** Easing function type, includes:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8146">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8146">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8147">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8147">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8148">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8148">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8149">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8149">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8150">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8150">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8151">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8151">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8152">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8152">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8153">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8153">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8154">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8154">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8155">GX_ANIMATION_CUBIC_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8155">GX_ANIMATION_CUBIC_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8156">GX_ANIMATION_CUBIC_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8156">GX_ANIMATION_CUBIC_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8157">GX_ANIMATION_CUBIC_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8157">GX_ANIMATION_CUBIC_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8158">GX_ANIMATION_ELASTIC_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8158">GX_ANIMATION_ELASTIC_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8159">GX_ANIMATION_ELASTIC_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8159">GX_ANIMATION_ELASTIC_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8160">GX_ANIMATION_ELASTIC_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8160">GX_ANIMATION_ELASTIC_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8161">GX_ANIMATION_EXPO_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8161">GX_ANIMATION_EXPO_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8162">GX_ANIMATION_EXPO_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8162">GX_ANIMATION_EXPO_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8163">GX_ANIMATION_EXPO_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8163">GX_ANIMATION_EXPO_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8164">GX_ANIMATION_QUAD_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8164">GX_ANIMATION_QUAD_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8165">GX_ANIMATION_QUAD_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8165">GX_ANIMATION_QUAD_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8166">GX_ANIMATION_QUAD_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8166">GX_ANIMATION_QUAD_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8167">GX_ANIMATION_QUART_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8167">GX_ANIMATION_QUART_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8168">GX_ANIMATION_QUART_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8168">GX_ANIMATION_QUART_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8169">GX_ANIMATION_QUART_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8169">GX_ANIMATION_QUART_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8170">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8170">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8171">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8171">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8172">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8172">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8173">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8173">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8174">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8174">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8175">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8175">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8176">**animation_update_callback** Zdefiniowana przez użytkownika funkcja wywołania zwrotnego, która będzie wywoływana po każdym kroku animacji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8176">**animation_update_callback** User-defined callback function that will be called after each animation step</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8177">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8177">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8178">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) ustawiono animację suwaka "powodzenie"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8178">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial slider animation set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8179">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8179">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8180">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8180">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8181">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0X12) nieprawidłowy widżet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8181">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8182">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8182">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8183">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8183">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8184">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8184">Example</span></span>

```C
VOID animation_callback(GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider)
{
    /* This function will be called after each animation step,
    add custom code here. */
}

/* Set animation info for “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_animation_set(&my_radial_slider, 15, 2,
                                GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN_OUT,
                                animation_callback);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider needle will move with specified animation. */

/* Disable animation for “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_animation_set(&my_radial_slider, 0, 0,
                                        0, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider needle will move without animation. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_animation_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8195">gx_radial_slider_animation_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8195">gx_radial_slider_animation_start</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8207">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0X12) nieprawidłowy widżet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8207">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8208">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8208">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* Start an animation to move radial slider needle from
current position to 90 degree position. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider needle animation has been started. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8221">gx_radial_slider_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8221">gx_radial_slider_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8222">Utwórz suwak promieniowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8222">Create radial slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8223">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8223">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_create(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO *info,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT slider_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8224">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8224">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8225">Ta usługa tworzy widżet suwak promieniowy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8225">This service creates a radial slider widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8226">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8226">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8227">**suwak** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki suwaka promieniowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8227">**slider** Pointer to radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8228">**Nazwa** Logiczna nazwa widżetu suwaka promieniowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8228">**name** Logical name of radial slider widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8229">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do widżetu nadrzędnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8229">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8230">**informacje** Definicja wyglądu suwaka promieniowego, **dodatek I** zawiera definicję do GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8230">**info** Radial slider appearance definition, **Appendix I** contains definition to GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8231">**styl** Styl przycisku radiowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8231">**style** Style of radio button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8232">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich elementów widget, a także style charakterystyczne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8232">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8233">**radio_button_id** Zdefiniowany przez aplikację suwak promieniowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8233">**radio_button_id** Application-defined ID of radial slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8234">**rozmiar** Wymiary suwaka promieniowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8234">**size** Dimensions of radial slider</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8235">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8235">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8236">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) udany suwak promieniowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8236">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial slider create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8237">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8237">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8238">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8238">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8239">Element widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) został już utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8239">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8240">**GX_INVALID_** ROZMIAR (0x19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontrolki widgetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8240">**GX_INVALID_** SIZE (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8241">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0X12) nieprawidłowy element widget elementu nadrzędnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8241">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid parent widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8242">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8242">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8243">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8243">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8244">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8244">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO info;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Distance from left side of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_xcenter = 100;

/* Distance from top size of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_ycenter = 100;

/* Radius of rotating circle. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_radius = 100;

/* Widget of rotating track. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_track_width = 40;

/* Current angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_current_angle = 0;

/* Minimum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_min_anlge = -60;

/* Maximum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_max_angle = 240;

/* Anchor value list. */
info.gx_radial_slider_angle_list = GX_NULL;

/* Anchor value count. */
info.gx_radial_slider_list_count = 0;

/* Resource ID of background pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_background_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_BKGRD;

/* Resource ID of needle pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_needle_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Define widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 0, 0, 200, 200);

/* Create “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_create(&my_radial_slider,
                                “my_radial_slider”, &my_parent,
                                &info, GX_STYLE_ENABLED,
                                MY_RADIAL_SLIDER_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider “my_radial_slider” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8255">gx_radial_slider_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8255">gx_radial_slider_draw</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8258">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8258">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8259">Ta usługa rysuje suwak promieniowy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8259">This service draws a radial slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8260">Ta usługa jest wywoływana wewnętrznie przez odświeżanie kanwy GUIX, ale może być również wywoływana przez zastąpione funkcje rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8260">This service is called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh, but can also be called by overridden drawing functions.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8279">gx_radial_slider_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8279">gx_radial_slider_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8280">Zdarzenie suwaka promieniowego procesu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8280">Process radial slider event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8281">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8281">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_event_process(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8282">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8282">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8283">Ta usługa przetwarza zdarzenie suwaka promieniowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8283">This service processes a radial slider event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8284">Ta usługa powinna być wywoływana jako domyślna procedura obsługi zdarzeń przez wszelkie niestandardowe funkcje przetwarzania zdarzeń suwaka promieniowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8284">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom radial slider event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8285">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8285">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8295">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8295">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process(GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
                    GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_radial_slider_event_process(slider, event_ptr);

        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_radial_slider_event_process(slider, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8341">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8341">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8342">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8342">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8343">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0X12) nieprawidłowy widżet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8343">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8344">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8344">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8345">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8345">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8346">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8346">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO info;

/* Distance from left side of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_xcenter = 100;

/* Distance from top size of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_ycenter = 100;

/* Radius of rotating circle. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_radius = 100;

/* Widget of rotating track. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_track_width = 40;

/* Current angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_current_angle = 0;

/* Minimum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_min_anlge = -60;

/* Maximum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_max_angle = 240;

/* Anchor value list. */
info.gx_radial_slider_angle_list = GX_NULL;

/* Anchor value count. */
info.gx_radial_slider_list_count = 0;

/* Resource ID of background pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_background_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_BKGRD;

/* Resource ID of needle pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_needle_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Reset radial slider info for “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_info_set(&my_radial_slider, &info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider info of “my_radial_slider” has been reset. */
```

## <a name="gx_rich_text_view_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8384">gx_rich_text_view_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8384">gx_rich_text_view_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8385">Tworzenie widoku tekstu sformatowanego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8385">Create a rich text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8386">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8386">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_rich_text_view_create(
    GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS *fonts,
    USHORT id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8387">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8387">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8388">Ta usługa tworzy widok tekstu sformatowanego jako określony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8388">This service creates a rich text view as specified.</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8389">**Tagi formatowania są używane do wyświetlania typów specjalnych dla tekstu:**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8389">**Formatting tags are used to display special types for text:**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8390">**\<b>\</b>** Ustaw czcionkę tekstową z określonym przez użytkownika identyfikatorem czcionki pogrubionej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8390">**\<b>\</b>** Set text font with user specified bold font id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8391">**\<i>\</i>** Ustaw czcionkę tekstową z określonym przez użytkownika kursywą identyfikatorem czcionki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8391">**\<i>\</i>** Set text font with user specified italic font id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8392">**\<u>\</u>** Włącz podkreślanie tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8392">**\<u>\</u>** Enable text underline</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8393">**\<f GX_FONT_ID>\</f>** Ustaw czcionkę tekstową o określonym identyfikatorze czcionki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8393">**\<f GX_FONT_ID>\</f>** Set text font with specified font id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8394">**\<c GX_COLOR_ID>\</c>** Ustaw czcionkę tekstu o określonym identyfikatorze koloru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8394">**\<c GX_COLOR_ID>\</c>** Set text font with specified color id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8395">**\<hc GX_COLOR_ID>\</hc>** Ustaw kolor wyróżnienia tekstu określony identyfikator koloru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8395">**\<hc GX_COLOR_ID>\</hc>** Set text highlight color specified color id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8396">**\<align left/right/center>\</align>** Ustawianie wyrównania tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8396">**\<align left/right/center>\</align>** Set text alignment</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8397">**Przykłady użycia tagów formatowania:**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8397">**Examples of formatting tag usage:**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8398">\<b>Jest to pogrubiony tekst< \b></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8398">\<b>This is bold text<\b></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8399">\<i>Ten tekst jest pisany kursywą< \i></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8399">\<i>This is italic text<\i></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8400">\<u>Jest to tekst z podkreśleniem< \u></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8400">\<u>This is text with underline<\u></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8401">\<f 0>Ten identyfikator czcionki tekstowej jest ustawiony na 0< \f></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8401">\<f 0>This text font id is set to 0<\f></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8402">\<c 1>Ten identyfikator koloru tekstu jest ustawiony na 1< \c></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8402">\<c 1>This text color id is set to 1<\c></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8403">\<hc 2>Ten identyfikator koloru wyróżnienia tekstu jest ustawiony na 2< \hc></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8403">\<hc 2>This text highlight color id is set to 2<\hc></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8404">\<align left> Ten tekst jest wyrównany do lewej< \align></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8404">\<align left> This text is left aligned<\align></span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8405">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8405">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8406">**text_view** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki widoku tekstu sformatowanego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8406">**text_view** Pointer to rich text view control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8407">**Nazwa** Nazwa widoku tekstu sformatowanego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8407">**name** Name of the rich text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8408">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do elementu nadrzędnego widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8408">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8409">**text_id** Identyfikator zasobu ciągu tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8409">**text_id** Resource ID of the text string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8410">**czcionki** Wskaźnik do informacji o czcionce widoku tekstu sformatowanego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8410">**fonts** Pointer to the rich text view font information.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8411">**Dodatek I** zawiera definicję do GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS struktury.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8411">**Apendix I** contains definition to GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8412">**styl** Styl elementu widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8412">**style** Style of the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8413">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich elementów widget, a także style charakterystyczne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8413">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8414">**Identyfikator** zdefiniowany przez aplikację w widoku tekstu sformatowanego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8414">**id** Application-defined ID of the rich text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8415">**rozmiar** Rozmiar widoku tekstu sformatowanego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8415">**size** Size of the rich text view</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8416">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8416">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8417">Zakończono Tworzenie widoku tekstu sformatowanego **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8417">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful rich text view creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8418">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8418">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8419">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8419">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8420">Element widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) został już utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8420">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8421">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontrolki widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8421">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8422">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8422">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8423">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8423">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8424">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8424">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW rich_view;
GX_RCIH_TEXT_FONTS fonts;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Defined widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 100, 100, 300, 150);

/* Define font information. */
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_normal_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;

/* Create rich text view widget. */
status = gx_rich_text_view_create(&rich_view, “my_rich_view”,
                                  parent, GX_STRING_ID_TEST_STRING,
                                  &fonts,
                                  GX_STYLE_ENABLED,
                                  MY_RICH_VIEW_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the rich text view was successfully created. */

```

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8425">Aplikacja demonstracyjna demo_guix_widget_types, dostępna jako część instalacji programu GUIX Studio, zawiera kompletny przykład widżetu widok tekstu sformatowanego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8425">The demo application demo_guix_widget_types, provided as part of the GUIX Studio installation, provides a complete example of using the rich text view widget.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_rich_text_view_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8430">gx_rich_text_view_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8430">gx_rich_text_view_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8431">Rysuj widok tekstu sformatowanego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8431">Draw rich text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8432">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8432">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_rich_text_view_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8433">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8433">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8434">Ta usługa Rysuje określony widżet widoku tekstu sformatowanego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8434">This service draws the specified rich text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8435">Ta usługa jest zwykle wywoływana wewnętrznie przez GUIX w ramach operacji odświeżania kanwy, ale jest również dostępna dla aplikacji, która może chcieć udostępnić funkcję rysowania niestandardowego i wywoływać domyślny rysunek widoku tekstu sformatowanego jako niestandardowa baza rysunku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8435">This service is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default rich text view drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8436">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8436">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8437">**text_view** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki widżetu widok tekstu sformatowanego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8437">**text_view** Pointer to rich text view widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8438">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8438">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8439">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8439">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8440">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8440">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8441">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8441">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8442">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8442">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom rich text view drawing function. */

VOID my_rich_text_view_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view)
{
    /* Call default rich text view draw. */
    gx_rich_text_view_draw(text_view);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8448">Ustaw czcionki widoku tekstu sformatowanego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8448">Set rich text view fonts</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8451">Ta usługa ustawia czcionki widżetu widoku tekstu sformatowanego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8451">This service sets the fonts of a rich text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8452">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8452">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8453">**text_view** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki widżetu widok tekstu sformatowanego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8453">**text_view** Pointer to rich text view widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8456">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8456">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8457">Zestaw czcionek (0x00) o pomyślnym zaawansowaniu widoku tekstu sformatowanego **GX_SUCCESS**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8457">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful rich text view fonts set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8458">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8458">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8459">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8459">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8460">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8460">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8461">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8461">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8462">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8462">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8463">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8463">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS fonts;

/* Replace the font ids as needed. */
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_normal_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;

/* Set the font of “my_rich_view”. */
status = gx_rich_text_view_fonts_set(&my_rich_view, &fonts);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the font for rich text view “my_rich_view” has been set. */
```


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8471">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8471">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8472">Ta funkcja obsługi służy do rysowania części tekstowej w widoku tekstu sformatowanego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8472">This support function draws the text portion of a rich text view.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8473">Ta funkcja jest wywoływana wewnętrznie przez gx_rich_text_view_draw () i jest udostępniana jako osobny interfejs API jako wygoda dla aplikacji, które definiują niestandardową funkcję rysowania widoku tekstu sformatowanego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8473">This function is called internally by gx_rich_text_view_draw(), and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom rich text view drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8474">Aplikacje, które chcą dostosować rysunek w tle widoku tekstu sformatowanego, mogą zapewnić swoją niestandardową funkcję rysowania i wywoływać usługę gx_rich_text_view_text_draw jako część niestandardowego rysunku, aby narysować tekst tekstu sformatowanego w tle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8474">Applications that want to customize the rich text view background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the gx_rich_text_view_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the rich text view text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8475">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8475">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8476">**text_view** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki widżetu widok tekstu sformatowanego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8476">**text_view** Pointer to rich text view widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8477">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8477">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8478">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8478">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8479">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8479">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8480">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8480">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8481">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8481">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom rich text view drawing function. */

VOID my_rich_text_view_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view)
{
    /* Insert code here to draw rich text view background. */

    /* Call support function to do text drawing. */
    gx_rich_text_view_text_draw();

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) rich_text_view);
}
```

## <a name="gx_screen_stack_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8486">gx_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8486">gx_screen_stack_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8487">Inicjowanie stosu ekranu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8487">Initialize a screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8488">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8488">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_screen_stack_create(
    GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL *control,
    GX_WIDGET **memory_buffer, 
    INT buffer_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8489">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8489">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8490">Ta usługa inicjuje stos ekranu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8490">This service initializes a screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8491">Aplikacja musi zdefiniować blok pamięci i rozmiar buforu używany do implementowania funkcji stosu ekranu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8491">The application must define the memory block and buffer size used to implement the screen stack feature.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8492">*Ten interfejs API jest przestarzały i został zastąpiony gx_system_screen_stack_create (). Ta wersja jest świadczona tylko w celu zapewnienia zgodności z poprzednimi wersjami z powyższymi wersjami biblioteki.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8492">*This API is obsoleted, and is replaced with gx_system_screen_stack_create(). This version is provided only for backwards compatibility with previous library releases..*</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8493">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8493">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8494">**kontrolka** Blok sterowania stosu ekranu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8494">**control** Screen stack control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8495">**memory_buffer** Wskaźnik do bufora pamięci, który został użyty jako stos ekranu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8495">**memory_buffer** Pointer to a memory buffer that used as a screen stack</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8496">**buffer_size** Rozmiar pamięci w bajtach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8496">**buffer_size** Memory size in bytes</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8497">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8497">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8498">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne utworzenie stosu ekranu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8498">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful screen stack create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8499">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8499">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8500">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar buforu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8500">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8501">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8501">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8502">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8502">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8503">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8503">Example</span></span>

```C
#define SCREEN_STACK_SIZE 10

GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL my_stack_control;
GX_WIDGET *screen_stack[SCREEN_STACK_SIZE];

/* Initialize “my_stack_control”. */
status = gx_screen_stack_create(&my_stack_control, screen_stack,
                        SCREEN_STACK_SIZE * sizeof(GX_WIDGET *));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the screen control block “my_stack control” has been initialized. */
```

## <a name="gx_screen_stack_pop"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8508">gx_screen_stack_pop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8508">gx_screen_stack_pop</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8509">Usuń wpis znajdujący się najwyżej z stosu ekranu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8509">Remove the topmost entry from the screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8510">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8510">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_screen_stack_pop(GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL *control);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8511">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8511">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8512">Ta usługa usuwa wpis z góry z stosu ekranu i dołącza ekran zdjęte do jego poprzedniego elementu nadrzędnego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8512">This service removes the topmost entry from the screen stack, and attaches the popped screen to its previous parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8513">Ten interfejs API odłącza również wszelkie istniejące elementy podrzędne z elementu nadrzędnego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8513">This API also detaches any existing children from the parent.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8514">*Ten interfejs API jest przestarzały i został zastąpiony gx_system_screen_stack_pop (). Ta wersja jest świadczona tylko w celu zapewnienia zgodności z poprzednimi wersjami z powyższymi wersjami biblioteki.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8514">*This API is obsoleted, and is replaced with gx_system_screen_stack_pop(). This version is provided only for backwards compatibility with previous library releases..*</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8515">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8515">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8516">**kontrolka** Blok sterowania stosu ekranu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8516">**control** Screen stack control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8517">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8517">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8518">Pomyślny stos ekranu **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8518">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful screen stack pop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8519">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8519">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8520">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8520">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8521">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8521">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8522">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8522">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8523">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8523">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove the topmost entry from the screen stack. */
status = gx_screen_stack_pop(&my_stack_control);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the topmost entry has been removed from the screen stack, 
    and the popped screen has been attached to its parent. */
```

## <a name="gx_screen_stack_push"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8528">gx_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8528">gx_screen_stack_push</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8529">Wypychanie ekranu i jego elementów nadrzędnych do stosu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8529">Push screen and its parents to stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8530">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8530">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_screen_stack_push(
    GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL *control,
    GX_WIDGET *screen,
    GX_WIDGET *new_screen);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8531">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8531">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8532">Ta usługa odłącza od jej elementu nadrzędnego, a następnie wypycha wskaźnik ekranu i wskaźnik nadrzędny na stosie ekranu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8532">This service detaches screen from its parent, and pushes the screen pointer and the parent pointer onto the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8533">Nowy wskaźnik ekranu jest następnie dołączany do elementu nadrzędnego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8533">The new screen pointer is then attached to the parent.</span></span>


> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8534">*Ten interfejs API jest przestarzały i został zastąpiony gx_system_screen_stack_pop (). Ta wersja jest świadczona tylko w celu zapewnienia zgodności z poprzednimi wersjami z powyższymi wersjami biblioteki.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8534">*This API is obsoleted, and is replaced with gx_system_screen_stack_pop(). This version is provided only for backwards compatibility with previous library releases..*</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8535">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8535">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8536">**kontrolka** Blok sterowania stosu ekranu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8536">**control** Screen stack control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8537">**ekran** Wskaźnik ekranu do wypchnięcia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8537">**screen** Screen pointer to push</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8538">**new_screen** Wskaźnik nowego ekranu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8538">**new_screen** Pointer of the new screen</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8539">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8539">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8540">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne wypychanie stosu ekranu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8540">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful screen stack push</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8541">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8541">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8542">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8542">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8543">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8543">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8544">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8544">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8545">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8545">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Push “screen” and its parent to screen stack, Dettach “screen” from its parent, and attach “new screen” to the parent. */
status = gx_screen_stack_push(&my_stack_control,
                                screen, new_screen);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “screen” and its parent have been pushed to screen stack, “screen” has been detached from its parent, “new_screen” has been attached to the parent. */
```


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8553">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8553">Description</span></span>
