> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8555">*Ten interfejs API jest przestarzały i został zastąpiony gx_system_screen_stack_pop (). Ta wersja jest świadczona tylko w celu zapewnienia zgodności z poprzednimi wersjami z powyższymi wersjami biblioteki.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8555">*This API is obsoleted, and is replaced with gx_system_screen_stack_pop(). This version is provided only for backwards compatibility with previous library releases..*</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8558">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8558">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8559">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne przewijanie — tworzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8559">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scroll thumb create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8560">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8560">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8561">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8561">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8562">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8562">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8563">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8563">Example</span></span>

```C

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS all entries of screen stack has been removed. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_thumb_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8568">gx_scroll_thumb_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8568">gx_scroll_thumb_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8569">Utwórz kciuk przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8569">Create scroll thumb</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8570">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8570">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_thumb_create(
    GX_SCROLL_THUMB *scroll_thumb,
    GX_SCROLLBAR *parent, ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8571">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8571">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8572">Ta usługa tworzy pokrętło przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8572">This service creates a scroll thumbwheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8573">Ta usługa jest zwykle wywoływana wewnętrznie podczas tworzenia GX_SCROLLBAR, ale jest udostępniana publicznie w celu zezwalania na niestandardowe implementacje SCROLLBAR.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8573">This service is normally called internally when a GX_SCROLLBAR is created, but is made public in order to allow custom scrollbar implementations.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8574">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8574">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8575">**scroll_thumb** Scroll — blok kontrolny widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8575">**scroll_thumb** Scroll thumb widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8576">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik na nadrzędny pasek przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8576">**parent** Pointer to parent scrollbar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8577">**styl** Styl widżetu ScrollBar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8577">**style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8578">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich elementów widget, a także style charakterystyczne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8578">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8579">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8579">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8580">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne przewijanie — tworzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8580">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scroll thumb create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8581">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8581">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8582">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8582">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8583">Element widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) został już utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8583">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8584">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontrolki widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8584">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8585">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8585">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8586">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8586">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8587">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8587">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8588">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8588">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLL_THUMB my_scroll_thumb;

/* Create scroll thumb “my_scroll_thumb”. */
status = gx_scroll_thumb_create(&my_scroll_thumb, &my_scrollbar,
                                GX_STYLE_NONE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scroll thumb “my_scroll_thumb” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_thumb_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8592">gx_scroll_thumb_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8592">gx_scroll_thumb_draw</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8594">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8594">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_scroll_thumb_draw(GX_SCROLL_THUMB *scroll_thumb);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8595">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8595">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8596">Ta usługa rysuje pokrętło przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8596">This service draws a scroll thumbwheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8597">Ta usługa jest wywoływana wewnętrznie przez odświeżanie kanwy GUIX, ale może być również wywoływana przez zastąpione funkcje rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8597">This service is called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh, but can also be called by overridden drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8598">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8598">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8599">**scroll_thumb** Scroll — blok kontrolny widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8599">**scroll_thumb** Scroll thumb widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8600">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8600">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8601">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8601">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8602">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8602">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8603">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8603">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8604">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8604">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom scroll thumb drawing function. */

VOID my_scroll_thumb_draw(GX_SCROLL_THUMB *thumb)
{
    /* Call default scroll thumb draw. */
    gx_scroll_thumb_draw(thumb);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_thumb_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8608">gx_scroll_thumb_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8608">gx_scroll_thumb_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8609">Zdarzenie przewijania przewijania procesu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8609">Process scroll thumb event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8610">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8610">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_thumb_event_process(
    GX_SCROLL_THUMB *scroll_thumb,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8611">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8611">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8612">Ta usługa obsługuje zdarzenia wysyłane do pokrętła ScrollBar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8612">This service handles events sent to a scrollbar thumbwheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8613">Ta usługa jest zwykle używana wewnętrznie przez GUIX, ale jest udostępniana publicznie, aby pomóc w zaimplementowaniu niestandardowych zachowań pasków przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8613">This service is normally used internally by GUIX, but is made public to assist with implementing custom scrollbar behaviors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8614">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8614">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8615">**scroll_thumb** Scroll — blok kontrolny widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8615">**scroll_thumb** Scroll thumb widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8616">**zdarzenie** Wskaźnik do zdarzenia do przetworzenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8616">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8617">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8617">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8618">Proces zdarzenia przewijania pomyślnego przewijania **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8618">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scroll thumb event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8619">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8619">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8620">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8620">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8621">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8621">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8622">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8622">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8623">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8623">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8624">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8624">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process (GX_SCROLL_THUMB *thumb, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_scroll_thumb_event_process(thumb, event_ptr);

        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_scroll_thumb_event_process(thumb, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8628">gx_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8628">gx_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8629">Tworzenie podstawowego widgetu kółka przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8629">Create a base scroll wheel widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8630">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8630">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_create( 
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_rows, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8631">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8631">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8632">Ta usługa tworzy generyczny widżet kółka przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8632">This service creates a generic scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8633">Ogólne koło przewijania jest podstawowym elementem widget dla wszystkich typów widżetów przewijania kółka, w tym *gx_text_scroll_wheel*\* *, który jest podstawą dla *gx_numeric_scroll_wheel** \* i gx_string_ elementów widget *scroll_wheel*\* \*.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8633">A generic scroll wheel is the base widget for all scroll wheel widget types, including the *gx_text_scroll_wheel*\*\* which is the base for *gx_numeric_scroll_wheel*\*\* and *gx_string_ scroll_wheel*\*\* widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8634">Element widget podstawowego kółka przewijania zapewnia obsługę zdarzeń, animację przewijania i zaznaczone obliczenia wierszy dla wszystkich typów widżetu kółka przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8634">The base scroll wheel widget provides event handling, scrolling animation, and selected row calculation for all scroll wheel widget types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8635">Aplikacje nie zwykle tworzą wystąpienia widżetu ogólnego kółka przewijania, ponieważ ten typ widżetu nie udostępnia funkcji rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8635">Applications would not normally create an instance of a generic scroll wheel widget, since this widget type provides no drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8636">Jednak dostęp do tego interfejsu API jest dostarczany, aby pomóc aplikacjom, które muszą utworzyć niestandardowy typ widżetu kółka przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8636">However access to this API is provided to assist applications which need to create a custom scroll wheel widget type.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8637">GX_SCROLL_WHEEL bazują na GX_WINDOW i w związku z tym wszystkie GX_WINDOW interfejsy API mogą być używane z GX_SCROLL_WHEEL i widżetami uzyskanymi z GX_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8637">GX_SCROLL_WHEEL is based on GX_WINDOW, and therefore all GX_WINDOW APIs may be used with GX_SCROLL_WHEEL and widgets derived from GX_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8638">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8638">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8639">**koło** Wskaźnik do ogólnego bloku kontrolki pokrętła przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8639">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8640">**Nazwa** Nazwa widżetu przypisanego do aplikacji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8640">**name** Application assigned widget name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8641">**element nadrzędny** Element widget elementu nadrzędnego lub GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8641">**parent** Parent widget, or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8642">**total_rows** Łączna liczba dostępnych wierszy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8642">**total_rows** Total available rows</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8643">**styl** Flagi stylu widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8643">**style** Widget style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8644">**Identyfikator** widżetu przypisanego do aplikacji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8644">**id** Application assigned widget ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8645">**rozmiar** Prostokąt definiujący początkowy rozmiar widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8645">**size** Rectangle defining initial widget size.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8646">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8646">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8647">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie utworzyła kółko przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8647">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8648">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8648">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8649">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8649">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8650">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontroli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8650">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8651">Utworzono element widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8651">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8652">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8652">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8653">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8653">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8654">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8654">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8655">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8655">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic create function during custom widget createl. */

UINT custom_scroll_wheel_create(CUSTOM_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
                    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
                    GX_WIDGET *parent,
                    INT total_rows, ULONG style,
                    USHORT id,
                    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
{
    /* create base widget as part of custom create */
    status = gx_scroll_wheel_create(wheel, name, parent,
                            total_rows, style, id, size);

    /* If status is GX_SUCCESS the base scroll wheel has been created. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8675">gx_scroll_wheel_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8675">gx_scroll_wheel_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8676">Funkcja przetwarzania zdarzeń dla ogólnego widgetu kółka przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8676">Event processing function for generic scroll wheel widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8677">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8677">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_event_process(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8678">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8678">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8679">Ta usługa udostępnia podstawową obsługę zdarzeń wejściowych dla wszystkich typów widżetów z kółkiem przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8679">This service provides the basic input event handling for all scroll wheel widget types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8680">Ta funkcja jest udostępniona oprogramowaniu aplikacji, aby pomóc w aplikacjach, które wymagają utworzenia niestandardowego typu widgetu kółka przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8680">This function is exposed to the application software to assist with applications which need to create a custom scroll wheel widget type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8681">Aplikacje często zapewniają własną funkcję przetwarzania zdarzeń, ale wywołują ogólne przetwarzanie zdarzeń dla widżetów dla zdarzeń, które nie muszą być dostosowywane.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8681">Applications would often provide their own event processing function, but invoke the generic event processing for wheel widgets for events that they do not need to customize.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8682">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8682">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8683">**koło** Wskaźnik do ogólnego bloku kontrolki pokrętła przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8683">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8684">**zdarzenie** GX_EVENT wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8684">**event** GX_EVENT pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8685">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8685">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8686">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie przewiń proces zdarzenia kółka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8686">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully scroll wheel event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8687">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8687">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8688">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8688">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8689">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8689">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8690">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8690">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8691">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8691">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8692">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8692">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic scroll wheel event processing 
    as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_scroll_wheel_event_process(CUSTOM_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
                    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* pass all other events to the generic scroll wheel
            event processing */
        gx_scroll_wheel_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8712">gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8712">gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8713">Przypisz gradient wartości alfa dla opcjonalnego gradientu nakładki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8713">Assign gradient alpha values for optional overlay gradient</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8714">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8714">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_UBYTE start_alpha,
    GX_UBYTE end_alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8715">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8715">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8716">Ta usługa definiuje początkową i końcową wartość alfa dla opcjonalnej nakładki gradientu widżetu przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8716">This service defines the starting and ending alpha values for an optional gradient overlay of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8717">Wszystkie widżety z kółkiem przewijania obsługują efekt "zanikania" wierszy kółka przewijania jako wierszy w górnej i dolnej krawędzi widżetu przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8717">All scroll wheel widgets support a “fade” effect of the scroll wheel rows as the rows near the top and bottom edge of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8718">Ten efekt zaniku jest realizowany przez rysowanie Pixelmap gradientu nad wierszami kółka przewijania, co sprawia, że wiersze pojawiają się w taki sposób, że wiersze są rysowane blisko góry i u dołu widżetu przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8718">This fade effect is accomplished by drawing a gradient pixelmap over the scroll wheel rows, which make the rows appear to fade out as the rows are drawn near the top and bottom of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8719">Ta usługa interfejsu API pozwala aplikacji modyfikować intensywność efektu zanikania lub wyłączyć ten efekt całkowicie poprzez ustawienie wartości początkowych i końcowych alfa na 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8719">This API service allows the application to modify the fading effect intensity, or disable this effect entirely by setting the start and end alpha values to 0.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8720">Pixelmap gradientu jest tworzony w czasie wykonywania, gdy koło przewijania początkowo staną się widoczne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8720">The gradient pixelmap is created at runtime when the scroll wheel initially becomes visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8721">Wymaga to, aby usługa alokacji pamięci środowiska uruchomieniowego została zdefiniowana przy użyciu _gx_system_memory_allocator_set ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8721">This requires that a runtime memory allocation service has been defined using _gx_system_memory_allocator_set().</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8722">Jeśli funkcja alokatora pamięci nie została zdefiniowana, obraz gradientu nie zostanie utworzony i nie będzie dostępny żaden efekt zanikania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8722">If no memory allocator function has been defined, the gradient image will not be created and no fade effect will be available.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8723">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8723">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8724">**koło** Wskaźnik do ogólnego bloku kontrolki pokrętła przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8724">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8725">**start_alpha** Początkowa wartość alfa gradientu nakładki.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8725">**start_alpha** The overlay gradient starting alpha value.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8726">**end_alpha** Wartość alfa końcowego gradientu nakładek.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8726">**end_alpha** The overlay gradient ending alpha value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8727">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8727">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8728">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił gradient dla kółka przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8728">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the scroll wheel gradient alpha</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8729">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8729">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8730">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8730">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8731">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8731">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8732">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8732">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8733">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8733">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8734">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8734">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set(&wheel, 240, 0);
/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the wheel gradient alpha values were
Successfully assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8754">gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8754">gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8755">Przypisz wysokość wiersza dla każdego wiersza kółka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8755">Assign the row height for each wheel row</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8756">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8756">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_VALUE row_height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8757">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8757">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8758">Ta usługa przypisuje wysokość wiersza dla każdego wiersza kółka przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8758">This service assigns the row height for each row of the scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8759">Należy pamiętać, że jeśli kółko przewijania ma GX_STYLE_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL_ROUND stylu, Wysokość wiersza przechodzi przez transformację, która efektywnie zmniejsza wysokość wiersza jako wiersz blisko górnej lub dolnej krawędzi pokrętła.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8759">Note that if the scroll wheel has style GX_STYLE_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL_ROUND, the row height passes through a transform which effectively reduces the row height as the row nears the top or bottom edge of the wheel.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8760">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8760">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8761">**koło** Wskaźnik do ogólnego bloku kontrolki pokrętła przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8761">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8762">**row_height** Wartość wysokości wiersza w pikselach.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8762">**row_height** Row height value, in pixels.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8763">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8763">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8764">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił wysokość kółka przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8764">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set scroll wheel height</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8765">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8765">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8766">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8766">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8767">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8767">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8768">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8768">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8769">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8769">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8770">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8770">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set(&wheel, 40);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the wheel row height has been set to 40
pixels. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8790">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8790">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8791">Przypisz obraz tła dla zaznaczonego wiersza kółka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8791">Assign background image for wheel selected row</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8792">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8792">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL*wheel, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID image_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8793">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8793">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8794">Ta usługa przypisuje opcjonalny identyfikator Pixelmap, który jest rysowany za zaznaczonym wierszem kółka przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8794">This service assigns an optional pixelmap ID that is drawn behind the selected row of the scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8795">Można go użyć do wyróżnienia zaznaczonego wiersza, aby użytkownik mógł łatwo odróżnić wiersz kółka przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8795">This can be used to highlight the selected row so that the user can easily distinguish which row of the scroll wheel is selected.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8796">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8796">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8797">**koło** Wskaźnik do ogólnego bloku kontrolki pokrętła przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8797">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8798">**image_id** Identyfikator Pixelmap, który ma być używany jako obraz tła zaznaczonego wiersza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8798">**image_id** Pixelmap ID to use as the selected row background image.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8799">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8799">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8800">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił tło kółka przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8800">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set scroll wheel background</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8801">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8801">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8802">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8802">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8803">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8803">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8804">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8804">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8805">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8805">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8806">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8806">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set(&wheel,
GX_PIXELMAP_ID_SELECTED_ROW);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the background image has been
assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8826">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8826">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8827">Pobierz aktualnie wybrany wiersz koła</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8827">Retrieve the currently selected wheel row</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8828">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8828">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT *row);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8829">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8829">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8830">Ta usługa będzie wysyłać zapytania do pokrętła przewijania w celu pobrania aktualnie zaznaczonego wiersza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8830">This service will query the scroll wheel to retrieve the currently selected row.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8831">Obiekt wywołujący musi przekazać lokalizację, aby przywrócić wybrany indeks wiersza jako drugi parametr tej funkcji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8831">The caller must pass the location to return the selected row index as the second parameter to this function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8832">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8832">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8833">**koło** Wskaźnik do ogólnego bloku kontrolki pokrętła przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8833">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8834">**wiersz** Lokalizacja, w której zostanie zwrócona wartość wybranego wiersza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8834">**row** Location in which selected row value will be returned.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8835">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8835">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8836">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie pobrał wybrany wiersz kółka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8836">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved selected wheel row</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8837">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8837">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8838">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8838">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8839">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x19) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8839">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x19) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8840">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8840">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8841">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8841">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8842">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8842">Example</span></span>

```C
INT row;
status = gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get(&wheel, &row);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the selected row has been returned in
the row variable. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_selected_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8862">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8862">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8863">Przypisz wybrany wiersz kółka przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8863">Assign selected scroll wheel row</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8864">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8864">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_selected_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT row);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8865">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8865">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8866">Ta usługa przypisuje aktualnie zaznaczony wiersz kółka przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8866">This service assigns the currently selected scroll wheel row.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8867">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8867">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8868">**koło** Wskaźnik do ogólnego bloku kontrolki pokrętła przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8868">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8869">**wiersz** Wiersz pokrętła przewijania, który ma zostać wybrany.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8869">**row** Row of the scroll wheel to be selected.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8870">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8870">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8871">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił wybrany wiersz kółka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8871">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the selected wheel row</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8872">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8872">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8873">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8873">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8874">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8874">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8875">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8875">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8876">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8876">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8877">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8877">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_selected_set(&wheel, 20);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the scroll wheel has been set to select
row 20 */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8897">gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8897">gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8898">Przypisz szybkość przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8898">Assign scrolling speed</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8899">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8899">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_FIXED_VAL start_speed_rate,
    GX_FIXED_VAL end_speed_rate,
    GX_VALUE max_steps,
    GX_VALUE delay);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8900">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8900">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8901">Ta usługa przypisuje szybkość przewijania dla widgetu kółka przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8901">This service assigns the scrolling speed for the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8902">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8902">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8903">**koło** Wskaźnik do ogólnego bloku kontrolki pokrętła przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8903">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8904">**start_speed_rate** Szybkość uruchamiania przewijania, aby szybko przełączać szybkość.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8904">**start_speed_rate** The rate of scrolling start speed to flick speed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8905">**end_speed_rate** Szybkość kończenia przewijania do szybkości szybkiego przesuwania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8905">**end_speed_rate** The rate of scrolling end speed to flick speed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8906">**max_steps** Maksymalna liczba kroków do przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8906">**max_steps** Max steps for scrolling.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8907">**opóźnienie** Czas opóźnienia każdego kroku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8907">**delay** Delay time of each step.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8908">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8908">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8909">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił szybkość kółka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8909">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set wheel speed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8910">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8910">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8911">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8911">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8912">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8912">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8913">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) Nieprawidłowa wartość</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8913">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8914">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8914">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8915">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8915">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8916">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8916">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set(&wheel, GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(2),
                                GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2, 10, 2);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the scroll wheel speed has been
successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8936">gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8936">gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8937">Przypisz wszystkie dostępne wiersze kółka przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8937">Assign the total scroll wheel rows available</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8938">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8938">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT total_rows);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8939">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8939">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8940">Ta usługa przypisuje liczbę wierszy dostępnych we wskazanym kółku przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8940">This service assigns the number of rows available in the indicated scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8941">Widżet z kółkiem przewijania zazwyczaj otrzymuje zawartość wiersza z aplikacji w postaci tablicy ciągów lub danych ciągu dostarczonych przez użytkownika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8941">The scroll wheel widget usually receives the row content from the application in the form of an array of strings or user supplied string data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8942">Ten interfejs API informuje kółko przewijania o łącznej liczbie wierszy, które powinny być prezentowane użytkownikowi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8942">This API informs the scroll wheel of the total number of rows that should be presented to the user.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8943">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8943">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8944">**koło** Wskaźnik do ogólnego bloku kontrolki pokrętła przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8944">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8945">**total_rows** Całkowita liczba wierszy kółka, które mają być widoczne dla użytkownika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8945">**total_rows** Total number of wheel rows to present to the user.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8946">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8946">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8947">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił wiersz sumy kółka przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8947">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set scroll wheel total row</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8948">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8948">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8949">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8949">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8950">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8950">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8951">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) Nieprawidłowa wartość</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8951">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8952">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8952">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8953">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8953">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8954">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8954">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set(&wheel, 100);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the scroll wheel has been changed to
display 100 total rows */
```

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8973">gx_scrollbar_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8973">gx_scrollbar_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8974">Rysuj pasek przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8974">Draw scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8975">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8975">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_scrollbar_draw(GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8976">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8976">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8977">Ta usługa rysuje pasek przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8977">This service draws a scrollbar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8978">Wspólna funkcja rysowania jest używana zarówno jako pionowe, jak i poziome widżety ScrollBar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8978">A common drawing function is used for both vertical and horizontal scrollbar widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8979">Ta usługa jest wywoływana wewnętrznie przez odświeżanie kanwy GUIX, ale może być również wywoływana przez zastąpione funkcje rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8979">This service is called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh, but can also be called by overridden drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8980">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8980">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8981">**pasek przewijania** Widżet ScrollBar do rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8981">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget to draw</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8982">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8982">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8983">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8983">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8984">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8984">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8985">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8985">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8986">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8986">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom scrollbar drawing function. */

VOID my_scrollbar_draw(GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar)
{
    /* Call default scrollbar draw. */
    gx_scrollbar_draw(thumb);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8993">gx_scrollbar_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8993">gx_scrollbar_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8994">Zdarzenie ScrollBar procesu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8994">Process scrollbar event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8995">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8995">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scrollbar_event_process(
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8996">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8996">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-8997">Ta usługa przetwarza zdarzenie ScrollBar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8997">This service processes a scrollbar event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-8998">Wspólna funkcja obsługi zdarzeń używana zarówno dla pionowych, jak i poziomych elementów widget ScrollBar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8998">A common event handling function used for both vertical and horizontal scrollbar widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-8999">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-8999">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9000">**pasek przewijania** Blok kontrolny widżetu ScrollBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9000">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9001">**zdarzenie** Wskaźnik do zdarzenia do przetworzenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9001">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9002">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9002">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9003">Pomyślny proces zdarzenia ScrollBar **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9003">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scrollbar event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9004">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9004">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9005">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9005">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9006">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9006">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9007">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9007">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9008">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9008">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9009">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9009">Example</span></span>

```C
Call generic scrollbar event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_scrollbar_event_process(GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
                                    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* pass all other events to the generic scrollbar
            event processing */
        gx_scrollbar_event_process(scrollbar, event);
        break;
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_limit_check"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9016">gx_scrollbar_limit_check</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9016">gx_scrollbar_limit_check</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9017">Sprawdź limit ScrollBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9017">Check scrollbar limit</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9018">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9018">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scrollbar_limit_check(GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9019">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9019">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9020">Ta usługa sprawdza limit ScrollBar i zapobiega występowaniu pokrętła ScrollBar poza wstępnie zdefiniowanymi limitami.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9020">This service checks the limit of the scrollbar and prevents the scrollbar thumbwheel from traveling beyond the predefined limits.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9021">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9021">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9022">**pasek przewijania** Blok kontrolny widżetu ScrollBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9022">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9023">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9023">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9024">Sprawdzanie limitu liczby pokazywanych pomyślnych **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9024">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scrollbar limit check</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9025">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9025">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9026">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9026">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9027">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9027">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9028">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9028">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9029">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9029">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9030">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9030">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Check scrollbar limit of “my_scrollbar”. */
```

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_reset"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9037">gx_scrollbar_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9037">gx_scrollbar_reset</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9038">Resetuj pasek przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9038">Reset scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9039">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9039">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scrollbar_reset(
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    GX_SCROLL_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9040">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9040">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9041">Ta usługa resetuje pasek przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9041">This service resets the scrollbar.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9042">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9042">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9043">**pasek przewijania** Blok kontrolny widżetu ScrollBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9043">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9044">**informacje** Wskaźnik do GX_SCROLL_INFO struktury, który definiuje limity ScrollBar, bieżącą wartość i krok lub przyrost.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9044">**info** Pointer to GX_SCROLL_INFO structure that defines the scrollbar limits, current value, and step or increment.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9045">**Dodatek I** zawiera definicję do GX_SCROLL_INFO struktury.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9045">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SCROLL_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9046">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9046">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9047">Resetowanie paska przewijania **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9047">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scrollbar reset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9048">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9048">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9049">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9049">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9050">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9050">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9051">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) — informacje o przewijaniu są nieprawidłowe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9051">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Scroll info not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9052">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9052">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9053">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9053">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9054">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9054">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Reset scrollbar “my_scrollbar”. */

GX_SCROLL_INFO my_info;

my_info.gx_scroll_value = 0;
my_info.gx_scroll_minimum = 0;
my_info.gx_scroll_maximum = 100;
my_info.gx_scroll_visible = 10;
my_info.gx_scroll_increment = 1;

status = gx_scrollbar_reset(&my_scrollbar, &my_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scrollbar “my_scrollbar” has been reset. */
```

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_value_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9061">gx_scrollbar_value_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9061">gx_scrollbar_value_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9062">Przypisz wartość paska przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9062">Assign scrollbar value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9063">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9063">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scrollbar_value_set(
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    INT value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9064">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9064">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9065">Ta usługa przypisuje bieżącą wartość paska przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9065">This service assigns the current scrollbar value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9066">W oknie nadrzędnym zostanie wygenerowane zdarzenie GX_EVENT_VERTICAL_SCROLL lub GX_EVENT_HORIZONTAL_SCROLL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9066">A GX_EVENT_VERTICAL_SCROLL or GX_EVENT_HORIZONTAL_SCROLL event will be generated to the parent window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9067">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9067">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9068">**pasek przewijania** Blok kontrolny widżetu ScrollBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9068">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9069">**wartość** Nowa wartość paska przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9069">**value** New scrollbar value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9070">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9070">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9071">Pomyślny proces zdarzenia ScrollBar **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9071">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scrollbar event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9072">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9072">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9073">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9073">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9074">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9074">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9075">Wartość przewijania **GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) jest nieprawidłowa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9075">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Scroll value is not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9076">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9076">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9077">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9077">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9078">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9078">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Assign new value for scrollbar “my_scrollbar”. */

status = gx_scrollbar_value_set(&my_scrollbar, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the current position of scrollbar “my_scrollbar” has been set. */

```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_backspace"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9085">gx_single_line_text_input_backspace</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9085">gx_single_line_text_input_backspace</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_backspace(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9096">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9096">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9097">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9097">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9098">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9098">Allowed From</span></span>


## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9158">gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9158">gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_get</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9160">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9160">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_buffer_get(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CHAR **buffer_address, 
    UINT *content_size, 
    UINT *buffer_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9161">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9161">Description</span></span>

```C

UINT buffer_size;
UINT content_size;

/* Retrieve buffer information of “my_text_input” widget. */

                    &buffer_address, &string_size, &buffer_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of buffer_address, string_size and buffer_size has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9234">gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9234">gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9235">Wstaw ciąg znaków w bieżącym położeniu kursora</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9235">Insert a character string at current cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9236">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9236">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_UBYTE *insert_str,
    UINT insert_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9237">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9237">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9238">Ta usługa wstawia ciąg znaków do buforu ciągu wejściowego tekstu w bieżącym położeniu kursora.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9238">This service inserts a character string into the text input string buffer at the current cursor position.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9239">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9239">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9240">**text_input** Blok kontrolny widżetu tekst jednowierszowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9240">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9241">**insert_str** Ciąg znaków, który ma zostać wstawiony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9241">**insert_str** Character string to be inserted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9242">**insert_size** Liczba bajtów do wstawienia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9242">**insert_size** Byte count to be inserted</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9243">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9243">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9244">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie wstawiono znak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9244">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully inserted the character</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9245">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9245">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9246">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9246">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9247">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9247">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9248">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9248">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9249">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9249">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9250">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9250">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Insert characters at current cursor position. */

GX_CHAR insert_text[10] = “insert”;
status = gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert(&my_text_input,
                                            insert_text,
                                            GX_STRLEN(insert_text));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input widget has successfully insert the string. */
```
