## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9272">gx_single_line_text_input_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9272">gx_single_line_text_input_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9273">Tworzenie widżetu wprowadzania tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9273">Create a text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9274">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9274">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_create(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_CHAR *input_buffer, UINT buffer_size,
    UINT style, USHORT text_input_id, GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9275">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9275">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9276">Ta usługa tworzy widżet wprowadzania tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9276">This service creates a text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9277">Obiekt wywołujący musi dostarczyć magazyn dla ciągu wejściowego i wskazać maksymalną długość ciągu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9277">The caller must provide storage for the input string and indicate the maximum length of the string.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9278">GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT pochodzi od GX_PROMPT i w związku z tym wszystkie usługi gx_prompt mogą być używane z GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT widżetów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9278">GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT is derived from GX_PROMPT and therefore all gx_prompt services may be used with GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9279">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9279">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9280">**text_input** Blok kontrolny widżetu tekst jednowierszowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9280">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9281">**Nazwa** Opcjonalna nazwa logiczna widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9281">**name** Optional widget logical name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9282">**element nadrzędny** Opcjonalny widżet nadrzędny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9282">**parent** Optional parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9283">**input_buffer** Magazyn dla ciągu wejściowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9283">**input_buffer** Storage for input string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9284">**buffer_size** Rozmiar obszaru przechowywania ciągów wejściowych w bajtach.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9284">**buffer_size** Size of input string storage area, in bytes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9285">**styl** Flagi stylu wprowadzania tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9285">**style** Text input style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9286">**text_input_id** Opcjonalny identyfikator widżetu danych wejściowych</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9286">**text_input_id** Optional ID of the input widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9287">**rozmiar** Prostokąt definiujący początkowy rozmiar widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9287">**size** Rectangle defining initial widget size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9288">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9288">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9289">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne Tworzenie tekstu jednowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9289">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single-line text input create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9290">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9290">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9291">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9291">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9292">Element widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) został już utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9292">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9293">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontrolki widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9293">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9294">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9294">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9295">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9295">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9296">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9296">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9297">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9297">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT my_text_input;
static GX_CHAR           text_input_buffer[100];
GX_RECTANGLE             size;

/* Define widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 10, 10, 110, 40);

/* Create single-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_create(&my_text_input,
                        “text_input”, GX_NULL, text_input_buffer, 100,
                        GX_STYLE_ENABLED, 0, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text input widget has been created. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9321">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9321">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_single_line_text_input_draw(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9322">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9322">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9323">Ta usługa rysuje widżet wprowadzania tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9323">This service draws a text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9324">Ta usługa jest zwykle wywoływana wewnętrznie podczas odświeżania kanwy, ale może być również wywoływana z funkcji niestandardowego rysowania tekstu wejściowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9324">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom text input drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9325">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9325">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9327">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9327">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9328">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9328">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9329">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9329">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9330">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9330">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9331">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9331">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom single line text input draw function. */

VOID my_sl_text_input_draw(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input)
{
    /* Call default single line text input draw. */
    gx_single_line_text_input_draw(input);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9353">gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9353">gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9354">Pobierz pozycję początkową rysowania tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9354">Retrieve text draw start position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9355">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9355">Prototype</span></span>

```C
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_VALUE *xpos, GX_VALUE *ypos);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9356">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9356">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9357">Ta usługa Pobiera pozycję początku tekstu wejściowego tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9357">This service retrieves the draw start position of text input text.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9358">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9358">Parameters</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom single line text input draw function. */

VOID my_sl_text_input_draw(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input)
{
GX_VALUE xpos;
GX_VALUE ypos;

    /* Draw background. */
    gx_widget_border_draw(input, border_color, upper_fill_color,
                          lower_fill_color, GX_TRUE);

    /* Retrieve text draw start position. */
    gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get(input, xpos,
                                                ypos);

    /* Add your text drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_end"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9389">gx_single_line_text_input_end</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9389">gx_single_line_text_input_end</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_end(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9392">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9392">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9393">Ta usługa umieszcza kursor widżetu wprowadzanie tekstu na końcu ciągu wejściowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9393">This service positions the text input widget cursor at the end of the input string.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9394">Ta usługa jest wywoływana wewnętrznie po odebraniu zdarzenia dotyczącego klucza zakończenia, ale może być również wywoływana przez aplikację.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9394">This service is called internally when an end key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9397">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9397">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9399">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9399">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9400">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9400">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9401">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9401">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9402">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9402">Allowed From</span></span>


## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9426">gx_single_line_text_input_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9426">gx_single_line_text_input_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9427">Funkcja przetwarzania zdarzeń widżetu wprowadzanie tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9427">Text input widget event processing function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9428">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9428">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_event_process(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9429">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9429">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9430">Ta usługa przetwarza zdarzenie wejściowe tekstu jednowierszowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9430">This service processes a single line text input event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9431">Ta funkcja jest wewnętrznie przywoływana przez funkcję gx_single_line_text_input_create, ale jest narażona na użycie przez aplikację w takich przypadkach, w których aplikacja definiuje niestandardową funkcję przetwarzania zdarzeń tekstu jednowierszowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9431">This function is internally referenced by the gx_single_line_text_input_create function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom single line text input event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9432">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9432">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9433">**text_input** Blok kontrolny widżetu tekst jednowierszowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9433">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9434">**event_ptr** Wskaźnik do GX_EVENT struktury</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9434">**event_ptr** Pointer to GX_EVENT structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9435">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9435">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9436">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie przetworzył zdarzenie wprowadzania tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9436">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed text input event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9437">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9437">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9438">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9438">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9439">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9439">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9440">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9440">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9441">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9441">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9442">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9442">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic single line text input event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_sl_text_input_event_process(
                                GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input,
                                GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default single line
            text input event processing */
        status =
        gx_single_line_text_input_event_process(input, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9464">gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9464">gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9465">Ustaw kolor tła tekstu jednowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9465">Set single line text input background color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9466">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9466">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_fill_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9467">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9467">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9468">Ta usługa ustawia kolor wypełnienia tekstu jednowierszowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9468">This service sets the fill color of the single line text input.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9469">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9469">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9470">**text_input** Wskaźnik do bloku kontroli wejścia tekstu jednowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9470">**text_input** Pointer to single line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9471">**normal_fill_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu koloru wypełnienia widżetu w normalnym stanie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9471">**normal_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color in normal state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9472">**Dodatek A** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane identyfikatory zasobów koloru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9472">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9473">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodać identyfikatory zasobów koloru niestandardowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9473">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9474">**selected_fill_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu koloru wypełnienia widżetu, gdy element widget uzyskuje fokus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9474">**selected_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9475">**Dodatek A** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane identyfikatory zasobów koloru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9475">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9476">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodać identyfikatory zasobów koloru niestandardowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9476">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9477">**disabled_fill_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu koloru wypełnienia widżetu, gdy styl GX_STYLE_ENABLED nie jest ustawiony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9477">**disabled_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9478">**Dodatek A** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane identyfikatory zasobów koloru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9478">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9479">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodać identyfikatory zasobów koloru niestandardowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9479">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9480">**readonly_fill_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu koloru wypełnienia widżetu po ustawieniu obu stylów GX_STYLE_ENABLED i GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READYONLY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9480">**readonly_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color when both style GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READYONLY are set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9481">**Dodatek A** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane identyfikatory zasobów koloru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9481">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9482">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodać identyfikatory zasobów koloru niestandardowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9482">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9483">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9483">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9484">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie ustawiono kolor wypełnienia tekstu jednowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9484">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single line text input fill color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9485">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9485">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9486">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9486">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9487">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9487">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9488">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9488">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9489">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9489">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9490">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9490">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set fill colors for single line text input “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set(&my_text_input,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_FILL);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the fill color of “my_text_input” was
set. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_home"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9512">gx_single_line_text_input_home</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9512">gx_single_line_text_input_home</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9513">Przenieś kursor wprowadzania tekstu do pozycji głównej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9513">Move the text input cursor to the home position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9514">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9514">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_home(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9515">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9515">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9516">Ta usługa przenosi położenie kursora wprowadzania tekstu do początku ciągu wejściowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9516">This service moves the text input cursor position to the start of the input string.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9517">Ta usługa jest wywoływana wewnętrznie po odebraniu zdarzenia dotyczącego klucza głównego, ale może być również wywoływana przez aplikację.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9517">This service is called internally when a home key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9518">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9518">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9519">**text_input** Blok kontrolny widżetu tekst jednowierszowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9519">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9520">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9520">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9521">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie przeniesiono kursor do pozycji głównej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9521">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to the home position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9522">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9522">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9523">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9523">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9524">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9524">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9525">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9525">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9526">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9526">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9527">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9527">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move cursor to the start of the input text. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_home(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the cursor has been moved to the home position */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_left_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9549">gx_single_line_text_input_left_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9549">gx_single_line_text_input_left_arrow</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9550">Przenieś kursor wejściowy o jeden znak w lewo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9550">Move input cursor one character to the left</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9551">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9551">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_left_arrow(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

```C
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    INT pixel_position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9589">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9589">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9590">Ta usługa umieszcza kursor wprowadzania tekstu na podstawie żądanego położenia pikseli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9590">This service positions the text input cursor based on the requested pixel position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9591">Indeks kursora wprowadzania tekstu będzie obliczany na podstawie wartości x położenia pikseli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9591">The text input cursor index will be calculated based on the x value of the pixel position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9592">Ta usługa jest wywoływana wewnętrznie po odebraniu zdarzenia pióra, ale może być również wywoływana przez aplikację.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9592">This service is called internally when a pen down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9593">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9593">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9595">**pixel_position** Wartość X położenia pikseli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9595">**pixel_position** X value of pixel position</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9597">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił kursor na żądaną pozycję</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9597">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the cursor to requested position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9598">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9598">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9599">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9599">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9600">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0X12) nieprawidłowy widżet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9600">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9769">gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9769">gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9770">Ustaw kolor tekstu tekstu jednowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9770">Set single line text input text color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9771">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9771">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_text_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9772">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9772">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9773">Ta usługa ustawia kolor tekstu jednowierszowego tekstu wejściowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9773">This service sets the text color of the single line text input.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9774">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9774">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9775">**text_input** Wskaźnik do bloku kontroli wejścia tekstu jednowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9775">**text_input** Pointer to single line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9776">**normal_text_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu koloru tekstu w normalnym stanie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9776">**normal_text_color_id** Resource ID of the text color in normal state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9777">**Dodatek A** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane identyfikatory zasobów koloru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9777">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9778">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodać identyfikatory zasobów koloru niestandardowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9778">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9779">**selected_text_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu koloru tekstu, gdy element widget uzyskuje fokus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9779">**selected_text_color_id** Resource ID of the text color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9780">**Dodatek A** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane identyfikatory zasobów koloru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9780">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9781">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodać identyfikatory zasobów koloru niestandardowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9781">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9782">**disabled_text_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu koloru tekstu, gdy GX_STYLE_ENABLED stylu nie jest ustawiony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9782">**disabled_text_color_id** Resource ID of the text color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9783">**Dodatek A** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane identyfikatory zasobów koloru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9783">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9784">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodać identyfikatory zasobów koloru niestandardowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9784">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9785">**readonly_text_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu tekstu, gdy ustawiono oba style GX_STYLE_ENABLED i GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READONLY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9785">**readonly_text_color_id** Resource ID of the text color when both style GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READONLY are set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9786">**Dodatek A** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane identyfikatory zasobów koloru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9786">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9787">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodać identyfikatory zasobów koloru niestandardowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9787">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9788">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9788">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9789">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie ustawiono kolor tekstu jednowierszowego wejścia tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9789">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single line text input text color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9790">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9790">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9791">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9791">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9792">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9792">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9793">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9793">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9794">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9794">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9795">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9795">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for single line text input “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set(&my_text_input,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text color “my_text_input” was set. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_text_select"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9817">gx_single_line_text_input_text_select</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9817">gx_single_line_text_input_text_select</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9818">Zaznacz tekst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9818">Select text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9819">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9819">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    UINT start_index, UINT end_index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9820">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9820">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9821">Ta usługa zaznacza tekst z określonym znacznikiem początkowym i indeksem znacznika końcowego oraz podświetla zaznaczony tekst z wybranymi kolorami wypełnienia i tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9821">This service selects text with specified start mark and end mark index and highlights the selected text with the selected fill and text colors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9822">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9822">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9823">**text_input** Wskaźnik do bloku kontroli wejścia tekstu jednowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9823">**text_input** Pointer to single line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9824">**start_index** Indeks pierwszego zaznaczonego znaku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9824">**start_index** Index of the first selected character</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9825">**end_index** Indeks ostatniego zaznaczonego znaku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9825">**end_index** Index of the last selected character</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9826">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9826">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9827">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne Zaznaczanie tekstu tekstu jednowierszowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9827">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single line text input text selection</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9828">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9828">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9829">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9829">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9830">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9830">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9831">Wartość indeksu **GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) jest nieprawidłowa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9831">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Index value not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9832">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9832">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9833">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9833">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9834">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9834">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Select text between index [0, 9]. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_text_select(&my_text_input,
                                                0,9);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text between index [0, 9] “my_text_input” was selected. */
```


## <a name="gx_slider_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9912">gx_slider_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9912">gx_slider_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9913">Utwórz suwak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9913">Create slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9914">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9914">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_create(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, INT tick_count,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *slider_info,
    ULONG style, USHORT slider_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9915">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9915">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9916">Ta usługa tworzy widżet suwaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9916">This service creates a slider widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9917">GX_SLIDER pochodzi od GX_WIDGET i w związku z tym wszystkie gx_widget usługi API mogą być używane z GX_SLIDER widżetami typu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9917">GX_SLIDER is derived from GX_WIDGET, and therefore all gx_widget API services may be used with GX_SLIDER type widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9918">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9918">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9919">**Slider**: blok kontrolny widżetu Slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9919">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9920">**name**: Nazwa suwaka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9920">**name**: Name of slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9921">**element nadrzędny**: wskaźnik do elementu nadrzędnego widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9921">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9922">**tick_count**: liczba znaczników suwaka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9922">**tick_count**: Number of slider ticks</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9923">**slider_info**: wskaźnik do informacji o suwaku, który jest strukturą używaną do przekazywania limitów wartości suwaka, rozmiaru i położenia wskazówki suwaka oraz innych parametrów suwaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9923">**slider_info**: Pointer to slider info which is a structure used to pass the slider value limits, slider needle size and position, and other slider parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9924">**Dodatek I** zawiera definicję do GX_SLIDER_INFO struktury.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9924">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9925">**styl**: styl suwaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9925">**style**: Style of slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9926">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich elementów widget, a także style charakterystyczne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9926">**Appendix D** contains predefined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9927">**slider_id**: zdefiniowany przez aplikację identyfikator suwaka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9927">**slider_id**: Application-defined ID of slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9928">**rozmiar**: Wymiary suwaka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9928">**size**: Dimensions of slider</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9929">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9929">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9930">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) — Tworzenie suwaka pomyślne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9930">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9931">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9931">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9932">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9932">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9933">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) — element widget został już utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9933">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9934">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0X19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontrolki widgetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9934">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9935">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) element widget elementu nadrzędnego jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9935">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9936">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9936">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9937">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9937">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9938">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9938">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create slider “my_slider”. */

GX_SLIDER my_slider;
GX_SLIDER_INFO info;

info.gx_slider_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_slider_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_slider_info_current_val = 50;
info.gx_slider_info_increment = 1;
info.gx_slider_info_min_travel = 20;
info.gx_slider_info_max_travel = 20;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_width = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_height = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_inset = 5;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_hotspot_offset = 5;

status = gx_slider_create(&my_slider, “my_slider”,
    &my_parent, 10, info, GX_STYLE_ENABLED, ID_MY_SLIDER, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the slider “my_slider” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_slider_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9953">gx_slider_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9953">gx_slider_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9954">Suwak rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9954">Draw slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9955">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9955">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_slider_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9956">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9956">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9957">Ta usługa rysuje suwak.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9957">This service draws a slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9958">Ta usługa jest używana wewnętrznie przez funkcję gx_slider_create, ale jest również narażona na użycie przez aplikację w tych wystąpieniach, gdy zdefiniowana jest funkcja rysowania suwaków niestandardowych.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9958">This service is used internally by the gx_slider_create function, but is also exposed for use by the application in those instances when a custom slider drawing function is defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9959">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9959">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9960">**Slider**: blok kontrolny widżetu Slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9960">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9961">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9961">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9962">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9962">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9963">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9963">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9964">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9964">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9965">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9965">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom slider draw function. */
VOID my_slider_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider)
{
    /* Call default slider draw. */
    gx_slider_draw(slider);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_slider_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9980">gx_slider_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9980">gx_slider_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9981">Zdarzenie suwaka procesu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9981">Process slider event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9982">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9982">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_event_process(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9983">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9983">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9984">Ta usługa przetwarza zdarzenie suwaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9984">This service processes a slider event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9985">Ta funkcja jest wewnętrznie przywoływana przez funkcję gx_slider_create, ale jest udostępniona do użycia przez aplikację w takich przypadkach, gdy aplikacja definiuje niestandardową funkcję przetwarzania zdarzeń suwaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9985">This function is internally referenced by the gx_slider_create function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom slider event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9986">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9986">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9987">**Slider**: blok kontrolny widżetu Slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9987">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9988">**zdarzenie**: wskaźnik do zdarzenia do przetworzenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9988">**event**: Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9989">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9989">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9990">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) proces zdarzenia suwaka zakończony pomyślnie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9990">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9991">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9991">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9992">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9992">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-9993">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) nieprawidłowy element widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9993">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9994">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9994">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-9995">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9995">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-9996">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-9996">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic slider event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_slider_event_process(GX_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;
        default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default slider event processing */
            status = gx_slider_event_process(slider, event);
            break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_slider_info_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10011">gx_slider_info_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10011">gx_slider_info_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10012">Ustaw blok informacji o suwaku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10012">Set slider information block</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10013">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10013">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_info_set(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10014">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10014">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10015">Ta usługa przypisuje wybrane informacje o suwaku, takie jak minimum suwaka, maksimum suwaka i bieżąca wartość suwaka do wskazanego suwaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10015">This service assigns the specified slider information such as slider minimum, slider maximum, and slider current value to the indicated slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10016">Suwak zaktualizuje pozycję wskazówki i ponownie narysuje na podstawie nowych informacji o suwaku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10016">The slider will update the needle position and redraw based on the new slider information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10017">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10017">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10018">**Slider**: blok kontrolny widżetu Slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10018">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10019">**info**: wskaźnik do struktury informacji o suwaku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10019">**info**: Pointer to the slider information structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10020">**Dodatek I** zawiera definicję do GX_SLIDER_INFO struktury.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10020">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10021">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10021">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10022">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił informacje o suwaku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10022">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set slider information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10023">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10023">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10024">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10024">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10025">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) nieprawidłowy element widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10025">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10026">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10026">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10027">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10027">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10028">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10028">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SLIDER_INFO my_slider_info;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_min_val = 0;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_max_val = 100;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_current_val = 50;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_increment = 1;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_min_travel = 20;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_max_travel = 20;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_width = 10;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_height = 10;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_inset = 5;

my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_hotspot_offset = 5;

/* Set slider information for slider “my_slider”. */
status = gx_slider_info_set (&my_slider, &my_slider_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “my_slider” is configured with my_slider_info. */
```

## <a name="gx_slider_needle_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10043">gx_slider_needle_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10043">gx_slider_needle_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10044">Rysuj wskazówkę suwaka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10044">Draw slider needle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10045">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10045">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_slider_needle_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10046">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10046">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10047">Ta usługa rysuje wskazówkę suwaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10047">This service draws a slider needle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10048">Ta usługa jest automatycznie wywoływana przez funkcję gx_slider_draw, ale może być również wywoływana przez aplikację jako część niestandardowej funkcji rysowania suwaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10048">This service is automatically called by the gx_slider_draw function, but may also be invoked by the application as part of a customized slider drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10049">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10049">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10050">**Slider**: blok kontrolny widżetu Slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10050">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10051">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10051">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10052">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10052">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10053">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10053">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10054">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10054">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10055">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10055">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom slider draw function. */
VOID my_slider_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider)
{
    /* Add your own background draw here. */

    /* Call default tickmarks draw. */
    gx_slider_tickmarks_draw(slider);

    /* Call default slider needle draw. */
    gx_slider_needle_draw(slider);
}
```

## <a name="gx_slider_needle_position_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10070">gx_slider_needle_position_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10070">gx_slider_needle_position_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10071">Pobierz położenie wskazówki dla suwaka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10071">Get slider needle position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10072">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10072">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_needle_position_get(
    GX_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *slider_info,
    GX_RECTANGLE *return_position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10073">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10073">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10074">Ta usługa oblicza pozycję wskazówki suwaka na podstawie bieżącej wartości suwaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10074">This service computes the slider needle position based on the current slider value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10075">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10075">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10076">**Slider**: blok kontrolny widżetu Slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10076">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10077">**slider_info**: wskaźnik do struktury informacji o suwaku definiujący limity suwaków, rozmiar wskazówki i przesunięcie oraz inne parametry suwaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10077">**slider_info**: Pointer to slider information structure defining the slider limits, needle size and offset, and other slider parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10078">**Dodatek I** zawiera definicję do GX_SLIDER_INFO struktury.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10078">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10079">**return_position**: wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla pozycji wskazówki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10079">**return_position**: Pointer to destination for needle position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10080">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10080">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10081">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) udany wskaźnik wskazówki dla suwaka Get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10081">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider needle position get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10082">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10082">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10083">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10083">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10084">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) nieprawidłowy element widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10084">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10085">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) nieprawidłowe informacje o suwaku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10085">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Slider info not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10086">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10086">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10087">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10087">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10088">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10088">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE needle_position;

/* Get the needle position for slider “my_slider”. */
status = gx_slider_needle_posistion_get(&my_slider, &slider_info,
    &needle_position);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the needle position for slider “my_slider” has been retrieved. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10105">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10105">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_slider_tickmarks_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10106">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10106">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10107">Ta usługa rysuje suwak znaczniki.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10107">This service draws the slider tickmarks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10108">Ta funkcja jest wywoływana wewnętrznie przez funkcję gx_slider_draw, ale jest udostępniona do użycia przez aplikacje, które mogą implementować funkcję rysowania suwaków niestandardowych.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10108">This function is called internally by the gx_slider_draw function, but is exposed for use by applications that might implement a custom slider drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10109">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10109">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10111">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10111">Return Values</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10114">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10114">Threads</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom slider draw function. */

{
    /* Add your own background draw here. */

    gx_slider_tickmarks_draw(slider);

    /* Call default slider needle draw. */
    gx_slider_needle_draw(slider);
}
```

## <a name="gx_slider_travel_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10130">gx_slider_travel_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10130">gx_slider_travel_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10131">Pobierz drogę suwaka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10131">Get slider travel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10132">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10132">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_travel_get(
    GX_SLIDER *widget,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info,
    INT *return_min_travel, 
    INT *return_max_travel);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10133">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10133">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10134">Ta usługa Pobiera przesunięcie suwaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10134">This service gets the slider travel.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10135">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10135">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10136">**Slider**: blok kontrolny widżetu Slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10136">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10139">**return_min_travel**: wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla minimalnej wartości skoku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10139">**return_min_travel**: Pointer to destination for minimum travel value</span></span></td>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10140">**return_max_travell**: wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla maksymalnej wartości skoku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10140">**return_max_travell**: Pointer to destination for maximum travel value</span></span></td>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10141">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10141">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10142">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Przesuwanie suwaka zakończone powodzeniem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10142">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider travel get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10143">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10143">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10144">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10144">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10145">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) nieprawidłowy element widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10145">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10146">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) nieprawidłowe informacje o suwaku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10146">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Slider info not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10147">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10147">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10148">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10148">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10149">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10149">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get travel information for for slider “my_slider”. */
status = gx_slider_travel_get(&my_slider, &info,
    &my_min_travel, &my_max_travel);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the travel max/min values for slider “my_slider” have been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_slider_value_calculate"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10164">gx_slider_value_calculate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10164">gx_slider_value_calculate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10165">Oblicz wartość suwaka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10165">Calculate slider value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10166">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10166">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_value_calculate(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info,
    INT new_position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10167">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10167">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10168">Ta usługa oblicza wartość suwaka na podstawie pozycji wskazówki suwaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10168">This service calculates the slider value based on the slider needle position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10169">Ta funkcja jest wywoływana wewnętrznie przez GUIX, gdy użytkownik przenosi wskazówkę suwaka, ale może być również wywoływana przez aplikację podczas implementowania niestandardowego widżetu suwaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10169">This function is called internally by GUIX when the user moves the slider needle, but can also be invoked by the application when implementing a custom slider widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10170">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10170">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10171">**Slider**: blok kontrolny widżetu Slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10171">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10172">**info**: wskaźnik do informacji o suwaku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10172">**info**: Pointer to slider info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10173">**Dodatek I** zawiera definicję do GX_LISDER_INFO struktury.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10173">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_LISDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10174">**new_position**: Nowa pozycja suwaka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10174">**new_position**: New slider position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10175">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10175">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10176">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Obliczanie wartości suwaka zakończone powodzeniem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10176">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider value calculate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10177">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10177">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10178">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10178">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10179">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) nieprawidłowy element widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10179">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10180">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) nieprawidłowe informacje o suwaku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10180">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Slider info not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10181">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10181">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10182">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10182">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10183">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10183">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Calculate new value for slider “my_slider”. */
status = gx_slider_value_calculate(&my_slider,
    &my_slider.gx_slider_info, new_slider_position);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the slider value of “my_slider” has been calculated. */

```
