## <a name="gx_system_dirty_mark"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10723">gx_system_dirty_mark</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10723">gx_system_dirty_mark</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10724">Oznacz obszar jako zanieczyszczony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10724">Mark area dirty</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10725">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10725">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_dirty_mark(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10726">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10726">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10727">Ta usługa oznacza obszar tego widżetu jako zanieczyszczony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10727">This service marks the area of this widget as dirty.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10728">To efektywnie ustawia widżet do przerysowania po zakończeniu przetwarzania zdarzeń systemowych.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10728">This effectively queues the widget for redrawing when the system event processing has been completed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10729">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10729">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10730">**widget**: wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki elementu widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10730">**widget**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10731">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10731">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10732">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślnie oznaczył widżet jako zanieczyszczony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10732">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully marked widget dirty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10733">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10733">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10734">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10734">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10735">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) nieprawidłowy element widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10735">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10736">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10736">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10737">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10737">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10738">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10738">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Mark widget “my_widget” as dirty. */
status = gx_system_dirty_mark(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the area associated
   with “my_widget” has been marked as dirty. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_dirty_partial_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10763">gx_system_dirty_partial_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10763">gx_system_dirty_partial_add</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10764">Oznacz obszar częściowy jako zanieczyszczony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10764">Mark partial area dirty</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10765">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10765">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_dirty_partial_add(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RECTANGLE *dirty_area);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10766">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10766">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10767">Ta usługa oznacza częściowy obszar tego widżetu jako zanieczyszczony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10767">This service marks the partial area of this widget as dirty.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10768">Powoduje to Zakolejkowanie widżetu do przerysowania przez operację odświeżania kanwy GUIX po zakończeniu przetwarzania zdarzeń systemowych.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10768">This queues the widget for redrawing by the GUIX canvas refresh operation when the system event processing has been completed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10769">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10769">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10770">**widget**: wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki elementu widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10770">**widget**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10771">**dirty_area**: zanieczyszczony obszar elementu widget do oznaczania zanieczyszczony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10771">**dirty_area**: Dirty area of widget to mark dirty</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10772">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10772">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10773">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślne częściowe zanieczyszczone pole</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10773">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful partial dirty area mark</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10774">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10774">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10775">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10775">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10776">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) nieprawidłowy element widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10776">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10777">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0X19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar obszaru zanieczyszczonego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10777">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid size of dirty area</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10778">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10778">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10779">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10779">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10780">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10780">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Mark widget “my_widget” partial area as dirty. */

status = gx_system_dirty_partial_add(&my_widget,
    &partial_area);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the partial area “partial_area”
associated with “my_widget” has been marked as dirty. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_draw_context_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10805">gx_system_draw_context_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10805">gx_system_draw_context_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10806">Pobierz kontekst rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10806">Get drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10807">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10807">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_draw_context_get(GX_DRAW_CONTEXT **current_context);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10808">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10808">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10809">Ta usługa zwraca wskaźnik do bieżącego kontekstu rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10809">This service returns a pointer to the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10810">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10810">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10811">**current_context**: wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla bieżącego wskaźnika kontekstu rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10811">**current_context**: Pointer to destination for current drawing context pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10812">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10812">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10813">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślne uzyskanie bieżącego kontekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10813">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful current context get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10814">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: 0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10814">**GX_PTR_ERROR**:0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10815">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10815">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10816">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10816">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10817">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10817">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DRAW_CONTEXT *current_context;

/* Get current drawing context. */

status = gx_system_draw_context_get(&current_context);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the current drawing context
   is contained in “current_context”. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_event_fold"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10842">gx_system_event_fold</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10842">gx_system_event_fold</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10843">Wyślij zdarzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10843">Send event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10844">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10844">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_event_fold(GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10845">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10845">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10846">Ta usługa przeszukuje kolejkę zdarzeń GUIX dla zdarzenia tego samego typu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10846">This service searches the GUIX event queue for an event of the same type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10847">Jeśli istnieje zdarzenie tego samego typu, ładunek zdarzenia zostanie zaktualizowany w celu dopasowania go do nowego zdarzenia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10847">If an event of the same type exists, the event payload is updated to match the new event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10848">Jeśli nie zostanie znalezione pasujące zdarzenie, funkcja gx_system_event_send zostanie wywołana w celu dodania nowego zdarzenia do końca kolejki zdarzeń.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10848">If no matching event is found, the gx_system_event_send function is called to add the new event to the end of the event queue.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10849">Ta funkcja jest często używana przez szybkie sterowniki wejścia Touch, aby zapobiec wypełnieniu kolejki zdarzeń z wieloma zdarzeniami PEN_DRAG.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10849">This function is commonly used by fast touch input drivers to prevent filling the event queue with multiple PEN_DRAG events.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10850">Ta funkcja może być również wywoływana przez aplikację, aby zapobiec dodawaniu wielu zdarzeń tego samego typu do kolejki zdarzeń GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10850">This function can also be called by the application to prevent multiple events of the same type from being added to the GUIX event queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10851">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10851">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10852">**zdarzenie**: wskaźnik do zdarzenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10852">**event**: Pointer to event</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10853">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10853">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10854">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślne wysłanie zdarzenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10854">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful event send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10855">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10855">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10856">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10856">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10857">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10857">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10858">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10858">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10859">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10859">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_EVENT my_event;

memset(&my_event, 0, sizeof(GX_EVENT));

my_event.gx_event_type = GX_EVENT_PEN_DOWN;

my_event.gx_event_payload.gx_event_pointdata.gx_point_x = 100;
my_event.gx_event_payload.gx_event_pointdata.gx_point_y = 200;

/* Send “my_event” for processing. */
status = gx_system_event_fold(&my_event);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event has been sent for processing. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_event_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10884">gx_system_event_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10884">gx_system_event_send</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10885">Wyślij zdarzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10885">Send event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10886">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10886">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_event_send(GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10887">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10887">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10888">Ta usługa wysyła określone zdarzenie do kolejki zdarzeń systemu GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10888">This service sends the specified event into the GUIX system event queue.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10889">Nowe zdarzenie jest umieszczane na końcu kolejki.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10889">The new event is placed at the end of the queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10890">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10890">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10891">**zdarzenie**: wskaźnik do zdarzenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10891">**event**: Pointer to event</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10892">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10892">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10893">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślne wysłanie zdarzenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10893">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful event send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10894">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10894">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10895">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10895">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10896">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10896">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10897">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10897">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10898">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10898">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Send “new_event” for processing. */

GX_EVENT new_event;

new_event.gx_event_target = widget ->gx_widget_parent;
new_event.gx_event_type = MY_EVENT_TYPE;

/* Set optional param. */
new_event.gx_event_payload.xxxx = yyyy
new_event.gx_event_sender = widget->gx_widget_id;

/* Push the event to event pool. */
status = gx_system_event_send(&new_event);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event has been sent for processing. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_focus_claim"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10923">gx_system_focus_claim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10923">gx_system_focus_claim</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10924">Fokus dotyczący roszczeń</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10924">Claim focus</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10925">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10925">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_focus_claim(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10926">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10926">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10927">Ta usługa zastrzega fokus dla określonego widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10927">This service claims the focus for the specified widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10928">Jeśli widżet nie miał wcześniej fokusu, otrzyma zdarzenie GX_EVENT_FOCUS_GAINED.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10928">If the widget did no previously have focus, it will receive a GX_EVENT_FOCUS_GAINED event.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10929">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10929">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10930">**widget**: wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki elementu widget, aby przejąć fokus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10930">**widget**: Pointer to widget control block to claim focus</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10931">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10931">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10932">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślne zgłoszenie fokusu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10932">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful focus claim</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10933">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10933">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10934">**GX_NO_CHANGE**: element widget (0x08) już jest fokusem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10934">**GX_NO_CHANGE**: (0x08) Widget already owns focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10935">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10935">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10936">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (nieprawidłowy element widget 0x12</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10936">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12 Widget not valid</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_initialize"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10964">gx_system_initialize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10964">gx_system_initialize</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10965">Zainicjuj GUIX</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10965">Initialize GUIX</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10966">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10966">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_initialize(VOID);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10967">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10967">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10968">Ta usługa inicjuje GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10968">This service initializes GUIX.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10969">Ta usługa musi być wywoływana przed żadną inną usługą interfejsu API GUIX i powinna być wywoływana tylko raz podczas uruchamiania systemu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10969">This service must be invoked before any other GUIX API service, and should only be invoked once at system startup.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10970">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10970">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10971">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10971">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10972">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10972">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10973">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślne zainicjowanie systemu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10973">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful system initialize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10974">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR**: (0XFE) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontroli GX_EVENT lub nie można utworzyć kolejki zdarzeń/obiektu mutex/wątku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10974">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR**: (0xFE) Invalid GX_EVENT control block size or event queue/mutex/thread create failed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-10975">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10975">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10976">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10976">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-10977">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10977">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-10978">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-10978">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Initialize GUIX. */
status = gx_system_initialize();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, GUIX has been initialized. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_language_table_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11003">gx_system_language_table_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11003">gx_system_language_table_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11004">Pobierz tabelę języka aktywnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11004">Retrieve active language table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11005">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11005">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_language_table_get( 
    GX_CHAR ****language_table,
    GX_UBYTE *languages_count, 
    UINT *string_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11006">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11006">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11007">Ta usługa pobiera tabelę Active Language.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11007">This service retrieves the active language table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11008">Ta funkcja jest przestarzała na rzecz gx_display_language_table_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11008">This function is deprecated in favor of gx_display_language_table_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11009">Wszystkie nowe aplikacje powinny używać gx_display_language_table_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11009">All new applications should use gx_display_language_table_get.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11010">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11010">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11011">**language_table**: adres wskaźnika do tabeli języka powrotu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11011">**language_table**: Address of pointer to return language table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11012">**languages_count**: adres zmiennej do zwrócenia kolumn tabeli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11012">**languages_count**: Address of variable to return table columns.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11013">**string_count**: adres wskaźnika do zwracania wierszy tabeli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11013">**string_count**: Address of pointer to return table rows.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11014">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11014">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11015">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślnie pobrałeś tabelę Active Language</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11015">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully retrieved active language table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11016">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11016">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11017">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11017">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11018">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11018">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11019">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11019">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11020">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11020">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR ***language_table;

GX_UBYTE language_count;

UINT string_count;

/* Retrieve the language table */

status = gx_system_language_table_get(&language_table,
    &language_count, &string_count);
```

## <a name="gx_system_language_table_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11024">gx_system_language_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11024">gx_system_language_table_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11025">Przypisz tabelę języka aktywnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11025">Assign active language table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11026">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11026">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_language_table_set(
    GX_CHAR ***language_table,
    GX_UBYTE languages_count, 
    UINT string_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11027">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11027">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11028">Ta usługa instaluje tabelę aktywnych języków.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11028">This service installs the active language table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11029">Ta funkcja została uznana za przestarzałą na rzecz gx_display_language_table_set.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11029">This function has been deprecated in favor of gx_display_language_table_set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11030">Wszystkie nowe aplikacje powinny używać gx_display_language_table_set.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11030">All new applications should use gx_display_language_table_set.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11031">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11031">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11032">**language_table**: wskaźnik do tabeli językowej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11032">**language_table**: Pointer to language table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11033">**languages_count**: liczba języków w tabeli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11033">**languages_count**: Number of languages in table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11034">**string_count**: liczba wierszy tabeli ciągów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11034">**string_count**: Number of string table rows.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11035">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11035">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11036">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił tabelę języka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11036">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set language table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11037">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11037">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11038">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11038">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11039">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11039">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11040">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11040">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11041">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11041">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve the language table */

status = gx_system_language_table_set(language_table,
    language_count, string_count);
```

## <a name="gx_system_memory_allocator_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11046">gx_system_memory_allocator_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11046">gx_system_memory_allocator_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11047">Przypisywanie funkcji alokacji pamięci, cofnięcia alokacji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11047">Assign functions for memory allocation, de-allocation</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11048">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11048">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_memory_allocator_set(VOID *(allocate)(ULONG size),
    VOID(*release)(VOID *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11049">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11049">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11050">Ta usługa przypisuje funkcję wywołania zwrotnego dla aplikacji w celu przydzielenia pamięci dynamicznej i cofnięcia alokacji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11050">This service assigns the application supplied callback function for dynamic memory allocation and de-allocation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11051">Jeśli aplikacja nie wymaga usługi GUIX, która używa dynamicznego przydzielania pamięci, ta usługa nie musi być wywoływana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11051">If no GUIX service that uses dynamic memory allocation is needed by the application, this service does not need to be called.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11052">Jeśli jest używana, ta usługa powinna być wywoływana po gx_system_initialize (), która czyści wskaźniki usługi GUIX oraz przed jakąkolwiek usługą GUIX, która wymaga użycia dynamicznego przydzielania pamięci.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11052">If used, this service should be called after gx_system_initialize() which clears the GUIX service pointers, and before any GUIX service that requires use of dynamical memory allocation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11053">Usługi GUIX, które wymagają alokacji pamięci środowiska uruchomieniowego i usługi cofnięcia alokacji, obejmują:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11053">GUIX services which require a runtime memory allocation and de-allocation service include:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11054">Ładowanie zasobów binarnych z magazynu zewnętrznego do środowiska uruchomieniowego GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11054">Loading binary resources from external storage into the GUIX runtime environment.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11055">Dekoder obrazu JPEG środowiska uruchomieniowego oprogramowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11055">The software runtime jpeg image decoder.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11056">Dekoder obrazu PNG środowiska uruchomieniowego oprogramowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11056">The software runtime png image decoder.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11057">Używanie widżetów tekstowych z GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11057">Using text widgets with GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11058">Funkcje narzędzia do zmiany rozmiaru i rotacji środowiska uruchomieniowego pixemap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11058">Runtime pixemap resize and rotation utility functions.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11059">Alokacja bloku ekranu i widżetu środowiska uruchomieniowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11059">Runtime screen and widget control block allocation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11060">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11060">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11061">**Alokator**: funkcja alokatora pamięci</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11061">**allocator**: Memory allocator function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11062">**wydanie**: funkcja wolna pamięć</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11062">**release**: Memory free function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11063">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11063">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11064">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślnie przypisać funkcję przydzielenia pamięci</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11064">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully assigned memory allocate function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11065">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11065">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11066">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11066">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11067">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11067">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11068">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11068">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11069">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11069">Example</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11070">W poniższym przykładzie użyto puli bajtów ThreadX do zaimplementowania usługi threadsafe pamięć dynamiczna i alokacja pamięci.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11070">The following example utilizes a ThreadX byte pool to implement a threadsafe dynamic memory allocation and memory de-allocation service.</span></span>

```C
TX_BYTE_POOL memory_pool;

#define SCRATCHPAD_SIZE (1024 * 4)

ULONG scratchpad[SCRATCHPAD_SIZE];

/* define memory allocation service */

VOID *memory_allocate(ULONG size)
{
    VOID *memptr;

    if (tx_byte_allocate(&memory_pool, &memptr, size, TX_NO_WAIT) == TX_SUCCESS)
    {
        return memptr;
    }
    return NULL;
}

/* define memory de-allocation service */
void memory_free(VOID *mem)
{
    tx_byte_release(mem);
}

/* create byte pool and install our dynamic memory services with GUIX
*/

VOID tx_application_define(void *first_unused_memory)
{
    /* create byte pool for GUIX to use */
    tx_byte_pool_create(&memory_pool, "scratchpad", scratchpad,
        SCRATCHPAD_SIZE * sizeof(ULONG));

    guix_setup();

    /* install our memory allocator and de-allocator */
    gx_system_memory_allocator_set(memory_allocate, memory_free);
}
```

## <a name="gx_system_pen_configure"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11095">gx_system_pen_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11095">gx_system_pen_configure</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11096">Ustaw konfigurację pióra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11096">Set pen configuration</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11097">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11097">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_pen_configure(GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION *pen_configuration);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11098">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11098">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11099">Ta usługa ustawia konfigurację pióra, aby kontrolować szybkość pióra i parametry odległości używane do wyzwalania generacji typów zdarzeń GX_EVENT_FLICK.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11099">This service sets pen configuration to control the pen speed and distance parameters used to trigger the generation of GX_EVENT_FLICK event types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11100">Gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist element członkowski GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION jest stałym typem danych i należy używać GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE (Value) do konwersji z INT do GX_FIXED_VAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11100">The gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist member of GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION is a fixed point data type, and you should use GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(value) to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11101">Na przykład jeśli chcesz ustawić minimalną odległość przeciągania na 0,5 pikseli na takt, musisz ustawić gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist na `GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11101">For example, if you want to set minimum drag distance to 0.5 pixel per tick, you have to set the gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist to `GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2`.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11102">W GUIX releases 5.4.0 i starszym gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist członkiem GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION był typ (INT << 8), a nie typ GX_FIXED_VAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11102">In GUIX releases 5.4.0 and older, the gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist member of GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION was of (INT << 8) type rather than GX_FIXED_VAL type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11103">Jeśli projekt z biblioteką 5.4.0 w wersji GUIX korzysta z tego interfejsu API, należy zmodyfikować parametr min_drag_dist lub GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY #define podczas kompilowania biblioteki GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11103">If your project with 5.4.0 version GUIX library is using this API, you will need to modify the min_drag_dist parameter or #define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY when building the GUIX library.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11104">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11104">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11105">**pen_configuration** Wskaźnik do struktury konfiguracji pióra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11105">**pen_configuration** Pointer to pen configuration structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11106">**Dodatek I** zawiera definicję do GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION struktury</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11106">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11107">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11107">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11108">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił konfigurację pióra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11108">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set pen configuration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11109">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11109">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11110">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11110">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11111">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11111">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11112">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11112">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define pen configuration, set minimum drag distance to 0.5 pixel
per tick, maximum pen speed to 10 ticks. That means GUIX will trigger
a vertical or horizontal flick event if the drag time is smaller than
10 ticks and the drag distance is bigger than 0.5 * drag_ticks. */

GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION pen_configuration;

#if defined(GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
Pen_configuration.gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist = (1 << 8)/ 2;
#else
pen_configuration.gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2;
#endif

pen_configuration.gx_pen_configuration_max_pen_speed_ticks = 10;

/* Set the pen configuration. */
status = gx_system_pen_configure(&pen_configuration);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the touch configure has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11113">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11113">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11114">Tworzenie i Inicjowanie stosu ekranu systemu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11114">Create and initialize the system screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11115">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11115">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_create(
    GX_WIDGET **memory, 
    INT size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11116">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11116">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11117">Ta usługa definiuje pulę pamięci, która ma być używana na potrzeby stosu ekranu systemu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11117">This service defines a memory pool to be used for the system screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11118">Stos ekranu systemu to opcjonalna funkcja, która może być używana przez aplikację do zarządzania wyglądem przepływu ekranu aplikacji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11118">The system screen stack is an optional feature that can be used by the application to manage application screen flow appearance.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11119">Jeśli aplikacja zamierza korzystać z usług stosu ekranu, należy najpierw wywołać funkcję gx_system_screen_stack_create, aby skonfigurować region pamięci stosu ekranu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11119">If the application intends to utilize the screen stack services, the gx_system_screen_stack_create function must first be called to setup the screen stack memory region.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11120">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11120">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11121">**pamięć**: wskaźnik do bloku pamięci zarezerwowanej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11121">**memory**: Pointer to the reserved memory block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11122">**rozmiar**: rozmiar, w bajtach, zarezerwowany blok pamięci.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11122">**size**: Size, in bytes, of the reserved memory block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11123">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11123">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11124">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) — pomyślne utworzenie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11124">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11125">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11125">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11126">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11126">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11127">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11127">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11128">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11128">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11129">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11129">Example</span></span>

```C
#define SCREEN_STACK_DEPTH 8
GX_WIDGET *screen_stack[SCREEN_STACK_DEPTH * 2];

UINT status;

/* Get the scrollbar appearance. */

status = gx_system_screen_stack_create(screen_stack,
    sizeof(GX_WIDGET *) * SCREEN_STACK_DEPTH * 2);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the system screen stack is initialized
and ready for use. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11135">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11135">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11136">Pokaż górne wskaźniki stosu ekranu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11136">Pop the topmost screen stack pointers</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11137">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11137">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_get(
    GX_WIDGET **popped_parent,
    GX_WIDGET **popped_screen);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11138">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11138">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11139">Ta funkcja powoduje wypunktowanie wskaźników stosu ekranu najwyższego poziomu i zwraca te wskaźniki do obiektu wywołującego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11139">This function pops the topmost screen stack pointers and returns those pointers to the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11140">Ta funkcja różni się od gx_system_screen_stack_pop (), ponieważ ekran zdjęte nie jest automatycznie ponownie dołączany do poprzedniego elementu nadrzędnego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11140">This function differs from gx_system_screen_stack_pop() in that the popped screen is not automatically reattached to the previous parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11141">Zamiast tego wskaźniki są zdjęte ze stosu i zwracane do obiektu wywołującego, co umożliwia obiektowi wywołującemu dołączenie lub odrzucanie zwracanego ekranu zgodnie z potrzebami.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11141">Instead, the pointers are popped from the stack and returned to the caller, allowing the caller to attach the or discard the returned screen as desired.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11142">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11142">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11143">**popped_parent**: Lokalizacja przechowywania nadrzędnego wskaźnika widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11143">**popped_parent**: Location to store the parent widget pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11144">**popped_screen**: lokalizacja do przechowywania wskaźnika ekranu zdjęte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11144">**popped_screen**: Location to store the popped screen pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11145">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11145">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11146">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślnie powiodło się pobranie wskaźników stosu ekranu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11146">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully retrieval of screen stack pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11147">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11147">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11148">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11148">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11149">**GX_FAILURE**: (0X10) nieprawidłowy lub pusty stos ekranu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11149">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) Invalid or empty screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11150">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11150">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11151">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11151">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11152">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11152">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_WIDGET *parent_screen;

GX_WIDGET *popped_screen;

/* Pop a screen stack entry. */
status = gx_system_screen_stack_get(&parent_screen, &popped_screen);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, parent_screen and
popped_screen hold the topmost screen stack pointers. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11153">Zobacz też</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11153">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11154">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11154">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11155">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11155">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11156">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11156">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11157">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11157">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_pop"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11158">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11158">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11159">Podręczny wpis z poziomu stosu ekranu systemu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11159">Pop the topmost entry from the system screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11160">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11160">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_pop();
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11161">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11161">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11162">Ta funkcja powoduje przełączenie do górnego wpisu na stosie ekranu i automatyczne dołączanie ekranu zdjęte do widżetu nadrzędnego zdjęte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11162">This function pops the topmost entry fo the screen stack and automatically attaches the popped screen to the popped parent widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11163">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11163">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11164">**brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11164">**none**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11165">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11165">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11166">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślne pobranie wskaźników stosu ekranu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11166">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfull retrieval of screen stack pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11167">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11167">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11168">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11168">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11169">**GX_FAILURE**: (0X10) nieprawidłowy lub pusty stos ekranu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11169">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) Invalid or empty screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11170">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11170">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11171">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11171">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11172">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11172">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Pop a screen stack entry. */
status = gx_system_screen_stack_pop();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the topmost screen stack entry has been
popped from the stack and re-attached to the previous parent. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11173">Zobacz też</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11173">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11177">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11177">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_push"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11178">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11178">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11179">Wypychanie widżetu i wskaźnika nadrzędnego do stosu ekranu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11179">Push a widget and parent pointer to the screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11180">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11180">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_push(GX_WIDGET *screen)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11181">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11181">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11182">Ta usługa umieszcza wskaźnik do wskazanego widżetu, który jest zazwyczaj ekranem najwyższego poziomu na stosie ekranu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11182">This service places a pointer to the indicated widget, which is usually a top-level screen, onto the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11183">Jeśli widżet ma element nadrzędny, jest odłączony od elementu nadrzędnego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11183">If the widget has a parent it is detached from the parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11184">Wskaźnik widżetu nadrzędnego jest również wypychany do stosu ekranu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11184">The parent widget pointer is also pushed to the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11185">Widżet nadrzędny może mieć wartość NULL, co oznacza, że ekran, który nie jest widoczny lub dołączony do żadnego elementu nadrzędnego, może zostać wypchnięte do stosu ekranu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11185">The parent widget may be NULL, meaning a screen that is not visible or attached to any parent may be pushed onto the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11186">Jeśli widżet z elementem nadrzędnym jest wypychany do stosu ekranu, należy użyć interfejsu API screen_stack_get (), aby pobrać wskaźnik ekranu wypychanego, zamiast korzystać z interfejsu API screen_stack_pop (), który próbuje ponownie dołączyć widżet zdjęte do jego poprzedniego elementu nadrzędnego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11186">If a widget with no parent is pushed to the screen stack, the screen_stack_get() API should be used to retrieve the pushed screen pointer, rather than using the screen_stack_pop() API, which attempts to reattached the popped widget to its previous parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11187">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11187">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11188">**ekran**: wskaźnik do widżetu do wypchnięcia do stosu ekranu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11188">**screen**: Pointer to the widget to be pushed to the screen stack.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11189">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11189">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11190">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślnie uzyskuje wygląd paska przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11190">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully get scrollbar appearance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11191">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11191">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11192">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11192">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11193">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11193">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11194">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11194">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11195">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11195">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the scrollbar appearance. */
status = gx_system_screen_stack_push(window);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the widget pointed to by “window” has
been pushed to the screen stack, along with the widget’s parent
ponter. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11196">Zobacz też</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11196">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11197">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11197">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11198">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11198">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_reset"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11201">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11201">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11202">Zresetuj stos ekranu systemu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11202">Reset the system screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11203">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11203">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_reset();
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11204">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11204">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11205">Ta funkcja usuwa wszystkie wpisy ze stosu ekranu systemu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11205">This function removes all entries from the system screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11206">Jeśli ekrany zdjęte ze stosu mają dynamicznie przydzielane bloki kontroli przydzielone przez GUIX Studio, pamięć dla tych bloków kontroli jest zwalniana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11206">If the screens popped from the stack have dynamically allocated control blocks allocated by GUIX Studio, the memory for those control blocks is freed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11207">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11207">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11208">**brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11208">**none**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11209">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11209">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11210">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślnie uzyskuje wygląd paska przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11210">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully get scrollbar appearance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11211">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11211">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11212">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11212">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11213">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11213">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11214">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11214">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11215">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11215">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the scrollbar appearance. */
status = gx_system_screen_stack_reset();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the system screen stack has been cleared
of entries. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11216">Zobacz też</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11216">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11220">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11220">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_scroll_appearance_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11221">gx_system_scroll_appearance_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11221">gx_system_scroll_appearance_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11222">Uzyskaj wygląd przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11222">Get scroll appearance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11223">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11223">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_scroll_appearance_get(
    ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *return_appearance);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11224">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11224">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11225">Ta usługa pobiera wygląd paska przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11225">This service gets the scrollbar appearance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11226">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11226">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11227">**styl**: styl paska przewijania: `GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` lub `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11227">**style**: Scrollbar style: `GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` or `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11228">**return_appearance**: wskaźnik do elementu docelowego dla wyglądu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11228">**return_appearance**: Pointer to destination for appearance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11229">**Dodatek I** zawiera definicję do GX_SCROLLBAR_APPERANCE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11229">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SCROLLBAR_APPERANCE</span></span>

appearance. */

## <a name="gx_system_scroll_appearance_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11261">gx_system_scroll_appearance_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11261">gx_system_scroll_appearance_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11262">Ustaw wygląd przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11262">Set scroll appearance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11263">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11263">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_scroll_appearance_set(
    ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *appearance);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11264">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11264">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11265">Ta usługa ustawia domyślny wygląd przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11265">This service sets the default scroll appearance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11266">Po utworzeniu przewijania Ta struktura wyglądu jest używana, jeśli aplikacja nie udostępnia niestandardowej wersji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11266">When a scroll is created, this appearance structure is used unless the application provides a custom version.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11267">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11267">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11268">**styl**: styl przewijania `GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` lub `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11268">**style**: Scroll style `GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` or `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11269">**wygląd**: zainicjowano wskaźnik do struktury wyglądu przy użyciu różnych atrybutów wyglądu ScrollBar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11269">**appearance**: Pointer to appearance structure initialized with various scrollbar appearance attributes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11270">Zapoznaj się z **załącznikiem I** , aby zapoznać się z definicją struktury GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11270">Refer to **Appendix I** for the definition of the GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11271">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11271">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11272">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił zestaw wyglądu przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11272">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set scroll appearance set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11273">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11273">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11274">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11274">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11275">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11275">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11276">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11276">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11277">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11277">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE my_appearance;

memset(&my_appearance, 0, sizeof(GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE));

my_appearance.gx_scroll_width = 20;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_width = 18;

my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_color = GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_color = GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_button_color = GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_min = 20;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_max = 20;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_style = GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN;

/* Set the scroll appearance. */

status = gx_system_scroll_appearance_set(GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL, &my_appearance);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scroll appearance has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11301">gx_system_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11301">gx_system_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11302">Uruchom GUIX</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11302">Start GUIX</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11303">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11303">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_start(VOID);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11304">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11304">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11305">Ta usługa uruchamia przetwarzanie GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11305">This service starts GUIX processing.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11306">W normalnych warunkach ta funkcja nigdy nie zwraca, ale zamiast tego zaczyna przetwarzać kolejkę zdarzeń GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11306">Under normal circumstances this function never returns, but instead begins processing the GUIX event queue.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11307">Gdy kolejka zdarzeń GUIX jest pusta, ta usługa zawiesza wątek wywołujący do momentu nadejścia nowych zdarzeń w kolejce zdarzeń GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11307">When the GUIX event queue is empty, this service suspends the calling thread until new events arrive in the GUIX event queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11308">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11308">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11309">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11309">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11310">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11310">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11311">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślne uruchomienie systemu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11311">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful system start</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11312">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11312">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11313">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11313">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11314">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11314">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11315">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11315">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Start GUIX. */
status = gx_system_start();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . GUIX has been started. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_string_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11340">gx_system_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11340">gx_system_string_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11341">Pobierz ciąg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11341">Get string</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11342">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11342">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_string_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id,
    GX_CHAR **return_string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11343">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11343">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11344">Ta usługa Pobiera ciąg dla określonego identyfikatora zasobu przy użyciu pierwszego zdefiniowanego ekranu i aktualnie aktywnego języka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11344">This service gets the string for the specified resource ID, using the first defined display and the currently active language.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11345">Ta funkcja została uznana za przestarzałą na rzecz gx_display_string_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11345">This function has been deprecated in favor of gx_display_string_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11346">Wszystkie nowe aplikacje powinny używać gx_display_string_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11346">All new applications should use gx_display_string_get.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11347">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11347">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11348">**string_id**: Identyfikator zasobu ciągu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11348">**string_id**: String resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11349">**return_string**: wskaźnik do wskaźnika elementu docelowego ciągu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11349">**return_string**: Pointer to string destination pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11350">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11350">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11351">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) pomyślny ciąg Get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11351">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful string get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11352">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11352">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11353">**GX_PTR_ERROR (0x07)**: nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11353">**GX_PTR_ERROR (0x07)**: Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11354">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID**: (0X33) Nieprawidłowy identyfikator zasobu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11354">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID**: (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11355">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11355">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11356">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11356">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11357">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11357">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the string associated with MY_STRING_ID. */

status = gx_system_string_get(MY_STRING_RESOURCE_ID, &my_string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string is contained in “my_string”.
*/
```
