## <a name="gx_system_string_table_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11362">gx_system_string_table_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11362">gx_system_string_table_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11363">Pobiera tabelę ciągów</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11363">Retrieves the string table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11364">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11364">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_string_table_get(
    GX_UBYTE language,
    GX_CHAR ***string_table,
    UINT *get_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11365">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11365">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11366">Ta usługa pobiera tabelę ciągów dla żądanego języka z pierwszego ekranu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11366">This service retrieves the string table for the requested language from the first display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11367">Ta funkcja została uznana za przestarzałą na rzecz gx_display_string_table_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11367">This function has been deprecated in favor of gx_display_string_table_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11368">Wszystkie nowe aplikacje powinny używać gx_display_string_table_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11368">All new applications should use gx_display_string_table_get.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11369">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11369">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11370">**Język**: indeks języka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11370">**language**: Language index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11371">**string_table**: wskaźnik do miejsca do magazynowania w wskaźniku tabeli ciągów lub wartości null, jeśli obiekt wywołujący nie musi uzyskać wskaźnika do tabeli ciągów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11371">**string_table**: Pointer to storage space of the string table pointer, or NULL if the caller does not need to get the pointer to the string table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11372">**get_size**: wskaźnik do magazynu dla liczby ciągów w tabeli ciągów lub wartości null, jeśli obiekt wywołujący nie musi uzyskać liczby ciągów w tabeli ciągów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11372">**get_size**: Pointer to the storage for the number of strings in string table, or NULL if the caller does not need to get the number of strings in the string table.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11373">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11373">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11374">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślne pobieranie tabeli ciągów</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11374">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful string table get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11375">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11375">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11376">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11376">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11377">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11377">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11378">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11378">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the string table. */

CHAR **my_string_table; UINT table_size;

status = gx_system_string_table_get(LANGUAGE_ID_ENGLISH,
    &my_string_table, &table_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . the pointer to the string table has
been obtained. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11379">Zobacz też</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11379">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11380">gx_display_string_table_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11380">gx_display_string_table_get</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_string_width_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11384">gx_system_string_width_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11384">gx_system_string_width_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11385">Pobierz szerokość ciągu (przestarzałe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11385">Get string width (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11386">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11386">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_string_width_get(
    GX_FONT *font, GX_CHAR *string,
    INT string_length,
    GX_VALUE *return_width);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11387">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11387">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11388">Ta usługa jest przestarzała na rzecz gx_system_string_width_get_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11388">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_system_string_width_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11389">Ta usługa oblicza szerokość wyświetlanego ciągu w pikselach przy użyciu określonej czcionki.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11389">This service computes the display width of the supplied string in pixels using the specified font.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11390">Jeśli parametr string_length jest >= 0, obliczenia zawierają tylko liczbę żądań znaków.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11390">If the string_length parameter is >= 0, only the request count of characters are included in the calculation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11391">Jeśli string_length parametr ma wartość-1, cały ciąg do terminatora NULL jest używany w obliczeniach.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11391">If the string_length parameter is -1, the entire string up to the NULL terminator is used in the calculation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11392">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11392">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11393">**Font**: wskaźnik do czcionki ciągu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11393">**font**: Pointer to string’s font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11394">**String**: wskaźnik do ciągu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11394">**string**: Pointer to string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11395">**string_length**: długość ciągu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11395">**string_length**: Length of string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11396">**return_width**: miejsce docelowe dla szerokości ciągu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11396">**return_width**: Destination for width of string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11397">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11397">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11398">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) pomyślna szerokość ciągu Get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11398">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful string width get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11399">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11399">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11400">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11400">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11401">**GX_INVALID_FONT**: (0X16) Nieprawidłowa czcionka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11401">**GX_INVALID_FONT**: (0x16) Invalid font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11402">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0X34) Nieprawidłowa długość ciągu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11402">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11403">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11403">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11404">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11404">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11405">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11405">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the string width of “my_string”. */

status = gx_system_string_width_get(&my_font, &my_string,
    strlen(my_string), &my_width);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . “my_width” contains the string width.
*/
```

```C
UINT gx_system_string_width_get_ext(
    GX_FONT *font,
    GX_STRING *string,
    GX_VALUE *return_width);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11411">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11411">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11412">Ta usługa oblicza szerokość wyświetlanego ciągu w pikselach przy użyciu określonej czcionki.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11412">This service computes the display width of the supplied string in pixels using the specified font.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11413">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11413">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11414">**Font**: wskaźnik do czcionki ciągu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11414">**font**: Pointer to string’s font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11415">**String**: wskaźnik do ciągu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11415">**string**: Pointer to string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11416">**return_width**: miejsce docelowe dla szerokości ciągu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11416">**return_width**: Destination for width of string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11417">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11417">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11418">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) pomyślna szerokość ciągu Get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11418">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful string width get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11419">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11419">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11420">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: 0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11420">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: 0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11421">**GX_INVALID_FONT**: (0X16) Nieprawidłowa czcionka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11421">**GX_INVALID_FONT**: (0x16) Invalid font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11422">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0X34) Nieprawidłowa długość ciągu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11422">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11423">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11423">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11424">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11424">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11425">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11425">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING my_string; my_string.gx_string_ptr = “Monday”;

my_string.gx_string_length = strlen(my_string.gx_string_ptr);

    &my_string, &my_width);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . “my_width” contains the string width.
*/
```

## <a name="gx_system_timer_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11443">gx_system_timer_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11443">gx_system_timer_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11444">Uruchom czasomierz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11444">Start timer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11445">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11445">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_timer_start(
    GX_WIDGET *owner, 
    UINT timer_id,
    UINT initial_ticks,
    UINT reschedule_ticks);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11446">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11446">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11447">Ta usługa uruchamia czasomierz dla określonego widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11447">This service starts a timer for the specified widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11448">GX_MAX_ACTIVE_TIMERS stała definiuje maksymalną obsługiwaną liczbę aktywnych czasomierzy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11448">The constant GX_MAX_ACTIVE_TIMERS defined the maximum active timers supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11449">Domyślnym ustawieniem tej wartości jest 32.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11449">The default setting for this value is 32.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11450">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11450">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11451">**Owner**: wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki elementu widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11451">**owner**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11452">**timer_id**: Identyfikator czasomierza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11452">**timer_id**: ID of timer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11453">**initial_ticks**: początkowe cykle wygasania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11453">**initial_ticks**: initial expiration ticks</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11454">**reschedule_ticks**: okresowe cykle wygasania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11454">**reschedule_ticks**: Periodic expiration ticks</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11455">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11455">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11456">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślne uruchomienie czasomierza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11456">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful timer start</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11457">**GX_OUT_OF_TIMERS**: (0X04) nie więcej czasomierzy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11457">**GX_OUT_OF_TIMERS**: (0x04) No more timers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11458">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11458">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11459">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11459">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11460">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) nieprawidłowy element widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11460">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11461">Wartości czasomierza **GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) są nieprawidłowe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11461">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Timer value(s) not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11462">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11462">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11463">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11463">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11464">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11464">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Start a periodic timer for the widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_system_timer_start(&my_widget, MY_TIMER_ID, 10, 20);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . the timer for “my_widget” has been
started. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_timer_stop"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11482">gx_system_timer_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11482">gx_system_timer_stop</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11483">Zatrzymaj czasomierz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11483">Stop timer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11484">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11484">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_timer_stop(
    GW_WIDGET *owner, 
    UINT timer_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11485">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11485">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11486">Ta usługa przerywa czasomierz z określoną timer_id skojarzoną z widżetem wywołującym.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11486">This service stops the timer with the specified timer_id associated with the calling widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11487">Aby zatrzymać wszystkie czasomierze połączone z określonym widżetem, aplikacja może przekazać wartość timer_id równą 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11487">To stop all timers linked to a particular widget, the application can pass the timer_id value of 0.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11488">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11488">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11489">**Owner**: wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki elementu widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11489">**owner**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11490">**timer_id**: Identyfikator czasomierza lub 0 dla wszystkich czasomierzy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11490">**timer_id**: ID of timer, or 0 for all timers</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11491">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11491">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11492">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślne zatrzymanie czasomierza</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11492">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful timer stop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11493">Nie znaleziono identyfikatora czasomierza **GX_NOT_FOUND**: (0x09)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11493">**GX_NOT_FOUND**: (0x09) Timer ID not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11494">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11494">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11495">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11495">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11496">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) nieprawidłowy element widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11496">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11497">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11497">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11498">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11498">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11499">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11499">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Stop the periodic timer for the widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_system_timer_stop(&my_widget, MY_TIMER_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . the timer for “my_widget” has been
stopped. */
```

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11538">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11538">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11541">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślnie pobrał ciąg wersji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11541">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully retrieved version string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11542">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11542">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11543">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0X34) Nieprawidłowa długość ciągu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11543">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_widget_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11571">gx_system_widget_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11571">gx_system_widget_find</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11572">Znajdź widżet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11572">Find widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11573">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11573">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_widget_find(
    USHORT widget_id,
    INT search_level, 
    GX_WIDGET **return_search_result);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11574">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11574">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11575">Ta usługa wyszukuje określony identyfikator widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11575">This service searches for the specified widget ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11576">W przeciwieństwie do gx_widget_find (), ta funkcja przeszukuje elementy podrzędne wszystkich okien głównych zdefiniowanych w systemie, co oznacza, że jest to wyczerpujące wyszukiwanie wszystkich widocznych elementów widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11576">Unlike gx_widget_find(), this function searches the children of all root windows defined in the system, meaning this is an exhaustive search of all visible widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11577">Jeśli znasz element nadrzędny widżetu, którego szukasz, Użyj zamiast niego gx_widget_find ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11577">If you know the parent of the widget you are searching for, use gx_widget_find() instead.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11578">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11578">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11579">**widget_id**: Identyfikator elementu widget do wyszukania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11579">**widget_id**: Widget ID to search for</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11580">**search_level**: definiuje cykliczny poziom zagnieżdżenia, do którego są przeszukiwane podrzędne elementy widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11580">**search_level**: Defines the recursive nesting level into which child widgets are searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11581">Jeśli ta wartość wynosi 0, przeszukiwane są tylko natychmiastowe elementy podrzędne każdego okna głównego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11581">If this value is 0, only immediate children of each root window are searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11582">Jeśli ta wartość jest GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE, funkcja zagnieżdża wszystkie elementy podrzędne wyszukiwania dla żądanego identyfikatora widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11582">If this value is GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE, the function nests down into all children searching for the requested widget ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11583">Dla każdej innej wartości > 0 poziom wyszukiwania definiuje, jak głęboko zagnieżdżona ta funkcja będzie przeszukiwać żądany identyfikator widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11583">For any other value > 0, the search level defines how deeply nested this function will go searching for the requested widget ID.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11584">**return_search_result**: znaleziono wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla elementu widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11584">**return_search_result**: Pointer to destination for widget found</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11585">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11585">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11586">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślne wyszukiwanie widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11586">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful widget search</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11587">**GX_NOT_FOUND**: (0x09) nie znaleziono identyfikatora elementu widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11587">**GX_NOT_FOUND**: (0x09) Widget ID not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11588">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11588">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11589">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11589">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11590">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11590">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11591">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11591">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Search recursively from the top level widget for the widget with
ID of MY_WIDGET_ID. */

status = gx_system_widget_find(MY_WIDGET_ID,
    GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE,
    &my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . the search was successful and
“my_widget” contains the pointer to the widget. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11607">gx_system_scroll_appearance_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11607">gx_system_scroll_appearance_get</span></span>

## <a name="gx_text_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11616">gx_text_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11616">gx_text_button_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11617">Przycisk tworzenia tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11617">Create text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11618">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11618">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_create(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT text_button_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11619">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11619">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11620">Ta usługa tworzy widżet przycisku tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11620">This service creates a text button widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11621">GX_TEXT_BUTTON pochodzi od GX_BUTTON i obsługuje wszystkie gx_button usługi interfejsu API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11621">GX_TEXT_BUTTON is derived from GX_BUTTON and supports all gx_button API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11622">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11622">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11623">**text_button**: wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki przycisku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11623">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11624">**name**: logiczna nazwa przycisku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11624">**name**: Logical name of text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11625">**Parent**: wskaźnik do elementu nadrzędnego widget przycisku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11625">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11626">**text_id**: Identyfikator zasobu tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11626">**text_id**: Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11627">**styl**: styl przycisku tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11627">**style**: Text button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11628">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich elementów widget, a także style charakterystyczne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11628">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11629">**text_button_id**: zdefiniowany przez aplikację identyfikator przycisku tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11629">**text_button_id**: Application-defined ID of the text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11630">**rozmiar**: rozmiar przycisku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11630">**size**: Size of the button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11631">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11631">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11632">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślne utworzenie przycisku tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11632">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful text button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11633">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11633">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11634">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11634">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11635">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) — element widget został już utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11635">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11636">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0X19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontrolki widgetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11636">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11637">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0X12) element widget elementu nadrzędnego jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11637">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>


### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11638">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11638">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11639">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11639">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11640">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11640">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_BUTTON my_text_button;

GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Define widget size. */

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Create text button “my_text_button”. */

status = gx_text_button_create(&my_text_button, "my text button",
    &my_parent_window, MY_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE, MY_TEXT_BUTTON_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text button “my_text_button” was
created. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11658">gx_text_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11658">gx_text_button_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11659">Przycisk rysowania tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11659">Draw text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11660">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11660">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_text_button_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11661">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11661">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11662">Ta usługa rysuje przycisk tekst.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11662">This service draws the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11663">Ta usługa jest zwykle wywoływana wewnętrznie podczas odświeżania kanwy, ale może być również wywoływana z funkcji niestandardowego rysowania przycisków tekstowych.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11663">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom text button drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11664">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11664">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11665">**Button**: wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki przycisku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11665">**button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11666">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11666">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11667">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11667">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11668">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11668">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11669">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11669">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11670">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11670">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom text button draw function. */

VOID my_text_button_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button)
{
    /* Call default text button draw. */
    gx_text_button_draw(text_button);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11688">gx_text_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11688">gx_text_button_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11689">Zdarzenie przycisku tekstu procesu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11689">Process text button event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11690">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11690">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_event_process(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button, GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11691">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11691">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11692">Ta usługa przetwarza zdarzenie dla określonego przycisku tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11692">This service processes an event for the specified text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11693">Ta usługa powinna być wywoływana jako domyślna procedura obsługi zdarzeń za pomocą wszelkich funkcji niestandardowego przetwarzania zdarzeń tekstowych.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11693">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom text button event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11694">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11694">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11695">**text_button** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki przycisku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11695">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11696">**event_ptr** Wskaźnik do zdarzenia do przetworzenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11696">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11697">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11697">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11698">Proces zdarzenia dotyczącego prawidłowego przycisku tekstu **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11698">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text button event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11699">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11699">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11700">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11700">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11701">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11701">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11702">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11702">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11703">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11703">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11704">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11704">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic text button event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_text_button_event_process(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default text button event processing */
        status = gx_text_button_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_font_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11722">gx_text_button_font_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11722">gx_text_button_font_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11723">Ustaw przycisk czcionki na tekst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11723">Set the font to text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11724">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11724">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_font_set(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *button,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11725">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11725">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11726">Ta usługa przypisuje czcionkę do określonego przycisku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11726">This service assigns a font to the specified button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11727">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11727">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11728">**Button**: wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki przycisku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11728">**button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11729">**font_id**: Identyfikator zasobu czcionki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11729">**font_id**: Resource ID fo the font</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11730">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11730">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11731">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił czcionkę</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11731">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set the font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11732">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11732">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11733">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11733">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11734">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) nieprawidłowy element widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11734">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11735">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11735">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11736">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11736">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11737">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11737">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the text button with the font ID MY_FONT. */
status = gx_text_button_font_set(&my_text_button, MY_FONT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the font of the text button
“my_text_button” was set to MY_FONT. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11755">gx_text_button_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11755">gx_text_button_text_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11756">Kolor przycisku ustawiania tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11756">Set text button color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11757">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11757">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_text_color_set(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11758">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11758">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11759">Ta usługa ustawia kolor przycisku tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11759">This service sets the color of the text button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11760">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11760">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11761">**text_button**: wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki przycisku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11761">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11762">**normal_text_color_id**: Identyfikator zasobu normalnego tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11762">**normal_text_color_id**: Resource ID of normal text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11763">**Dodatek A** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane identyfikatory zasobów koloru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11763">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11764">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodać identyfikatory zasobów koloru niestandardowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11764">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11765">**selected_text_color_id**: Identyfikator zasobu zaznaczonego tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11765">**selected_text_color_id**: Resource ID of selected text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11766">**Dodatek A** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane identyfikatory zasobów koloru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11766">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11767">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodać identyfikatory zasobów koloru niestandardowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11767">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11768">**disabled_text_color_id**: Identyfikator zasobu koloru dla wyłączonego tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11768">**disabled_text_color_id**: Resource ID of color for disabled text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11769">**Dodatek A** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane identyfikatory zasobów koloru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11769">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11770">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodać identyfikatory zasobów koloru niestandardowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11770">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11771">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11771">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11772">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) ustawiono kolor przycisku tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11772">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful text button color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11773">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11773">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11774">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11774">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11775">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) nieprawidłowy element widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11775">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11776">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11776">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11777">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11777">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11778">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11778">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the color of the text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_text_button_text_color_set(&my_text_button,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text color of “my_text_button” was
set. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11795">gx_text_button_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11795">gx_text_button_text_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11796">Funkcja obsługi do rysowania tekstu przycisku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11796">Support function to draw button text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11797">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11797">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_text_button_text_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11798">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11798">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11799">Ta funkcja obsługi rysuje część tekstową przycisku tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11799">This support function draws the text portion of a text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11800">Ta funkcja jest wywoływana wewnętrznie przez gx_text_button_draw i jest udostępniana jako osobny interfejs API jako wygoda dla aplikacji, które definiują funkcję rysowania niestandardowego przycisku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11800">This function is called internally by gx_text_button_draw, and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom button drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11801">Aplikacje, które chcą dostosować Rysowanie w tle przycisków, mogą zapewnić swoją niestandardową funkcję rysowania i wywoływać usługę gx_text_button_text_draw jako część niestandardowego rysunku, aby narysować tekst przycisku w tle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11801">Applications that want to customize the button background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the gx_text_button_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the button text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11802">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11802">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11803">**text_button**: wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki przycisku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11803">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11804">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11804">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11805">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11805">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11806">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11806">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11807">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11807">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11808">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11808">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function */

VOID my_button_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Insert code here to draw button background */

    /* Call support function to do text drawing */
    gx_text_button_text_draw(button);

    /* Draw child widgets */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) button);
}
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11825">gx_text_button_text_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11825">gx_text_button_text_get</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11827">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11827">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_text_get(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CHAR **return_text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11828">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11828">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11829">Ta usługa jest przestarzała na rzecz gx_text_button_text_get_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11829">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_text_button_text_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11830">Ta usługa Pobiera określony ciąg z przycisku tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11830">This service retrieves the specified string from the text button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11831">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11831">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11832">**text_button**: wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki przycisku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11832">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11833">**return_text**: wskaźnik do ciągu pobranego z przycisku tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11833">**return_text**: Pointer to the string retrieved from the text button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11834">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11834">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11835">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślnie Pobiera tekst z przycisku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11835">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully get the text from the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11836">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11836">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11837">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11837">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11838">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) nieprawidłowy element widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11838">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11839">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11839">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11840">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11840">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11841">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11841">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR *string;

/* Get the string from the text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_text_button_text_get(&my_text_button, &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string pointer from
“my_text_button” is retrieved and stored in string. */
```

```C
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11847">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11847">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11848">Ta usługa Pobiera określony ciąg z przycisku tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11848">This service retrieves the specified string from the text button.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11908">gx_text_button_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11908">gx_text_button_text_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11909">Przypisywanie tekstu do przycisku tekstu (przestarzałe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11909">Assign text to the text button (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11910">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11910">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_text_set(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11911">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11911">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11912">Ta usługa jest przestarzała na rzecz gx_text_button_text_set_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11912">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_text_button_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11913">Ta usługa przypisuje określony ciąg do przycisku tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11913">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11914">Jeśli element widget text_button został utworzony z GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY stylu, widżet tworzy prywatną kopię ciągu tekstowego przypisanego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11914">If the text_button widget was created with style  GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11915">Jeśli GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY nie jest aktywny, widżet nie tworzy prywatnej kopii ciągu przychodzącego, w związku z czym ciąg musi być statycznie lub globalnie przydzielony, tj. nie może to być automatyczna lub Tymczasowa zmienna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11915">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11916">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11916">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11917">**text_button**: wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki przycisku tekstowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11917">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11918">**Text**: wskaźnik do ciągu ZAKOŃCZONEGO wartością null</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11918">**text**: pointer to the NULL-terminated string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11919">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11919">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11920">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił tekst na przycisk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11920">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11921">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11921">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11922">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11922">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11923">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) nieprawidłowy element widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11923">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11924">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: program przydzielania pamięci (0x30) nie został zdefiniowany lub alokacja pamięci nie powiodła się</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11924">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11925">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0X34) Nieprawidłowa długość ciągu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11925">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11927">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11927">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
*/

*/
```

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11937">Ta usługa przypisuje określony ciąg do przycisku tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11937">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11938">Jeśli element widget text_button został utworzony z GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY stylu, widżet tworzy prywatną kopię ciągu tekstowego przypisanego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11938">If the text_button widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11939">Jeśli GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY nie jest aktywny, widżet nie tworzy prywatnej kopii ciągu przychodzącego, w związku z czym ciąg musi być statycznie lub globalnie przydzielony, tj. nie może to być automatyczna lub Tymczasowa zmienna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11939">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11943">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11943">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11944">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił tekst na przycisk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11944">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11945">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11945">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

## <a name="gx_text_input_cursor_blink_interval_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11969">gx_text_input_cursor_blink_interval_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11969">gx_text_input_cursor_blink_interval_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11970">Ustaw interwał migania kursora</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11970">Set cursor blink interval</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11971">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11971">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_input_cursor_blink_interval_set(
    GX_TEXT_INPUT_CURSOR *cursor_input,
    GX_UBYTE blink_interval);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11972">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11972">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-11973">Ta usługa ustawia wartość interwału migania kursora.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11973">This service sets blink interval value of the cursor.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11974">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11974">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11975">**cursor_input** Blok kontrolny kursora</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11975">**cursor_input** Cursor control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11976">**blink_interval** Wartość do ustawienia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11976">**blink_interval** Value to be set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11977">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11977">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11978">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił interwał migania kursora</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11978">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set the cursor blink interval</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11979">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11979">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-11980">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) wartość interwału migania jest nieprawidłowa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11980">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Blink interval value not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11981">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11981">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-11983">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-11983">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_INPUT_CURSOR *input_cursor;

/* Pointer the input cursor to the cursor instance of single/multi
line text input widget. */

input_cursor = &sl_input.gx_single_line_text_input_cursor_instance;

/* Set the blink interval value of “input_cursor” to 2. */
status = gx_text_input_cursor_blink_interval_set(input_cursor, 2);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the blink interval value of
“input_cursor” has been successfully set to 2. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12023">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12023">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12024">Przypisywanie funkcji wywołania zwrotnego typu Text kółka przewijania (przestarzałe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12024">Assign the callback function of text type scroll wheel (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12025">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12025">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set(
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *(*callback)(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *, int));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12026">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12026">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12027">Ta usługa jest przestarzała na rzecz gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12027">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12028">Ta usługa przypisuje funkcję wywołania zwrotnego, do którego zostanie wywołane kółko przewijania typu tekstowego, aby określić ciąg tekstowy, który ma być wyświetlany w każdym wierszu kółka przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12028">This service assigns the callback function which a text type scroll wheel will invoke to determine the text string to be displayed at each row of the scroll wheel.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12029">W przypadku GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL i GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL są udostępniane domyślne funkcje wywołania zwrotnego, a aplikacja nie musi wprowadzać żadnych zmian w celu korzystania z tych domyślnych implementacji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12029">For GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL, default callback functions are provided and the application does not need to make any changes to use these default implementations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12030">Ten interfejs API jest dostępny, aby umożliwić aplikacji dostosowanie formatowania lub innych parametrów ciągu, który jest wyświetlany w każdym wierszu widżetu przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12030">This API is provided to allow the application to customize the formatting or other parameters of the string that is displayed on each row of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12031">Funkcja wywołania zwrotnego będzie odbierać jako wskaźnik wejściowy do bloku sterowania kółkiem przewijania i wyświetlany numer wiersza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12031">The callback function will receive as input a pointer to the scroll wheel control block and the row number that is being displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12032">Funkcja powinna zwrócić wskaźnik do ciągu tekstowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12032">The function should return a pointer to a text string.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12033">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12033">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12034">**koło** Adres bloku formantu pokrętła przewijania ciągu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12034">**wheel** String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12035">**wywołanie zwrotne** Wskaźnik do funkcji wywołania zwrotnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12035">**callback** Pointer to callback function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12036">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12036">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12037">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił wywołanie zwrotne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12037">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set callback</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12038">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12038">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12039">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) nieprawidłowy element widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12039">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12040">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12040">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12041">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12041">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12042">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12042">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

GX_CHAR string_buffer[20];

GX_CHAR *my_wheel_callback(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, int row)
{
    /* Just for an example, return row number as string for rows
    >= 0, and return text “Invalid” otherwise */
    if (row >= 0)
    {
        gx_utility_ltoa(row, string_buffer, 20);
    }
    else
    {
        return(“Invalid”);
    }
}

gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, “my wheel”, root, 10,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED|GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER|GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT|
    GX_STYLE_WRAP|ID_MY_WHEEL, &size);

status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set(&wheel,
    my_wheel_callback);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the scroll whell callback function has
been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12059">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12059">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12060">Przypisywanie funkcji wywołania zwrotnego typu Text kółka przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12060">Assign the callback function of text type scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12061">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12061">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext(
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    UINT *(*callback)(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *, int, GX_STRING *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12062">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12062">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12063">Ta usługa przypisuje funkcję wywołania zwrotnego, do którego zostanie wywołane kółko przewijania typu tekstowego, aby określić ciąg tekstowy, który ma być wyświetlany w każdym wierszu kółka przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12063">This service assigns the callback function which a text type scroll wheel will invoke to determine the text string to be displayed at each row of the scroll wheel.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12064">W przypadku GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL i GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL są udostępniane domyślne funkcje wywołania zwrotnego, a aplikacja nie musi wprowadzać żadnych zmian w celu korzystania z tych domyślnych implementacji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12064">For GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL, default callback functions are provided and the application does not need to make any changes to use these default implementations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12065">Ten interfejs API jest dostępny, aby umożliwić aplikacji dostosowanie formatowania lub innych parametrów ciągu, który jest wyświetlany w każdym wierszu widżetu przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12065">This API is provided to allow the application to customize the formatting or other parameters of the string that is displayed on each row of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12066">Funkcja wywołania zwrotnego będzie odbierać jako wskaźnik wejściowy do bloku sterowania kółkiem przewijania i wyświetlany numer wiersza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12066">The callback function will receive as input a pointer to the scroll wheel control block and the row number that is being displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12067">Funkcja powinna zwrócić wskaźnik do ciągu tekstowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12067">The function should return a pointer to a text string.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12068">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12068">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12069">**koło** Adres bloku formantu pokrętła przewijania ciągu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12069">**wheel** String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12070">**wywołanie zwrotne** Wskaźnik do funkcji wywołania zwrotnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12070">**callback** Pointer to callback function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12071">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12071">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12072">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił wywołanie zwrotne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12072">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set callback</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12073">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12073">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12074">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) nieprawidłowy element widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12074">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12075">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12075">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12076">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12076">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12077">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12077">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

GX_CHAR string_buffer[20];

UINT *my_wheel_callback(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, int row,
    GX_STRING *return_string)
{
    /* Just for an example, return row number as string for rows
    >= 0, and return text “Invalid” otherwise */
    if (row >= 0)
    {
        gx_utility_ltoa(row, string_buffer, 20);
        return_string->gx_string_ptr = string_buffer;
        return_string->gx_string_length = strlen(string_buffer);
    }
    else
    {
        return_string->gx_string_ptr = “Invalid”;
        return_string->gx_string_length = strlen(“Invalid”);
    }

    return GX_SUCCESS;
}

gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, “my wheel”, root, 10,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED|GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER|GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT|
    GX_STYLE_WRAP|ID_MY_WHEEL, &size);

status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext(&wheel,
    my_wheel_callback);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the scroll whell callback function has
been set. */
```
