## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12094">gx_text_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12094">gx_text_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12095">Tworzenie kółka przewijania tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12095">Create a text scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12096">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12096">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    INT total_rows,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT Id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12097">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12097">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12098">Ta usługa tworzy kółko przewijania tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12098">This service creates a text scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12099">Kółko przewijania tekstu jest podstawowym elementem widget dla elementów widget GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL i GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12099">The text scroll wheel is a base widget for the GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL type widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12100">Ta funkcja jest wywoływana wewnętrznie przez gx_string_scroll_wheel_create i gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create i jest udostępniana jako osobny interfejs API jako wygoda dla aplikacji, które definiują niestandardowy widżet kółka przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12100">This function is called internally by gx_string_scroll_wheel_create and gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create, and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12101">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12101">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12102">**koło**: adres bloku formantu pokrętła przewijania tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12102">**wheel**: Text scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12103">**name**: Nazwa widżetu zdefiniowanego przez aplikację</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12103">**name**: Application defined widget name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12104">**element nadrzędny**: koło lub GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12104">**parent**: Wheel parent or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12105">**total_rows**: łączną liczbę wierszy do prezentowania użytkownikowi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12105">**total_rows**: Total rows to be presented to user</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12106">**styl**: wymagane flagi stylu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12106">**style**: Desired style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12107">**ID**: flagi stylu koła zdefiniowanego przez aplikację</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12107">**Id**: Application defined wheel style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12108">**rozmiar**: początkowy rozmiar kółka przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12108">**size**: Initial scroll wheel size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12109">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12109">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12110">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślnie utworzono koło przewijania tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12110">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully created text scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12111">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12111">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12112">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12112">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12113">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) — element widget został już utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12113">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12114">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) nieprawidłowy element widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12114">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>


### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12115">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12115">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12116">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12116">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12117">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12117">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom scroll wheel widget. */
typedef MY_SCROLL_WHEEL_STRUCT
{
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL text_scroll_wheel;

    /* Add custom members here. */

} MY_SCROLL_WHEEL;

MY_SCROLL_WHEEL my_scroll_wheel;

UINT my_scroll_wheel_create(MY_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_rows, ULONG style, USHORT Id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
{
    /* Call base creation. */
    status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(
        &wheel.text_scroll_wheel,
        ”my_text_scroll_wheel”, GX_NULL, 7,
        GX_STYLE_ENABLED, ID_MY_SCROLL_WHEEL, &size);

    if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* Add custom initialization here. */
        if(parent)
        {
            gx_widget_link(parent, (GX_WIDGET *)wheel);
        }
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12136">gx_text_scroll_wheel_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12136">gx_text_scroll_wheel_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12137">Rysowanie kółka przewijania tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12137">Draw a text scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12138">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12138">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_text_scroll_wheel_draw(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12139">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12139">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12140">Jest to domyślna funkcja rysowania dla wszystkich typów kół na podstawie GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12140">This is the default drawing function for all wheel types based on GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12141">Ta funkcja może zostać przesłonięta przez aplikacje, które wymagają dostosowania wyglądu kółka przewijania tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12141">This function can be overridden by applications that require customization of the text scroll wheel drawing appearance.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12142">GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL i GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL są oparte na lub pochodzące od GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12142">GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL are both based on or derived from GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12143">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12143">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12144">**koło**: adres bloku formantu pokrętła przewijania ciągu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12144">**wheel**: String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12145">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12145">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12146">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12146">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12147">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12147">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12148">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12148">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12149">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12149">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom wheel draw function. */
UINT my_wheel_draw(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel)
{
    /* Perform default drawing */
    gx_text_scroll_wheel_draw(wheel);

    /* Add custom drawing here */
}
```

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12166">gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12166">gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12167">Zdarzenie kółka przewijania tekstu procesu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12167">Process text scroll wheel event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12168">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12168">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12169">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12169">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12170">Ta usługa przetwarza zdarzenie dla określonego kółka przewijania tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12170">This service processes an event for the specified text scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12171">Ta usługa powinna być wywoływana jako domyślna procedura obsługi zdarzeń przez dowolne funkcje przetwarzania zdarzeń niestandardowego kółka przewijania tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12171">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom text scroll wheel event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12172">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12172">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12173">**koło** Blok sterowania przesuwaniem wskaźnika do tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12173">**wheel** Pointer to text scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12174">**event_ptr** Wskaźnik do zdarzenia do przetworzenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12174">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12175">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12175">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12176">Proces zdarzenia kółka przewijania tekstu **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12176">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text scroll wheel event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12177">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12177">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12178">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12178">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12179">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12179">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12180">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12180">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12181">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12181">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12182">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12182">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic text scroll wheel event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_text_scroll_wheel_event_process(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default text scroll wheel event processing */
        status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12232">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12232">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_text_color_set(

    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color,
    GX_RESOURCe_ID disabled_text_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12233">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12233">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12234">Ta funkcja przypisuje kolory tekstu używane do rysowania wierszy przewijania tekstu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12234">This function assigns the text colors used to draw a text based scroll wheel rows.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12235">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12235">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12236">**koło**: adres bloku formantu pokrętła przewijania ciągu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12236">**wheel**: String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12237">**normal_text_color**: kolor używany do rysowania niezaznaczonych wierszy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12237">**normal_text_color**: Color used to draw non-selected rows</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12238">**selected_text_color**: kolor używany do rysowania zaznaczonego wiersza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12238">**selected_text_color**: Color used to draw selected row.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12239">**disabled_text_color**: kolor używany do rysowania tekstu dla wyłączonego widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12239">**disabled_text_color**: Color used to draw text for disabled widget.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12240">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12240">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12241">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślnie przypisano kolor tekstu kółka przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12241">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully assigned scroll wheel text color</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12242">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12242">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12243">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12243">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12244">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) nieprawidłowy element widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12244">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12245">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12245">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12246">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12246">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

UINT status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_text_color_set(&wheel,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the colors used to draw the wheel text have been assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_tree_view_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12264">gx_tree_view_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12264">gx_tree_view_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12265">Tworzenie widoku drzewa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12265">Create a tree view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12266">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12266">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_tree_view_create(
    GX_TREE_VIEW *tree,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT tree_view_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12267">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12267">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12268">Ta usługa tworzy widok drzewa jako określony i kojarzy widok drzewa z podanym widżetem nadrzędnym.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12268">This service creates a tree view as specified and associates the tree view with the supplied parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12269">Akceptuje wszystkie typy widżetów jako element menu podrzędnego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12269">It accepts all types of widget as child menu item.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12270">Zaleca się używanie widżetu typu GX_MENU jako elementu podrzędnego menu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12270">It’s recommended to use GX_MENU type widget as its child menu item.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12271">GX_TREE_VIEW pochodzi od GX_WINDOW i obsługuje wszystkie gx_window usługi interfejsu API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12271">GX_TREE_VIEW is derived from GX_WINDOW and supports all gx_window API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12272">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12272">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12273">**drzewo**: wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki widoku drzewa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12273">**tree**: Pointer to tree view control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12274">**Nazwa**: Nazwa widoku drzewa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12274">**name**: Name of the tree view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12275">**element nadrzędny**: wskaźnik do elementu nadrzędnego widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12275">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12276">**styl**: styl elementu widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12276">**style**: Style of the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12277">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich elementów widget, a także style charakterystyczne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12277">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12278">**menu_id**: zdefiniowany przez aplikację Identyfikator widoku drzewa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12278">**menu_id**: Application-defined ID of the tree view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12279">**rozmiar**: rozmiar widoku drzewa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12279">**size**: Size of the tree view</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12280">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12280">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12281">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślne utworzenie widoku drzewa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12281">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful tree view creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12282">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12282">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12283">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12283">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12284">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) — element widget został już utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12284">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12285">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0X19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontrolki widgetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12285">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12286">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) nieprawidłowy element widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12286">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12287">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12287">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12288">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12288">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12289">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12289">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_tree_view_create(&my_tree_view,
    “my_tree_view”, parent,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED, MY_TREE_VIEW_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the tree view was successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_tree_view_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12304">gx_tree_view_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12304">gx_tree_view_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12305">Rysuj widok drzewa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12305">Draw tree view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12306">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12306">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_tree_view_draw(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12307">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12307">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12308">Ta usługa Rysuje określony widok drzewa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12308">This service draws the specified tree view.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12309">Ta funkcja jest zwykle wywoływana wewnętrznie przez mechanizm odświeżania kanwy GUIX, ale jest dostępna dla aplikacji, aby pomóc w zaimplementowaniu niestandardowych funkcji rysowania dla widżetów niestandardowego widoku drzewa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12309">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom tree view widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12310">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12310">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12311">**drzewo** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki widoku drzewa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12311">**tree** Pointer to tree view control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12312">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12312">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12313">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12313">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12314">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12314">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12315">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12315">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12316">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12316">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom tree view draw function. */
UINT my_tree_view_draw(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree_view)
{
    /* Perform default drawing */
    gx_tree_view_draw(tree_view);

    /* Add custom drawing here */
}
```

## <a name="gx_tree_view_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12331">gx_tree_view_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12331">gx_tree_view_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12332">Zdarzenie widoku drzewa procesów</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12332">Process tree view event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12333">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12333">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_tree_view_event_process(
    GX_TREE_VIEW *tree, 
    GX_EVENT event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12334">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12334">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12335">Ta usługa przetwarza zdarzenie dla określonego widoku drzewa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12335">This service processes an event for the specified tree view.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12336">Ta usługa powinna być wywoływana jako domyślna procedura obsługi zdarzeń przez wszystkie niestandardowe funkcje przetwarzania zdarzeń w widoku drzewa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12336">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom tree view event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12337">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12337">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12338">**drzewo**: wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki widoku drzewa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12338">**tree**: Pointer to tree view control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12339">**event_ptr**: wskaźnik do zdarzenia do przetworzenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12339">**event_ptr**: Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12340">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12340">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12341">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) zdarzenie widoku drzewa procesu zakończone powodzeniem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12341">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful process tree view event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12342">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12342">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12343">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12343">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12344">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) nieprawidłowy element widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12344">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12345">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12345">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12346">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12346">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12347">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12347">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic tree view event processing as part of custom event
    processing function. */

UINT custom_tree_view_event_process(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree_view,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;
        default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default tree view
                event processing */
            status = gx_tree_view_event_process(tree_view, event);
            break;
    }
}
return status;
```

## <a name="gx_tree_view_root_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12451">gx_tree_view_root_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12451">gx_tree_view_root_pixelmap_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12452">Ustaw katalog główny widoku drzewa Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12452">Set tree view root pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12453">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12453">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_tree_view_root_pixelmap_set(
    GX_TREE_VIEW *tree,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID expand_map_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID collapse_map_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12454">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12454">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12455">Ta usługa przypisuje rozszerzanie i zwijanie Pixelmap widoku drzewa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12455">This service assigns expand and collapse pixelmap for the tree view.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12456">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12456">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12457">**drzewo**: wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki widoku drzewa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12457">**tree**: Pointer to tree view control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12458">**expand_map_id**: Identyfikator zasobu dla rozwiń Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12458">**expand_map_id**: Resource id of expand pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12459">**collapse_map_id**: Identyfikator zasobu zwijania Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12459">**collapse_map_id**: Resource id of collapse pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12460">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12460">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12461">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił katalog główny Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12461">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set root pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12462">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12462">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12463">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12463">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12464">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) nieprawidłowy element widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12464">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12465">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12465">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12466">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12466">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12467">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12467">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set root pixelmaps for tree view “my_tree”. */

status = gx_tree_view_root_pixelmap_set(&my_tree,
    MY_EXPAND_MAP_ID,
    MY_COLLAPSE_MAP_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the root pixelmaps of tree view
“my_tree” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_tree_view_selected_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12481">gx_tree_view_selected_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12481">gx_tree_view_selected_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12482">Pobierz wybrany element</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12482">Get selected item</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12483">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12483">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_tree_view_selected_get(
    GX_TREE_VIEW *tree,
    GX_WIDGET **selected);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12484">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12484">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12485">Ta usługa Pobiera bieżący wybrany element widoku drzewa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12485">This service retrieves current selected item of the tree view.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12486">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12486">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12487">**drzewo**: wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki widoku drzewa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12487">**tree**: Pointer to tree view control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12488">**zaznaczone**: wskaźnik do wybranego wskaźnika widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12488">**selected**: Pointer to selected widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12489">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12489">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12490">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślnie pobrał wybrany element</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12490">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully retrieved selected item</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12491">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12491">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12492">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) nieprawidłowy element widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12492">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12493">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12493">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12494">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12494">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12495">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12495">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve selected item of tree view “my_tree”. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the selected item of tree view “my_tree”
has been retrieved. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12514">Ta usługa ustawia wybrany element dla widoku drzewa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12514">This service sets selected item for the tree view.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12540">gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12540">gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12541">Konwertuj memort kanwy na mapę bitową</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12541">Convert canvas memort to bitmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12542">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12542">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_RECTANGLE *rect,
    UINT (*write_data)(GX_UBYTE *byte_data, UINT data_count));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12543">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12543">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12544">Ta usługa konwertuje pamięć kanwy na plik mapy bitowej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12544">This service converts canvas memory to bitmap file.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12545">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12545">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12546">**Kanwa**: wskaźnik bloku kontrolki kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12546">**canvas**: Canvas control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12547">**Rect**: prostokąt do przekonwertowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12547">**rect**: Rectangle to convert</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12548">**WRITE_DATA**: wskaźnik funkcji wywołania zwrotnego do zapisywania danych</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12548">**write_data**: Callback function pointer to write data to</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12549">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12549">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12550">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślnie przekonwertowano wartość całkowitą na ciąg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12550">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully converted integer value to string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12551">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik buforu powrotu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12551">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid return buffer pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12552">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0X19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar buforu powrotu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12552">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid return buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12553">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12553">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12554">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12554">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12555">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12555">Example</span></span>

```C
FILE *fp = GX_NULL;

/* define call back function of how to write the data read from
canvas memory. */

UINT write_data_callback(GX_UBYTE *byte_data, UINT data_count)
{
    if (fp)
    {
        fwrite(byte_data, 1, data_count, fp);
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}

VOID scroll_wheel_screen_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{
    UINT status;

    GX_RECTANGLE size = {31,31,610,450};
    gx_window_draw(window);
    if (screenshot)
    {
        fp = fopen("../screenshot.bmp", "wb");
        /* Convert canvas memory to bitmap format.
           Status GX_SUCCESS means operation succeed. */
        status = gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp(root->gx_window_root_canvas,
            &size, write_data_callback);

        fclose(fp);
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_utility_circle_point_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12571">gx_utility_circle_point_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12571">gx_utility_circle_point_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12572">Oblicz punkt na okręgu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12572">Calculate point on a circle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12573">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12573">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_circle_point_get(
    INT xCenter, 
    INT yCenter,
    UINT radius, 
    INT angle, 
    GX_POINT *point);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12574">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12574">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12575">Ta usługa oblicza punkt na okręgu, w którym znajduje się okrąg, promień i kąt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12575">This service calculates point on a circle given the circle center, radius, and angle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12576">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12576">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12577">**xCenter**: Współrzędna x środka okręgu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12577">**xCenter**: x coordinate of circle center</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12578">**yCenter**: Współrzędna y środka okręgu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12578">**yCenter**: y coordinate of circle center</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12579">**promień**: promień okręgu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12579">**radius**: Circle radius</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12580">**kąt**: kąt, w którym ma zostać obliczony punkt obwodu koła (w stopniach).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12580">**angle**: Angle at which to calculate circle perimeter point, in degrees</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12581">**Point**: Address zmiennej GX_POINT, w której ma być przechowywana obliczona Współrzędna x, y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12581">**point**: Address of GX_POINT variable at which to store calculated x,y coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12582">**end_alpha**: końcowa wartość alfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12582">**end_alpha**: End alpha value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12583">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12583">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12584">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) gradient został utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12584">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Gradient was created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12585">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) nieprawidłowy adres punktu powrotu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12585">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid return point address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12586">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0X22) nieprawidłowy parametr RADIUS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12586">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Invalid radius parameter</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12587">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12587">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12588">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12588">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12589">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12589">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_POINT point;
    UINT status;

        status = gx_utility_circle_point_get(100, 100,
20, 45,
&point);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of point is the x,y coordinate of a point on the circle perimeter at an angle of 45 degrees, where the circle is centered at (100, 100), has a radius of 20 pixels */

```

## <a name="gx_utility_gradient_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12607">gx_utility_gradient_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12607">gx_utility_gradient_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12608">Tworzenie Pixelmap gradientu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12608">Create a gradient pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12609">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12609">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_gradient_create(
    GX_GRADIENT *gradient,
    GX_VALUE width, 
    GX_VALUE height,
    UCHAR type, 
    GX_UBYTE start_alpha, 
    GX_UBYTE end_alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12610">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12610">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12611">Ta usługa tworzy Pixelmap gradientu w czasie wykonywania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12611">This service creates a gradient pixelmap at runtime.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12612">Obraz gradientu może służyć do osiągnięcia efektów zaniku i innych interesujących zmian wizualnych.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12612">A gradient image can be used to accomplish fade effects and other interesting visual changes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12613">Szerokość i wysokość żądanego gradientu nie może być krótsza niż 2x2 pikseli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12613">The width and height of the requested gradient can be no less than 2x2 pixels.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12614">GUIX wewnętrznie utrzymuje listę utworzonych gradientów, a ta funkcja najpierw przeszuka listę gradientów, aby znaleźć pasujący Pixelmap gradientu przed utworzeniem nowego Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12614">GUIX internally maintains a list of created gradients, and this function will first search the gradient list to find a matching gradient pixelmap before creating a new pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12615">Innymi słowy, ten sam Pixelmap gradientu jest potrzebny wiele razy, tylko jeden Pixelmap jest w rzeczywistości tworzony, a każdy gradient, który wymaga tego Pixelmap, udostępnia utworzony Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12615">In other words,  the same gradient pixelmap is needed multiple times, only one pixelmap is actually created, and each gradient that requires this pixelmap shares the created pixelmap.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12616">Ten interfejs API wymaga zdefiniowania funkcji gx_system_memory_allocator, aby zezwalać na alokację pamięci środowiska uruchomieniowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12616">This API requires the gx_system_memory_allocator function be defined to allow runtime memory allocation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12617">Flagi typu gradientu obejmują GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA i GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MIRROR.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12617">The gradient type flags include GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA and GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MIRROR.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12618">Obecnie są obsługiwane tylko gradienty typu GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA (tj. Ta flaga typu musi być ustawiona).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12618">Only  GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA type gradients are currently supported (i.e. this type flag must be set).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12619">Flaga GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MORROR jest opcjonalna, a po ustawieniu powoduje, że logika tworzenia gradientu tworzy gradient, który zmienia się z start_alpha na end_alpha i z powrotem do start_alpha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12619">The  GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MORROR flag is optional, and when set  instructs the gradient creation logic to create a gradient that changes from start_alpha to end_alpha and back to start_alpha.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12620">W przeciwnym razie jest tworzony gradient liniowy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12620">Otherwise a linear gradient is created.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12621">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12621">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12622">**gradient**: wskaźnik do struktury bloku sterowania gradientem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12622">**gradient**: Pointer to gradient control block structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12623">**Width**: żądana szerokość Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12623">**width**: Requested pixelmap width</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12624">**wysokość**: żądana wysokość Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12624">**height**: Requested pixelmap height</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12625">**Typ**: żądany typ gradientu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12625">**type**: Requested gradient type</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12626">**start_alpha**: Rozpoczynanie wartości alfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12626">**start_alpha**: Starting alpha value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12627">**end_alpha**: końcowa wartość alfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12627">**end_alpha**: End alpha value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12628">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12628">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12629">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) gradient został utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12629">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Gradient was created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12630">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0X19) gradient nie ma co najmniej 2x2 pikseli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12630">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Gradient is not at least 2x2 pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12631">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0X28) gradient nie jest typu GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12631">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x28) Gradient is not type GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12632">**GX_FAILURE**: program przydzielania pamięci (0x10) nie został zdefiniowany lub alokacja pamięci nie powiodła się</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12632">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12633">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12633">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12634">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik gradientu<</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12634">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Gradient pointer not valid<</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12635">Wartość parametru **GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) nie jest prawidłowa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12635">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Width and height value not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12636">Typ gradientu **GX_INVALID_TYPE**: (0x1B) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12636">**GX_INVALID_TYPE**: (0x1B) Gradient type not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12637">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12637">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12638">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12638">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12639">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12639">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_GRADIENT gradient;

UINT status;

status = gx_utiity_gradient_create(&gradient, 3, 40,
    GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA, 240, 0);

/* If status == GX_SUCCESS the gradient pixelmap has been created */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_gradient_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12657">gx_utility_gradient_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12657">gx_utility_gradient_delete</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12658">Usuwanie wcześniej utworzonego gradientu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12658">Delete a previously created gradient</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12659">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12659">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_gradient_delete(GX_GRADIENT *gradient);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12660">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12660">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12661">Ta usługa usuwa wcześniej utworzony gradient.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12661">This service deletes a previously created gradient.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12662">Jeśli Pixelmap skojarzony z tym gradientem nie jest używany przez żadne inne gradienty, dane Pixelmap również zostaną usunięte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12662">If the pixelmap associated with this gradient is not in use by any other gradients, the pixelmap data will also be deleted.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12663">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12663">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12664">**gradient**: wskaźnik do bloku sterowania gradientem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12664">**gradient**: Pointer to gradient control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12665">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12665">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12666">Gradient **GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) został usunięty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12666">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Gradient was deleted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12667">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12667">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12668">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) wskaźnik gradientu jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12668">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Gradient pointer is not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12669">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12669">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12670">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12670">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12671">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12671">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_GRADIENT gradient;

UINT status;

/* Delete previously created gradient. */
status = gx_utility_gradient_delete(&gradient);

/* If status == GX_SUCCESS, the gradient has been deleted. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_ltoa"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12689">gx_utility_ltoa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12689">gx_utility_ltoa</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12690">Konwertuj liczbę całkowitą na ASCII</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12690">Convert long integer to ASCII</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12691">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12691">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_itoa(
    LONG value, 
    GX_CHAR *return_buffer,
    UINT seturn_buffer_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12692">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12692">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12693">Ta usługa konwertuje wartość Long Integer na ciąg ASCII.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12693">This service converts a long integer value into an ASCII string.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12694">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12694">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12695">**Value**: wartość Long Integer do przekonwertowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12695">**value**: Long integer value to convert</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12696">**return_buffer**: bufor docelowy dla ciągu ASCII</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12696">**return_buffer**: Destination buffer for ASCII string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12697">**return_buffer_size**: rozmiar buforu docelowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12697">**return_buffer_size**: Size of destination buffer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12698">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12698">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12699">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślnie przekonwertowano wartość całkowitą na ciąg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12699">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully converted integer value to string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12700">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik buforu powrotu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12700">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid return buffer pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12701">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0X19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar buforu powrotu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12701">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid return buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12702">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12702">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12703">Wszystko</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12703">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12704">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12704">Example</span></span>

```C
INT my_value = 200;

GX_CHAR string_buffer[10];

UINT status;

/* Convert “my_value” into an ASCII string. */
status = gx_utility_ltoa(my_value, string_buffer, 10);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “string_buffer” contains the ASCII
representation of “my_value”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_acos"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12720">gx_utility_math_acos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12720">gx_utility_math_acos</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12721">Arcus cosinus łuku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12721">Compute arc cosine</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12722">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12722">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_math_acos(GX_FIXED_VAL x);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12723">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12723">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12724">Ta usługa oblicza wartość kąta łuku x.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12724">This service computes the angle value of the arc cosine x.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12725">Wartość wejściowa jest stałym typem danych, wywołanie GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE do konwersji z typu INT na typ GX_FIXED_VAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12725">The input value is a fixed point data type, call GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12726">Na przykład jeśli chcesz obliczyć cosinus łuku 0,5, wprowadź dane wejściowe jako GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE (1)/2.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12726">For example, if you want to calculate the arc cosine of 0.5, make the input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12727">W 5.4.0 lub w mniejszej wersji GUIX typ wartości wejściowej tej funkcji to INT, a wartość jest ograniczona do zakresu [-256, 256].</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12727">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX, the input value type of this function is INT, and the value is limited to the range [-256, 256].</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12728">Aplikacja musi skalować wartość z zakresu [-1, 1] do zakresu [-256, 256] przed wywołaniem tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12728">The application must scale the value from range [-1, 1] to range [-256, 256] before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12729">Jeśli projekt z GUIX w wersji równej lub mniejszej niż 5.4.0 ma odwołanie do tego interfejsu API i chcesz uaktualnić projekt przy użyciu najnowszej biblioteki GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12729">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0 has reference to this API, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12730">Dostępne są dwie opcje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12730">You have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12731">Popraw wartość wejściową tego wywołania interfejsu API, aby użyć wartości typu danych GX_FIXED_VAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12731">Fix the input value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL data type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12732">Zdefiniuj GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12732">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12733">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12733">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12734">**x**: wartość, której cosinus łuku jest obliczany</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12734">**x**: Value whose arc cosine is computed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12735">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12735">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12736">**kąt**: wartość kąta łuku cosinus x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12736">**angle**: Angle value of arc cosine x</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12737">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12737">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12738">Wszystko</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12738">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12739">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12739">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compute the angle value of arc cosine of “0.5”. */

#if defined(GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
    x = 256 / 2;
#else
    x = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2;
#endif

angle = gx_utility_math_acos(x);

/* “angle” contains the angle value of arc cosine “x”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_asin"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12757">gx_utility_math_asin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12757">gx_utility_math_asin</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12758">Arcus sinus łuku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12758">Compute arc sine</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12759">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12759">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_math_asin(GX_FIXED_VAL x);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12760">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12760">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12761">Ta usługa oblicza wartość kąta łuku x.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12761">This service computes the angle value of the arc sine x.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12762">Wartość wejściowa jest stałym typem danych, wywołanie GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE do konwersji z typu INT na typ GX_FIXED_VAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12762">The input value is a fixed point data type, call  GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL  type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12763">Na przykład jeśli chcesz obliczyć sinus łuku 0,5, wprowadź dane wejściowe jako GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE (1)/2.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12763">For example, if you want to calculate the arc sin of 0.5, make the input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12764">W 5.4.0 lub w mniejszej wersji GUIX typ wartości wejściowej tej funkcji to INT, a wartość jest ograniczona do zakresu [-256, 256].</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12764">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX, the input value type of this function is INT, and the value is limited to the range [-256, 256].</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12765">Aplikacja musi skalować wartość z zakresu [-1, 1] do zakresu [-256, 256] przed wywołaniem tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12765">The application must scale the value from range [-1, 1] to range [-256, 256] before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12766">Jeśli projekt ma wersję GUIX równą lub mniejszą niż 5.4.0, i chcesz uaktualnić projekt przy użyciu najnowszej biblioteki GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12766">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12767">Dostępne są dwie opcje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12767">You have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12768">Popraw wartość wejściową tego wywołania interfejsu API, aby użyć wartości typu danych GX_FIXED_VAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12768">Fix the input value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL data type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12769">Zdefiniuj GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12769">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12770">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12770">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12771">**x**: wartość, której sinus łuku jest obliczany</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12771">**x**: Value whose arc sine is computed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12772">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12772">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12773">**kąt**: wartość kąta łuku sinus x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12773">**angle**: Angle value of arc sine x</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12774">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12774">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12775">Wszystko</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12775">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12776">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12776">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compute the angle value of arc sine of “x”. */

#if defined GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY
    x = 256 / 2;
#else
    X = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2;
#endif

angle = gx_utility_math_asin(x);

/* “angle” contains the angle value of arc sine “x”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_cos"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12794">gx_utility_math_cos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12794">gx_utility_math_cos</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12795">Cosinus obliczeń</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12795">Compute cosine</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12796">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12796">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_FIXED_VAL gx_utility_math_cos(GX_FIXED_VAL angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12797">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12797">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12798">Ta usługa oblicza cosinus podanego kąta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12798">This service computes the cosine of the supplied angle.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12799">Wartość wejściowa jest stałym typem danych, wywołanie GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE do konwersji z INT na GX_FIXED_VAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12799">The input value is a fixed point data type, call  GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12800">Na przykład jeśli chcesz obliczyć cosinus o 90 stopni, wprowadź dane wejściowe jako GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE (90).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12800">For example, if you want to calculate the cosine of 90 degree, make input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(90).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12801">Wartość zwracana jest stałym typem danych, wywołanie GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT do konwersji z GX_FIXED_VAL na INT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12801">The return value is a fixed point data type, call  GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT to convert from GX_FIXED_VAL to INT.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12802">W wersji GUIX 5.4.0 lub o mniejszej wersji wartość wejściowa i typ wartości zwracanej tej usługi to INT, wartość wejściowa i wartość zwracana są powiększone o 256.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12802">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX version, the input value and return value type of this service is INT, the input value and return value are enlarged by 256.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12803">W związku z tym aplikacja musi skalować wartość kąta o 256 przed wywołaniem tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12803">And therefore, the application must scale the angle value by 256 before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12804">Jeśli projekt ma wersję GUIX równą lub mniejszą niż 5.4.0 i chcesz uaktualnić projekt przy użyciu najnowszej biblioteki GUIX, dostępne są dwie opcje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12804">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library, you have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12805">Popraw wartość wejściową i obsługę do wartości zwracanej tego wywołania interfejsu API, aby użyć wartości typu daty GX_FIXED_VAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12805">Fix the input value and the handling to the return value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL date type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12806">Zdefiniuj GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12806">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12807">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12807">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12808">**kąt**: kąt oblicza cosinus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12808">**angle**: Angle to compute cosine of</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12809">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12809">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12810">**cosinus**: cosinus podanego kąta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12810">**cosine**: Cosine of supplied angle</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12811">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12811">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12812">Wszystko</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12812">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12813">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12813">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compute cosine of 90 degree. */

INT angle = 90;

#if defined (GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
    INT scaled_angle = angle << 8;
#else
    GX_FIXED_VAL scaled_angle = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(angle);
#endif

my_angle_cosine = gx_utility_math_cos(scaled_angle);

/* “my_angle_cosine” contains the cosine of “my_angle”. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12839">W 5.4.0 lub mniejszej wersji GUIX, wartość wejściowa i typ zwracanej wartości to INT, wartość wejściowa i wartość zwracana są powiększone o 256.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12839">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX, the input value and return value type is INT, the input value and return value are enlarged by 256.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12840">W związku z tym aplikacja musi skalować wartość kąta o 256 przed wywołaniem tej usługi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12840">And therefore, the application must scale the angle value by 256 before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12841">Jeśli projekt ma wersję GUIX równą lub mniejszą niż 5.4.0 i chcesz uaktualnić projekt przy użyciu najnowszej biblioteki GUIX, dostępne są dwie opcje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12841">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library, you have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12842">Popraw wartość wejściową i przekazanie do zwracanej wartości tego wywołania interfejsu API, aby użyć wartości typu danych GX_FIXED_VAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12842">Fix the input value and the handing to the return value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL data type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12843">Zdefiniuj GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12843">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12845">**kąt**: kąt do obliczenia sinusa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12845">**angle**: Angle to compute sine of</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12846">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12846">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12847">**sinus**: sinus podanego kąta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12847">**sine**: Sine of supplied angle</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12850">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12850">Example</span></span>

```C
INT my_angle = 80;

/* Compute sine of “my_angle”. */

#if defined(GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
    INT scaled_angle = my_angle << 8;
#else
    GX_FIXED_VAL = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(my_angle);
#endif

my_angle_sine = gx_utility_math_sin(scaled_angle);

/* “my_angle_sine” contains the sine of “my_angle”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12895">gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12895">gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12896">Zmień kolejność tekstu dwukierunkowego w kolejności wyświetlania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12896">Reorder BiDi text into its display order</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12897">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12897">Prototype</span></span>

