```C
                                       GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO **resolved_info_head)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12898">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12898">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12899">Ta usługa zmienia kolejność tekstu dwukierunkowego w kolejności wyświetlania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12899">This service reorders BiDi text into its display order.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12900">Jeśli podano czcionkę rysowania tekstu i szerokość wyświetlania, najpierw zostanie zastosowany podział wiersza, a proces zmiany kolejności zostanie zastosowany na podstawie poszczególnych wierszy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12900">If text draw font and display width are provided, line breaking will be applied first, reordering process will be applied based on each line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12901">Jeśli podany tekst zawiera więcej niż jeden akapit, usługa spowoduje przerwanie tekstu w akapitach, podział wiersza i zmiana kolejności każdego akapitu zostaną połączone jako lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12901">If the provided text contains more than one paragraph, the service will break the text into paragraphs, the line breaking and reordering result of each paragraph will be linked as a list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12902">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12902">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12903">**input_info**: wskaźnik do informacji o dzieleniu wierszy i zmianach kolejności tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12903">**input_info**: Pointer to the information for line breaking and text reordering</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12904">**resolved_info_head**: wskaźnik do połączonej listy, który zawiera podział wierszy i zmianę kolejności wyników każdego akapitu podanego tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12904">**resolved_info_head**: Pointer to the linked list that contains line breaking and reordering results of each paragraph of the the provided text</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12905">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12905">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12906">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) pomyślna zmiana kolejności tekstu dwukierunkowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12906">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful bidi text reorder</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12907">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) nieprawidłowe wskaźniki wejściowe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12907">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12908">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: program przydzielania pamięci (0x30) nie został zdefiniowany lub alokacja pamięci nie powiodła się</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12908">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12909">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12909">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12910">Wszystko</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12910">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12911">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12911">Example</span></span>
#### <a name="draw-single-line-bidi-text-to-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12912">Rysuj jednowierszowy tekst dwukierunkowy do kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12912">Draw single line bidi text to canvas</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Single Line String";
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = GX_NULL;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = -1;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_left,
                                widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_top,
                                resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text);

        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```
#### <a name="draw-multi-line-bidi-text-to-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12913">Rysuj wieloliniowy tekst dwukierunkowy do kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12913">Draw multi line bidi text to canvas</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Multi Line BiDi Text Display Example";
    GX_FONT *font;
    GX_RECTANGLE client;
    GX_VALUE display_width;
    INT index;
    GX_VALUE xpos;
    GX_VALUE ypos;
    
    /* Pickup the font. */
    gx_context_font_get(font_id, &font);
    gx_widget_client_get(widget, 2, &client);
    
    display_width = (GX_VALUE)(client.gx_rectangle_right - client.gx_rectangle_left + 1);
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = font;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = display_width;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        xpos = client.gx_rectangle_left;
        ypos = client.gx_rectangle_top;
        
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        for(index = 0; index < resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_total_lines; index++)
        {
            gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(xpos, ypos, &resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text[index]);
        
            ypos += font->gx_font_line_height;
        }
        
        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```

#### <a name="draw-multi-paragraph-bidi-text-to-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12914">Rysuj dwuakapitowy tekst dwukierunkowy do kanwy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12914">Draw multi paragraph bidi text to canvas</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *next;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Multi Paragraph\r BiDi Text Display Example";
    GX_FONT *font;
    GX_RECTANGLE client;
    GX_VALUE display_width;
    INT index;
    GX_VALUE xpos;
    GX_VALUE ypos;
    
    /* Pickup the font. */
    gx_context_font_get(font_id, &font);
    gx_widget_client_get(widget, 2, &client);
    
    display_width = (GX_VALUE)(client.gx_rectangle_right - client.gx_rectangle_left + 1);
    
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = font;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = display_width;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        xpos = client.gx_rectangle_left;
        ypos = client.gx_rectangle_top;
        
        next = resolved_info;
        
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        while(next)
        {
            for(index = 0; index < next.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_total_lines; index++)
            {
                gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(xpos, ypos, &next.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text[index]);
            
                ypos += font->gx_font_line_height;
            }
            
            next = next->gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_next;
        }
        
        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12921">Ta usługa usuwa listę rozwiązanych informacji, która zwróciła gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12921">This service deletes resolved information list that returned by gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12922">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12922">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12923">**resolved_info_head**: wskaźnik do rozwiązanej listy informacji o tekście dwukierunkowym</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12923">**resolved_info_head**: Pointer to the resolved BiDi text information list</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12924">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12924">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12925">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślne rozwiązany usuwanie tekstu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12925">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful resolved text delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12926">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) nieprawidłowe wskaźniki wejściowe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12926">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12927">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: program przydzielania pamięci (0x30) nie został zdefiniowany lub alokacja pamięci nie powiodła się</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12927">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12928">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12928">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12929">Wszystko</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12929">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12930">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12930">Example</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Single Line String";
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = GX_NULL;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = -1;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_left,
                                widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_top,
                                resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text);

        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_utility_pixelmap_resize"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12933">gx_utility_pixelmap_resize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12933">gx_utility_pixelmap_resize</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12934">Zmień rozmiar Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12934">Resize pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12935">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12935">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_pixelmap_resize(
    GX_PIXELMAP *src,
    GX_PIXELMAP *destination, 
    INT width, 
    INT height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12936">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12936">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12937">Ta usługa zmienia rozmiar Pixelmap i zwraca wskaźnik do nowego Pixelmap, który jest wynikiem zmiany rozmiaru Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12937">This service resizes a pixelmap and returns a pointer to a new pixelmap, which is the result of the pixelmap resize.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12938">Ta usługa wymaga wcześniejszego użycia gx_system_memory_allocator_set, aby umożliwić alokację pamięci do przechowywania danych Pixelmap o zmienionym rozmiarze.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12938">This service requires the prior use of gx_system_memory_allocator_set, to allow allocation of memory to hold the resized pixelmap data.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12939">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12939">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12940">**src**: wskaźnik do Pixelmap do zmiany rozmiaru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12940">**src**: Pointer to the pixelmap to resize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12941">**miejsce docelowe**: bufor docelowy dla wyników Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12941">**destination**: Destination buffer for the resulting pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12942">**Width**: szerokość wyników Pixelmap (w pikselach)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12942">**width**: Width of the resulting pixelmap, in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12943">**Height**: Hieght wyników Pixelmap w pikselach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12943">**height**: Hieght of the resulting pixelmap, in pixels</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12944">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12944">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12945">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślne zmiana rozmiaru Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12945">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful pixelmap resize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12946">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowa źródłowa lub docelowa wskaźnik Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12946">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid source or destination pixelmap pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12947">Wartość szerokości lub wysokości **GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) jest nieprawidłowa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12947">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Width or height value not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12948">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0X28) Źródło Pixelmap jest skompresowanym formatem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12948">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x28) Source pixelmap is compressed format</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12949">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: program przydzielania pamięci (0x30) nie został zdefiniowany lub alokacja pamięci nie powiodła się</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12949">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12950">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12950">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12951">Wszystko</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12951">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12952">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12952">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXLEMAP *des_pixelmap;

/* Resize “src_pixelmap” with specifiy width and height. */
status = gx_utility_pixelmap_resize(src_pixelmap,
    &des_pixelmap, 100, 200);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS. “des_pixelmap” successfully load the
resulting pixelmap of resize. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12969">gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12969">gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12970">Obróć Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12970">Rotate pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12971">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12971">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(
    GX_PIXELMAP *src, INT angle,
    GX_PIXELMAP *destination,
    UINT *rot_cx, 
    UINT *rot_cy);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12972">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12972">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12973">Ta usługa obraca Pixelmap i zwraca wskaźnik do nowego Pixelmap, który jest wynikiem obrotu Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12973">This service rotates a pixelmap and returns a pointer to a new pixelmap, which is the result of the pixelmap rotation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12974">Aby obrócić Pixelmap bezpośrednio do kanwy, użyj gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12974">To rotate a pixelmap directly to the canvas, use gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12975">Ta usługa wymaga wcześniejszego użycia gx_system_memory_allocator_set, aby umożliwić alokacji pamięci przechowywanie obróconych danych Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12975">This service requires the prior use of gx_system_memory_allocator_set, to allow allocation of memory to hold the rotated pixelmap data.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12976">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12976">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12977">**src**: Pixelmap do obrócenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12977">**src**: The pixelmap to rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12978">**kąt**: kąt obrotu w stopniach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12978">**angle**: Angle of rotation in degrees</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12979">**miejsce docelowe**: bufor docelowy dla wyników Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12979">**destination**: Destination buffer for the resulting pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12980">**rot_cx**: pobrana Współrzędna x środka rotacji w odniesieniu do elementu docelowego Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12980">**rot_cx**: Retrieved x coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12981">Powinna zostać zainicjowana przy użyciu współrzędnych x środka rotacji w odniesieniu do źródła Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12981">Should be initiated with the x coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12982">Jeśli rot_cx jest GX_NULL, wartość nie zostanie pobrana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12982">If rot_cx is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12983">**rot_cy**: pobrana Współrzędna y środka rotacji w odniesieniu do elementu docelowego Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12983">**rot_cy**: Retrieved y coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12984">Powinna zostać zainicjowana przy użyciu Współrzędna y środka rotacji w odniesieniu do źródła Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12984">Should be initiated with the y coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12985">Jeśli rot_cy jest GX_NULL, wartość nie zostanie pobrana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12985">If rot_cy is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12986">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12986">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12987">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślne obracanie Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12987">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful pixelmap rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12988">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowa źródłowa lub docelowa wskaźnik Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12988">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid source or destination pixelmap pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12989">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) wartość kąta wynosi 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12989">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Angle value is 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12990">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0X28) Źródło Pixelmap jest skompresowanym formatem, co nie jest obsługiwane.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12990">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0x28) Source pixelmap is compressed format, which is not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-12991">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: program przydzielania pamięci (0x30) nie został zdefiniowany lub alokacja pamięci nie powiodła się</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12991">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12992">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12992">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-12993">Wszystko</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12993">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-12994">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-12994">Example</span></span>

```C
rot_cx = source_rotate_center_x;
rot_cy = source_rotate_center_y;

/* rotate “src_pixelmap” by 30 degree in clockwise direction. */
status = gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(src_pixelmap, 30,
    &des_pixelmap, &rot_cx, &rot_cy);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS. “des_pixelmap” successfully load the
resulting pixelmap of rotation. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13013">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13013">Prototype</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13014">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13014">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13015">Ta usługa obraca Pixelmap o 90 stopni, 180 stopnia lub 270 stopień.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13015">This service rotates a pixelmap by 90 degree, 180 degree or 270 degree.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13016">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13016">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13017">**src**: Pixelmap do obrócenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13017">**src**: The pixelmap to rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13018">**kąt**: kąt obrotu w stopniach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13018">**angle**: Angle of rotation in degrees</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13019">**miejsce docelowe**: bufor docelowy dla wyników Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13019">**destination**: Destination buffer for the resulting pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13020">**rot_cx**: pobrana Współrzędna x środka rotacji w odniesieniu do elementu docelowego Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13020">**rot_cx**: Retrieved x coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13021">Powinna zostać zainicjowana przy użyciu współrzędnych x środka rotacji w odniesieniu do źródła Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13021">Should be initiated with the x coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13022">Jeśli rot_cx jest GX_NULL, wartość nie zostanie pobrana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13022">If rot_cx is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13023">**rot_cy**: pobrana Współrzędna y środka rotacji w odniesieniu do elementu docelowego Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13023">**rot_cy**: Retrieved y coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13024">Powinna zostać zainicjowana przy użyciu Współrzędna y środka rotacji w odniesieniu do źródła Pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13024">Should be initiated with the y coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13025">Jeśli rot_cy jest GX_NULL, wartość nie zostanie pobrana.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13025">If rot_cy is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13026">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13026">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13027">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślne obracanie Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13027">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful pixelmap rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13028">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowa źródłowa lub docelowa wskaźnik Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13028">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid source or destination pixelmap pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13029">Wartość kąta **GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) to 0 lub nie jest to prosty kąt, taki jak 90, 180, 270</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13029">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Angle value is 0 or not a simple angle like 90, 180, 270</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13030">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0X28) Źródło Pixelmap jest skompresowanym formatem, co nie jest obsługiwane.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13030">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0x28) Source pixelmap is compressed format, which is not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13031">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: program przydzielania pamięci (0x30) nie został zdefiniowany lub alokacja pamięci nie powiodła się</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13031">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**:  (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13032">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13032">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13033">Wszystko</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13033">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13034">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13034">Example</span></span>

```C
rot_cx = source_rotate_center_x;
rot_cy = source_rotate_center_y;

/* rotate “src_pixelmap” by 90 degree in clockwise direction. */
status = gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate(src_pixelmap, 90,
    &des_pixelmap,
    &rot_cx, &rot_cy);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS. “des_pixelmap” successfully load the
resulting pixelmap of rotation. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_center"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13050">gx_utility_rectangle_center</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13050">gx_utility_rectangle_center</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13051">Wyśrodkuj prostokąt w innym prostokącie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13051">Center rectangle within another rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13052">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13052">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_center(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *within_rectangle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13053">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13053">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13054">Ta usługa centrum usług umieszcza prostokąt w innym prostokącie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13054">This service centers the rectangle within another rectangle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13055">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13055">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13056">**prostokąt**: prostokąt do środka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13056">**rectangle**: Rectangle to center</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13057">**within_rectangle**: prostokąt do wyśrodkowania w obrębie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13057">**within_rectangle**: Rectangle to center within</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13058">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13058">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13059">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślnie wyśrodkować prostokąt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13059">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully centered the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13060">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik prostokąta wejściowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13060">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input rectangle pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13061">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0X19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar prostokąta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13061">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid rectangle size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13062">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13062">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13063">Wszystko</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13063">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13064">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13064">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Center “my_inner_rectangle” inside of “my_outer_rectangle”.*/
status = gx_utility_rectangle_center(&my_inner_rectangle,
    &my_outer_rectangle);

/* Is status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_inner_rectangle” is centered
within “my_other_rectangle”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_center_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13080">gx_utility_rectangle_center_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13080">gx_utility_rectangle_center_find</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13081">Znajdź środek prostokąta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13081">Find center of rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13082">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13082">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_center_find(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_POINT *return_center);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13083">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13083">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13084">Ta usługa znajduje środek prostokąta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13084">This service finds the center of the rectangle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13085">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13085">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13086">**prostokąt**: prostokąt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13086">**rectangle**: Rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13087">**return_center**: wskaźnik do punktu środkowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13087">**return_center**: Pointer to center point</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13088">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13088">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13089">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślnie odnalazło środek prostokąta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13089">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully found the center of the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13090">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik wejściowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13090">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13091">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0X19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar prostokąta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13091">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid rectangle size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13092">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13092">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13093">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13093">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13094">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13094">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_RECTANGLE my_rectangle;

GX_POINT my_center_point;

gx_utility_define(&my_rectangle, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Find center of “my_rectangle””. */

status = gx_utility_rectangle_center_find(&my_rectangle,
    &my_center_point);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_center_point” is the center point
of “my_rectangle” (50, 50). */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_combine"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13110">gx_utility_rectangle_combine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13110">gx_utility_rectangle_combine</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13111">Połącz dwa prostokąty w pierwszej kolejności</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13111">Combine two rectangles into first</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13112">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13112">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_combine(
    GX_RECTANGLE *first_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *second_rectangle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13113">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13113">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13114">Ta usługa łączy pierwszy i drugi prostokąt do pierwszego prostokąta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13114">This service combines the first and second rectangle into the first rectangle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13115">Pierwszy prostokąt jest rozwinięty w celu uwzględnienia drugiego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13115">The first rectangle is expanded to include the second.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13116">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13116">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13117">**first_rectangle**: pierwszy prostokąt i połączony prostokąt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13117">**first_rectangle**: First rectangle and combined rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13118">**second_rectangle**: drugi prostokąt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13118">**second_rectangle**: Second rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13119">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13119">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13120">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślnie połączone dwa prostokąty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13120">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully combined two rectangles</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13121">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik wejściowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13121">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13122">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13122">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13123">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13123">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13124">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13124">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_RECTANGLE rect_a;

GX_RECTANGLE rect_b;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&rect_a, 0, 0, 100, 100);
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&rect_b, 50, 50, 200, 200);

/* Combine “my_rectangle_a” to “my_rectangle_b”. */
status = gx_utility_rectangle_combine(&rect_a, &rect_b);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “rect_a” is (0, 0, 200, 200) the merger
of the original “rect_a” and “rect_b”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_compare"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13140">gx_utility_rectangle_compare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13140">gx_utility_rectangle_compare</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13141">Porównaj dwa prostokąty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13141">Compare two rectangles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13142">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13142">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL gx_utility_rectangle_compare( 
    GX_RECTANGLE *first_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *second_rectangle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13143">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13143">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13144">Ta usługa porównuje pierwszy i drugi prostokąt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13144">This service compares the first and second rectangle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13145">Jeśli są równe, zwracana jest wartość GX_TRUE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13145">If they are equal, a value of GX_TRUE is returned.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13146">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13146">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13147">**first_rectangle**: pierwszy prostokąt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13147">**first_rectangle**: First rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13148">**second_rectangle**: drugi prostokąt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13148">**second_rectangle**: Second rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13149">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13149">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13150">**wynik**: GX_TRUE, jeśli prostokąty są równe. w przeciwnym razie GX_FALSE jest zwracany.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13150">**result**: GX_TRUE if rectangles are equal, otherwise GX_FALSE is returned.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13151">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13151">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13152">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13152">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13153">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13153">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compare “my_rectangle_a” to “my_rectangle_b”. */
result = gx_utility_rectangle_compare(&my_rectangle_a,
    &my_rectangle_b);

/* If result is GX_TRUE, the two rectangles are equal. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13169">gx_utility_rectangle_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13169">gx_utility_rectangle_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13170">Definiowanie prostokąta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13170">Define a rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13171">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13171">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_define(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_VALUE left,
    GX_VALUE top, 
    GX_VALUE right, 
    GX_VALUE bottom);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13172">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13172">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13173">Ta usługa definiuje prostokąt jako określony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13173">This service defines a rectangle as specified.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13174">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13174">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13175">**prostokąt**: blok sterowania prostokątem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13175">**rectangle**: Rectangle control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13176">z **lewej**: z lewej strony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13176">**left**: Left most coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13177">**Góra**: najwyższe współrzędne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13177">**top**: Top most coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13178">**prawy**: najbardziej koordynuje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13178">**right**: Right most coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13179">**dół**: najbardziej koordynuj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13179">**bottom**: Bottom most coordinate</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13180">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13180">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13181">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślnie zdefiniowano prostokąt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13181">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully defined a rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13182">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik prostokąta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13182">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid rectangle pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13183">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13183">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13184">Wszystko</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13184">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13185">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13185">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_RECTANGLE my_rect;

/* Define “my_rect”. */

status = gx_utility_rectangle_define(&my_rect, 10, 5, 200, 100);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_rect” is defined. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13201">gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13201">gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13202">Wykrywanie nakładania się prostokątów</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13202">Detect overlap of rectangles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13203">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13203">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect(
    GX_RECTANGLE *first_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *second_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *return_overlap_area);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13204">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13204">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13205">Ta usługa wykrywa dowolne nakładanie się w dostarczone prostokąty.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13205">This service detects any overlap of the supplied rectangles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13206">Jeśli zostanie znalezione nakładanie się, usługa zwraca GX_TRUE i nakładający się prostokąt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13206">If overlap is found, the service returns GX_TRUE and the overlapping rectangle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13207">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13207">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13208">**first_rectangle**: pierwszy prostokąt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13208">**first_rectangle**: First rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13209">**second_rectangle**: drugi prostokąt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13209">**second_rectangle**: Second rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13210">**return_overlap_area**: nakładający się obszar prostokąta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13210">**return_overlap_area**: Overlapping rectangle area</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13211">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13211">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13212">**wynik**: GX_TRUE, jeśli prostokąty nakładają się, w przeciwnym razie GX_FALSE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13212">**result**: GX_TRUE if rectangles overlap, otherwise GX_FALSE.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13213">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13213">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13214">Wszystko</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13214">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13215">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13215">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Detect overlap of “my_rectangle_a” and “my_rectangle_b”. */
result = gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect(&my_rectangle_a,
    &my_rectangle_b,
    &my_overlap_area);

/* If result is GX_TRUE, “my_overlap_area” specifies the area the
rectangles overlap. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13231">gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13231">gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13232">Wykryj, czy punkt znajduje się w prostokącie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13232">Detect if point resides in rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13233">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13233">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_POINT point);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13234">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13234">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13235">Ta usługa wykrywa, czy określony punkt znajduje się w prostokącie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13235">This service detects if the specified point resides in the rectangle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13236">Jeśli punkt znajduje się w prostokącie, usługa zwraca GX_TRUE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13236">If the point does reside in the rectangle, the service returns  GX_TRUE.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13237">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13237">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13238">**prostokąt**: prostokąt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13238">**rectangle**: Rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13239">**punkt**: punkt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13239">**point**: Point</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13240">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13240">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13241">**wynik**: GX_TRUE, jeśli punkt znajduje się w prostokącie, w przeciwnym razie GX_FALSE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13241">**result**: GX_TRUE if point resides in rectangle, otherwise GX_FALSE</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13242">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13242">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13243">Wszystko</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13243">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13244">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13244">Example</span></span>

```c
GX_RECTANGLE my_rectangle;

GX_POINT my_point;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&my_rectangle, 0, 0, 100, 100);

my_point.gx_point_x = 20; my_point.gx_point_y = 20;

/* Detect if point “my_point” is within “my_rectangle””. */
result = gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect(&my_rectangle,
    &my_point);

/* If result is GX_TRUE, “my_point” resides in the rectangle. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_resize"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13260">gx_utility_rectangle_resize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13260">gx_utility_rectangle_resize</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13261">Prostokąt wzrostu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13261">Grow rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13262">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13262">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_resize(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_VALUE adjust);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13263">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13263">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13264">Ta usługa zwiększa rozmiar prostokąta w określony sposób.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13264">This service increases the size of the rectangle as specified.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13265">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13265">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13266">**prostokąt**: wskaźnik do prostokąta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13266">**rectangle**: Pointer to rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13267">**Dostosuj**: wartość, aby dopasować prostokąt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13267">**adjust**: Amount to adjust the rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13268">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13268">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13269">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślnie Zmieniono rozmiar prostokąta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13269">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully resized the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13270">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik prostokąta wejściowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13270">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input rectangle pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13271">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13271">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13272">Wszystko</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13272">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13273">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13273">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Adjust “my_rectangle” by increasing 20 pixels on four sides */
status = gx_utility_rectangle_resize(&my_rectangle, 20);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_rectangle” is 20 pixels larger. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_shift"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13289">gx_utility_rectangle_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13289">gx_utility_rectangle_shift</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13290">Prostokąt przesunięcia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13290">Shift rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13291">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13291">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_shift(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_VALUE x_shift,
    GX_VALUE y_shift);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13292">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13292">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13293">Ta usługa przenosi prostokąt według określonych wartości.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13293">This service shifts the rectangle by the specified values.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13294">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13294">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13295">**prostokąt**: prostokąt do przesunięcia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13295">**rectangle**: Rectangle to shift</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13296">**x_shif**: liczba pikseli do przesunięcia na osi x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13296">**x_shif**: Number of pixels to shift on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13297">**y_shift**: liczba pikseli do przesunięcia na osi y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13297">**y_shift**: Number of pixels to shift on the y-axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13298">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13298">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13299">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0X00) pomyślnie przesunie prostokąt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13299">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully shifted the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13300">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik prostokąta wejściowego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13300">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input rectangle pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13301">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13301">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13302">Wszystko</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13302">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13303">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13303">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Shift “my_rectangle”. */

status = gx_utility_rectangle_shift(&my_rectangle, 10, 20);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_rectangle” has been shifted. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_string_to_alphamap"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13319">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13319">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13320">Renderowanie ciągu do typu 8bpp alphamap Pixelmap (przestarzałe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13320">Render string to an 8bpp alphamap type pixelmap (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13321">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13321">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_string_to_alphamap(
    const GX_CHAR *text, const
    GX_FONT *font, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *return_map);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13322">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13322">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13323">Ta usługa została wycofana na korzyść gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext ().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13323">This service has been deprecated in favor of gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13324">Ta usługa renderuje ciąg tekstowy do alphamap, który jest specjalną formą 8bpp Pixelmap zawierającą tylko wartości alfanumeryczne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13324">This service renders a text string to an alphamap, which is a special form of 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha values.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13325">Ta usługa jest zwykle używana wraz z gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate i gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw do rysowania obróconego tekstu na kanwie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13325">This service is typically used along with gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw to draw rotated text to the canvas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13341">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13341">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13342">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13342">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXELMAP alphamap;

GX_PIXELMAP rotated_text;

INT xpos;

INT ypos;

gx_widget_font_get(widget, GX_FONT_ID_SCREEN_LABEL, &font);

/* render string to alphamap once */

gx_utility_string_to_alphamap("Hello World", font, &alphamap);

/* rotate and render the alphmap at multiple angles */

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 45, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(10, 10, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 135, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(100, 100, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 300, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(200, 200, &rotated_text);
```

## <a name="gx_vertical_list_children_position"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13383">gx_vertical_list_children_position</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13383">gx_vertical_list_children_position</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13392">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13392">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

## <a name="gx_vertical_list_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13407">gx_vertical_list_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13407">gx_vertical_list_create</span></span>
### <a name="create-vertical-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13408">Utwórz listę pionową</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13408">Create vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13409">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13409">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_vertical_list_create(
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    INT total_rows,
    VOID (*callback)(GX_VERTICAL_LIST *, GX_WIDGET *, INT),
    ULONG style, USHORT vertical_list_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13410">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13410">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13411">Ta usługa tworzy listę pionową.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13411">This service creates a vertical list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13412">GX_VERTICAL_LIST pochodzi od GX_WINDOW i obsługuje wszystkie gx_window usługi interfejsu API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13412">GX_VERTICAL_LIST is derived from GX_WINDOW and supports all gx_window API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13413">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13413">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13414">**vertical_list** Blok kontrolny widżetu listy pionowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13414">**vertical_list** Vertical list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13415">**Nazwa** Nazwa listy pionowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13415">**name** Name of vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13416">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do elementu nadrzędnego widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13416">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13417">**total_rows** Łączna liczba wierszy na liście pionowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13417">**total_rows** Total number of rows in vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13418">**wywołanie zwrotne** Funkcja, która będzie wywoływana przez listę pionową, gdy lista zostanie przewinięty.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13418">**callback** A function that will be called by the vertical list when the list is scrolled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13419">Obiekt wywołujący powinien początkowo utworzyć wystarczającą liczbę elementów podrzędnych opartych na GX_WIDGET, aby wypełnić widoczne wiersze listy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13419">The caller should initially create enough GX_WIDGET based children to fill the visible list rows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13420">Gdy lista jest przewijana, ta funkcja jest wywoływana, aby ponownie utworzyć elementy podrzędne listy odpowiadające podanemu indeksowi listy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13420">As the list is scrolled, this function is called to re-create the list children corresponding to the supplied list index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13421">**styl** Styl widżetu ScrollBar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13421">**style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13422">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich elementów widget, a także style charakterystyczne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13422">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13423">**vertical_list_id** Zdefiniowany przez aplikację Identyfikator listy pionowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13423">**vertical_list_id** Application-defined ID of vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13424">**rozmiar** Wymiary listy pionowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13424">**size** Dimensions of vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13425">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13425">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13426">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie utworzył listę pionową</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13426">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created the vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13427">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13427">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13428">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13428">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13429">Element widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) został już utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13429">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13430">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontrolki widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13430">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13431">Niepoprawna liczba wierszy w **GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13431">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Number of rows not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13432">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13432">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13433">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13433">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13434">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13434">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13435">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13435">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create vertical list “my_list” with 20 rows. */
status = gx_vertical_list_create(&my_list, “my_list”, &my_parent,
                    20, callback, GX_STYLE_WRAP, MY_LIST_ID,
                    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the vertical list “my_list” has been created. */
```

```C

    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *list,
    INT index);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13471">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13471">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13472">Ta usługa ustawia początkowy indeks listy pionowej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13472">This service sets the starting index for the vertical list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13473">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13473">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13474">**Lista** Blok kontrolny widżetu listy pionowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13474">**list** Vertical list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13475">**indeks** Nowy indeks górny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13475">**index** The new top index</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13478">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13478">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13480">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0X22) Nieprawidłowa wartość indeksu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13480">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid index value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13481">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13481">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13482">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13482">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13483">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13483">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
been set to 4. */
```

## <a name="gx_vertical_list_selected_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13516">gx_vertical_list_selected_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13516">gx_vertical_list_selected_set</span></span>
### <a name="assign-the-selected-entry-in-a-vertical-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13517">Przypisz wybrany wpis na liście pionowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13517">Assign the selected entry in a vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13518">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13518">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_vertical_list_selected_set(
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list,
    INT index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13519">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13519">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13520">Ta usługa przypisuje wybrany wpis na liście pionowej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13520">This service assigns the selected entry in a vertical list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13521">W razie potrzeby Pionowa lista zostanie prześwietlona, aby wyświetlić wybrany wpis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13521">If necessary, the vertical list will scroll to make the selected entry visible.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13522">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13522">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13523">**vertical_list** Blok kontrolny widżetu listy pionowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13523">**vertical_list** Vertical list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13524">**indeks** Położenie nowego wpisu listy na podstawie indeksu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13524">**index** Index based position of new list entry</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13525">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13525">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13526">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił wpis listy pionowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13526">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the vertical list entry</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13527">Nie znaleziono indeksu wejściowego **GX_FAILURE** (0x10) na liście</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13527">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Input index not found in list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13528">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13528">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13529">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13529">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13530">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0X12) Pionowa lista lub element widget wpisów listy jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13530">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Vertical list or list entry widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13531">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13531">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13532">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13532">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13533">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13533">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the list entry of “my_list” to the child in line 12. */
status = gx_vertical_list_selected_set(&my_list, 12);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the list entry of “my_list” has been successfully set to 12. */
```

## <a name="gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13542">gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13542">gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-selected-widget-from-vertical-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13543">Pobierz wybrany element widget z listy pionowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13543">Get selected widget from vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13544">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13544">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get(
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list,
    GX_WIDGET **return_list_entry);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13545">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13545">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13546">Ta usługa zwraca wybrany element widget listy pionowej.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13546">This service returns the selected widget of the vertical list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13547">Należy pamiętać, że jeśli lista zawiera więcej wierszy niż podrzędne elementy widget, a wybrany widżet podrzędny został przewinięty z widoku, ta funkcja zwróci GX_NULL jako wskaźnik GX_WIDGET, ponieważ widżet został ponownie użyty do wyświetlenia nowego wpisu listy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13547">Note that if the list contains more rows than child widgets, and the selected child widget has been scrolled from view, this function will return GX_NULL as the GX_WIDGET pointer, since the widget has been reused to display a new list entry.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13548">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13548">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13549">**vertical_list** Blok kontrolny widżetu listy pionowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13549">**vertical_list** Vertical list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13550">**return_list_entry** Miejsce docelowe dla widżetu wpisu listy zwrotnej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13550">**return_list_entry** Destination for return list entry widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13551">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13551">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13552">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie pobiera wpis listy pionowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13552">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully get the vertical list entry</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13553">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) wybrany element widget został przewinięty z widoku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13553">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) The selected widget has been scrolled from view.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13554">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13554">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13555">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13555">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13556">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13556">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13557">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13557">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13558">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13558">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET *current_selected_widget;

/* Get the list entry at the current index of vertical list “my_list”. */
status = gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get(&my_list, &current_selected_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “current_list_entry” contains a pointer to the currently selected widget. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13570">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13570">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13571">Ta usługa przypisuje lub zmienia łączną liczbę wierszy listy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13571">This service assigns or changes the total number of list rows.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13577">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13577">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13578">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13578">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13579">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13579">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13580">Wartość liczby wierszy w **GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) jest nieprawidłowa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13580">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Row count value not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13581">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13581">Allowed From</span></span>
