## <a name="gx_vertical_scrollbar_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13592">gx_vertical_scrollbar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13592">gx_vertical_scrollbar_create</span></span>
### <a name="create-vertical-scrollbar"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13593">Utwórz pionowy pasek przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13593">Create vertical scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13594">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13594">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_vertical_scrollbar_create(
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WINDOW *parent,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *appearance,
    ULONG style);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13595">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13595">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13596">Ta usługa tworzy pionowy pasek przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13596">This service creates a vertical scrollbar.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13597">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13597">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13598">**pasek przewijania** Blok kontrolny widżetu ScrollBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13598">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13599">**Nazwa** Nazwa paska przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13599">**name** Name of scrollbar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13600">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do elementu nadrzędnego widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13600">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13601">**wygląd** Wygląd pionowego widżetu paska przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13601">**appearance** Appearance of vertical scrollbar widget.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13602">**styl** Styl paska przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13602">**style** Style of the scrollbar.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13603">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13603">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13605">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13605">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13606">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13606">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13608">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontrolki widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13608">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13612">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13612">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create vertical scrollbar “my_scrollbar”. */
status = gx_vertical_scrollbar_create(&my_scrollbar,
                          “my_vertical_scrollbar”,
                          &my_parent, &scrollbar_appearance,
                          GX_STYLE_ENABLED);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the vertical scrollbar “my_scrollbar” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_allocate"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13619">gx_widget_allocate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13619">gx_widget_allocate</span></span>
### <a name="allocate-a-widget-control-block"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13620">Przydzielanie bloku kontrolki widgetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13620">Allocate a widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13621">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13621">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_allocate(
    GX_WIDGET **control_block,
    ULONG memsize);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13622">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13622">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13623">Ta usługa dynamicznie przydziela blok kontrolki widżetu przez wywołanie funkcji alokacji pamięci zdefiniowanej przez aplikację.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13623">This service dynamically allocates a widget control block, by calling the application defined memory allocation function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13624">Ta usługa jest używana głównie przez funkcje wygenerowane przez GUIX Studio do dynamicznego przydzielania bloku sterowania, gdy właściwość "dynamiczna alokacja" została wybrana w widoku właściwości programu GUIX Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13624">This service is primarily used by the functions generated by GUIX Studio to dynamically allocate control block when the “Dynamic Allocation” property is selected in the GUIX Studio properties view.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13625">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13625">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13626">**control_block** Wskaźnik do zwróconego wskaźnika bloku sterowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13626">**control_block** Pointer to returned control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13627">**memsize** Rozmiar bloku kontroli (w bajtach)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13627">**memsize** Control block size, in bytes</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13628">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13628">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13629">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — przydzielenie widżetu pomyślne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13629">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget allocate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13630">Program przydzielania pamięci **GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) nie został zdefiniowany lub alokacja pamięci nie powiodła się</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13630">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13631">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13631">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13632">Nieprawidłowy rozmiar pamięci **GX_INVALID_MEMORY_SIZE** (0x29)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13632">**GX_INVALID_MEMORY_SIZE** (0x29) Memory size not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13633">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13633">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13634">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13634">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13635">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13635">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_BUTTON *button;

/* Attach “my_widget” to “my_parent”. */
status = gx_widget_allocate(&button, sizeof(GX_TEXT_BUTTON));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the button widget control block is allocated. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_attach"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13673">gx_widget_attach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13673">gx_widget_attach</span></span>
### <a name="attach-widget-to-its-parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13674">Dołącz widżet do jego elementu nadrzędnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13674">Attach widget to its parent</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13675">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13675">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_attach(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_WIDGET *widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13676">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13676">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13677">Ta usługa dołącza widżet do określonego elementu nadrzędnego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13677">This service attaches the widget to the specified parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13678">Jeśli widżet jest już dołączony do innego elementu nadrzędnego, najpierw jest odłączony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13678">If the widget is already attached to another parent, it is first detached.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13679">Jeśli widżet jest już dołączony do tego samego elementu nadrzędnego, funkcja nic nie robi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13679">If the widget is already attached to the same parent, the function does nothing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13680">Widżet zostanie przesunięty w przód od elementu nadrzędnego względem porządku osi z.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13680">The widget becomes the front-most child of its parent in terms of z ordering.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13681">Jeśli elementy widget elementu równorzędnego nakładają się, ten element widget jest rysowany na elementach równorzędnych.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13681">If sibling widgets overlap, this widget is drawn on top of siblings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13682">Aby umieścić nowy widżet z tyłu porządku osi z, użyj gx_widget_back_attach lub gx_widget_back_move.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13682">To put the new widget in the back of the z-order, use gx_widget_back_attach or gx_widget_back_move.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13683">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13683">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13684">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do elementu nadrzędnego widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13684">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13685">element **widget** Wskaźnik do elementu widget podrzędny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13685">**widget** Pointer to child widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13686">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13686">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13687">Dołączanie widżetu **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13687">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget attach</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13688">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13688">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13689">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13689">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13690">Element nadrzędny or **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13690">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent or widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13691">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13691">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13692">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13692">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13693">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13693">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Attach “my_widget” to “my_parent”. */
status = gx_widget_attach(&my_parent, &my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” is attached to “my_parent”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13731">gx_widget_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13731">gx_widget_background_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-a-widget-background"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13732">Rysowanie tła widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13732">Draw a widget background</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13733">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13733">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_background_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13734">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13734">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13735">Ta usługa wykonuje pełny kolor wypełnienia tła widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13735">This service performs a solid color fill of a widget background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13736">Ta usługa jest automatycznie wywoływana przez funkcję gx_widget_draw, ale może być również wywoływana przez aplikację jako część niestandardowej funkcji rysowania widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13736">This service is automatically called by the gx_widget_draw function, but may also be invoked by the application as part of a customized widget drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13737">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13737">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13738">element **widget** Wskaźnik do elementu widget do rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13738">**widget** Pointer to widget to be drawn</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13739">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13739">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13740">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13740">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13741">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13741">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13742">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13742">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13743">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13743">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET * widget)
{
    /* Call default widget background draw. */
    gx_widget_background_draw(widget);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw(widget);
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_back_attach"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13781">gx_widget_back_attach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13781">gx_widget_back_attach</span></span>
### <a name="attach-widget-to-its-parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13782">Dołącz widżet do jego elementu nadrzędnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13782">Attach widget to its parent</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13783">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13783">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_back_attach(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_WIDGET *widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13784">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13784">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13785">Ta usługa dołącza widżet do określonego elementu nadrzędnego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13785">This service attaches the widget to the specified parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13786">Jeśli widżet jest już dołączony do innego elementu nadrzędnego, najpierw jest odłączony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13786">If the widget is already attached to another parent, it is first detached.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13787">Jeśli widżet jest już dołączony do tego samego elementu nadrzędnego, funkcja nic nie robi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13787">If the widget is already attached to the same parent, the function does nothing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13788">Widżet zmieni się z tyłu elementu podrzędnego w stosunku do porządku osi z.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13788">The widget becomes the back-most child of its parent in terms of z ordering.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13789">Jeśli elementy widget elementu równorzędnego nakładają się, ten element widget jest rysowany za tymi elementami równorzędnymi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13789">If sibling widgets overlap, this widget is drawn behind those siblings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13790">Aby umieścić nowy widżet z góry porządku osi z, użyj gx_widget_attach lub gx_widget_front_move.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13790">To put the new widget in the front of the z-order, use gx_widget_attach or gx_widget_front_move.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13791">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13791">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13792">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do elementu nadrzędnego widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13792">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13793">element **widget** Wskaźnik do elementu widget podrzędny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13793">**widget** Pointer to child widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13794">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13794">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13795">Dołączanie widżetu **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13795">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget attach</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13796">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13796">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13797">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13797">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13798">Element nadrzędny or **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13798">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent or widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13799">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13799">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13800">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13800">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13801">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13801">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Attach “my_widget” to “my_parent”. */
status = gx_widget_back_attach(&my_parent, &my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” is attached to “my_parent”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_back_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13839">gx_widget_back_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13839">gx_widget_back_move</span></span>
### <a name="move-widget-to-back"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13840">Przenieś widżet do tyłu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13840">Move widget to back</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13841">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13841">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_back_move(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_BOOL *return_widget_moved);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13842">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13842">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13843">Ta usługa przenosi widżet do tyłu w porządku osi Z elementów podrzędnych elementu nadrzędnego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13843">This service moves the widget to the back in the parent's Z-order of child widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13844">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13844">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13845">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do elementu nadrzędnego widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13845">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13846">**return_widget_moved** Wskaźnik do elementu docelowego dla flagi wskazującej, że element widget został przeniesiony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13846">**return_widget_moved** Pointer to destination for flag indicating the widget was moved</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13847">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13847">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13848">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne przejście widżetu do tyłu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13848">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget move to the back</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13849">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13849">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13850">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13850">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13851">**GX_NO_CHANGE** (0X08) nie są stosowane żadne zmiany</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13851">**GX_NO_CHANGE** (0x08) No changes are applied</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13852">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13852">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13853">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13853">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13854">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13854">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13855">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13855">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move “my_widget” to the back. */
status = gx_widget_back_move(&my_widget, &moved_flag);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS and “moved_flag” is GX_TRUE, the widget “my_widget” was moved to the back. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_block_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13892">gx_widget_block_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13892">gx_widget_block_move</span></span>
### <a name="move-a-rectangular-block-of-pixels"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13893">Przenoszenie prostokątnego bloku pikseli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13893">Move a rectangular block of pixels</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13894">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13894">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_block_move(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RECTANGLE *block,
    INT xshift, INT yshift);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13895">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13895">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13896">Ta usługa przenosi prostokątny blok pikseli.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13896">This service moves a rectangular block of pixels.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13897">Ta usługa jest najczęściej używana do implementowania szybkiego przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13897">This service is most often used to implement fast scrolling.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13898">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13898">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13899">element **widget** Wskaźnik do elementu widget żądający przeniesienia bloku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13899">**widget** Pointer to widget requesting block move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13900">**Blokuj** Blok ograniczający prostokąt do przeniesienia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13900">**block** Rectangle bounding block to move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13901">**xshift** Kwota przesunięcia x w pikselach.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13901">**xshift** The x shift amount in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13902">**yshift** Wartość przesunięcia y w pikselach.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13902">**yshift** The y shift amount in pixels</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13903">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13903">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13904">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne przejście widżetu do tyłu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13904">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget move to the back</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13905">Nie znaleziono kanwy widżetu **GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13905">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13906">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13906">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13907">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13907">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13908">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13908">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13909">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13909">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13910">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13910">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13911">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13911">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move a block of pixels 20 pixels to the right. */
status = gx_widget_block_move(&my_widget, &size, 20, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the block of pixels was moved. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_border_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13948">gx_widget_border_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13948">gx_widget_border_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-widget-border"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13949">Obramowanie elementu widget rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13949">Draw widget border</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13950">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13950">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_border_draw(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_COLOR border_color,
    GX_COLOR upper_fill, 
    GX_COLOR lower_fill, 
    GX_BOOL fill);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13951">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13951">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13952">Ta usługa rysuje obramowanie widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13952">This service draws the widget border.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13953">Ta usługa jest zwykle wywoływana jako część funkcji rysowania widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13953">This service is normally invoked as part of a widget drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13954">Ta usługa interpretuje flagi stylu obramowania widżetu do rysowania bez obramowania, cienkiego obramowania, wypukłego obramowania, obramowania wgłębienia ani grubego obramowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13954">This service interprets the widget border style flags to draw no border, a thin border, a raised border, a recessed border, or a thick border.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13955">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13955">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13956">element **widget** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13956">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13957">**border_color** Kolor obramowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13957">**border_color** Color of border.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13958">**Dodatek A** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane kolory.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13958">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13959">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodać kolory niestandardowe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13959">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13960">**upper_fill** Kolor górnego wypełnienia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13960">**upper_fill** Color of upper fill.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13961">**Dodatek A** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane kolory.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13961">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13962">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodać kolory niestandardowe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13962">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13963">**lower_fill** Kolor dolnego wypełnienia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13963">**lower_fill** Color of lower fill.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13964">**Dodatek A** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane kolory.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13964">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13965">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodać kolory niestandardowe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13965">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13966">**wypełnienie** Ta flaga logiczna wskazuje, czy obszar widżetu ma być wypełniony podanymi kolorami wypełnienia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13966">**fill** This boolean flag indicates whether or not the widget area should be filled with the supplied fill colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13967">Jeśli ta wartość jest GX_FALSE, rysowany jest tylko obramowanie elementu widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13967">If this value is GX_FALSE, only the widget border is drawn.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13968">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13968">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-13969">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13969">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13970">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13970">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-13971">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13971">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-13972">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-13972">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET * widget)
{
      /* Call widget border draw. */
      gx_widget_border_draw(widget, GX_COLOR_BLACK,
                            GX_COLOR_GREEN, GX_COLOR_BLUE,
                            GX_TRUE);

      /* Add your own drawing here. */

      /* Draw child widgets. */
      Gx_widget_children_draw(widget);
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_border_style_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14009">gx_widget_border_style_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14009">gx_widget_border_style_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-widget-border-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14010">Ustaw styl obramowania widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14010">Set widget border style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14011">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14011">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_border_style_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14012">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14012">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-14013">Ta usługa ustawia styl obramowania widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14013">This service sets the widget border style.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14014">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14014">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14015">element **widget** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14015">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14016">**styl** Styl obramowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14016">**style** Style of border.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14017">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich elementów widget, a także style charakterystyczne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14017">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14018">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14018">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14019">Zestaw stylu obramowania **GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) zakończony powodzeniem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14019">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget border style set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14020">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14020">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14021">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14021">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14022">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14022">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14023">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14023">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-14024">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14024">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14025">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14025">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set border style of “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_border_style_set(&my_widget,
                                    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” border style has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_border_width_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14062">gx_widget_border_width_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14062">gx_widget_border_width_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-border-width"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14063">Pobierz szerokość obramowania elementu widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14063">Get widget border width</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14064">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14064">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_border_width_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_VALUE *return_width);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14065">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14065">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-14066">Ta usługa Pobiera szerokość obramowania widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14066">This service gets the widget border width.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14067">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14067">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14068">element **widget** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14068">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14069">**return_width** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla szerokości obramowania elementu widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14069">**return_width** Pointer to destination for widget border width</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14070">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14070">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14071">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie pobrała szerokość obramowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14071">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved border width</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14072">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14072">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14073">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14073">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14074">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14074">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14076">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14076">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE my_width;

/* Get border width of “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_border_width_get(&my_widget, &my_width);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_width” contains the border width of the widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_canvas_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14113">gx_widget_canvas_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14113">gx_widget_canvas_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14114">Pobierz kanwę widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14114">Get widget canvas</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14115">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14115">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_canvas_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_CANVAS **return_canvas)
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14116">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14116">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-14117">Ta usługa zwraca wskaźnik do kanwy, na której jest renderowany ten element widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14117">This service returns a pointer to the canvas onto which this widget is rendered.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14118">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14118">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14119">element **widget** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14119">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14120">**return_canvas** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla kanwy elementu widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14120">**return_canvas** Pointer to destination for widget’s canvas</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14121">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14121">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14122">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne pobieranie kanwy widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14122">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget canvas get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14123">Nie znaleziono kanwy widżetu **GX_FAILURE** (0x10)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14123">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Widget canvas not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14124">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14124">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14125">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14125">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14126">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14126">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-14127">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14127">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14128">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14128">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get canvas associated with “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_canvas_get(&my_widget, &my_canvas);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_canvas” contains the canvas of the widget “my_widget”. */
```

```C
UINT gx_widget_child_detect(

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14169">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14169">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-14170">Ta usługa wykrywa, czy widżet jest elementem podrzędnym widżetu nadrzędnego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14170">This service detects if the widget is a child of the parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14171">Ta usługa jest zagnieżdżona w celu przeszukiwania elementów podrzędnych i zwraca wartość TRUE, jeśli widżet nadrzędny znajduje się na dowolnym poziomie jako element nadrzędny widżetu podrzędnego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14171">This service nests to search children of children, and returns TRUE if the parent widget is at any level an ancestor of the child widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14172">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14172">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14173">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do elementu nadrzędnego widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14173">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14174">**element podrzędny** Wskaźnik do elementu widget podrzędny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14174">**child** Pointer to child widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14175">**return_detect** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego na potrzeby wykrywania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14175">**return_detect** Pointer to destination for detection</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14176">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14176">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14177">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne wykrywanie elementu podrzędnego widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14177">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget child detection</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14178">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14178">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14179">Element nadrzędny lub podrzędny elementu **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14179">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent or child widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14180">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14180">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-14181">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14181">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14182">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14182">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL detected;

/* Determine if “my_child” is a child of “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_child_detect(&my_widget, &my_child, &detected);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS and “detected” is GX_TRUE, “my_child” is a child of widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_children_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14219">gx_widget_children_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14219">gx_widget_children_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-widget-children"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14220">Elementy podrzędne elementu widget rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14220">Draw widget children</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14221">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14221">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_children_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14222">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14222">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-14223">Ta usługa rysuje wszystkie elementy podrzędne widżetu nadrzędnego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14223">This service draws all children of the parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14224">Ta usługa jest zwykle wywoływana przez wszystkie funkcje rysowania standardowego widżetu do rysowania wszelkich istniejących elementów widget i powinny być wywoływane przez dowolne niestandardowe funkcje rysowania, aby umożliwić dołączenie podrzędnych elementów widget do niestandardowego typu widżetu nadrzędnego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14224">This service is normally invoked by all standard widget drawing functions to draw any existing child widgets, and should be invoked by any custom drawing functions to allow child widgets to be attached to your custom parent widget type.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14225">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14225">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14226">element **widget** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14226">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14227">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14227">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14228">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14228">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14229">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14229">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-14230">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14230">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14231">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14231">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET * widget)
{
        /* Call default widget background draw. */
        gx_widget_background_draw(widget);

        /* Add your own drawing here. */

        /* Draw child widgets. */
        gx_widget_children_draw(widget);
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_client_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14268">gx_widget_client_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14268">gx_widget_client_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-client-area"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14269">Pobierz obszar klienta widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14269">Get widget client area</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14270">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14270">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_client_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_VALUE border_width,
    GX_RECTANGLE *return_client_area);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14271">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14271">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-14272">Ta usługa oblicza obszar klienta widżetu, odejmując szerokość obramowania widżetu od ogólnego rozmiaru widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14272">This service computes the client area of widget by subtracting the widget border width from the overall widget size.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14273">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14273">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14274">element **widget** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14274">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14275">**border_width** Szerokość obramowania widgetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14275">**border_width** Width of widget border</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14276">**return_client_area** Miejsce docelowe dla zwracanego obszaru klienta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14276">**return_client_area** Destination for returning client area</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14277">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14277">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14278">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne odbieranie obszaru klienta widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14278">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget client area get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14279">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14279">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14280">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14280">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14281">Obramowanie widgetu **GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) jest nieprawidłowe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14281">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Widget border not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14282">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14282">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_color_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14321">gx_widget_color_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14321">gx_widget_color_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-color"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14322">Pobierz kolor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14322">Get color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14323">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14323">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_color_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID resource_id,
    GX_COLOR *return_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14324">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14324">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-14325">Ta usługa Pobiera kolor skojarzony z podanym IDENTYFIKATORem zasobu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14325">This service gets the color associated with the supplied resource ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14326">Ta usługa powinna być wywoływana tylko przez widoczne widżety.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14326">This service should only be called by visible widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14327">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14327">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14328">element **widget** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki elementu widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14328">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14329">**resource_id** Identyfikator zasobu koloru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14329">**resource_id** Resource ID of color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14330">**Dodatek B** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane identyfikatory zasobów koloru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14330">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14331">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodać identyfikatory zasobów koloru niestandardowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14331">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14332">**return_color** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla koloru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14332">**return_color** Pointer to destination for color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14333">**Dodatek A** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane kolory.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14333">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14334">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodać kolory niestandardowe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14334">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14335">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14335">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14336">Pobieranie pomyślnego koloru **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14336">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14337">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0X33) Nieprawidłowy identyfikator zasobu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14337">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14338">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Kanwa widżetu jest nieprawidłowa lub element widget jest niewidoczny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14338">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not valid or widget is invisible</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14339">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14339">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14340">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14340">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14341">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14341">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-14342">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14342">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14343">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14343">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_COLOR actual_color;

/* Get color for resource ID MY_FIRST_COLOR_ID. */
status = gx_widget_color_get(my_widget, MY_FIRST_COLOR_RESOURCE_ID,
                            &actual_color);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the actual color is contained in “actual_color”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14347">gx_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14347">gx_widget_create</span></span>
### <a name="create-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14348">Utwórz widżet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14348">Create widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14349">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14349">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_create(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT widget_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14350">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14350">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-14351">Ta usługa tworzy widżet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14351">This service creates a widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14352">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14352">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14353">element **widget** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14353">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14354">**Nazwa** Logiczna nazwa widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14354">**name** Logical name of widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14355">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do elementu nadrzędnego widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14355">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14356">**styl** Stylów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14356">**style** Style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14357">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich elementów widget, a także style charakterystyczne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14357">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14358">**widget_id** Zdefiniowany przez aplikację identyfikator widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14358">**widget_id** Application-defined ID of the widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14359">**rozmiar** Rozmiar widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14359">**size** Size of the widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14360">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14360">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14361">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pomyślnego utworzenia widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14361">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14362">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14362">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14363">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14363">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14364">Element widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) został już utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14364">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14365">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontrolki widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14365">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14366">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14366">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14367">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14367">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-14368">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14368">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14369">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14369">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET my_widget;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Get client area of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_create(&my_widget, "my widget",
                          &my_parent_window, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_WIDGET_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the widget “my_widget” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_created_test"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14406">gx_widget_created_test</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14406">gx_widget_created_test</span></span>
### <a name="test-if-widget-created"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14407">Testuj, czy element widget został utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14407">Test if widget created</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14408">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14408">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_created_test(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_BOOL *return_test);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14409">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14409">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-14410">Ta usługa sprawdza, czy element widget został wcześniej utworzony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14410">This service tests to determine if the widget has previously been created.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14411">Jeśli nie zostaną napotkane żadne błędy, ta funkcja zwróci GX_SUCCESS, bez względu na to, czy element widget został jeszcze utworzony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14411">If no errors are encountered, this function return GX_SUCCESS, regardless if the widget is created yet or not.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14412">Wynik testu znajduje się na return_test wskaźniku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14412">The result of the test is in the return_test pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14413">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14413">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14414">element **widget** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14414">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14415">**return_test** Miejsce docelowe dla wyniku testu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14415">**return_test** Destination for test result</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14416">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14416">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14417">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne zakończenie testu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14417">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful test completion</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14418">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14418">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14419">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14419">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-14420">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14420">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14421">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14421">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL was_created;

/* Test to see if widget “my_widget” is created. */
status = gx_widget_created_test(&my_widget, &was_created);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, no error occurred. If “was_created” is
GX_TRUE, the widget “my_widget” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14458">gx_widget_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14458">gx_widget_delete</span></span>
### <a name="delete-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14459">Usuń widżet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14459">Delete widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14460">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14460">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_delete(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14461">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14461">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-14462">Ta usługa usuwa widżet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14462">This service deletes the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14463">Jeśli blok kontrolki widżetu jest przydzielany dynamicznie, usługa gx_system_memory_free jest wywoływana w celu zwolnienia dynamicznie przydzielonych magazynów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14463">If the widget control block is dynamically allocated, the gx_system_memory_free service is invoked to free dynamically allocated storage.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14464">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14464">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14465">element **widget** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14465">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14466">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14466">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14467">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pomyślnego usunięcia GX_CALLER_ERROR widżetu (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14467">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget delete GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14468">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14468">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14469">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14469">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14470">Funkcja wolnych pamięci **GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) nie jest zdefiniowana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14470">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory free function is not defined</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14471">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14471">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-14472">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14472">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14473">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14473">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Delete widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_delete(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has been deleted. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_detach"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14510">gx_widget_detach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14510">gx_widget_detach</span></span>
### <a name="detach-widget-from-parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14511">Odłącz widżet z elementu nadrzędnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14511">Detach widget from parent</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14512">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14512">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_detach(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14513">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14513">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-14514">Ta usługa odłącza widżet od swojego elementu nadrzędnego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14514">This service detaches the widget from its parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14515">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14515">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14516">element **widget** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14516">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14517">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14517">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14518">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pomyślnego odłączenia widżetu, GX_CALLER_ERROR (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14518">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget detach GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14519">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14519">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14520">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14520">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14521">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14521">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-14522">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14522">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14523">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14523">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Detach widget “my_widget” from its parent. */
status = gx_widget_detach(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has been detached. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14560">gx_widget_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14560">gx_widget_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14561">Element widget rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14561">Draw widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14562">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14562">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14563">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14563">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-14564">Ta usługa rysuje element widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14564">This service draws the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14565">Ta funkcja jest zwykle wywoływana wewnętrznie przez mechanizm odświeżania kanwy GUIX, ale jest dostępna dla aplikacji, aby pomóc w zaimplementowaniu niestandardowych funkcji rysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14565">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14566">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14566">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14567">element **widget** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14567">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14568">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14568">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14569">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14569">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14570">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14570">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-14571">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14571">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14572">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14572">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
      /* Call default widget draw. */
      gx_widget_draw(widget);

      /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_draw_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14609">gx_widget_draw_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14609">gx_widget_draw_set</span></span>
### <a name="assign-the-widget-drawing-function"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14610">Przypisywanie funkcji rysowania widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14610">Assign the widget drawing function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14611">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14611">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_draw_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    VOID (*drawing_function) (GX_WIDGET *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14612">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14612">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-14613">Ta usługa zastępuje domyślną funkcję rysowania widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14613">This service overrides the default drawing function of the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14614">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14614">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14615">element **widget** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14615">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14616">**drawing_function** Wskaźnik do funkcji rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14616">**drawing_function** Pointer to drawing function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14617">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14617">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14618">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne przesłonięcie funkcji rysowania widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14618">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget drawing function override</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14619">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14619">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14620">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14620">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14621">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14621">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14622">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14622">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-14623">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14623">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14624">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14624">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function. */
VOID my_drawing_function(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
      /* Add your own drawing here. */
}

/* Set the drawing function of widget “my_widget” to “my_drawing_function”. */
status = gx_widget_draw_set(&my_widget, my_drawing_function);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has the drawning function “my_drawing_function”. */
```
