## <a name="gx_widget_event_generate"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14661">gx_widget_event_generate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14661">gx_widget_event_generate</span></span>
### <a name="generate-widget-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14662">Generuj zdarzenie widgetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14662">Generate widget event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14663">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14663">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_generate(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    USHORT event_type, LONG value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14664">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14664">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-14665">Ta usługa generuje GX_SIGNAL typ zdarzenia, który jest określonym typem lub klasą GX_EVENT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14665">This service generates a GX_SIGNAL type of event, which is a particular type or class of GX_EVENT.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14666">gx_widget_event_generate () Koduje identyfikator widżetu 16-bitowego wraz z przekazywaniem w event_type, do jednej wartości 32 bit GX_EVENT. gx_event_type.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14666">gx_widget_event_generate() encodes the 16 bit widget ID, along with the passed in event_type, into a single 32 bit GX_EVENT.gx_event_type value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14667">Parametr value jest zakodowany w wygenerowanym gx_event.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14667">The value parameter is encoded into the generated gx_event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14668">gx_event_payload pole gx_event_payload.gx_event_longdata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14668">gx_event_payload.gx_event_longdata field.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-14669">Pole wygenerowana event.gx_event_target jest zawsze ładowane z elementem nadrzędnym widżetu wywołującego, co oznacza, że wygenerowane zdarzenie jest zawsze wysyłane najpierw do elementu nadrzędnego widżetu generującego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14669">The generated event.gx_event_target field is always loaded with the calling widget’s parent, meaning the generated event is always sent first to the parent of the generating widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-14670">Należy pamiętać, że gx_widget_event_generate należy używać tylko do wysyłania typów zdarzeń GX_SIGNAL zakres.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14670">Note that gx_widget_event_generate should only be used to send GX_SIGNAL range event types.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14671">Dla wszystkich innych typów zdarzeń, w tym typów zdarzeń zdefiniowanych przez użytkownika, należy użyć interfejsu API gx_system_event_send (), który przyznaje pełną kontrolę nad każdym polem zdarzenia wypchnięte w kolejce zdarzeń GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14671">For all  other event types, including user defined event types, use the gx_system_event_send() API, which grants full control over every field of the event pushed in the GUIX event queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14672">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14672">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14673">element **widget** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14673">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14674">**event_type** Typ zdarzenia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14674">**event_type** Type of event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14675">**Dodatek E** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane zdarzenia GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14675">**Appendix E** contains pre-defined GUIX events.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14676">Aplikacja może dodawać dodatkowe zdarzenia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14676">Additional events may be added by the application.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14677">**wartość** Dodatkowe informacje o zdarzeniu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14677">**value** Additional event information</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14678">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14678">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14679">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne generowanie zdarzeń widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14679">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget event generation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14680">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14680">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14681">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14681">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14682">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14682">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14683">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14683">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-14684">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14684">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14685">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14685">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Generate a redraw event for widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_event_generate(&my_widget, GX_EVENT_REDRAW, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the redraw event for widget “my_widget” has been generated. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14723">gx_widget_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14723">gx_widget_event_process</span></span>
### <a name="process-widget-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14724">Zdarzenie widżetu procesu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14724">Process widget event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14725">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14725">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_process(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14726">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14726">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-14727">Jest to domyślna funkcja przetwarzania zdarzeń dla wszystkich elementów widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14727">This is the default event processing function for all widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14728">Gdy jest zapisywana funkcja niestandardowego przetwarzania zdarzeń, domyślną akcją dla każdego typu zdarzenia powinna być zawsze przekazanie zdarzenia do typu widżetu, na którym jest oparty element widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14728">When a custom event processing function is written, the default action for any event type should always be to pass the event to the widget type upon which a widget is based.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14729">Widżety, które są oparte na najbardziej podstawowym typie GX_WIDGET, używają gx_widget_event_process jako domyślnej funkcji przetwarzania zdarzeń.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14729">Widgets that are based on the most basic GX_WIDGET type pass use gx_widget_event_process as their default event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14730">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14730">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14731">element **widget** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14731">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14732">**zdarzenie** Wskaźnik do zdarzenia do przetworzenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14732">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14733">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14733">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14734">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne przetwarzanie zdarzeń widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14734">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget event processing</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_event_process_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14777">gx_widget_event_process_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14777">gx_widget_event_process_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-event-processing-function-of-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14778">Ustaw funkcję przetwarzania zdarzeń elementu widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14778">Set event processing function of widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14779">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14779">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_process_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    UINT (*event_processing) (GX_WIDGET *, GX_EVENT *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14780">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14780">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-14781">Ta usługa zastępuje funkcję przetwarzania zdarzeń elementu widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14781">This service overrides the event processing function of the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14782">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14782">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14783">element **widget** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14783">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14784">**Event_Processing** Wskaźnik do nowej funkcji przetwarzania zdarzeń</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14784">**event_processing** Pointer to new event processing function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14785">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14785">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14786">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) zakończono pomyślne przesłonięcie przetwarzania zdarzeń widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14786">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget event processing override</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14787">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14787">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14788">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14788">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14789">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14789">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-14790">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14790">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14791">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14791">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT my_event_process(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree_view,
                      GX_EVENT *event)
{
      UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

      switch(event->gx_event_type)
      {
      case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;

      default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default tree view
               event processing */
            status = gx_tree_view_event_process(tree_view, event);
            break;
      }
      return status;
}

/* Use “my_event_process” to process events for widget “my_tree_view”. */
status = gx_widget_event_process_set((GX_WIDGET *)&my_tree_view,
                    (VOID (*)(GX_WIDGET *))my_event_process);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS all event processing for widget “my_tree_view” is handled by “my_event_process”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_event_to_parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14828">gx_widget_event_to_parent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14828">gx_widget_event_to_parent</span></span>
### <a name="send-event-to-widgets-parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14829">Wyślij zdarzenie do elementu nadrzędnego widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14829">Send event to widget’s parent</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14830">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14830">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_to_parent(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14831">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14831">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-14832">Ta usługa wysyła zdarzenie do elementu nadrzędnego widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14832">This service sends an event to the widget’s parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14833">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14833">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14834">element **widget** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14834">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14835">**zdarzenie** Wskaźnik do zdarzenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14835">**event** Pointer to the event</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14836">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14836">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14837">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie wysłał zdarzenie do elementu nadrzędnego widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14837">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully sent event to widget’s parent</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14838">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14838">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14839">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14839">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14840">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14840">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-14841">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14841">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14842">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14842">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Send my_event to the widget’s parent */
status = gx_widget_event_to_parent(&my_widget, my_event);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event has been delivered to the parent of my_widget. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14879">gx_widget_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14879">gx_widget_fill_color_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-widget-background-color"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14880">Ustaw kolor tła widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14880">Set widget background color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14881">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14881">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_fill_color_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_color_id);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14882">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14882">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-14883">Ta usługa ustawia kolory tła widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14883">This service sets the widget background colors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14884">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14884">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14885">element **widget** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14885">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14886">**normal_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu koloru wypełnienia w normalnym stanie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14886">**normal_color_id** Resource ID of the fill color in normal state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14887">**Dodatek A** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane identyfikatory zasobów koloru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14887">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14888">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodać identyfikatory zasobów koloru niestandardowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14888">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14889">**selected_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu koloru wypełnienia, gdy element widget uzyskuje fokus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14889">**selected_color_id** Resource ID of the fill color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14890">**Dodatek A** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane identyfikatory zasobów koloru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14890">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14891">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodać identyfikatory zasobów koloru niestandardowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14891">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14892">**disabled_color_id** Identyfikator zasobu koloru wypełnienia, gdy styl GX_STYLE_ENABLED nie jest ustawiony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14892">**disabled_color_id** Resource ID of the fill color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14893">**Dodatek A** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane identyfikatory zasobów koloru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14893">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14894">Należy pamiętać, że aplikacja może również dodać identyfikatory zasobów koloru niestandardowego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14894">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14895">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14895">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14896">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie ustawił kolor wypełnienia widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14896">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set widget fill color</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14897">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14897">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14898">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14898">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14899">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14899">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14900">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14900">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-14901">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14901">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14902">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14902">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set background of “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_fill_color_set(&my_widget,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_FILL);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” background has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14939">gx_widget_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14939">gx_widget_find</span></span>
### <a name="find-child-widget-of-parent-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14940">Znajdź element widget elementu nadrzędnego widgetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14940">Find child widget of parent widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14941">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14941">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_find(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    USHORT widget_id,
    INT search_depth, 
    GX_WIDGET **return_widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14942">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14942">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-14943">Ta usługa przeszukuje elementy podrzędne określonego elementu nadrzędnego szukające widżetu z żądanym wartością identyfikatora.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14943">This service searches through the children of the specified parent looking for a widget with the  requested ID value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14944">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14944">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14945">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do elementu nadrzędnego widget, z którego jest uruchamiane wyszukiwanie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14945">**parent** Pointer to parent widget from which search is started</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14946">**widget_id** Identyfikator elementu widget do wyszukania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14946">**widget_id** Widget ID to search for</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14947">**search_depth** Definiuje cykliczny poziom zagnieżdżenia, do którego funkcja będzie przeszukiwać elementy podrzędne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14947">**search_depth** Defines the recursive nesting level into which the function will search child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14948">Jeśli ta wartość jest <= 0, przeszukiwane są tylko natychmiastowe elementy podrzędne widżetu nadrzędnego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14948">If this value is <= 0, only immediate children of the parent widget are searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14949">Jeśli ta wartość jest GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE, wszystkie elementy podrzędne wszystkich elementów widget podrzędnych są wyczerpująco przeszukiwane.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14949">If this value is GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE, all children of all child widgets are exhaustively searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14950">Dla każdej innej wartości > 0 ta wartość ogranicza, jak głęboko zagnieżdżona ta funkcja będzie przeszukiwać za pomocą elementów widget dla żądanego identyfikatora widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14950">For any other value > 0, this value limits how deeply nested this function will search through child widgets looked for the requested widget ID.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14951">**return_widget** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla znalezionego widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14951">**return_widget** Pointer to destination for found widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14952">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14952">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14953">Odnalezienie elementu widget pomyślnego **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14953">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget find</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-14954">Element widget **GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) nie Fount</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14954">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) Widget not fount</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_first_child_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14996">gx_widget_first_child_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14996">gx_widget_first_child_get</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-first-child-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14997">Zwróć wskaźnik do pierwszego widżetu podrzędnego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14997">Return pointer to first child widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14998">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14998">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_first_child_get(
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-14999">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-14999">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15000">GUIX utrzymuje strukturalną listę widżetów nadrzędnych i podrzędnych.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15000">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15001">Ta usługa zwraca wskaźnik do pierwszego widgetu podrzędnego elementu nadrzędnego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15001">This service returns a pointer to the first child widget of the parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15002">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15002">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15003">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do elementu nadrzędnego widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15003">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15004">**widget_return** Wskaźnik do zwrócenia wskaźnika widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15004">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15005">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15005">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15006">Zwrócony wskaźnik **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15006">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15007">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15007">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15008">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0X12) nieprawidłowy widżet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15008">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15009">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15009">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15010">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15010">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15011">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15011">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve child widget pointer. */

GX_WIDGET *get_child_widget(GX_WIDGET *parent)
{
      GX_WIDGET *child;
      UINT status;

      status = gx_widget_first_child_get(parent, &child);
      if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
      {
            return child;
      }
      return GX_NULL;
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15017">gx_widget_top_visible_child_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15017">gx_widget_top_visible_child_find</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_focus_next"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15018">gx_widget_focus_next</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15018">gx_widget_focus_next</span></span>
### <a name="move-focus-to-next-widget-in-navigation-order"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15019">Przenieś fokus do następnego widżetu w kolejności nawigacji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15019">Move focus to next widget in navigation order</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15020">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15020">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_focus_next(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15021">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15021">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15022">Ta usługa przenosi fokus do następnego elementu widget równorzędnego na połączonej liście widżetów, które akceptują fokus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15022">This service moves focus to the next sibling widget in the linked list of widgets that accept focus.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15023">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15023">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15024">element **widget** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki elementu widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15024">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15025">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15025">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15026">Zmieniono fokus **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15026">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) focus was moved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15027">Fokus **GX_FAILURE** (0x00) nie został przeniesiony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15027">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) focus was not moved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15028">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15028">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15029">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15029">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15030">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0X12) nieprawidłowy widżet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15030">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15031">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15031">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15032">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15032">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15033">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15033">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move focus to next widget in navigation order. */ status =
gx_widget_focus_next(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the focus has been moved to the next
widget in the navigation order */
```

```C
UINT gx_widget_focus_previous(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15046">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15046">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15047">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15047">Initialization and threads</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_font_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15051">gx_widget_font_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15051">gx_widget_font_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-font-for-specified-resource-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15052">Pobierz czcionkę dla określonego identyfikatora zasobu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15052">Get font for specified resource ID</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15053">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15053">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_font_get(
    GX_WIDGETG *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID resource_id,
    GX_FONT **return_font);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15054">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15054">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15055">Ta usługa pobiera czcionkę skojarzoną z określonym IDENTYFIKATORem zasobu z tabeli Fonts wyświetlanej, na której jest widoczny ten element widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15055">This service retrieves the font associated with the specified resource ID from the font table of the display on which this widget is visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15056">Ta funkcja powinna być wywoływana tylko przez widoczny element widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15056">This function should only be called by a visible widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15057">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15057">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15058">element **widget** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki elementu widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15058">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15059">**resource_id** Identyfikator zasobu czcionki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15059">**resource_id** Resource ID of font</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15061">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15061">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15062">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie pobrała czcionkę</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15062">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15063">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0X33) Nieprawidłowy identyfikator zasobu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15063">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15064">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Kanwa widżetu jest nieprawidłowa lub element widget jest niewidoczny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15064">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not valid or widget is invisible</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15065">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15065">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15066">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15066">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15067">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15067">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15068">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15068">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15069">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15069">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_FONT *my_font;
/* Get font for MY_FONT_ID. */
status = gx_widget_font_get(widget, MY_FONT_RESOURCE_ID, &my_font);
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the font pointer has been retrieved in “my_font”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_free"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15073">gx_widget_free</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15073">gx_widget_free</span></span>
### <a name="release-memory-associated-with-a-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15074">Zwolnij pamięć skojarzoną z widżetem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15074">Release memory associated with a widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15075">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15075">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_free(GX_WIDGETG *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15076">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15076">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15077">Ta usługa zwalnia pamięć skojarzoną z blokiem kontrolki widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15077">This service releases the memory associated with a widget control block.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15078">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15078">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15079">element **widget** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki elementu widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15079">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15080">**resource_id** Identyfikator zasobu czcionki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15080">**resource_id** Resource ID of font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15081">**return_font** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla wskaźnika czcionki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15081">**return_font** Pointer to destination for font pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15082">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15082">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15083">Element widget **GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) został pomyślnie zwolniony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15083">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully freed widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15084">Funkcja wolnych pamięci **GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) nie jest zdefiniowana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15084">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory free function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15085">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15085">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15086">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15086">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15087">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15087">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15088">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15088">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET widget;
UINT status;

status = gx_widget_allocate(&widget, sizeof(GX_WIDGET))

/* Free a runtime allocated widget. */
if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
      status = gx_widget_free(widget);
}

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the memory that allocated to the widget has been released. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_front_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15125">gx_widget_front_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15125">gx_widget_front_move</span></span>
### <a name="move-widget-to-front"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15126">Przenieś widżet do przodu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15126">Move widget to front</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15127">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15127">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_front_move(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_BOOL *return_moved);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15128">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15128">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15129">Ta usługa przenosi widżet do przodu na liście nadrzędnych elementów widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15129">This service moves the widget to the front in the parent Z-order list of child widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15130">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15130">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15131">element **widget** Wskaźnik do elementu widget do przeniesienia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15131">**widget** Pointer to widget to move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15132">**return_moved** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla elementu widget wskazujący został przeniesiony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15132">**return_moved** Pointer to destination for indication widget was moved</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15133">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15133">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15134">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne przejście widżetu do przodu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15134">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget move to front</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15135">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15135">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15136">Element widget **GX_NO_CHANGE** (0x08) jest już na wierzchu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15136">**GX_NO_CHANGE** (0x08) Widget already in front</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15137">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15137">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15138">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15138">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15139">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15139">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15140">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15140">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15141">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15141">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL widget_moved;

/* Move widget “my_widget” to the front. */
status = gx_widget_front_move(&my_widget, &widget_moved);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS and “widget_moved” is GX_TRUE, the
widget “my_widget” was moved to the front . */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_height_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15178">gx_widget_height_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15178">gx_widget_height_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-height"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15179">Pobierz wysokość widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15179">Get widget height</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15180">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15180">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_height_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    UINT *return_height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15181">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15181">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15182">Ta usługa pobiera wysokość elementu widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15182">This service gets the widget height.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15183">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15183">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15184">element **widget** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15184">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15185">**return_height** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla wysokości widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15185">**return_height** Pointer to destination for widget height</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15186">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15186">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15187">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne pobieranie wysokości widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15187">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget height get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15188">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15188">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15189">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15189">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15190">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15190">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15191">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15191">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15192">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15192">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15193">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15193">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE widget_height;

/* Get height for widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_height_get(&my_widget, &widget_height);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the height of the widget is contained in
“widget_height” . */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_hide"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15230">gx_widget_hide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15230">gx_widget_hide</span></span>
### <a name="hide-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15231">Ukryj widżet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15231">Hide widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15232">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15232">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_hide(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15233">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15233">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15234">Ta usługa ukrywa widżet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15234">This service hides the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15235">Ten widżet jest nadal dołączony do elementu nadrzędnego, ale nie może być rysowany na kanwie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15235">This widget is still attached to it's parent, but it is not allowed to draw on the canvas.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15241">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15241">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15242">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15242">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15243">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15243">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15244">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15244">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15245">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15245">Example</span></span>

```c

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” is hidden. */
```

```C
/* Retrieve child widget pointer. */

GX_WIDGET *get_last_child_widget(GX_WIDGET *parent)
{

      GX_WIDGET *child;

      if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
      {

      }
      return GX_NULL;
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_pixelmap_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15348">gx_widget_pixelmap_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15348">gx_widget_pixelmap_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-pixelmap"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15349">Pobierz Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15349">Get pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15350">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15350">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_pixelmap_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID resource_id,
    GX_PIXELMAP **return_pixelmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15351">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15351">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15352">Ta usługa pobiera Pixelmap skojarzone z podanym IDENTYFIKATORem zasobu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15352">This service gets the pixelmap associated with the supplied resource ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15353">Ta usługa powinna być wywoływana tylko dla widocznych elementów widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15353">This service should only be called for visible widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15354">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15354">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15355">element **widget** Wskaźnik do bloku kontrolki elementu widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15355">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15356">**pixelmap_id** Identyfikator zasobu Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15356">**pixelmap_id** Pixelmap resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15357">**return_pixelmap** Wskaźnik do Pixelmap docelowego wskaźnika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15357">**return_pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap destination pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15358">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15358">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15359">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne pobieranie Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15359">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15360">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0X33) Nieprawidłowy identyfikator zasobu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15360">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15361">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Kanwa widżetu jest nieprawidłowa lub element widget jest niewidoczny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15361">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not valid or widget is invisible</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15362">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15362">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15363">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15363">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15364">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15364">Allowed From</span></span>

```c
GX_PIXELMAP *my_pixelmap;

/* Get the pixelmap associated with MY_PIXELMAP_ID. */
status = gx_widget_pixelmap_get(widget, MY_PIXELMAP_RESOURCE_ID,
                                &my_pixelmap);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_pixelmap” contains the pixemap pointer. */
```

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15385">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15385">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve previous sibling widget */

GX_WIDGET *get_previous(GX_WIDGET *current)
{
      GX_WIDGET *sibling;
      UINT status;

      status = gx_widget_previous_sibling_get(current, &sibling);
      if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
      {
          return sibling;
      }
      return GX_NULL;
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_resize"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15392">gx_widget_resize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15392">gx_widget_resize</span></span>
### <a name="resize-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15393">Zmień rozmiar widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15393">Resize widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15394">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15394">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_resize(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_RECTANGLE *new_size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15395">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15395">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15396">Ta usługa zmienia rozmiar widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15396">This service resizes the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15397">Jeśli widżet jest widoczny, zostanie automatycznie unieważniony i umieszczony w kolejce do przerysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15397">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15398">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15398">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15399">element **widget** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15399">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15400">**new_size** Nowy rozmiar widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15400">**new_size** New widget size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15401">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15401">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15402">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne zmiana rozmiaru widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15402">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget resize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15403">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15403">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15404">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15404">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15405">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15405">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15406">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15406">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15407">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15407">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15408">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15408">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE new_size;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&new_size, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Resize widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_resize(&my_widget, &new_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has been resized. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_shift"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15445">gx_widget_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15445">gx_widget_shift</span></span>
### <a name="shift-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15446">Widżet przesunięcia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15446">Shift widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15447">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15447">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_shift(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_VALUE x_shift,
    GX_VALUE y_shift, 
    GX_BOOL mark_dirty);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15448">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15448">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15449">Ta usługa przenosi widżet i opcjonalnie oznacza go jako zanieczyszczony.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15449">This service shifts the widget and optionally marks it as dirty.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15450">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15450">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15451">element **widget** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15451">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15452">**x_shift** Liczba pikseli do przesunięcia na osi x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15452">**x_shift** Number of pixels to shift on x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15453">**y_shift** Liczba pikseli do przesunięcia na osi y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15453">**y_shift** Number of pixels to shift on y-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15454">**mark_dirty** GX_TRUE wskazujące na zanieczyszczone, w przeciwnym razie GX_FALSE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15454">**mark_dirty** GX_TRUE to indicate dirty, otherwise GX_FALSE</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15455">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15455">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15456">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pomyślnego przesunięcia widżetu GX_CALLER_ERROR (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15456">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget shift GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15457">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15457">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15458">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15458">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15459">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15459">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15460">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15460">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15461">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15461">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Shift widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_shift(&my_widget, 10, 20, GX_FALSE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has been shifted. */
```

### <a name="show-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15499">Pokaż widżet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15499">Show widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15500">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15500">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_show(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15501">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15501">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15502">Ta usługa pokazuje widżet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15502">This service shows the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15503">Widżet stanie się widoczny tylko wtedy, gdy jest dołączony do elementu nadrzędnego, a widżet nadrzędny jest również widoczny.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15503">The widget will become visible only if it is attached to a parent and the parent widget is also visible.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15506">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15506">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15508">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15508">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15509">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15509">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15510">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15510">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_status_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15550">gx_widget_status_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15550">gx_widget_status_add</span></span>
### <a name="add-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15551">Dodaj stan widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15551">Add widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15552">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15552">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_add(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG status)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15553">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15553">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15554">Ta usługa dodaje dowolną kombinację stanu flags do określonego widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15554">This service adds any combination of status flags to the specified widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15555">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15555">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15556">element **widget** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15556">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15557">**stan** Stan do dodania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15557">**status** Status to add</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15559">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne dodanie stanu widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15559">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status add</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15560">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15560">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15561">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15561">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15562">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15562">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15563">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15563">Initialization and threads</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_status_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15601">gx_widget_status_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15601">gx_widget_status_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15602">Pobierz stan widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15602">Get widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15603">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15603">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    ULONG *return_status)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15604">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15604">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15605">Ta usługa pobiera flagi stanu z elementu widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15605">This service retrieves status flags from the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15606">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15606">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15607">element **widget** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15607">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15608">**return_status** Wskaźnik do zwracanego stanu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15608">**return_status** Pointer to the status being returned</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15609">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15609">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15610">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne pobieranie stanu widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15610">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15611">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15611">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15612">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15612">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_status_remove"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15651">gx_widget_status_remove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15651">gx_widget_status_remove</span></span>
### <a name="remove-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15652">Usuń stan widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15652">Remove widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15653">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15653">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_remove(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG status)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15654">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15654">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15655">Ta usługa usuwa określone flagi stanu z wewnętrznej zmiennej stanu widżetów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15655">This service removes the specified status flags from the widgets internal status variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15656">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15656">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15657">element **widget** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15657">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15658">**stan** Stan do usunięcia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15658">**status** Status to remove</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15659">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15659">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15660">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) usunięcie stanu widżetu zakończonego powodzeniem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15660">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status removal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15661">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15661">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15662">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15662">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15663">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15663">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15664">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15664">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15665">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15665">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove status of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_status_remove(&my_widget, status_to_remove);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the status flags are removed from the
widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_status_test"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15702">gx_widget_status_test</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15702">gx_widget_status_test</span></span>
### <a name="test-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15703">Stan elementu widget testu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15703">Test widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15704">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15704">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_test(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG status,
    GX_BOOL *return_test);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15705">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15705">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15706">Ta usługa sprawdza flagi stanu określonego widżetu i zapisuje wynik w pamięci wskazanej przez "return_test".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15706">This service tests the status flags of the specified widget and stores the result in the memory pointed by “return_test”.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15707">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15707">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15708">element **widget** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15708">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15709">**stan** Stan do przetestowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15709">**status** Status to test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15710">**return_status** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla wyniku testu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15710">**return_status** Pointer to destination for result of test</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15711">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15711">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15712">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Test stanu widżetu pomyślne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15712">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15713">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15713">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15714">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15714">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15715">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15715">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15716">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15716">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15717">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15717">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL test_result;

/* Test status of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_status_test(&my_widget, status_to_test,
                              &test_result);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” status was tested
and the result in “test_result”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_string_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15726">gx_widget_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15726">gx_widget_string_get</span></span>
### <a name="retrieve-string-associated-with-a-visible-widget-and-string-id-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15727">Pobierz ciąg skojarzony z widocznym widżetem i IDENTYFIKATORem ciągu (przestarzałe)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15727">Retrieve string associated with a visible widget and string ID (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15728">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15728">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR **string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15729">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15729">Description</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15759">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15759">Return Values</span></span>
