## <a name="gx_widget_style_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15769">gx_widget_style_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15769">gx_widget_style_add</span></span>
### <a name="add-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15770">Dodaj styl widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15770">Add widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15771">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15771">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_add(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15772">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15772">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15773">Ta usługa dodaje styl do widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15773">This service adds a style to the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15774">Ponadto są podejmowane następujące działania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15774">In addition, the following actions are taken.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15775">Jeśli dodany styl jest GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT zostanie dodany stan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15775">If the added style is GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT will be added.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15776">Jeśli dodany styl jest GX_STYLE_ENABLED, GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE zostanie dodany stan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15776">If the added style is GX_STYLE_ENABLED, status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE will be added.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15777">Jeśli widżet jest widoczny, zostanie automatycznie unieważniony i umieszczony w kolejce do przerysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15777">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15778">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15778">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15779">element **widget** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15779">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15780">**styl** Nowy styl do dodania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15780">**style** New style to add.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15781">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich elementów widget, a także style charakterystyczne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15781">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15782">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15782">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15783">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pomyślnego dodania stylu widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15783">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget style add</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15784">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15784">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15785">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15785">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15786">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15786">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15787">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15787">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15788">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15788">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15789">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15789">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Add style to widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_style_add(&my_widget, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the style was successfully applied to the widget “my_widget”. */
```


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15829">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15829">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15830">Ta usługa Pobiera flagę stylu z elementu widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15830">This service retrieves style flag from the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15831">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15831">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15833">**return_style** Wskaźnik do zwracanego stylu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15833">**return_style** Pointer to the style being returned.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15836">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15836">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15839">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15839">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the style flag from widget is saved in “style”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_style_remove"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15878">gx_widget_style_remove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15878">gx_widget_style_remove</span></span>
### <a name="remove-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15879">Usuń styl widgetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15879">Remove widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15880">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15880">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_remove(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15881">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15881">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15882">Ta usługa usuwa styl z elementu widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15882">This service removes a style from the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15883">Ponadto są podejmowane następujące działania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15883">In addition, the following actions are taken.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15884">Jeśli usunięty styl jest GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, stan GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT zostanie usunięty.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15884">If the removed style is GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15885">Jeśli usunięty styl jest GX_STYLE_ENABLED, stan GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE zostanie usunięty.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15885">If the removed style is GX_STYLE_ENABLED, status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15886">Jeśli widżet jest widoczny, zostanie automatycznie unieważniony i umieszczony w kolejce do przerysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15886">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15887">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15887">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15888">element **widget** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15888">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15889">**styl** Styl do usunięcia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15889">**style** Style to remove.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15890">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich elementów widget, a także style charakterystyczne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15890">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15891">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15891">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15892">Pomyślne usunięcie stylu widżetu **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15892">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget style remove</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15893">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15893">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15894">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15894">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15895">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15895">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15896">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15896">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15897">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15897">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15898">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15898">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove style from widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_style_remove(&my_widget,
                                GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED style was removed from the widget “my_widget”.*/
```

## <a name="gx_widget_style_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15935">gx_widget_style_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15935">gx_widget_style_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15936">Ustaw styl widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15936">Set widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15937">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15937">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15938">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15938">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15939">Ta usługa ustawia styl do widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15939">This service sets a style to the widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15940">Jeśli zestaw stylów zawiera GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, zostanie dodany stan GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT, w przeciwnym razie stan zostanie usunięty.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15940">If the set style includes GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT will be added, otherwise the status will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15941">Jeśli zestaw stylów zawiera GX_STYLE_ENABLED, zostanie dodany stan GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE, w przeciwnym razie stan zostanie usunięty.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15941">If the set style includes GX_STYLE_ENABLED, status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE will be added, otherwise the status will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-15942">Jeśli widżet jest widoczny, zostanie automatycznie unieważniony i umieszczony w kolejce do przerysowania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15942">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-15943">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15943">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-15944">element **widget** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-15944">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_top_visible_child_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16102">gx_widget_top_visible_child_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16102">gx_widget_top_visible_child_find</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-visible-child-that-is-top-of-z-order"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16103">Zwróć wskaźnik do widocznego elementu podrzędnego, który jest góra z kolejności Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16103">Return pointer to visible child that is top of Z order</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16104">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16104">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_top_visible_child_find(
    GX_WIDGET *current,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16105">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16105">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-16106">GUIX utrzymuje strukturalną listę widżetów nadrzędnych i podrzędnych.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16106">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="603fa-16107">Ta usługa zwraca wskaźnik do najwyższego widocznego elementu podrzędnego bieżącego widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16107">This service returns a pointer to the topmost visible child of the current widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16108">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16108">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16109">**bieżące** Wskaźnik do bieżącego widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16109">**current** Pointer to current widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16110">**widget_return** Wskaźnik do zwrócenia wskaźnika widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16110">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16111">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16111">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16112">Zwrócony wskaźnik **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16112">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16113">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16113">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16114">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0X12) nieprawidłowy widżet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16114">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16115">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16115">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-16116">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16116">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16117">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16117">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve topmost visible widget on the display */

GX_WIDGET *get_top_window(GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root)
{
    GX_WIDGET *top_window;
    UINT status;

    status = gx_widget_top_visible_child_find(root, &top_window);
    if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        return top_window;
    }
    return GX_NULL;
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_width_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16175">gx_widget_width_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16175">gx_widget_width_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-width"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16176">Pobierz szerokość widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16176">Get widget width</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16177">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16177">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_width_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_VALUE *return_width)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16178">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16178">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-16179">Ta usługa Pobiera szerokość widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16179">This service gets the width of the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16180">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16180">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16181">element **widget** Wskaźnik do widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16181">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16182">**return_width** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla szerokości elementu widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16182">**return_width** Pointer to destination for widget width</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16183">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16183">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16184">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne uzyskanie szerokości widżetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16184">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget width get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16185">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16185">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16186">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16186">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16187">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16187">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16188">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16188">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-16189">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16189">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16190">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16190">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE my_widget_width;

/* Get width of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_width_get(&my_widget, &my_widget_width);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the width of widget “my_widget” is in “my_widget_width”. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_client_height_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16227">gx_window_client_height_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16227">gx_window_client_height_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-window-client-height"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16228">Pobierz wysokość klienta okna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16228">Get window client height</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16229">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16229">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_client_height_get(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_VALUE *return_height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16230">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16230">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-16231">Ta usługa pobiera wysokość klienta okna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16231">This service gets the client height of the window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16232">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16232">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16233">**okno** Wskaźnik do okna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16233">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16234">**return_height** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla wysokości klienta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16234">**return_height** Pointer to destination for client height</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16235">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16235">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16236">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślne pobieranie wysokości przez klienta okna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16236">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window client height get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16237">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16237">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16238">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16238">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16239">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16239">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-16240">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16240">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16241">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16241">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE my_client_height;

/* Get client height of “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_client_height_get(&my_window,
                                     &my_client_height);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the window “my_window” client height is contained in “my_client_height”. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_client_scroll"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16257">gx_window_client_scroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16257">gx_window_client_scroll</span></span>
### <a name="scroll-window-clients"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16258">Przewinięcie okna klientów</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16258">Scroll window clients</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16259">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16259">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_client_scroll(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    GX_VALUE x_scroll,
    GX_VALUE y_scroll);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16260">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16260">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-16261">Ta usługa przewija klientów systemu Windows o określoną liczbę.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16261">This service scrolls the window clients by the specified amount.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16262">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16262">Parameters</span></span>

## <a name="gx_window_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16349">gx_window_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16349">gx_window_create</span></span>
### <a name="create-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16350">Utwórz okno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16350">Create window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16351">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16351">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_create(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT window_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16352">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16352">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-16353">Ta usługa tworzy okno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16353">This service creates a window.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-16354">GX_WINDOW pochodzi od GX_WIDGET i obsługuje wszystkie gx_widget usługi interfejsu API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16354">GX_WINDOW is derived from GX_WIDGET and supports all gx_widget API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16355">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16355">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16356">**okno** Wskaźnik do bloku sterowania oknem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16356">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16357">**Nazwa** Nazwa logiczna okna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16357">**name** Logical name of window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16358">**element nadrzędny** Wskaźnik do elementu nadrzędnego widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16358">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16359">**styl** Styl okna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16359">**style** Window style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16360">**Dodatek D** zawiera wstępnie zdefiniowane style ogólne dla wszystkich elementów widget, a także style charakterystyczne dla widżetu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16360">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16361">**window_id** Zdefiniowany przez aplikację identyfikator okna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16361">**window_id** Application-defined ID of the window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16362">**rozmiar** Rozmiar okna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16362">**size** Size of the window</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16363">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16363">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16364">Pomyślne utworzenie okna **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16364">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16365">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16365">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16366">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16366">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16367">Element widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) został już utworzony</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16367">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16368">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0X19) Nieprawidłowy rozmiar bloku kontrolki widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16368">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16369">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16369">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16370">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16370">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-16371">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16371">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16372">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16372">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create window “my_window”. */

                          &my_parent_window, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
                          MY_WINDOW_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS window “my_window” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16388">gx_window_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16388">gx_window_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16389">Okno rysowania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16389">Draw window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16390">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16390">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16391">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16391">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-16392">Ta usługa rysuje okno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16392">This service draws a window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16393">Ta usługa jest zwykle wywoływana wewnętrznie podczas odświeżania kanwy, ale może być również wywoływana z funkcji niestandardowego rysowania okna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16393">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom window drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16394">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16394">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16395">**okno** Wskaźnik do bloku sterowania oknem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16395">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16396">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16396">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16397">**Brak**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16397">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16398">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16398">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-16399">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16399">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16400">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16400">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom window draw function. */

VOID my_custom_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{
    /* Call default window draw. */
    gx_window_draw(window);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_window_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16416">gx_window_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16416">gx_window_event_process</span></span>
### <a name="process-window-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16417">Zdarzenie okna procesu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16417">Process window event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16418">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16418">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_event_process(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16419">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16419">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-16420">Ta usługa przetwarza zdarzenie dla tego okna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16420">This service processes an event for this window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16421">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16421">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16422">**okno** Wskaźnik do bloku sterowania oknem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16422">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16423">**zdarzenie** Wskaźnik do zdarzenia do przetworzenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16423">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16424">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16424">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16425">Zakończono przetwarzanie zdarzenia okna **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16425">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window event processing</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16426">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16426">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16427">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16427">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16428">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16428">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16429">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16429">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-16430">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16430">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16431">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16431">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic window event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_window_event_process(GX_WINDOW *window,
                                 GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;
        default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default window
            event processing */
            status = gx_window_event_process(window, event);
            break;
        }
        return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_window_execute"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16447">gx_window_execute</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16447">gx_window_execute</span></span>
### <a name="modally-execute-a-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16448">Modalne wykonywanie okna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16448">Modally execute a window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16449">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16449">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_execute(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    ULONG *return_ptr)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16450">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16450">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-16451">Ta usługa modalnie wykonuje okno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16451">This service modally executes a window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16452">Wszystkie dane wejściowe użytkownika (zdarzenia pióra itp.) poza obszarem klienta okna zostaną zignorowane.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16452">Any user input (pen events, etc.) outside of the window client area will be ignored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16453">Należy zauważyć, że ta funkcja wprowadza ciągłą pętlę wykonywania i nie wraca do obiektu wywołującego do momentu zakończenia wykonywania modelu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16453">Note that this function enters a continuous blocking execution loop, and does not return to the caller until the model execution is terminated.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-16454">Wykonywanie modalne kończy się, gdy przetwarzanie zdarzeń dla każdego odebranego zdarzenia zwróci wartość stanu różną od zera lub gdy zostanie wywołana funkcja interfejsu API gx_window_close.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16454">Modal execution terminates when the event processing for any received event returns a non-zero status value, or when the gx_window_close API function is invoked.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16455">Kod powrotu niezerowego przetwarzania zdarzeń jest zwracany do obiektu wywołującego za pomocą return_ptr przekazana do tego interfejsu API</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16455">The non-zero event processing return code is returned to the caller through the return_ptr passed into this API</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16456">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16456">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16457">**okno** Wskaźnik do bloku sterowania oknem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16457">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16458">**return_ptr** Lokalizacja do zapisania stanu zakończenia wykonywania operacji modalnych.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16458">**return_ptr** Location to save modal execution exit status.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16459">Może być GX_NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16459">May be GX_NULL.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16460">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16460">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16461">Pomyślne wykonanie **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16461">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful execution</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16462">**GX_SYSTEM_EVENT_RECEIVE_ERROR (0x05)** Odbiór zdarzenia z kolejki zdarzeń nie powiodło się</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16462">**GX_SYSTEM_EVENT_RECEIVE_ERROR(0x05)** Pickup event from event queue failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16463">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16463">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16464">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16464">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16465">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16465">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16466">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16466">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-16467">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16467">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16468">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16468">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Execute a modal window. */
status = gx_window_execute(&my_window, &return_code);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the window was executed, and return_code holds the execution return code. */
```

### <a name="process-event-for-the-root-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16536">Przetwarzaj zdarzenie dla okna głównego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16536">Process event for the root window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16537">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16537">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_root_create(
    GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root_window,
    GX_EVENT *event)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16538">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16538">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-16539">Ta usługa przetwarza zdarzenia dla określonego okna głównego.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16539">This service processes events for the specified root window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16540">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16540">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16541">**root_window** Wskaźnik do bloku sterowania oknem głównym</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16541">**root_window** Pointer to root window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16542">**zdarzenie** Wskaźnik do zdarzenia do przetworzenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16542">**event** Pointer to the event to be processed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16543">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16543">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16544">**GX_SUCCESS** (0X00) pomyślnie przetworzył zdarzenie głównego okna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16544">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed root window event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16545">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16545">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16546">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16546">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16547">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16547">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-16548">Wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16548">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16549">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16549">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic root window event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_root_window_event_process(GX_ROOT_WINDOW *root,
                                      GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default root window
            event processing */
        status = gx_window_root_event_process(root, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_window_root_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16565">gx_window_root_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16565">gx_window_root_find</span></span>

```C
    GX_WINDOW_ROOT **return_root_window);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16568">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16568">Description</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16573">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16573">Return Values</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16578">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16578">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-16579">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16579">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16580">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16580">Example</span></span>

```C

status = gx_window_root_find(&my_window, &root_window);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “root_window” contains the root window for window “my_window”. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_scroll_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16596">gx_window_scroll_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16596">gx_window_scroll_info_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-window-scroll-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16597">Pobierz informacje przewijania okna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16597">Get window scroll info</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16598">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16598">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_scroll_info_get(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLL_INFO *return_scroll_info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16599">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16599">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-16600">Ta usługa pobiera informacje o przewinięciu okna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16600">This service gets the window scroll information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16601">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16601">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16602">**okno** Wskaźnik do okna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16602">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16603">**styl** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL lub GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16603">**style** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL or GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16604">**return_scroll_info** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla informacji przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16604">**return_scroll_info** Pointer to destination for scroll info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16605">Okno nadrzędne inicjuje tę strukturę, aby poinformować pasek przewijania o łącznym rozmiarze okna nadrzędnego, widocznym obszarze i przyrostie przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16605">The parent window initializes this structure to inform the scrollbar of the parent window total size, viewable area, and scrolling increment and limits.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16606">Domyślna implementacja używa obszaru klienckiego systemu Windows jako obszaru możliwego do wyświetlania i przewijania według pikseli, ale dostosowana implementacja okna może korzystać z parametrów przewijania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16606">The default implementation uses the windows client area as the viewable area and scrolls by pixels, but customized window implementation can utilize the scroll parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16607">**Dodatek I** zawiera definicję struktury GX_SCROLL_INFO</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16607">**Appendix I** contains the definition of the GX_SCROLL_INFO structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16608">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16608">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16609">Pobieranie informacji o pomyślnym przewinięciu okna **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16609">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window scroll info get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16610">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16610">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16611">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16611">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16612">Nieprawidłowy typ **GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16612">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Invalid type</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16613">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16613">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-16614">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16614">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16615">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16615">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLL_INFO scroll_info;

/* Get scroll information for window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_scroll_info_get(&my_window,
                    GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL, &scroll_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “scroll_info” contains the scroll information for window “my_window”. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_scrollbar_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16631">gx_window_scrollbar_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16631">gx_window_scrollbar_find</span></span>
### <a name="find-window-scrollbar"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16632">Znajdź pasek przewijania okna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16632">Find window scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16633">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16633">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_scrollbar_find(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    USHORT type,
    GX_SCROLLBAR **return_scrollbar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16634">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16634">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-16635">Ta usługa znajduje pasek przewijania dla określonego okna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16635">This service finds the scrollbar for the specified window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16636">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16636">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16637">**okno** Wskaźnik do okna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16637">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16638">**Typ** GX_TYPE_VERTICAL_SCROLL lub GX_TYPE_HORIZONTAL_SCROLL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16638">**type** GX_TYPE_VERTICAL_SCROLL or GX_TYPE_HORIZONTAL_SCROLL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16639">**return_scrollbar** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla paska przewijania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16639">**return_scrollbar** Pointer to destination for scrollbar</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16641">Odnalezienie pomyślnego paska przewijania okna **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16641">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window scrollbar find</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16642">Nie znaleziono paska przewijania **GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16642">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) Scrollbar not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16643">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16643">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16644">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16644">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16645">Nieprawidłowy typ **GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16645">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Invalid type</span></span>

```C
                 GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL, &my_scrollbar);
```

### <a name="get-window-wallpaper"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16665">Pobierz tapetę okna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16665">Get window wallpaper</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16666">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16666">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_wallpaper_get(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID *return_wallpaper_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16667">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16667">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-16668">Ta usługa pobiera tapetę dla określonego okna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16668">This service gets the wallpaper for the specified window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16669">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16669">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16670">**okno** Wskaźnik do okna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16670">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16671">**return_wallpaper_id** Wskaźnik do miejsca docelowego dla identyfikatora zasobu Tapety</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16671">**return_wallpaper_id** Pointer to destination for resource ID of wallpaper</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16672">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16672">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16674">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16674">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16675">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16675">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16676">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16676">Allowed From</span></span>

```C

/* Get wallpaper for window “my_window”. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “my_window_wallpaper” contains the wallpaper resource ID for window “my_window”. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_wallpaper_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16694">gx_window_wallpaper_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16694">gx_window_wallpaper_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-window-wallpaper"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16695">Ustaw tapetę okna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16695">Set window wallpaper</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16696">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16696">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_wallpaper_set(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID wallpaper_id,
    GX_BOOL tile);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16697">Opis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16697">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-16698">Ta usługa ustawia tapetę dla określonego okna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16698">This service sets the wallpaper for the specified window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16699">Parametry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16699">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16700">**okno** Wskaźnik do okna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16700">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16701">**wallpaper_id** Identyfikator zasobu tapety do użycia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16701">**wallpaper_id** Resource ID of wallpaper to use</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16702">**kafelek** Tapeta jest rozmieszczana w przypadku GX_TRUE, w przeciwnym razie tapeta nie jest rozrozmieszczana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16702">**tile** Wallpaper is tiled if GX_TRUE, otherwise wallpaper is not tiled</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16703">Wartości zwrócone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16703">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16704">Pomyślne ustawienie tapety okna **GX_SUCCESS** (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16704">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window wallpaper set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16705">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0X11) Nieprawidłowy obiekt wywołujący tej funkcji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16705">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16706">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0X07) Nieprawidłowy wskaźnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16706">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="603fa-16707">Element widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) jest nieprawidłowy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16707">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16708">Dozwolone z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16708">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="603fa-16709">Inicjalizacje i wątki</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16709">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="603fa-16710">Przykład</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="603fa-16710">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set wallpaper for window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_wallpaper_set(&my_window,
                                 MY_WALLPAPER_RESOURCE_ID,
                                 GX_TRUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the wallpaper for window “my_window” is set. */
```
